From Rem_Ownrs

  From Customer
 Where ((:Parameter.User_No = 1)
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Lpad(C_Code,15,'0')
Select Brn_No,
 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
 Order By Cmp_No , Brn_No

 And Exists (Select 1  From S_Brn_Usr_Priv  
                                             Where U_Id =

From Customer

SELECT DISTINCT M.CMP_NO,M.BRN_NO,M.YER_CODE,M.ASSEMBLER,D.ACC_CODE,V.DV_CODE,M.QTY,P.PERIOD_CODE,SUM(P.AMT) AMT,SUM(P.AMT) / M.QTY  AVG   FROM MRP_PCM_STD_COST_VAR_MSTR M,MRP_PCM_STD_COST_VAR_DLS D,MRP_PCM_STD_COST_VAR_PERIOD P,MRP_PCM_ACCOUNTS_DEF DF,MRP_PCM_DISTRIBUTION_VARIABLES V  WHERE M.CMP_NO = D.CMP_NO  AND M.BRN_NO = D.BRN_NO  AND M.ASSEMBLER = D.ASSEMBLER  AND M.YER_CODE = D.YER_CODE  AND D.YER_CODE = P.YER_CODE  AND D.SEQ_SCVD = P.SEQ_SCVD  AND DF.ACC_CODE = D.ACC_CODE  AND DF.ACC_CTGRY = :b1  AND D.YER_CODE = 7  AND P.PERIOD_CODE = 10  AND V.BASEDON = 2  AND V.DV_CODE = :b2  GROUP BY M.CMP_NO,M.BRN_NO,M.YER_CODE,P.PERIOD_CODE,M.ASSEMBLER,D.ACC_CODE,V.DV_CODE,M.QTY"INSERT INTO MRP_PCM_VARIABLES_VALUES ( DV_CODE,CV_DATE,CV_VALUE,YER_CODE,PERIOD_CODE,CMP_NO,BRN_NO,P_CNTU,CRT_DATE,CRT_USR,ITEM_CODE )  VALUES ( :b1,LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(:b2 || ''-''  || :b3 ,''MM-YY'')),:b4,:b3,:b2,:b7,:b8,0,SYSDATE,:b9,:b10  )"

               FROM MRP_SGS_SHOPS_FLOOR_CODING
               WHERE CMP_NO = :PARAMETER.CMP_NO AND BRN_NO = :PARAMETER.BRANCH 
SELECT  DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,YER_NAME_A,YER_NAME_F),  TO_CHAR(YER_CODE)
                   FROM  MRP_YEAR
                   WHERE  P_CLS  = 0  AND P_CLS = 0 
SELECT CUR_NAME,to_char(CUR_CODE)
           FROM   EX_RATE  WHERE  L_F = 1 OR STOCK_CUR = 1 
ORDER BY

 From  Group_Details

 From Rms_Sctn

  Order By Rms_Sctn.Sctn_No

   Where Food_Grp_No Like '%'||:PARAMTRS.temp_data||'%'

  Order  By Food_Grp_No

               From Ias_Itm_Mst 
  Order By income_date 
SELECT SUB_FOOD_GRP_NO,
         (SELECT DECODE( :PARAMETER.LANG_NO, 1, NVL(FOOD_GRP_L_NM, FOOD_GRP_F_NM), NVL(FOOD_GRP_F_NM, FOOD_GRP_L_NM)) FOOD_GRP_NM 
            FROM RMS_FOOD_GRP 
           WHERE FOOD_GRP_NO = RMS_SUB_FOOD_GRP.FOOD_GRP_NO
    FROM RMS_SUB_FOOD_GRP
   WHERE SUB_FOOD_GRP_NO LIKE '%' || :PARAMTRS.TEMP_DATA || '%' AND FOOD_GRP_NO = NVL(:PARAMETER.CURRENT_SUB_FOOD_GRP,FOOD_GRP_NO)
ORDER BY SUB_FOOD_GRP_NO

   From  Ias_mainsub_grp_dtl
     Where mng_code Like '%'||:PARAMTRS.temp_data||'%'
    Order  by mng_code

   From  Ias_sub_grp_dtl
 Where subg_code Like '%'||:PARAMTRS.temp_data||'%'
       Order  by Subg_code

   From  IAS_ALTERNATIVE_GROUP
    Where group_no Like '%'||:PARAMTRS.temp_data||'%'
     Order  by group_no

From Ias_Itm_Mst 
Where I_Code Like '%'||:Paramtrs.Temp_Data||'%'
And Exists (Select 1 From Privilege_Gc Where U_Id=:Parameter.User_No 
 Order By I_Code

                        From Ias_Items_Activity 
    Where Activity_No Like '%'||:PARAMTRS.temp_data||'%'
     Order  By Activity_No
Select w_code,
From warehouse_details 
Where w_code Like '%'||:PARAMTRS.temp_data||'%'
And Exists (Select 1 from privilege_wh  where  privilege_wh.w_code=warehouse_details.w_code
Order By w_code
Select  Assistant_No, 
   From  Ias_Assistant_Group
    Where Assistant_No Like '%'||:PARAMTRS.temp_data||'%'
     Order  by Assistant_No
Select  Detail_No, 
   From  Ias_Detail_Group
    Where Detail_No Like '%'||:PARAMTRS.temp_data||'%'
     Order  by Detail_No
Select Brn_No,
 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
 Order By Cmp_No , Brn_No
Select u_id,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,U_a_Name,nvl(U_e_Name,U_a_Name)) U_name From User_r Order by U_id
Select v_code ,
 From 
   Where v_code Like '%'||:PARAMTRS.temp_data||'%'
          And Exists (Select 1 From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No And A_Code = v_details.v_a_code
          And Exists (Select 1 From Ias_Priv_Vendor
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No And v_code = v_details.v_code
Order By Lpad (v_code,15,'0')
From Bill Date
From Date
 And Exists ( Select 1 From Ias_V_Vndr_Itm Where I_Code = Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code And V_Code Between 
 And Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code  In ( Select I_Code From Ias_Itm_Mst Minus Select I_Code From Ias_Itm_Unt_Barcode  ) 
 And Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code  In ( Select I_Code From Ias_Itm_Mst Minus Select I_Code From Ias_V_Vndr_Itm  ) 
 and Exists(select 1
                                 From privilege_gc
                                Where Ias_Itm_Mst.G_CODE = privilege_gc.G_CODE
 And Exists( Select 1
                               From Rms_Food_Grp_Prv
                                Where Ias_Itm_Mst.FOOD_GRP_NO = Rms_Food_Grp_Prv.FOOD_GRP_NO
 And Exists (Select 1 From Ias_Itm_Wcode
                                Where Ias_Itm_Wcode.I_Code = Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code 
 And Not Exists (Select 1 From Ias_Itm_Wcode
                                           Where Ias_Itm_Wcode.I_Code = Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code
 And Exists (Select 1 From Ias_Itm_Wcode
                                Where Ias_Itm_Wcode.I_Code = Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code
 And Exists (Select privilege_wh.w_code From privilege_wh  Where gr_detail.w_code  = privilege_wh.w_code And  view_flag=1 and u_id=
 Order By SALES.i_code 
 Order By  i_name 
From INCOME DATE
Group By Type
From Active
Select  Activity_No, 
                        From Ias_Items_Activity Where 1=1 
 And Exists ( Select 1 From IAS_ITEMS_ACTIVITY_PRIV
                                 Where IAS_ITEMS_ACTIVITY_PRIV.Activity_No =Ias_Items_Activity.Activity_No
 Order BY Activity_No
Select  Activity_No, 
                        From Ias_Items_Activity Where 1=1 
 And Exists ( Select 1 From IAS_ITEMS_ACTIVITY_PRIV
                                 Where IAS_ITEMS_ACTIVITY_PRIV.Activity_No =Ias_Items_Activity.Activity_No
 Order BY Activity_No
From Hall No
From Section No
SELECT DATA_TYPE   FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS  WHERE TABLE_NAME = UPPER(''IAS_ITM_MST'')  AND UPPER(COLUMN_NAME) = UPPER(SUBSTR(:b1,INSTR(:b1,''.'') + 1 ,LENGTH(:b1) - INSTR(:b1,''.'') ))"
 Select  Nvl(IAS_DBS_SYS_PKG.Get_Comment(
             From User_Col_Comments

                    Order By Column_Name

               from mrp_sgs_shops_floor_coding

SELECT COUNT(*)   FROM MRP_SGS_STAGES_CODING  WHERE STG_MAIN IN (SELECT STG_MAIN   FROM MRP_SGS_STAGES_CODING  WHERE STG_MAIN = :b1  AND STG_CODE = :b2 )"
SELECT SC.SHF_CODE,DECODE(:b1,1,SH.SHF_NAME_A,NVL(SH.SHF_NAME_F,SH.SHF_NAME_A)) SHF_NAME,SC.LN_CODE,DECODE(:b1,1,L.LN_NAME_A,NVL(L.LN_NAME_F,L.LN_NAME_A)) LN_NAME,SC.STG_CODE,DECODE(:b1,1,S.STG_NAME_A,NVL(S.STG_NAME_F,S.STG_NAME_A)) STG_NAME,SC.STG_MAIN,SC.STG_LVL,SC.STG_PRIORITY   FROM MRP_SGS_SHOPS_FLOOR_CODING SH,MRP_SGS_LINES_CODING L,MRP_SGS_STAGES_CODING SC,MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION S  WHERE SH.CMP_NO = :b4  AND SH.BRN_NO = :b5  AND SH.CMP_NO = L.CMP_NO  AND SH.BRN_NO = L.BRN_NO  AND SH.SHF_CODE = L.SHF_CODE  AND SH.P_CNTU = 0  AND L.CMP_NO = SC.CMP_NO  AND L.BRN_NO = SC.BRN_NO  AND L.SHF_CODE = SC.SHF_CODE  AND L.LN_CODE = SC.LN_CODE  AND L.P_CNTU = 0  AND SC.CMP_NO = S.CMP_NO  AND SC.BRN_NO = S.BRN_NO  AND SC.STG_CODE = S.STG_CODE  AND SC.P_CNTU = 0 ORDER BY 1,3,9"
SELECT LN_CODE,
FROM MRP_SGS_LINES_CODING
WHERE     MRP_SGS_LINES_CODING.SHF_CODE =  :MRP_SGS_STAGES_CODING.SHF_CODE

FROM  MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION,
WHERE  
SELECT STG_CODE,
FROM MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION
WHERE 
SELECT DECODE(:b1,STG_NAME_A,STG_NAME_F)   FROM MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION  WHERE MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION.STG_CODE = :b2"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,STG_NAME_A,STG_NAME_F)   FROM MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION  WHERE MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION.STG_CODE = :b2  AND MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION.CMP_NO = :b3  AND MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION.BRN_NO = :b4"SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,LN_NAME_A,LN_NAME_F)   FROM MRP_SGS_LINES_CODING  WHERE MRP_SGS_LINES_CODING.CMP_NO = :b2  AND MRP_SGS_LINES_CODING.BRN_NO = :b3  AND MRP_SGS_LINES_CODING.SHF_CODE = :b4  AND MRP_SGS_LINES_CODING.LN_CODE = :b5"SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,STG_NAME_A,STG_NAME_F)   FROM MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION  WHERE MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION.STG_CODE = :b2  AND MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION.CMP_NO = :b3  AND MRP_SGS_STAGES_DEFINITION.BRN_NO = :b4"

 From Ias_Items_Activity

Select warehouse_details.w_code, 
from warehouse_details
where Exists (select 1 from PRIVILEGE_WH
where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and w_code=warehouse_details.w_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
order by warehouse_details.w_code
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 OR (:Parameter.User_No=1) )) 
Order By Cc_code
Select Pj_No,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,pj_a_name,nvl(pj_e_name,pj_a_name)) pj_name ,
 from Ias_Projects,IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP 
where Ias_Projects.group_no=IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP.group_no(+)
  and Exists (select 1 from IAS_PRIV_PROJECTS
               where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and Pj_No=Ias_Projects.Pj_No and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 OR (:Parameter.User_No=1) )) 
order by Pj_No
SELECT   Actv_no,
    FROM ias_Actvty, ias_Actvty_group
   WHERE ias_Actvty.group_no = ias_Actvty_group.group_no(+)
            SELECT 1
              FROM ias_priv_Actvty
             WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no
ORDER BY Actv_No

ORDER BY      DLR_NO

 From S_Brn

       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

CREATE TABLE Fas_Print_Barcode_Tmp ( 
Delete From Fas_Print_Barcode_Tmp Where Ad_U_Id =
Delete From Fas_Print_Barcode_Tmp Where FAS_CODE Is Null
Err. When Fetch Data From Fas_Print_Barcode_Tmp 
INSERT INTO FAS_PRINT_BARCODE_TMP ( FAS_CODE,FAS_NAME,FAS_BARCODE,FAS_QTY,AD_U_ID,TRMNL_NAME,LOC_CODE,EMP_NO,GRP_CODE )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,USERENV(''TERMINAL''),:b6,:b7,:b8  )"SELECT 1   FROM FAS_PRINT_BARCODE_TMP  WHERE FAS_CODE IS NOT NULL   AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT FAS_CODE,FAS_NAME,FAS_BARCODE,FAS_QTY,RCRD_NO,LOC_CODE,GRP_CODE,EMP_NO   FROM FAS_PRINT_BARCODE_TMP  WHERE AD_U_ID = :b1 ORDER BY RCRD_NO"
SELECT NULL "FLD1", NULL "FLD2", NULL "FLD3", NULL "FLD4", NULL "FLD5", NULL "FLD6", NULL "FLD7", NULL "FLD8", NULL "FLD9", NULL "FLD10", NULL "FLD11" , NULL "FLD12", NULL "FLD13" , NULL "FLD14" , NULL "FLD15",

SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,NVL(AS_A_NAME,AS_E_NAME),NVL(AS_E_NAME,AS_A_NAME)) AS_NAME,NVL(AS_BARCODE,AS_CODE)   FROM FAS_ASSETS_MST  WHERE FAS_ASSETS_MST.AS_CODE = :b2  AND FAS_ASSETS_MST.BRN_NO = :b3"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,NVL(AS_A_NAME,AS_E_NAME),NVL(AS_E_NAME,AS_A_NAME)) AS_NAME   FROM FAS_ASSETS_MST  WHERE FAS_ASSETS_MST.AS_CODE = :b2  AND FAS_ASSETS_MST.BRN_NO = :b3"
SELECT 1 FROM FAS_LOC WHERE LOC_CODE  = '

                                           Where  
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,NVL(I_NAME,I_E_NAME),NVL(I_E_NAME,I_NAME))   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE I_CODE = :b2  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
 SELECT SUM(Avl_Qty) FROM (
          SELECT  Avl_Qty 
           FROM TABLE(IAS_INV_KIT_ITM_PKG.GET_KIT_AVLQTY_FNC(P_Kit_Item_No => '
(Select I_Code, Ias_Itm_Pkg.Get_Icode_Min_Unit(I_Code) Itm_Unt, Sum(Nvl(P_Qty, 0)) RQ_Qty, Get_Icode_Avlqty(I_Code, 1, W_Code) Avl_Qty, W_Code, Kit_Itm From (Select I_Code, Di_Code, P_Qty, W_Code, Kit_Itm, Lvl_No From (With Rcrsv(I_Code, Di_Code, P_Qty, W_Code, Kit_Itm, Lvl_No) As (Select D.KIT_ITEM_NO I_Code, K.I_Code Di_Code, ((Nvl(D.I_QTY, 0) * Nvl(D.P_Size, 1)) * (Nvl(K.I_Qty, 0) * Nvl(K.P_Size, 1))) P_Qty, D.W_Code, Nvl(I.Kit_Itm,0) Kit_Itm, 2 Lvl_No From IAS_PRPRTN_DATA_TMP D, Kit_Items K,IAS_ITM_MST I Where D.KIT_ITEM_NO = K.Kit_Item_No AND I.I_CODE=K.I_CODE Union All Select K.Kit_Item_No, K.I_Code, (Nvl(K.I_Qty, 0) * Nvl(K.P_Size, 0)) * Rcrsv.P_Qty, Rcrsv.W_Code, Nvl(I.Kit_Itm, 0) Kit_Itm, Lvl_No + 1 From Kit_Items K, Ias_Itm_Mst I, Rcrsv Where K.I_Code = I.I_Code And K.Kit_Item_No = Rcrsv.Di_Code) Select Di_Code I_Code, I_Code Di_Code, P_Qty, W_Code, Kit_Itm, Lvl_No From Rcrsv union all Select D.KIT_ITEM_NO I_Code, null Di_Code, (Nvl(D.I_QTY, 0) * Nvl(D.P_Size, 1)) P_Qty, D.W_Code, Nvl(I.Kit_Itm,0) Kit_Itm, 1 Lvl_No From IAS_PRPRTN_DATA_TMP D,IAS_ITM_MST I Where D.KIT_ITEM_NO = i.i_code )) Where Kit_Itm = 0 Group By I_Code, W_Code, Kit_Itm)
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,NVL(I_NAME,I_E_NAME),NVL(I_E_NAME,I_NAME))   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = :b2"SELECT NVL(I_PRICE,0)   FROM IAS_ITEM_PRICE  WHERE LEV_NO = :b1  AND I_CODE = :b2  AND ITM_UNT = :b3"

Update Ias_Bill_Dtl A               
             Set Stk_Cost =(Select Round(Nvl(Sum((Nvl(I_Qty,0)+Nvl(Free_Qty,0))*Nvl(Stk_Cost,0)),0)/Nvl(Sum(Nvl(I_Qty,0)+Nvl(Free_Qty,0)),1),6)
                             From Detail_Out_Bills
                            Where Bill_Ser = A.Bill_Ser
                 Out_Qty =(Nvl((Select Nvl(Sum(Nvl(I_Qty,0)),0) Iqty                        
                                   From Detail_Out_Bills
                                  Where Bill_Ser = A.Bill_Ser
                                 Nvl((Select Nvl(Sum(P_Qty),0)/Nvl(A.P_Size,1) Iqty From Ias_Rt_Bill_Mst M,Ias_Rt_Bill_Dtl D
                                  Where M.Rt_Bill_Ser = D.Rt_Bill_Ser
               Out_Free_Qty =(Nvl((Select Nvl(Sum(Nvl(Free_Qty,0)),0) Fqty                        
                                             From Detail_Out_Bills
                                            Where Bill_Ser = A.Bill_Ser
                                           Nvl((Select  Nvl(Sum(Nvl(Free_Qty,0)*Nvl(P_Size,1)),0)/Nvl(A.P_Size,1) Fqty From Ias_Rt_Bill_Mst M,Ias_Rt_Bill_Dtl D
                                            Where M.Rt_Bill_Ser = D.Rt_Bill_Ser
           Where Bill_Ser=

from ias_itm_attach_movement
where flex_no Like decode(:ias_itm_attach_mov_dummy.flex_no,null,flex_no,:ias_itm_attach_mov_dummy.flex_no)
group by Flex_No,

from Ias_Itm_Attach
where flex_no Like decode(:ias_itm_attach_mov_dummy.flex_no,null,flex_no,:ias_itm_attach_mov_dummy.flex_no)
Order By attch_desc_no1,

ORDER BY DECODE (:parameter.p_ord_lov,1, cc_code,
SELECT   DTS_CUSTOMER_TRGT.C_CODE,
FROM     DTS_CUSTOMER_TRGT, CUSTOMER_GROUP
   WHERE DTS_CUSTOMER_TRGT.C_GROUP_CODE = CUSTOMER_GROUP.C_GROUP_CODE(+)
                             SELECT 1
                               FROM PRIV_ACC
                              WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO                                                             
                         SELECT 1
                           FROM IAS_PRIV_CUSTOMER
                          WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY LPAD(C_CODE, 15, '0')
Select   Sales_Man.Reprs_Code Rep_Code,
    From Sales_Man, Regions
   Where Sales_Man.R_Code = Regions.R_Code(+)
Order By Sales_Man.Reprs_Code
Select   Regions.R_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,
    From Regions, Cities
   Where Regions.City_No = Cities.City_No(+)
Order By Regions.R_Code
SELECT   COLLERCTOR.COL_NO,
    FROM COLLERCTOR, REGIONS
   WHERE COLLERCTOR.R_CODE = REGIONS.R_CODE(+)
ORDER BY COLLERCTOR.COL_NO
Select  Activity_No, 
                        From Ias_Items_Activity 
    Where Activity_No Like '%'||:PARAMTRS.temp_data||'%'
     Order  By Activity_No
Select Brn_No,
 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
 Order By Cmp_No , Brn_No
Select u_id,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,U_a_Name,nvl(U_e_Name,U_a_Name)) U_name From User_r Order by U_id
From DTS Group
From Rep_code
From Prm_code
From Item No.
SELECT 1   FROM PRIVILEGE_GC,IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE PRIVILEGE_GC.G_CODE = IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE  AND U_ID = :b1  AND I_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(VIEW_FLAG,0) = 1"
SELECT 1   FROM PRIVILEGE_GC,IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE PRIVILEGE_GC.G_CODE = IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE  AND U_ID = :b1  AND I_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(VIEW_FLAG,0) = 1"
From Active
From item type
From Price Level
SELECT PASSWORD   FROM USER_R  WHERE U_ID = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
SELECT PASSWORD   FROM USER_R  WHERE U_ID = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"

SELECT SUM(((NVL(I_QTY,0) - NVL(OUT_QTY,0) ) + (NVL(FREE_QTY,0) + NVL(OUT_FREE_QTY,0) ) ) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) )   FROM IAS_BILL_MST,IAS_BILL_DTL  WHERE IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER = IAS_BILL_DTL.BILL_SER  AND IAS_BILL_DTL.I_CODE = :b1  AND IAS_BILL_DTL.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = :b3  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = :b4  AND ((NVL(I_QTY,0) > NVL(OUT_QTY,0) ) OR (NVL(FREE_QTY,0) > NVL(OUT_FREE_QTY,0) ))"SELECT SUM(((NVL(I_QTY,0) - NVL(RET_QTY,0) ) + (NVL(FREE_QTY,0) + NVL(RET_FREE_QTY,0) ) ) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) )   FROM IAS_RT_BILL_MST,IAS_RT_BILL_DTL  WHERE IAS_RT_BILL_MST.RT_BILL_SER = IAS_RT_BILL_DTL.RT_BILL_SER  AND IAS_RT_BILL_DTL.I_CODE = :b1  AND IAS_RT_BILL_DTL.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = :b3  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = :b4  AND ((NVL(I_QTY,0) > NVL(RET_QTY,0) ) OR (NVL(FREE_QTY,0) > NVL(RET_FREE_QTY,0) ))"SELECT NVL(SUM(NVL(CP_QTY,0)),0)   FROM IAS_RESERVE_DTL  WHERE IAS_RESERVE_DTL.I_CODE = :b1  AND NVL(W_CODE,0) = NVL(:b2,NVL(W_CODE,0))  AND NVL(DOC_TYPE_REF,0) = 31  AND NVL(DOC_SER_REF,0) = :b3  AND NVL(RCRD_NO,0) = :b4  AND NVL(RESERVED,0) = 1"

from ias_itm_attach_movement a,Privilege_Wh b

from Ias_Itm_Attach

 from Ias_Projects,IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP

                 WHERE A_CODE = CUSTOMER_GROUP.C_A_CODE
ORDER BY CUSTOMER_GROUP.C_GROUP_CODE

    From Account, Account_Grouping
   Where Account.A_Grouping = Account_Grouping.Group_No(+)
     And Exists(Select Account_Type
                  From Account_Types
                 Where Nvl(Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1 And Account_Type = Account.A_S_M)

              From Priv_Acc
             Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

    FROM V_DETAILS

FROM     customer,

    FROM REGIONS,
   WHERE REGIONS.CITY_NO = CITIES.CITY_NO

    FROM COLLERCTOR

    FROM ARS_CODE_DTL

    ORDER BY CODE_NO

    FROM CITIES

    FROM CUSTOMER_CLASS

 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

 From ias_pos_machine
   Order By ias_pos_machine.machine_no

 From user_r 
   Where  user_type In (1,3)
  Order By user_r.u_id

 From ias_pos_bill_mst ,s_flags 
  Where ias_pos_bill_mst.bill_type = s_flags.flg_value
   Order By bill_no,bill_date,bill_time

SELECT IAS_RCRD_ATTCH.NEXTVAL   FROM DUAL"SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,NVL(ATTCH_A_NAME,ATTCH_E_NAME),NVL(ATTCH_E_NAME,ATTCH_A_NAME)) ATTCH_NAME   FROM IAS_ATTACH_MST  WHERE ATTCH_NO = :b2"SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE,FLEX_NO,ATTCH_DESC_NO1,ATTCH_DESC_NO2,ATTCH_DESC_NO3,ATTCH_DESC_NO4,ATTCH_DESC_NO5,NVL(SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ),0)   FROM IAS_ITM_ATTACH_MOVEMENT A  WHERE EXISTS  (SELECT I_CODE   FROM IAS_ITM_ATTACH_OTHRS  WHERE DOC_TYPE = 4  AND DOC_SER = :b1  AND I_CODE = A.I_CODE  AND W_CODE = A.W_CODE  AND FLEX_NO = A.FLEX_NO  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  AND BILL_COST = 1  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,FLEX_NO,ATTCH_DESC_NO1,ATTCH_DESC_NO2,ATTCH_DESC_NO3,ATTCH_DESC_NO4,ATTCH_DESC_NO5,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO  HAVING (NVL(SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ),0)) < 0"SELECT NVL(SUM((NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) )),0)   FROM IAS_ITM_ATTACH_MOVEMENT A  WHERE OUT_GR_SER = :b1  AND FLEX_NO = :b2  AND W_CODE = :b3"SELECT I_CODE   FROM (SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,REC_ATTCH,SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0)) QTY,SUM(NVL(FREE_QTY,0)) FQTY   FROM DETAIL_OUT_BILLS  WHERE OUT_SER = :b1  AND NVL(DETAIL_OUT_BILLS.USE_ATTCH,0) = 1  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,REC_ATTCH  MINUS SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,REC_ATTCH,SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0)) QTY,SUM(NVL(FREE_QTY,0)) FQTY   FROM IAS_ITM_ATTACH_MOVEMENT  WHERE DOC_TYPE = 1  AND OUT_GR_SER = :b1  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,REC_ATTCH )  WHERE ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT I_CODE   FROM (SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,REC_ATTCH,SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0)) QTY,SUM(NVL(FREE_QTY,0)) FQTY   FROM IAS_ITM_ATTACH_MOVEMENT  WHERE DOC_TYPE = 1  AND OUT_GR_SER = :b1  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,REC_ATTCH  MINUS SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,REC_ATTCH )  WHERE ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,NVL(ATTCH_A_NAME,ATTCH_E_NAME),NVL(ATTCH_E_NAME,ATTCH_A_NAME)) ATTCH_NAME   FROM IAS_ATTACH_MST  WHERE ATTCH_NO = :b2"SELECT FLEX_NO,FLEX_FIELD,ATTCH_NO1,ATTCH_NO2,ATTCH_NO3,ATTCH_NO4,ATTCH_NO5   FROM IAS_ITM_ATTACH  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND NVL(ATTCH_DESC_NO1,0) = NVL(:b2,0)  AND NVL(ATTCH_DESC_NO2,0) = I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,ATTCH_NO1,ATTCH_DESC_NO1,ATTCH_NO2,ATTCH_DESC_NO2,ATTCH_NO3,ATTCH_DESC_NO3,ATTCH_NO4,ATTCH_DESC_NO4,ATTCH_NO5,ATTCH_DESC_NO5,FLEX_NO,ATTCH_NOTE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,W_CODE,I_QTY,FREE_QTY,FLEX_FIELD,C_CODE,RCRD_NO SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE,NVL(P_SIZE,1) P_SIZE,(NVL(SUM(P_QTY),0) + NVL(SUM(FREE_QTY * P_SIZE ),0) ) QTY   FROM DETAIL_OUT_BILLS  WHERE OUT_NO = :b1  AND OUT_SER = :b2  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,P_SIZE"SELECT NVL(IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_GRAND_AVLQTY(:b1,:b2),0)   FROM DUAL"SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE,NVL(P_SIZE,1) P_SIZE,NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') EXPIRE_DATE,NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') BATCH_NO,(NVL(SUM(P_QTY),0) + NVL(SUM(FREE_QTY * P_SIZE ),0) ) QTY   FROM DETAIL_OUT_BILLS  WHERE OUT_NO = :b1  AND OUT_SER = :b2  AND BILL_SER = :b3  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,P_SIZE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO"SELECT SUM(B.INOUT * (NVL(A.P_QTY,0) + NVL(A.PF_QTY,0) ) )   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT A,ITEM_MOVEMENT_TYPE B  WHERE A.DOC_TYPE = B.DOC_TYPE  AND A.I_CODE = :b1  AND A.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(A.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = :b3  AND NVL(A.BATCH_NO,''0'') = :b4"

SELECT   DECODE (a.batch_no, '0', '', a.batch_no) batch_no,
    FROM item_movement a
   WHERE a.i_code = :detail_out_bills.i_code
GROUP BY a.batch_no

    FROM Ias_Drivers
ORDER by Driver_No

            From Ias_Priv_Price

 Order By Ias_Item_Price.Lev_No
SELECT ALL RMS_EMP.EMP_NO,NVL(DECODE(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,RMS_EMP.EMP_L_NM, RMS_EMP.EMP_F_NM),RMS_EMP.EMP_L_NM)  FEEDER_NM
FROM RMS_EMP 
WHERE EMP_TYP = 3 AND NVL(INACTIVE,0) = 0
ORDER BY 1

FROM S_EMP
WHERE NVL(INACTIVE,0) = 0
ORDER BY 1

FROM RMS_EMP 
WHERE EMP_TYP = 2 AND NVL(INACTIVE,0) = 0

FROM RMS_TBL 
WHERE HALL_NO = :RMS_BILL_MST.HALL_NO AND BRN_NO = :PARAMETER.BRN_NO
ORDER BY 1

FROM RMS_HALL
WHERE BRN_NO = :PARAMETER.BRN_NO  
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1
   FROM RMS_HALL_PRV
   WHERE :PARAMETER.USER_NO = 1
ORDER BY 1

FROM RMS_note
WHERE INACTIVE = 0  
ORDER BY 1

(SELECT A.FOOD_GRP_L_NM FOOD_GRP_L_NM, A.FOOD_GRP_F_NM FOOD_GRP_F_NM, A.FOOD_GRP_NO FOOD_GRP_NO_A, B.FOOD_GRP_L_NM FOOD_GRP_L_NM_B, B.FOOD_GRP_F_NM FOOD_GRP_F_NM_B, B.FOOD_GRP_NO FOOD_GRP_NO_B FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNOA, Q1.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, FOOD_GRP_NO, FOOD_GRP_IMG, FOOD_GRP_F_NM, FOOD_GRP_L_NM, FOOD_GRP_DSC, TO_NUMBER(MOD(ROWNUM, 2)) FROM ( SELECT * FROM RMS_FOOD_GRP WHERE NVL(INACTIVE, 0) = 0 AND NVL(MRN_TRSM_SYS_FLG,0) = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RMS_FOOD_GRP_PRV WHERE PARAMETER_USER_NO = 1 OR U_ID = PARAMETER_USER_NO AND FOOD_GRP_NO = RMS_FOOD_GRP.FOOD_GRP_NO AND PRV_FLG = 1 AND ROWNUM <= 1) ORDER BY FOOD_GRP_ORDR_NO, /*GNR_GRP_FLG DESC,*/ FOOD_GRP_NO) Q1) Q1 WHERE TO_NUMBER(MOD(RNO, 2)) = 1) A, (SELECT ROWNUM RNOB, Q2.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, TO_NUMBER(MOD(ROWNUM, 2)), FOOD_GRP_NO, FOOD_GRP_IMG, FOOD_GRP_F_NM, FOOD_GRP_L_NM, FOOD_GRP_DSC FROM ( SELECT * FROM RMS_FOOD_GRP WHERE NVL(INACTIVE, 0) = 0 AND NVL(MRN_TRSM_SYS_FLG,0) = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RMS_FOOD_GRP_PRV WHERE PARAMETER_USER_NO = 1 OR U_ID = PARAMETER_USER_NO AND FOOD_GRP_NO = RMS_FOOD_GRP.FOOD_GRP_NO AND PRV_FLG = 1 AND ROWNUM <= 1) ORDER BY FOOD_GRP_ORDR_NO, /*GNR_GRP_FLG DESC,*/ FOOD_GRP_NO) Q2) Q2 WHERE TO_NUMBER(MOD(RNO, 2)) = 0) B WHERE A.RNOA = B.RNOB(+))
SELECT A.FOOD_GRP_L_NM FOOD_GRP_L_NM, A.FOOD_GRP_F_NM FOOD_GRP_F_NM, A.FOOD_GRP_NO FOOD_GRP_NO_A, B.FOOD_GRP_L_NM FOOD_GRP_L_NM_B, B.FOOD_GRP_F_NM FOOD_GRP_F_NM_B, B.FOOD_GRP_NO FOOD_GRP_NO_B FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNOA, Q1.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, FOOD_GRP_NO, FOOD_GRP_IMG, FOOD_GRP_F_NM, FOOD_GRP_L_NM, FOOD_GRP_DSC, TO_NUMBER(MOD(ROWNUM, 2)) FROM ( SELECT * FROM RMS_FOOD_GRP WHERE NVL(INACTIVE, 0) = 0 AND NVL(MRN_TRSM_SYS_FLG,0) = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RMS_FOOD_GRP_PRV WHERE PARAMETER_USER_NO = 1 OR U_ID = PARAMETER_USER_NO AND FOOD_GRP_NO = RMS_FOOD_GRP.FOOD_GRP_NO AND PRV_FLG = 1 AND ROWNUM <= 1) ORDER BY FOOD_GRP_ORDR_NO, /*GNR_GRP_FLG DESC,*/ FOOD_GRP_NO) Q1) Q1 WHERE TO_NUMBER(MOD(RNO, 2)) = 1) A, (SELECT ROWNUM RNOB, Q2.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, TO_NUMBER(MOD(ROWNUM, 2)), FOOD_GRP_NO, FOOD_GRP_IMG, FOOD_GRP_F_NM, FOOD_GRP_L_NM, FOOD_GRP_DSC FROM ( SELECT * FROM RMS_FOOD_GRP WHERE NVL(INACTIVE, 0) = 0 AND NVL(MRN_TRSM_SYS_FLG,0) = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RMS_FOOD_GRP_PRV WHERE PARAMETER_USER_NO = 1 OR U_ID = PARAMETER_USER_NO AND FOOD_GRP_NO = RMS_FOOD_GRP.FOOD_GRP_NO AND PRV_FLG = 1 AND ROWNUM <= 1) ORDER BY FOOD_GRP_ORDR_NO, /*GNR_GRP_FLG DESC,*/ FOOD_GRP_NO) Q2) Q2 WHERE TO_NUMBER(MOD(RNO, 2)) = 0) B WHERE A.RNOA = B.RNOB(+)

SELECT   cc_code,
    FROM cost_centers, cc_grouping
   WHERE cost_centers.c_grouping = cc_grouping.group_no(+)
     AND c_s_m = (SELECT cc_type
                    FROM cost_center_types
                   WHERE affected_by_trans = 1)
     AND ((:parameter.user_no = 1) Or EXISTS (SELECT 1
                 FROM privilege_cc
                 WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no
ORDER BY Lpad(cc_code,15,'0')
select Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Mst.doc_no,
FROM   Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Mst,v_details
WHERE  Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Mst.v_code=v_details.v_code
          Or Exists (Select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                      Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
ORDER BY Doc_date Desc,doc_no Desc
SELECT Out_No,
    FROM Ias_Outgoing_Mst mst
   WHERE Out_Type=1
     AND Exists(Select Out_Ser,
                    FROM Ias_Outgoing_Mst
                   WHERE Out_Type=1
                  Select m.Doc_Ser_Ref,Round(Sum(Paid_Amt_Doc),2) 
                  FROM Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Mst M,Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Dtl D
                   Where m.Doc_Type_Ref=9
                   Group By m.Doc_Ser_Ref) 
ORDER BY Out_No,Out_Date
SELECT mst.Rt_Bill_No,
    FROM Ias_Pr_Bill_Mst mst
   WHERE mst.Rt_Bill_Doc_Type=4
     AND Exists(Select Rt_Bill_Ser,
                  FROM Ias_Pr_Bill_Mst                
                 WHERE Rt_Bill_Doc_Type=4
                Select M.Doc_Ser_Ref,Sum(Round(D.Paid_Amt_Doc,2)) 
                  FROM Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Mst M,Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Dtl D
                 Where M.Doc_Type_Ref=7
                 Group By M.Doc_Ser_Ref) 
ORDER BY Rt_Bill_No,Rt_Bill_Date
select DOC_NO,
FROM Ias_Pi_Bill_Mst_Add_Disc
    Where V_Code=Nvl(:Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Mst.V_Code,'0')
 AND Exists(Select Doc_Ser,
                FROM ias_post_dtl
               WHERE Doc_Type=16
            GROUP BY Doc_Ser,V_Code,nvl(cc_code,'0'),a_cy
                Select M.Doc_Ser_Ref,
                  FROM Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Mst M,Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Dtl D
                 Where M.Doc_Type_Ref=16
                 Group By M.Doc_Ser_Ref,M.V_Code,nvl(M.cc_code,'0'),M.a_cy) 
ORDER BY Doc_No,Doc_Date
SELECT Doc_No,
    FROM ias_post_dtl
   WHERE Doc_Type=0
     AND Exists(Select 0,V_code,nvl(cc_code,'0'),a_cy,abs(ROUND(nvl(Dr_amt,0),2)) Doc_Amt
                    FROM ias_post_dtl
                   WHERE Doc_Type=0
                Select Doc_Ser_Ref,v_code,nvl(cc_code,'0'),a_cy,Sum(Round(Paid_Amt_Doc,2)) 
                  FROM Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Dtl
                 Where Doc_Type_Ref=0
                 Group By Doc_Ser_Ref,v_code,nvl(cc_code,'0'),a_cy) 
ORDER BY Doc_No,Doc_Date
SELECT Doc_No,
    FROM ias_post_dtl
   WHERE Doc_Type=30
     AND Exists(Select Doc_Ser,V_code,nvl(cc_code,'0'),a_cy,abs(ROUND(nvl(Dr_amt,0),2)) Doc_Amt
                    FROM ias_post_dtl
                   WHERE Doc_Type=30
                Select Doc_Ser_ref,v_code,nvl(cc_code,'0'),a_cy,Sum(Round(Paid_Amt_Doc,2)) 
                  FROM Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Dtl
                 Where Doc_Type_Ref=30
                 Group By Doc_Ser_Ref,v_code,nvl(cc_code,'0'),a_cy) 
ORDER BY Doc_No,Doc_Date
SELECT MJ.J_Doc_No,
    FROM Master_Journal_V Mj,Detail_Journal_V Dj       
   WHERE MJ.J_Ser=DJ.J_Ser
     AND Exists(Select Doc_Ser,V_Code,a_cy,Decode(a_cy,:Parameter.Local_Cur,Round(nvl(CR_amt,0),2),Round(nvl(DR_amt_F,0),2)) Doc_Amt,Rcrd_no
                FROM ias_post_dtl
               WHERE Doc_Type=1
                Select M.Doc_Ser_Ref,D.v_code,D.a_cy,Sum(Round(D.Paid_Amt_Doc,2))  doc_amt,d.Rcrd_no 
                  FROM Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Mst M,Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Dtl D
                 Where M.doc_no=d.doc_no
                Group By M.Doc_Ser_Ref,D.v_code,D.a_cy,D.Rcrd_no) 
Group by MJ.J_Doc_No,
 NVL((Select Sum(Round(D.Paid_Amt_Doc,2)) 
                  FROM Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Mst M,Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Dtl D
                 Where M.doc_no=d.doc_no
                Group By M.Doc_Ser_Ref,D.v_code,D.a_cy,D.Rcrd_no),
ORDER BY MJ.J_Doc_No,MJ.J_Date
SELECT Mv.Voucher_No,
    FROM Vouchers Mv,Voucher_Detail Dv       
   WHERE Mv.V_Ser=Dv.V_Ser
     AND Exists(Select Doc_Ser,V_Code,a_cy,Decode(a_cy,:Parameter.Local_Cur,Round(Sum(nvl(DR_amt,0)),2),Round(Sum(nvl(DR_amt_F,0)),2)) Doc_Amt
                FROM ias_post_dtl
               WHERE Doc_Type=3
            GROUP BY Doc_Ser,V_Code,nvl(cc_code,'0'),a_cy
                Select M.Doc_Ser_Ref,D.V_code,D.a_cy,Round(Sum(d.Paid_Amt_Doc),2) doc_amt 
                  FROM Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Mst M,Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Dtl D
                 Where M.doc_no=d.doc_no
                Group By M.Doc_Ser_Ref,D.V_code,D.a_cy) 
 Group by
 NVL((Select Round(Sum(d.Paid_Amt_Doc),2) 
                  FROM Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Mst M,Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Dtl D
                 Where M.doc_no=d.doc_no
                Group By M.Doc_Ser_Ref,D.V_code,D.a_cy),
ORDER BY Mv.Voucher_No,Mv.Voucher_Date
SELECT Bill_No,
    FROM ias_Installment_pi
   WHERE Doc_Type=Nvl(:Ias_Adjst_Installment_Ap_Dtl.Doc_Type_Ref,1)
ORDER BY Bill_No,I_No

  From v_details,Vendor_Group
 Where 
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Vendor
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode(:Parameter.P_Ord_Lov,1,Lpad(v_code,15,'0'),Decode(:Parameter.lang_no,1,v_a_name,v_e_name))

   where V_code=

Select '','None' from dual union Select a_cy,a_cy  
        from vendor_curr
        where V_code='

SELECT Decode(:parameter.lang,1,LN_NAME_A,LN_NAME_F) 
                       FROM MRP_SGS_LINES_CODING
             Where P_CNTU = 0 
SELECT decode(:parameter.lang,1,SHIFT_DETAILS_A,SHIFT_DETAILS_F) SHIFT_NAME , TO_CHAR(SHIFT_CODE)
            FROM  MRP_SGS_SHIFTS_MAST 
            WHERE CMP_NO    = 
           ORDER BY SHIFT_CODE

SELECT NVL(SUM(ITM_MOV.QTY),0) ACTUAL_CONS,ITM_MOV.ITEM_CODE ITEM_CODE,COUNT(*) C,CMP_NO,BRN_NO   FROM MRP_SFC_WHM_ITEMS_MOVE ITM_MOV  WHERE (TRANS_DATE BETWEEN :b1 AND :b2 ) AND ITM_MOV.TRANS_TYPE IN ( 7,51  ) AND ITM_MOV.CMP_NO = :b3  AND ITM_MOV.BRN_NO = :b4  AND ITM_MOV.BRN_NO = :b5  AND ITM_MOV.CMP_NO = :b6  AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,''1'',ITM_MOV.SHF_CODE) = DECODE(:b7, NULL ,''1'',:b7)  AND DECODE(:b10, NULL ,1,ITM_MOV.SHIFT_CODE) = DECODE(:b10, NULL ,1,:b10)  AND DECODE(:b13, NULL ,''1'',ITM_MOV.LN_CODE) = DECODE(:b13, NULL ,''1'',:b13)  AND DECODE(:b16, NULL ,''1'',ITM_MOV.WORK_ORDER) = DECODE(:b16, NULL ,''1'',:b16)  AND DECODE(:b19, NULL ,''99'',:b19) = DECODE(:b19, NULL ,''99'',MRPSFC_PKG.GET_ITEM_CLASS(:b3,:b4,ITM_MOV.ITEM_CODE))  AND (ITEM_CODE NOT IN (SELECT ITEM_CODE   FROM MRP_CRP_ITEMS_CATEGORY  GROUP BY CTGR,ITEM_CODE  HAVING COUNT(ITEM_CODE) = 1  AND CTGR = 1 )) GROUP BY ITM_MOV.ITEM_CODE,CMP_NO,BRN_NO ORDER BY ITM_MOV.ITEM_CODE,ITM_MOV.CMP_NO,ITM_MOV.BRN_NO"

SELECT DISTINCT 1   FROM MRP_SFC_CONSUMPTION_TRANS_D D,MRP_SFC_CONSUMPTION_TRANS_M M  WHERE M.CMP_NO = :b1  AND M.BRN_NO = :b2  AND M.CMP_NO = :b3  AND M.BRN_NO = :b4  AND (M.F_DATE = :b5  AND M.T_DATE = :b6  AND D.ITEM_CODE = :b7 ) AND M.CMP_NO = D.CMP_NO  AND M.BRN_NO = D.BRN_NO  AND M.CONS_SQ = D.CONS_SQ  AND DECODE(:b8, NULL ,''1'',M.SHF_CODE) = DECODE(:b8, NULL ,''1'',:b8)  AND DECODE(:b11, NULL ,1,M.SHIFT_CODE) = DECODE(:b11, NULL ,1,:b11)  AND DECODE(:b14, NULL ,''1'',M.LN_CODE) = DECODE(:b14, NULL ,''1'',:b14)  AND DECODE(:b17, NULL ,''1'',M.WORK_ORDER) = DECODE(:b17, NULL ,''1'',:b17)  AND DECODE(:b20, NULL ,''99'',M.ITEMS_CLAS) = DECODE(:b20, NULL ,''99'',MRPSFC_PKG.GET_ITEM_CLASS(:b3,:b4,:b7))"SELECT 1,M.CONS_SQ   FROM MRP_SFC_CONSUMPTION_TRANS_D D,MRP_SFC_CONSUMPTION_TRANS_M M  WHERE M.CMP_NO = :b1  AND M.BRN_NO = :b2  AND M.CMP_NO = :b3  AND M.BRN_NO = :b4  AND (M.F_DATE = :b5  AND M.T_DATE = :b6 ) AND M.CMP_NO = D.CMP_NO  AND M.BRN_NO = D.BRN_NO  AND M.CMP_NO = :b3  AND M.BRN_NO = :b4  AND DECODE(M.SHF_CODE, NULL ,''1'',M.SHF_CODE) = DECODE(M.SHF_CODE, NULL ,''1'',:b9)  AND DECODE(M.SHIFT_CODE, NULL ,1,M.SHIFT_CODE) = DECODE(M.SHIFT_CODE, NULL ,1,:b10)  AND DECODE(M.WORK_ORDER, NULL ,''1'',M.WORK_ORDER) = DECODE(M.WORK_ORDER, NULL ,''1'',:b11)  AND DECODE(M.LN_CODE, NULL ,''1'',M.LN_CODE) = DECODE(M.LN_CODE, NULL ,''1'',:b12)  AND DECODE(M.ITEMS_CLAS, NULL ,''99'',M.ITEMS_CLAS) = DECODE(M.ITEMS_CLAS, NULL ,''99'',:b13)"
SELECT NVL(DECODE(TRANS_TYPE,51,SUM(ITM_MOV.QTY)),0) SUM_ADJ51,NVL(DECODE(TRANS_TYPE,7,SUM(ITM_MOV.QTY)),0) CON_SUM,NVL(DECODE(TRANS_TYPE,3,SUM(ITM_MOV.QTY)),0) REF_SUM,NVL(DECODE(TRANS_TYPE,5,SUM(ITM_MOV.QTY)),0) SCRAP_ROW_SUM,ITM_MOV.ITEM_CODE ITEM_CODE   FROM MRP_SFC_WHM_ITEMS_MOVE ITM_MOV  WHERE (TRANS_DATE <= :b1  OR TRANS_DATE >= :b2 ) AND ITM_MOV.TRANS_TYPE IN ( 7,51,52,5,3  ) AND ITM_MOV.CMP_NO = :b3  AND ITM_MOV.BRN_NO = :b4  AND ITM_MOV.BRN_NO = :b5  AND ITM_MOV.CMP_NO = :b6  AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,''1'',ITM_MOV.SHF_CODE) = DECODE(:b7, NULL ,''1'',:b7)  AND DECODE(:b10, NULL ,1,ITM_MOV.SHIFT_CODE) = DECODE(:b10, NULL ,1,:b10)  AND DECODE(:b13, NULL ,''1'',DECODE(TRANS_TYPE,51,ITM_MOV.LN_CODE,ITM_MOV.LN_CODE)) = DECODE(:b13, NULL ,''1'',:b13)  AND DECODE(:b13, NULL ,''1'',DECODE(TRANS_TYPE,52,ITM_MOV.LN_CODE,ITM_MOV.LN_CODE)) = DECODE(:b13, NULL ,''1'',:b13)  AND DECODE(:b19, NULL ,''1'',DECODE(TRANS_TYPE,51,ITM_MOV.WORK_ORDER,ITM_MOV.WORK_ORDER)) = DECODE(:b19, NULL ,''1'',:b19)  AND DECODE(:b19, NULL ,''1'',DECODE(TRANS_TYPE,52,ITM_MOV.WORK_ORDER,ITM_MOV.WORK_ORDER)) = DECODE(:b19, NULL ,''1'',:b19)  AND DECODE(:b25, NULL ,''99'',:b25) = DECODE(:b25, NULL ,''99'',MRPSFC_PKG.GET_ITEM_CLASS(:b3,:b4,ITM_MOV.ITEM_CODE))  GROUP BY ITM_MOV.ITEM_CODE,TRANS_TYPE ORDER BY ITM_MOV.ITEM_CODE"

SELECT DOC_SRL,AC_CODE,AC_CODE_DTL,AC_DTL_TYP,CUR_CODE,CC_CODE,PJ_NO,ACTV_NO,SUM(AMT_L) AC_AMT,SUM(AMT_F) AC_AMTF   FROM IAS_GRNT_DTL  WHERE DOC_SRL = :b1  GROUP BY DOC_SRL,AC_CODE,AC_CODE_DTL,AC_DTL_TYP,CUR_CODE,CC_CODE,PJ_NO,ACTV_NO"
SELECT NULL "FLD1", NULL "FLD2", NULL "FLD3", NULL "FLD4", NULL "FLD5", NULL "FLD6", NULL "FLD7", NULL "FLD8", NULL "FLD9", NULL "FLD10", NULL "FLD11" , NULL "FLD12", NULL "FLD13" , NULL "FLD14" , NULL "FLD15",
       NULL "FLD16", NULL "FLD17", NULL "FLD18", NULL "FLD19", NULL "FLD20" FROM DUAL
SELECT DOC_no,Gr_no,DOC_SRL,END_DATE,FLG_DESC GR_STATUS,ias_gen_pkg.Get_Flg_Nm ('GUARN_FUNC',gr_func_no,:Parameter.Lang_no) gr_Func  ,IAS_GRNT_MST.Brn_No
  FROM IAS_GRNT_MST,s_flags
 where IAS_GRNT_MST.GR_Type=s_flags.FLG_VALUE
           (Select 1 
              From Ias_Shw_Doc_Priv 
             Where U_Id =:Parameter.User_No
        Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
ORDER BY IAS_GRNT_MST.gr_no
select cash_at_bank.bank_no,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.a_cy,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.a_code,
From cash_at_bank,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl,priv_cash 
Where cash_at_bank.bank_no=ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.bank_no
order by cash_at_bank.bank_no
select account.a_code,
from account,ACCOUNT_CURR,account_grouping
and Exists  ( Select Account_Type  From Account_Types  Where Nvl (Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1
and Exists (select 1 from priv_acc where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and a_code=account.a_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,a_code,
SELECT cur_no,EX_RATE.CUR_CODE,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1 ,EX_RATE.CUR_NAME,cur_e_name ) cur_name,cur_rate
FROM EX_RATE 
WHERE CUR_CODE=DECODE(:IAS_GRNT_DTL.GR_AC_TYP,3,CUR_CODE,:IAS_GRNT_MST.CUR_CODE)
Order by cur_no
Select customer.c_code,
  From customer,customer_curr,Customer_Group
 Where customer.c_code=customer_curr.c_code
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Lpad(C_code,15,'0')
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) OR Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1  )) )
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,
select cc_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_a_name,cc_e_name)) cc_name
from cost_centers 
where cc_code in (select cc_code from PRIVILEGE_CC
  where u_id =:parameter.User_No and nvl(add_flag,0)=1)

 from account,account_grouping

 FROM  MRP_SGS_SHOPS_FLOOR_CODING

 From S_Brn

       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
 Order By Cmp_No , Brn_No

FROM MRP_SGS_ROUTE_MST 
WHERE CMP_NO    =  :PARAMETER.CMP_NO

 FROM MRP_SGS_ROUTE_SCRAPS     
WHERE CMP_NO    = :PARAMETER.CMP_NO

            Nvl(C_Class_E_Name,C_Class_Name)),To_Char(C_Class) From Customer_Class Order By C_Class
Select C_Group_Code||' - '||Decode(
                   From Customer_Group 
                   Where ((
                      Exists(Select 1 From Priv_Acc Where A_Code=Customer_Group.C_A_Code
                  Order By Customer_Group.C_Group_Code
Select Route_No||'- '||Decode(
                From Ias_Route_Mst                       
              Order By Route_No
SELECT NVL(CONN_CST_MULTI_SMAN,0)   FROM IAS_PARA_GEN,IAS_PARA_AR"
SELECT NULL "FLD1", NULL "FLD2", NULL "FLD3", NULL "FLD4", NULL "FLD5", NULL "FLD6", NULL "FLD7", NULL "FLD8", NULL "FLD9", NULL "FLD10", NULL "FLD11" , NULL "FLD12", NULL "FLD13" , NULL "FLD14" , NULL "FLD15",
       NULL "FLD16", NULL "FLD17", NULL "FLD18", NULL "FLD19", NULL "FLD20" FROM DUAL
SELECT 1   FROM DTS_CUSTOMER_TRGT  WHERE C_CODE = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
SELECT  c_group_code ,
    FROM customer_group
   WHERE ((:parameter.user_no = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM priv_acc
                 WHERE a_code = customer_group.c_a_code
ORDER BY customer_group.c_group_code
Select   C_Class  ,C_Class_Name,C_Class_E_Name
From Customer_Class
Order By  C_Class
SELECT   C_degree, C_degree_a_name, C_degree_e_name
    FROM Customer_degree
ORDER BY C_degree
SELECT   city_no,
    FROM cities, cntry
   WHERE cities.cntry_no = cntry.cntry_no(+)
ORDER BY cities.cntry_no, city_no
SELECT   cc_code,
    FROM cost_centers, cc_grouping
   WHERE cost_centers.c_grouping = cc_grouping.group_no(+)
     AND c_s_m = (SELECT cc_type FROM cost_center_types WHERE affected_by_trans = 1)
     AND ((:parameter.user_no=1) Or EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM privilege_cc
             WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no
ORDER BY DECODE (:parameter.p_ord_lov,1, cc_code,
SELECT   DTS_CUSTOMER_TRGT.C_CODE,
    FROM DTS_CUSTOMER_TRGT,
   WHERE DTS_CUSTOMER_TRGT.C_GROUP_CODE = CUSTOMER_GROUP.C_GROUP_CODE(+)
                             SELECT 1
                               FROM PRIV_ACC
                              WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO AND NVL(VIEW_FLAG, 0) = 1
                         SELECT 1
                           FROM IAS_PRIV_CUSTOMER
                          WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY LPAD(C_CODE, 15, '0')
Select   Sales_Man.Reprs_Code Rep_Code,
    From Sales_Man, Regions
   Where Sales_Man.R_Code = Regions.R_Code(+)
Order By Sales_Man.Reprs_Code
Select   Regions.R_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,
    From Regions, Cities
   Where Regions.City_No = Cities.City_No(+)
Order By Regions.R_Code
SELECT   COLLERCTOR.COL_NO,
    FROM COLLERCTOR, REGIONS
   WHERE COLLERCTOR.R_CODE = REGIONS.R_CODE(+)
ORDER BY COLLERCTOR.COL_NO
Select Brn_No,
 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
 Order By Cmp_No , Brn_No
Select u_id,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,U_a_Name,nvl(U_e_Name,U_a_Name)) U_name From User_r Order by U_id
From Cust
From Rep_code

            Order By Cmp_No

,1,nvl(V_GROUP_A_NAME,V_GROUP_E_NAME),nvl(V_GROUP_E_NAME,V_GROUP_A_NAME)),to_char(V_GROUP_CODE) from vendor_group order by V_GROUP_CODE

 From S_Brn

                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

 From S_Cmpny,S_Brn
where S_Cmpny.CMP_NO=S_Brn.CMP_NO and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

  From v_details,Vendor_Group

                   Select 1

                     From Ias_Priv_Vendor
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

                                  Where U_Id =

From Code

SELECT   cc_code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,Nvl(Cc_A_Name,Cc_E_Name),
    FROM cost_centers
   WHERE c_s_m = (SELECT cc_type
                    FROM cost_center_types
                   WHERE affected_by_trans = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM privilege_cc
                 WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no
Order By Lpad(Cc_Code,30,'0')

    FROM CUSTOMER_GROUP
   WHERE (   (:PARAMETER.USER_NO = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM PRIV_ACC
                 WHERE A_CODE = CUSTOMER_GROUP.C_A_CODE
ORDER BY CUSTOMER_GROUP.C_GROUP_CODE
Select C_Code,C_A_Name,C_E_Name,1 Op_Ac,C_Code Ccode From Customer_Rq Where Nvl(Insrtd_Flg,0)=0
Order By C_Code
Select   A_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,
    From Account, Account_Grouping
   Where Account.A_Grouping = Account_Grouping.Group_No(+)
     And Exists(Select Account_Type
                  From Account_Types
                 Where Nvl(Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1 And Account_Type = Account.A_S_M)
            Select 1
              From Priv_Acc
             Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode(:Parameter.P_Ord_Lov,
Select   A_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,
    From Account, Account_Grouping
   Where Account.A_Grouping = Account_Grouping.Group_No(+)
     And Exists(Select Account_Type
                  From Account_Types
                 Where Nvl(Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1 And Account_Type = Account.A_S_M)
            Select 1
              From Priv_Acc
             Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode(:Parameter.P_Ord_Lov,
SELECT   V_DETAILS.V_CODE,
    FROM V_DETAILS
   WHERE (   (:PARAMETER.USER_NO = 1)
                         SELECT 1
                           FROM PRIV_ACC
                          WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
                         SELECT 1
                           FROM IAS_PRIV_VENDOR
                          WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY LPAD(V_CODE, 15, '0')
Select Short_Code,Substr(Short_Code,:Parameter.Agnt_Prfx_Lnth+1) Shrt_Code, C_Code, Decode (:Parameter.Lang_No, 1, Nvl (C_A_Name, C_E_Name), Nvl (C_E_Name, C_A_Name) ) C_Name, 
From Customer_Rq 
Where Short_Code Is Not Null And Nvl(Insrtd_Flg,0) = 0 
And C_Class In (Select C_Class From Wms_Group_Class Where C_Group_Code = :Parameter.Agent_Group)
Select Short_Code, Substr(Short_Code,:Parameter.Agnt_Prfx_Lnth +1) Shrt_Code, W.C_Code, Decode (:Parameter.Lang_No, 1, Nvl (C_A_Name, C_E_Name), Nvl (C_E_Name, C_A_Name) ) C_Name,
From Customer C,Wms_Customer_Sub W 
Where C.C_Code = W.C_Code And Short_Code Is Not Null
And C.C_Class In (Select C_Class From Wms_Group_Class Where C_Group_Code = :Parameter.Agent_Group)
Order By Short_Code Desc
Select c_code,
  From customer  
Where Nvl(Conn_Rem_Sys,0)=Decode(:Parameter.Form_No,5104,1,Nvl(Conn_Rem_Sys,0))
Order By Lpad(c_code,15,'0')
SELECT   CODE_NO,
    FROM ARS_CODE_DTL
    WHERE CODE_TYP=3
    ORDER BY CODE_NO
SELECT   customer_rq.c_code,
FROM     customer_rq,
WHERE    USER_WALLET = 1 
                         SELECT 1
                         FROM   S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                         WHERE  u_id = :parameter.user_no
And C_Class In (Select C_Class From Wms_Group_Class Where C_Group_Code = :Parameter.Agent_Group)
ORDER BY LPAD (c_code, 15, '0')
SELECT   R_CODE,
    FROM REGIONS,
   WHERE REGIONS.CITY_NO = CITIES.CITY_NO
ORDER BY R_CODE
SELECT   COL_NO,
    FROM COLLERCTOR
   WHERE (   (:PARAMETER.USER_NO = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM IAS_PRIV_COLLECTORS
                 WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY COL_NO
SELECT   CITY_NO,
    FROM CITIES
   WHERE CNTRY_NO = NVL (:CUSTOMER.CNTRY_NO, CNTRY_NO)
ORDER BY CNTRY_NO
SELECT   C_CLASS,
    FROM CUSTOMER_CLASS
ORDER BY C_CLASS
SELECT   C_CLASS_TYP,
    FROM CUSTOMER_CLASS_TYP
ORDER BY C_CLASS_TYP
Select cntry_no,cntry_a_name,cntry_e_name from CNTRY order by cntry_no     
SELECT DISTINCT IAS_ROUTE_DTL.ROUTE_NO ROUTE_NO,
           FROM IAS_ROUTE_MST,
          WHERE IAS_ROUTE_MST.ROUTE_NO = IAS_ROUTE_DTL.ROUTE_NO
       ORDER BY IAS_ROUTE_DTL.ROUTE_NO,

           FROM IAS_ROUTE_MST
       ORDER BY IAS_ROUTE_MST.ROUTE_NO
Select PROV_NO,PROV_A_NAME,PROV_E_NAME
from IAS_PROVINCES
where cntry_no=Nvl(:Customer.cntry_no  ,cntry_no)
order by cntry_no,PROV_NO

    FROM S_BRN
   WHERE (   (:PARAMETER.USER_NO = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                 WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO

    FROM SALES_MAN  
   WHERE NVL (INACTIVE, 0) = 0

    FROM Customer_degree  
ORDER BY C_degree

 from IAS_INSRNCE_CMP  
order by INS_CMP_No

FROM     CNTRY

SELECT decode(:parameter.lang,1,SHF_NAME_A,SHF_NAME_F) , TO_CHAR(SHF_CODE)
        FROM  MRP_SGS_SHOPS_FLOOR_CODING 
        WHERE CMP_NO = 
       ORDER BY SHF_CODE 
SELECT Decode(:parameter.lang,1,LN_NAME_A,LN_NAME_F) 
                       FROM MRP_SGS_LINES_CODING
             Where P_CNTU = 0 
SELECT decode(:parameter.lang,1,SHIFT_DETAILS_A,SHIFT_DETAILS_F) SHIFT_NAME ,
            FROM  MRP_SGS_SHIFTS_MAST
         Where cmp_no =
ORDER BY 
SELECT CMP_LNAME,CMP_FNAME   FROM S_CMPNY  WHERE CMP_NO = :b1"SELECT BRN_LNAME,BRN_FNAME   FROM S_BRN  WHERE CMP_NO = :b1  AND BRN_NO = :b2"SELECT BRN_LADD,BRN_FADD   FROM S_BRN  WHERE CMP_NO = :b1  AND BRN_NO = :b2"
SELECT ITEM_CODE,DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,ITEM_NAME_A,ITEM_NAME_F) ITRM_NAME
FROM MRP_CRP_ITEMS_DETAILS
where cmp_no=:parameter.cmp_no and brn_no=:parameter.branch AND
( select DISTINCT cmp_no ,brn_no , item_code from MRP_CRP_ITEMS_CATEGORY where ctgr IN(1,2) )
SELECT LAB_CODE,DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,LAB_NAME_A,LAB_NAME_F) LAB_NAM,LAB_TYPE,LAB_CATG,P_MULTI_SHIFT,SHIFT_CODE,P_MULTI_LOC
FROM   MRP_CRP_LABORS_CODING
WHERE  CMP_NO  = :PARAMETER.CMP_NO
SELECT DISTINCT WORK_ORDER 
 FROM  MRP_SFC_WIP_MASTER
where CMP_NO =:parameter.cmp_no 
SELECT  BRN_NO,DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,BRN_LNAME,BRN_FNAME)NAME
FROM    S_BRN
ORDER   BY BRN_NO
SELECT decode(:parameter.lang,1,SHIFT_DETAILS_A,SHIFT_DETAILS_F) SHIFT_NAME ,
            FROM  MRP_SGS_SHIFTS_MAST
           WHERE CMP_NO     = 
           ORDER BY SHIFT_CODE
SELECT Decode(:parameter.lang,1,LN_NAME_A,LN_NAME_F) 
                       FROM MRP_SGS_LINES_CODING
             Where P_CNTU = 0 
from date

SELECT I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE   FROM IAS_ITM_DTL  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND ITM_UNT != :b2"INSERT INTO IAS_ITEM_PRICE ( LEV_NO,I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,W_CODE,FROM_QTY,TO_QTY,I_PRICE,AD_U_ID,AD_DATE,UP_U_ID,UP_DATE,BRN_NO )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,NVL(:b6,0) * :b4 ,NVL(:b8,0) * :b4 ,NVL(:b10,0) * :b4 ,:b12,:b13,:b14,:b15,:b16  )"INSERT INTO IAS_ITEM_PRICE_HISTORY ( AUD_TYPE,LEV_NO,I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,W_CODE,FROM_QTY,TO_QTY,I_PRICE,AD_U_ID,AD_DATE,UP_U_ID,UP_DATE,AUD_U_ID,AUD_DATE,BRN_NO,DOC_NO,DOC_DATE,PREV_I_PRICE )  VALUES ( 1,:b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,NVL(:b6,0) * :b4 ,NVL(:b8,0) * :b4 ,NVL(:b10,0) * :b4 ,:b12,:b13,:b14,:b15,:b16,IAS_GEN_PKG.GET_CURDATE,:b17,:b18,TO_DATE(IAS_GEN_PKG.GET_CURDATE,''DD/MM/YYYY''),:b19  )"UPDATE IAS_ITEM_PRICE SET I_PRICE=(NVL(:b1,0) / NVL(:b2,1) ) * :b3 ,UP_U_ID=:b4,UP_DATE=:b5 WHERE I_CODE = :b6  AND ITM_UNT = :b7  AND LEV_NO = :b8  AND NVL(W_CODE,0) = DECODE(NVL(:b9,0),0,NVL(W_CODE,0),:b9 * :b3 )  AND NVL(FROM_QTY,0) = DECODE(NVL(:b12,0),0,NVL(FROM_QTY,0),:b12 * :b3 )  AND NVL(TO_QTY,0) = DECODE(NVL(:b15,0),0,NVL(TO_QTY,0),:b15 * :b3 )"INSERT INTO IAS_ITEM_PRICE_HISTORY ( AUD_TYPE,LEV_NO,I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,W_CODE,FROM_QTY,TO_QTY,I_PRICE,AD_U_ID,AD_DATE,UP_U_ID,UP_DATE,AUD_U_ID,AUD_DATE,BRN_NO,DOC_NO,DOC_DATE,PREV_I_PRICE )  VALUES ( 2,:b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,NVL(:b6,0) * :b4 ,NVL(:b8,0) * :b4 ,(NVL(:b10,0) / NVL(:b11,1) ) * :b4 ,:b13,:b14,:b15,:b16,:b17,IAS_GEN_PKG.GET_CURDATE,:b18,:b19,TO_DATE(IAS_GEN_PKG.GET_CURDATE,''DD/MM/YYYY''),:b20  )"

 From  Ias_Grp_Itm_Lvl

where Ias_Itm_Mst.i_code = ias_item_price.i_code

 Where subg_code Like '%'||:Ias_Item_Price1.temp_data||'%'

   From measurement

            nvl(city_e_name,city_a_name)),to_char(City_no) from CITIES order by City_no
Select R_code||'- '||Decode(
            nvl(r_e_name,r_a_name)),to_char(R_Code) from Regions order by r_code
Select PROV_NO||'- '||Decode(
            nvl(PROV_E_NAME,PROV_A_NAME)),to_char(PROV_NO) from ias_provinces order by PROV_NO
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and (:Parameter.User_No=1 OR (Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(view_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1) )
and  c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
order by cc_code
Select Brn_No,
 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
 Order By Cmp_No , Brn_No

        Nvl(C_Class_E_Name,C_Class_Name)),to_char(C_class) from Customer_Class Order by c_class
Select C_Group_Code||' - '||Decode(
       From Customer_Group 
       Where ((
          Exists(Select 1 From Priv_Acc Where A_Code=Customer_Group.C_A_Code
      Order By Customer_Group.C_Group_Code
Select to_char(C_Degree)||'-'||Decode(
            Nvl(C_Degree_E_Name,C_Degree_A_Name)),to_char(C_Degree) from Customer_Degree Order By C_Degree
SELECT AR_CS_TYPE,CC_AVAIL   FROM IAS_PARA_AR,IAS_PARA_GEN"
 And Exists (Select 1  From S_Brn_Usr_Priv  
                                             Where U_Id =
  and Ias_Bill_Mst.c_code in (select c_code from customer where c_class between 
 and Ias_Bill_Mst.c_code in (select c_code from customer where c_group_code between 
 and Ias_Bill_Mst.c_code in (select c_code from customer where c_degree Between 
 and Ias_Bill_Mst.c_code In ( select c_code from customer where r_code >= '
 And Exists ( select 1 from  privilege_cc cc 
                                     where Ias_Bill_Mst.Cc_Code=cc.Cc_Code 
SELECT MIN(F_DATE)   FROM S_PRD_DTL"SELECT SYSDATE   FROM S_PRD_MST  WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,''YYYY'') BETWEEN F_YR_NO AND T_YR_NO"SELECT MAX(T_DATE)   FROM S_PRD_DTL"
SELECT  c_group_code ,
    FROM customer_group
   WHERE ((:parameter.user_no = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM priv_acc
                 WHERE a_code = customer_group.c_a_code
ORDER BY customer_group.c_group_code
Select   C_Class  ,C_Class_Name,C_Class_E_Name
From Customer_Class
Order By  C_Class
SELECT DISTINCT IAS_ROUTE_DTL.ROUTE_NO ROUTE_NO,DECODE (1,1, NVL (ROUTE_A_NAME, ROUTE_E_NAME),NVL (ROUTE_E_NAME, ROUTE_A_NAME)) RNAME,
           FROM IAS_ROUTE_MST, IAS_ROUTE_DTL, REGIONS
          WHERE IAS_ROUTE_MST.ROUTE_NO = IAS_ROUTE_DTL.ROUTE_NO
       ORDER BY IAS_ROUTE_DTL.ROUTE_NO,
SELECT   C_degree, C_degree_a_name, C_degree_e_name
    FROM Customer_degree
ORDER BY C_degree
Select Customer.C_Code,
  From Customer
 Where ((:Parameter.User_No = 1)
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Lpad(C_Code,15,'0')
select col_no,decode(:parameter.lang_no,1,nvl(col_name,col_e_name),
nvl(col_e_name,col_name) ) col_name from COLLERCTOR
order by col_no
select r_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,nvl(r_a_name,r_e_name),nvl(r_e_name,r_a_name))  r_a_name , 
 from regions ,cities
 where regions.city_no=cities.city_no(+)
 order by r_code
select reprs_code,decode(:parameter.Lang_No,1,nvl(reprs_a_name,reprs_e_name),nvl(reprs_e_name,reprs_a_name)) rep_name from sales_man order by reprs_code
SELECT   cc_code, cc_A_Name, cc_e_name
    FROM cost_centers

/NSPC2/CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,P_QTY,AVL_QTY   FROM (SELECT IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.I_CODE,IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.W_CODE,TO_DATE(NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''),''DD/MM/YYYY'') EXPIRE_DATE,NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.BATCH_NO,''0'') BATCH_NO,SUM(NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.P_QTY,0) + (NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.FREE_QTY,0) * P_SIZE ) ) P_QTY,NVL(GET_ICODE_AVLQTY(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.I_CODE,1,IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.W_CODE,TO_DATE(NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''),''DD/MM/YYYY''),NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.BATCH_NO,''0''), NULL ),0) AVL_QTY   FROM IAS_POS_BILL_MST,IAS_POS_BILL_DTL  WHERE IAS_POS_BILL_MST.BILL_NO = IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.BILL_NO  AND NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_MST.POSTED,0) = 0  AND NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_MST.HUNG,0) = 0  AND NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.SERVICE_ITEM,0) = 0  AND IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.W_CODE = :b1  AND IAS_POS_BILL_MST.BILL_DATE <= DECODE(:b2, NULL ,IAS_POS_BILL_MST.BILL_DATE,TO_CHAR(:b2,''DD/MM/YYYY''))  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.I_CODE  AND NVL(IAS_ITM_MST.KIT_ITM,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  GROUP BY IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.I_CODE,IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.W_CODE,TO_DATE(NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''),''DD/MM/YYYY''),NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.BATCH_NO,''0'')  HAVING GET_ICODE_AVLQTY(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.I_CODE,1,IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.W_CODE,TO_DATE(NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''),''DD/MM/YYYY''),NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.BATCH_NO,''0''), NULL ) - NVL(SUM(NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.P_QTY,0) + (NVL(IAS_POS_BILL_DTL.FREE_QTY,0) * P_SIZE ) ),0)  < 0 )"
/NSPC2/CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
Err When Update Rcrd_No In Kit_Items_Detail, After Delete Row

SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE,RCRD_NO,DOC_SEQUENCE   FROM KIT_ITEMS_DETAIL  WHERE DOC_SER = :b1  AND DOC_NO = :b2  AND KIT_ITEM_NO = :b3"
SELECT NVL(FILL_ITM_CMPNNT_IN_INVC,0)   FROM RMS_PARA"SELECT BILL_SRL   FROM RMS_BILL_MST  WHERE NVL(PST_FLG,0) = 0  AND BILL_DATE <= TO_DATE(:b1,''DD/MM/YYYY'')  AND NVL(W_CODE,0) = NVL(:b2,NVL(W_CODE,0))"DELETE FROM RMS_BILL_CMPNNT_DTL WHERE BILL_SRL = :b1"SELECT D.I_CODE I_CODE,ITM_UNT ITM_UNT,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,NVL(P_QTY,0) P_QTY,NVL(SUM_SLS_QTY,0) SUM_SLS_QTY   FROM IAS_ITM_MST M,RMS_MINUS_STK_QTY_TMP D  WHERE M.I_CODE = D.I_CODE  AND NVL(M.KIT_ITM,0) = 1  AND NVL(D.LVL_NO,0) = DECODE(:b1, NULL ,NVL(D.LVL_NO,0),:b1)  AND D.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b3, NULL ,D.W_CODE,:b3) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,D.W_CODE,:b3) ORDER BY D.LVL_NO DESC"
SELECT NVL(SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) ),0)   FROM ASSEMBLE_KIT_ITEMS_DET  WHERE DOC_TYPE_REF = 94  AND DOC_NO_REF = :b1  AND DOC_SER_REF = :b2  AND KIT_ITEM_NO = :b3"SELECT NVL(SUM(P_QTY),0)   FROM INV_RQ_ASSMBL_DTL  WHERE DOC_NO = :b1  AND DOC_SER = :b2  AND I_CODE = :b3"SELECT NVL(SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) ),0)   FROM ASSEMBLE_KIT_ITEMS_DET  WHERE DOC_SER = :b1  AND KIT_ITEM_NO = :b2  AND RCRD_NO = :b3"
SELECT NVL(FILL_ITM_CMPNNT_IN_INVC,0)   FROM RMS_PARA"SELECT BILL_SRL   FROM RMS_BILL_MST  WHERE NVL(PST_FLG,0) = 0  AND BILL_DATE <= TO_DATE(:b1,''DD/MM/YYYY'')  AND NVL(W_CODE,0) = NVL(:b2,NVL(W_CODE,0))"DELETE FROM RMS_BILL_CMPNNT_DTL WHERE BILL_SRL = :b1"SELECT D.I_CODE I_CODE,ITM_UNT ITM_UNT,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,P_QTY   FROM IAS_ITM_MST M,RMS_MINUS_STK_QTY_TMP D  WHERE M.I_CODE = D.I_CODE  AND NVL(M.KIT_ITM,0) = 1  AND NVL(D.LVL_NO,0) = DECODE(:b1, NULL ,NVL(D.LVL_NO,0),:b1)  AND D.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b3, NULL ,D.W_CODE,:b3) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,D.W_CODE,:b3) ORDER BY D.LVL_NO DESC"
SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT 1   FROM IAS_V_ITM_UNT_BARCODE  WHERE BARCODE = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"INSERT INTO IAS_ITM_UNT_BARCODE ( I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,BARCODE,BATCH_NO,EXPIRE_DATE,AD_U_ID,AD_DATE,UP_U_ID,UP_DATE,FLEX_NO )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,:b6,:b7,:b8,:b9,:b10, NULL   )"SELECT 1   FROM IAS_BATCH_NO  WHERE BATCH_NO = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"INSERT INTO IAS_BATCH_NO ( BATCH_NO,COL1,COL2,COL3,COL4,COL5,AD_U_ID,AD_DATE,UP_U_ID,UP_DATE,CMP_NO,BRN_NO,BRN_YEAR,BRN_USR )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,:b6,:b7,:b8,:b9,:b10,:b11,:b12,:b13,:b14  )"
SELECT 1   FROM IAS_V_ITM_UNT_BARCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = :b2  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = :b3  AND ITM_UNT = :b4  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT 1   FROM IAS_V_ITM_UNT_BARCODE  WHERE BARCODE = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT 1   FROM IAS_V_ITM_UNT_BARCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = :b2  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = :b3  AND ITM_UNT = :b4  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT 1   FROM IAS_V_ITM_UNT_BARCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND ITM_UNT = :b2  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT 1   FROM IAS_V_ITM_UNT_BARCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND ITM_UNT = :b2  AND ROWNUM <= 1"INSERT INTO IAS_ITM_UNT_BARCODE ( I_CODE,BARCODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,BATCH_NO,EXPIRE_DATE,AD_U_ID,AD_DATE,FLEX_NO )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,:b6,:b7,:b8, NULL   )"
SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,P_QTY,AVL_QTY   FROM (SELECT IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.I_CODE,IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.W_CODE,NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') EXPIRE_DATE,NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.BATCH_NO,''0'') BATCH_NO,SUM(NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.P_QTY,0) + (NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.FREE_QTY,0) * P_SIZE ) ) P_QTY,NVL(GET_ICODE_AVLQTY(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.I_CODE,1,IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.W_CODE,NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''),NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.BATCH_NO,''0''), NULL ),0) AVL_QTY   FROM IAS_BILL_MST_BR,IAS_BILL_DTL_BR  WHERE IAS_BILL_MST_BR.BILL_SER = IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.BILL_SER  AND NVL(IAS_BILL_MST_BR.BILL_POST,0) = 0  AND NVL(IAS_BILL_MST_BR.STAND_BY,0) = 0  AND NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.SERVICE_ITEM,0) = 0  AND IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.W_CODE = :b1  AND IAS_BILL_MST_BR.BILL_DATE <= DECODE(:b2, NULL ,IAS_BILL_MST_BR.BILL_DATE,TO_CHAR(:b2,''DD/MM/YYYY''))  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.I_CODE  AND NVL(IAS_ITM_MST.KIT_ITM,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  GROUP BY IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.I_CODE,IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.W_CODE,NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''),NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.BATCH_NO,''0'')  HAVING GET_ICODE_AVLQTY(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.I_CODE,1,IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.W_CODE,NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''),NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.BATCH_NO,''0''), NULL ) - NVL(SUM(NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.P_QTY,0) + (NVL(IAS_BILL_DTL_BR.FREE_QTY,0) * P_SIZE ) ),0)  < 0 )"
DELETE FROM KIT_ITEMS_DETAIL WHERE DOC_SER IN (SELECT DOC_SER   FROM KIT_ITEMS_DETAIL  MINUS SELECT DOC_SER   FROM ASSEMBLE_KIT_ITEMS_DET )"

SUM(NVL(I_PRICE,0) * NVL(I_QTY,0) )   FROM KIT_ITEMS,IAS_ITEM_PRICE  WHERE KIT_ITEMS.I_CODE = IAS_ITEM_PRICE.I_CODE  AND KIT_ITEMS.ITM_UNT = IAS_ITEM_PRICE.ITM_UNT  AND KIT_ITEMS.KIT_ITEM_NO = :b1  AND IAS_ITEM_PRICE.LEV_NO = :b2"SELECT NVL(I_PRICE,0)   FROM IAS_ITEM_PRICE  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND ITM_UNT = :b2  AND LEV_NO = :b3  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT NVL(I_PRICE,0)   FROM IAS_ITEM_PRICE  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND LEV_NO = :b2  AND ITM_UNT = :b3  AND W_CODE = :b4  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT NVL(I_PRICE,0)   FROM IAS_ITEM_PRICE  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND LEV_NO = :b2  AND ITM_UNT = :b3  AND BRN_NO = :b4  AND ROWNUM <= 1"INSERT INTO IAS_ITEM_PRICE ( LEV_NO,I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,W_CODE,I_PRICE,AD_U_ID,AD_DATE,BRN_NO )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,NVL(:b4,1),DECODE(:b5,2,:b6, NULL ),:b7,:b8,SYSDATE,:b9  )"SELECT I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE   FROM IAS_ITM_DTL  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND ITM_UNT != :b2"INSERT INTO IAS_ITEM_PRICE ( LEV_NO,I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,W_CODE,I_PRICE,AD_U_ID,AD_DATE,BRN_NO )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,DECODE(:b5,2,:b6, NULL ),NVL(:b7,0) * :b4 ,:b9,SYSDATE,:b10  )"UPDATE IAS_ITEM_PRICE SET I_PRICE=NVL(:b1,0),UP_U_ID=:b2,UP_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE I_CODE = :b3  AND ITM_UNT = :b4  AND LEV_NO = :b5  AND DECODE(:b6,2,W_CODE,5,BRN_NO,0) = DECODE(:b6,2,:b8,5,:b9,0)"INSERT INTO IAS_ITEM_PRICE_HISTORY ( AUD_TYPE,LEV_NO,I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,W_CODE,FROM_QTY,TO_QTY,I_PRICE,AD_U_ID,AD_DATE,UP_U_ID,UP_DATE,AUD_U_ID,AUD_DATE,BRN_NO,DOC_NO,DOC_DATE,PREV_I_PRICE )  VALUES ( 2,:b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,DECODE(:b5,2,:b6, NULL ), NULL , NULL ,:b7,:b8,:b9,:b10,:b11,:b12,IAS_GEN_PKG.GET_CURDATE,:b13,:b14,:b15,:b7  )"SELECT I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE   FROM IAS_ITM_DTL  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND ITM_UNT != :b2"UPDATE IAS_ITEM_PRICE SET I_PRICE=(NVL(:b1,0) / NVL(:b2,1) ) * :b3 ,UP_U_ID=:b4,UP_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE I_CODE = :b5  AND ITM_UNT = :b6  AND LEV_NO = :b7  AND DECODE(:b8,2,W_CODE,5,BRN_NO,0) = DECODE(:b8,2,:b10,5,:b11,0)"INSERT INTO IAS_ITEM_PRICE_HISTORY ( AUD_TYPE,LEV_NO,I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,W_CODE,FROM_QTY,TO_QTY,I_PRICE,AD_U_ID,AD_DATE,UP_U_ID,UP_DATE,AUD_U_ID,AUD_DATE,BRN_NO,DOC_NO,DOC_DATE,PREV_I_PRICE )  VALUES ( 2,:b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,DECODE(:b5,2,:b6, NULL ), NULL , NULL ,(NVL(:b7,0) / NVL(:b8,1) ) * :b4 ,:b10,:b11,:b12,:b13,:b14,IAS_GEN_PKG.GET_CURDATE,:b15,:b16,:b17,:b7  )"
SELECT BILL_SER   FROM IAS_BILL_MST  WHERE BILL_NO = NVL(:b1,0)  AND ROWNUM = 1"SELECT 1   FROM IAS_BILL_MST  WHERE BILL_SER = :b1  AND ((:b2 = 1 ) OR EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV  WHERE U_ID = :b2  AND S_BRN_USR_PRIV.BRN_NO = IAS_BILL_MST.BRN_NO  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,1) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT 1   FROM IAS_BILL_MST  WHERE BILL_NO = :b1  AND BILL_SER = :b2  AND NVL(EXTERNAL_POST,0) != 0  AND ((:b3 = 1 ) OR EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV  WHERE U_ID = :b3  AND S_BRN_USR_PRIV.BRN_NO = IAS_BILL_MST.BRN_NO  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,1) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT 1   FROM IAS_BILL_MST  WHERE BILL_SER = :b1  AND NVL(STAND_BY,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_NO,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_DOC_TYPE,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1) P_SIZE,SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0)) I_QTY,SUM(NVL(FREE_QTY,0)) FREE_QTY   FROM IAS_BILL_MST,IAS_BILL_DTL,IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER = IAS_BILL_DTL.BILL_SER  AND IAS_BILL_DTL.I_CODE = IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE  AND IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_NO = :b1  AND IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER = :b2  AND NVL(IAS_ITM_MST.KIT_ITM,0) = 1  GROUP BY IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_NO,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_DOC_TYPE,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1)"
SELECT DOC_SER   FROM INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST  WHERE DOC_NO = NVL(:b1,0)  AND ROWNUM = 1"SELECT 1   FROM INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST  WHERE DOC_SER = :b1  AND ((:b2 = 1 ) OR EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV  WHERE U_ID = :b2  AND S_BRN_USR_PRIV.BRN_NO = INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST.BRN_NO  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,1) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT 1   FROM INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST  WHERE DOC_NO = :b1  AND DOC_SER = :b2  AND NVL(EXTERNAL_POST,0) != 0  AND ((:b3 = 1 ) OR EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV  WHERE U_ID = :b3  AND S_BRN_USR_PRIV.BRN_NO = INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST.BRN_NO  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,1) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST.DOC_NO,INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST.DOC_SER,INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST.TYP_NO,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1) P_SIZE,SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0)) I_QTY,INV_RQ_ASSMBL_DTL.W_CODE,INV_RQ_ASSMBL_DTL.CC_CODE,RCRD_NO,REC_ATTCH,INV_RQ_ASSMBL_DTL.USE_ATTCH,BARCODE   FROM INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST,INV_RQ_ASSMBL_DTL,IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST.DOC_SER = INV_RQ_ASSMBL_DTL.DOC_SER  AND INV_RQ_ASSMBL_DTL.I_CODE = IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE  AND INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST.DOC_NO = :b1  AND INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST.DOC_SER = :b2  AND NVL(IAS_ITM_MST.KIT_ITM,0) = 1  GROUP BY INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST.DOC_NO,INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST.DOC_SER,INV_RQ_ASSMBL_MST.TYP_NO,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1),INV_RQ_ASSMBL_DTL.W_CODE,INV_RQ_ASSMBL_DTL.CC_CODE,RCRD_NO,REC_ATTCH,INV_RQ_ASSMBL_DTL.USE_ATTCH,BARCODE ORDER BY RCRD_NO"SELECT NVL(SUM(I_QTY),0)   FROM ASSEMBLE_KIT_ITEMS_DET  WHERE DOC_TYPE_REF = 94  AND DOC_SER_REF = :b1  AND KIT_ITEM_NO = :b2"
SELECT NVL(STKCOST_FRACTION,6)   FROM IAS_PARA_INV"
SELECT SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0))   FROM (SELECT SUM((NVL(I_QTY,0) + NVL(FREE_QTY,0) ) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) ) I_QTY   FROM IAS_BILL_MST M,IAS_BILL_DTL D  WHERE M.BILL_SER = D.BILL_SER  AND D.I_CODE = :b1  AND D.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0''))  UNION ALL SELECT SUM((NVL(I_QTY,0) + NVL(FREE_QTY,0) ) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) ) * -1  I_QTY   FROM DETAIL_OUT_BILLS  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(BATCH_NO,''0''))  UNION ALL SELECT SUM((NVL(D.I_QTY,0) + NVL(D.FREE_QTY,0) ) * NVL(D.P_SIZE,1) ) * -1  I_QTY   FROM IAS_RT_BILL_MST M,IAS_RT_BILL_DTL D  WHERE M.RT_BILL_SER = D.RT_BILL_SER  AND M.P_YEAR = 3  AND D.I_CODE = :b1  AND D.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0'')) )"SELECT SUM(((NVL(I_QTY,0) - NVL(RET_QTY,0) ) + (NVL(FREE_QTY,0) - NVL(RET_FREE_QTY,0) ) ) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) )   FROM IAS_RT_BILL_MST,IAS_RT_BILL_DTL  WHERE IAS_RT_BILL_MST.RT_BILL_SER = IAS_RT_BILL_DTL.RT_BILL_SER  AND IAS_RT_BILL_MST.P_YEAR != 3  AND I_CODE = :b1  AND IAS_RT_BILL_DTL.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(BATCH_NO,''0''))  AND ((NVL(I_QTY,0) > NVL(RET_QTY,0) ) OR (NVL(FREE_QTY,0) > NVL(RET_FREE_QTY,0) ))"SELECT SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0))   FROM IAS_OUTGOING_DTL  WHERE OUT_SER = :b1  AND I_CODE = :b2  AND W_CODE = :b3  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b4,''01/01/1900'')  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b5,''0'')  AND RCRD_NO = :b6"
Select M.I_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_Dflt,1,Nvl(M.I_Name,M.I_E_Name),Nvl(M.I_E_Name,M.I_Name)) I_Name,
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M,Ias_Itm_Dtl D 
   Where M.I_Code=D.I_Code
     And  Exists (Select 1 From Privilege_Gc
                 Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
 Order By Decode(
SELECT NULL "FLD1", NULL "FLD2", NULL "FLD3", NULL "FLD4", NULL "FLD5", NULL "FLD6", NULL "FLD7", NULL "FLD8", NULL "FLD9", NULL "FLD10", NULL "FLD11" , NULL "FLD12", NULL "FLD13" , NULL "FLD14" , NULL "FLD15",
       NULL "FLD16", NULL "FLD17", NULL "FLD18", NULL "FLD19", NULL "FLD20" FROM DUAL
SELECT SALES_ORDER.ORDER_NO,SALES_ORDER.ORDER_SER,SALES_ORDER.BILL_DOC_TYPE,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1) P_SIZE,SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0)) I_QTY,SUM(NVL(FREE_QTY,0)) FREE_QTY   FROM SALES_ORDER,ORDER_DETAIL,IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE SALES_ORDER.ORDER_SER = ORDER_DETAIL.ORDER_SER  AND ORDER_DETAIL.I_CODE = IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE  AND '','' || :b1  || '',''  LIKE  ''%,'' || SALES_ORDER.ORDER_SER  || '',%''   AND NVL(IAS_ITM_MST.KIT_ITM,0) = 1  AND ((:b2 = 1 ) OR EXISTS  (SELECT S_TYPE   FROM IAS_PRIV_AR  WHERE U_ID = :b2  AND NVL(VIEW_FLAG,0) = 1  AND IAS_PRIV_AR.S_TYPE = SALES_ORDER.SO_TYPE  AND IAS_PRIV_AR.AR_TYPE = 2  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) GROUP BY SALES_ORDER.ORDER_NO,SALES_ORDER.ORDER_SER,SALES_ORDER.BILL_DOC_TYPE,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1)"SELECT NVL(SUM(I_QTY),0)   FROM ASSEMBLE_KIT_ITEMS_DET  WHERE DOC_TYPE_REF = 53  AND DOC_SER_REF = :b1  AND KIT_ITEM_NO = :b2  AND ITM_UNT = :b3"
SELECT NVL(BATCH_DESC_A_NAME,BATCH_DESC_E_NAME)   FROM IAS_BATCH_NO_CONTENTS  WHERE COL_NO = 1  AND BATCH_DESC_NO = LPAD(SUBSTR(:b1,:b2,:b3),:b3,''0'')"SELECT NVL(BATCH_DESC_A_NAME,BATCH_DESC_E_NAME)   FROM IAS_BATCH_NO_CONTENTS  WHERE COL_NO = 2  AND BATCH_DESC_NO = LPAD(SUBSTR(:b1,:b2,:b3),:b3,''0'')"SELECT NVL(BATCH_DESC_A_NAME,BATCH_DESC_E_NAME)   FROM IAS_BATCH_NO_CONTENTS  WHERE COL_NO = 3  AND BATCH_DESC_NO = LPAD(SUBSTR(:b1,:b2,:b3),:b3,''0'')"SELECT NVL(BATCH_DESC_A_NAME,BATCH_DESC_E_NAME)   FROM IAS_BATCH_NO_CONTENTS  WHERE COL_NO = 4  AND BATCH_DESC_NO = LPAD(SUBSTR(:b1,:b2,:b3),:b3,''0'')"SELECT NVL(BATCH_DESC_A_NAME,BATCH_DESC_E_NAME)   FROM IAS_BATCH_NO_CONTENTS  WHERE COL_NO = 5  AND BATCH_DESC_NO = LPAD(SUBSTR(:b1,:b2,:b3),:b3,''0'')"
SELECT I_IMG   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
SELECT IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_NO,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_DOC_TYPE,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1) P_SIZE,SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0)) I_QTY,SUM(NVL(FREE_QTY,0)) FREE_QTY   FROM IAS_BILL_MST,IAS_BILL_DTL,IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER = IAS_BILL_DTL.BILL_SER  AND IAS_BILL_DTL.I_CODE = IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE  AND '','' || :b1  || '',''  LIKE  ''%,'' || IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER  || '',%''   AND NVL(IAS_ITM_MST.KIT_ITM,0) = 1  GROUP BY IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_NO,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_DOC_TYPE,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1)"SELECT NVL(SUM(I_QTY),0)   FROM ASSEMBLE_KIT_ITEMS_DET  WHERE DOC_TYPE_REF = 4  AND DOC_SER_REF = :b1  AND KIT_ITEM_NO = :b2  AND ITM_UNT = :b3"
SELECT IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_NO,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_DOC_TYPE,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1) P_SIZE,SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0)) I_QTY,SUM(NVL(FREE_QTY,0)) FREE_QTY   FROM IAS_BILL_MST,IAS_BILL_DTL,IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER = IAS_BILL_DTL.BILL_SER  AND IAS_BILL_DTL.I_CODE = IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE  AND '','' || :b1  || '',''  LIKE  ''%,'' || IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER  || IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE  || '',%''   AND NVL(IAS_ITM_MST.KIT_ITM,0) = 1  GROUP BY IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_NO,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_SER,IAS_BILL_MST.BILL_DOC_TYPE,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1)"SELECT NVL(SUM(I_QTY),0)   FROM ASSEMBLE_KIT_ITEMS_DET  WHERE DOC_TYPE_REF = 4  AND DOC_SER_REF = :b1  AND KIT_ITEM_NO = :b2  AND ITM_UNT = :b3"
SELECT SALES_ORDER.ORDER_NO,SALES_ORDER.ORDER_SER,SALES_ORDER.BILL_DOC_TYPE,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1) P_SIZE,SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0)) I_QTY,SUM(NVL(FREE_QTY,0)) FREE_QTY   FROM SALES_ORDER,ORDER_DETAIL,IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE SALES_ORDER.ORDER_SER = ORDER_DETAIL.ORDER_SER  AND ORDER_DETAIL.I_CODE = IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE  AND '','' || :b1  || '',''  LIKE  ''%,'' || SALES_ORDER.ORDER_SER  || IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE  || '',%''   AND NVL(IAS_ITM_MST.KIT_ITM,0) = 1  AND ((:b2 = 1 ) OR EXISTS  (SELECT S_TYPE   FROM IAS_PRIV_AR  WHERE U_ID = :b2  AND NVL(VIEW_FLAG,0) = 1  AND IAS_PRIV_AR.S_TYPE = SALES_ORDER.SO_TYPE  AND IAS_PRIV_AR.AR_TYPE = 2  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) GROUP BY SALES_ORDER.ORDER_NO,SALES_ORDER.ORDER_SER,SALES_ORDER.BILL_DOC_TYPE,IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE,ITM_UNT,NVL(P_SIZE,1)"SELECT NVL(SUM(I_QTY),0)   FROM ASSEMBLE_KIT_ITEMS_DET  WHERE DOC_TYPE_REF = 53  AND DOC_SER_REF = :b1  AND KIT_ITEM_NO = :b2  AND ITM_UNT = :b3"

SELECT D.I_CODE I_CODE,ITM_UNT ITM_UNT,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,P_QTY   FROM IAS_ITM_MST M,INV_RQ_ASSMBL_QTY_TMP D  WHERE M.I_CODE = D.I_CODE  AND NVL(M.KIT_ITM,0) = 1  AND NVL(D.LVL_NO,0) = DECODE(:b1, NULL ,NVL(D.LVL_NO,0),:b1)  AND D.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b3, NULL ,D.W_CODE,:b3) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,D.W_CODE,:b3) ORDER BY D.LVL_NO DESC"
SELECT COUNT(1)   FROM ((SELECT I_CODE,P_QTY,W_CODE,DOC_SEQUENCE   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE DOC_TYPE = 11  AND DOC_SER = :b1  MINUS SELECT I_CODE,PSUM_QTY,W_CODE,DOC_SEQUENCE   FROM KIT_ITEMS_DETAIL  WHERE DOC_SER = :b1 ) UNION (SELECT I_CODE,PSUM_QTY,W_CODE,DOC_SEQUENCE   FROM KIT_ITEMS_DETAIL  WHERE DOC_SER = :b1  MINUS SELECT I_CODE,P_QTY,W_CODE,DOC_SEQUENCE   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE DOC_TYPE = 11  AND DOC_SER = :b1 ) UNION (SELECT I_CODE,P_QTY,W_CODE,DOC_SEQUENCE   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE DOC_TYPE = 12  AND DOC_SER = :b1  MINUS SELECT KIT_ITEM_NO I_CODE,(I_QTY * P_SIZE ) P_QTY,T_W_CODE W_CODE,DOC_SEQUENCE   FROM ASSEMBLE_KIT_ITEMS_DET  WHERE DOC_SER = :b1 ) UNION (SELECT KIT_ITEM_NO I_CODE,(I_QTY * P_SIZE ) P_QTY,T_W_CODE W_CODE,DOC_SEQUENCE   FROM ASSEMBLE_KIT_ITEMS_DET  WHERE DOC_SER = :b1  MINUS SELECT I_CODE,P_QTY,W_CODE,DOC_SEQUENCE   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE DOC_TYPE = 12  AND DOC_SER = :b1 ))  WHERE ROWNUM <= 1"

 From Assemble_Kit_Items
  Where  Nvl(doc_Post,0) = 0 
           (Select 1 
              From Ias_Shw_Doc_Priv 
             Where U_Id =:Parameter.User_No
        Or Exists (Select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
        Or Exists (Select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                
        Or Exists (Select 1 From Privilege_Wh
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                
        Or Exists (Select 1 From Privilege_Wh
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                
  Order By Assemble_Kit_Items.Doc_Date Desc ,Assemble_Kit_Items.Doc_No
Select warehouse_details.w_code, 
from warehouse_details
where Exists (select 1 from PRIVILEGE_WH
where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and w_code=warehouse_details.w_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
order by warehouse_details.w_code

 From Inv_Rq_Assmbl_Mst
  Where  Nvl(Approved,0) = 1
           (Select 1 
              From Ias_Shw_Doc_Priv 
             Where U_Id =:Parameter.User_No

                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

  Order By Inv_Rq_Assmbl_Mst.Doc_Date Desc ,Inv_Rq_Assmbl_Mst.Doc_No
Select M.I_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_Dflt,1,Nvl(M.I_Name,M.I_E_Name),Nvl(M.I_E_Name,M.I_Name)) I_Name,
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M,Ias_Itm_Dtl D 
   Where M.I_Code=D.I_Code
     And  Exists (Select 1 From Privilege_Gc
                 Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode (:Parameter.P_Ord_Lov, 1, M.I_Code, (M.I_Code||M.I_Name))
Select  Decode(:Parameter.Lang_Dflt,1,Nvl(M.I_Name,M.I_E_Name),Nvl(M.I_E_Name,M.I_Name)) I_Name,
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M,Ias_Itm_Dtl D 
   Where M.I_Code=D.I_Code
     And  Exists (Select 1 From Privilege_Gc
                 Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode (:Parameter.P_Ord_Lov, 1, M.I_Code, (M.I_Code||M.I_Name))
Select M.I_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_Dflt,1,Nvl(M.I_Name,M.I_E_Name),Nvl(M.I_E_Name,M.I_Name)) I_Name,
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M,Ias_Itm_Dtl D 
   Where M.I_Code=D.I_Code
     And  Exists (Select 1 From Privilege_Gc
                 Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode(:Parameter.P_Ord_Lov,
Select 
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M,Ias_Itm_Dtl D
   Where M.I_Code=D.I_Code
                (Select 1
                   From Privilege_Gc
                  Where     U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode (:Parameter.Lang_No, 1, M.I_Name, M.I_E_Name), M.I_Code
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_dflt,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) OR Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 )) 
Order By Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_dflt,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) OR Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 )) 
Order By Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,
select Decode(:Parameter.Lang_Dflt,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) OR Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1  )) 
Order By Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,
Select   Distinct Order_Date,
    From Sales_Order,Order_Detail
   Where  Sales_Order.Order_Ser=Order_Detail.Order_Ser
     And Exists ( Select 1 From Ias_Itm_Mst
                   Where Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code=Order_Detail.I_Code
        Or Exists (Select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
And Sales_Order.Order_Ser Not In  ( Select Doc_Ser_Ref From Assemble_Kit_Items_Det Where Doc_Type_Ref =53  )
          Or Exists (Select S_Type
                       From Ias_Priv_Ar
                      Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Order_Date, Sales_Order.Order_No, Sales_Order.Bill_Doc_Type

    From Sales_Order,Order_Detail
   Where  Sales_Order.Order_Ser=Order_Detail.Order_Ser
     And Exists ( Select 1 From Ias_Itm_Mst
                   Where Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code=Order_Detail.I_Code
        Or Exists (Select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
          Or Exists (Select S_Type
                       From Ias_Priv_Ar
                      Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Order_Date, Sales_Order.Order_No, Sales_Order.Bill_Doc_Type

Select  Itm_Unt,Lvl_Unit,P_Size From Ias_Itm_Dtl Where I_Code=:KIT_ITEMS_DETAIL.I_Code

    FROM IAS_ITM_MST M,IAS_ITM_DTL D 
   WHERE M.I_Code=D.I_Code
ORDER BY Lvl_Unit
select a_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_dflt,1,A_Name,Nvl(A_Name_Eng,A_Name)) A_name,
 from account,account_grouping
and Exists  ( Select Account_Type  From Account_Types  Where Nvl (Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1
and Exists (select 1 from priv_acc where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and a_code=account.a_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,a_code,

Where A_Cy=Ex_Rate.Cur_Code

 from Ias_Projects,IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP 
where Ias_Projects.group_no=IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP.group_no(+)
  and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) OR Exists (select 1 from IAS_PRIV_PROJECTS
               where u_id=:Parameter.User_No and Pj_No=Ias_Projects.Pj_No and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1  )) 
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,Pj_No,

 From Ias_Actvty,Ias_Actvty_Group 
  Where Ias_Actvty.Group_No = Ias_Actvty_Group.Group_No(+)
   And ((:Parameter.User_No=1) OR Exists (Select 1 From Ias_Priv_Actvty
                Where U_Id=:Parameter.User_No

    from Ias_Itm_Mst m,Ias_Itm_Dtl D,Ias_Itm_Wcode S

     And (:Parameter.User_No=1 Or exists (select 1
                 from privilege_gc
                 where u_id = :parameter.user_no
Order By M.I_Code,S.W_Code
Select Decode( expire_date ,'01/01/1900',To_Date(''),expire_date) Expire_Date,
From  item_movement
  Where I_code = :KIT_ITEMS_DETAIL.I_code 
  And  Exists ( Select 1 From Privilege_Wh
                  Where add_flag =1
Group By  expire_date ,batch_no 
Select Decode( batch_no,'0','', batch_no) Batch_No  , 
From  item_movement
  Where I_code = :KIT_ITEMS_DETAIL.I_code 
  And  Exists ( Select 1 From Privilege_Wh
                  Where add_flag =1
 Group By batch_no
