From s_Emp M
Where ((:Parameter.User_No = 1)
                                      Else (Select 1
                                              From S_Emp_Prv
                                             Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Emp_No
SELECT   Distinct bill_date,
    FROM Ias_Bill_Mst,Ias_Bill_Dtl, S_Flags
   WHERE Ias_Bill_Mst.Bill_ser=Ias_Bill_Dtl.Bill_ser
     And Exists ( Select 1 From Ias_Itm_Mst
                   Where Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code=Ias_Bill_Dtl.I_Code
        Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
ORDER BY bill_date, Ias_Bill_Mst.bill_no, Ias_Bill_Mst.bill_doc_type
SELECT cur_no,priv_cash.A_CY,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cur_name,cur_e_name ) cur_name ,cur_rate 
FROM EX_RATE,priv_cash
WHERE EX_RATE.CUR_CODE=priv_cash.A_CY 
order by L_F,cur_no
Select a_cy
  From vendor_curr
    Where v_code=:IAS_ASSEMBLE_ITM_EXPND.Ac_Code_Dtl
Select a_cy
   From customer_curr
       Where c_code = :IAS_ASSEMBLE_ITM_EXPND.Ac_Code_Dtl
SELECT cur_no,priv_cash.A_CY,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cur_name,cur_e_name ) cur_name ,cur_rate 
FROM EX_RATE,priv_cash
WHERE EX_RATE.CUR_CODE=priv_cash.A_CY 
order by L_F,cur_no
Select D.AC_CODE_DTL,
  From GLS_V_ACCNT_DTL D,GLS_ACCNT_DTL_GRPS M
 Where   D.AC_Code = M.GRP_AC_Code(+)

  From v_details,Vendor_Group
 Where 
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Vendor
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Lpad(v_code,15,'0')
select cash_at_bank.bank_no,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.a_cy,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.a_code,
From cash_at_bank,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl,priv_cash 
Where cash_at_bank.bank_no=ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.bank_no
order by cash_at_bank.bank_no
select cash_in_hand.cash_no,ias_cash_in_hand_dtl.a_cy,ias_cash_in_hand_dtl.a_code,
From cash_in_hand,ias_cash_in_hand_dtl,priv_cash 
Where cash_in_hand.cash_no=ias_cash_in_hand_dtl.cash_no 
order by cash_in_hand.cash_no
Select customer.c_code,
  From customer,Customer_Group
 Where 
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode(:Parameter.P_Ord_Lov,1,Lpad(c_code,15,'0') ,Decode(:Parameter.lang_no,1,c_a_name,c_e_name))
Select Cur_Code a_cy
  From GLS_ACCNT_DTL_CURR
    Where AC_CODE_DTL=:IAS_ASSEMBLE_ITM_EXPND.Ac_Code_Dtl
Select w_code,
      From item_movement
       Where I_code=:Kit_Items_Detail.I_code
Group By w_code 
Order By w_code 
Select Customer.C_Code,
  From Customer,Customer_Class,Customer_Group
 Where 
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By C_Code
SELECT   Distinct IAS_WHTRNS_MST.TR_TYPE, IAS_WHTRNS_MST.TR_NO, IAS_WHTRNS_MST.TR_DATE,
    FROM IAS_WHTRNS_MST,IAS_WHTRNS_Dtl
   WHERE IAS_WHTRNS_MST.TR_INOUT_TYPE = 1
     And Exists ( Select 1 From Ias_Itm_Mst
                           Where Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code=IAS_WHTRNS_Dtl.I_Code
                SELECT 1
                  FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                 WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY IAS_WHTRNS_MST.TR_NO, IAS_WHTRNS_MST.TR_DATE
SELECT   Distinct QUOTATION.QT_TYPE, QUOTATION.QUOT_NO, QUOTATION.QUOT_DATE,
    FROM QUOTATION,QUOTATION_DETAIL
   WHERE QUOTATION.QUOT_SER=QUOTATION_DETAIL.QUOT_SER
     And Exists ( Select 1 From Ias_Itm_Mst
                           Where Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code=QUOTATION_DETAIL.I_Code
                SELECT 1
                  FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                 WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY QUOTATION.QUOT_NO, QUOTATION.QUOT_DATE
Select Batch_No
From Ias_Batch_No
 Where Batch_No <> '0'
Order By Batch_No 
SELECT  A.BATCH_DESC_NO BATCH_D_NO1,A.BATCH_DESC_NAME BATCH_D_NAME1,      
      FROM 
      (SELECT BATCH_DESC_NO,Nvl(BATCH_DESC_A_NAME,BATCH_DESC_E_NAME) BATCH_DESC_NAME FROM IAS_BATCH_NO_CONTENTS WHERE COL_NO=1 ) A

SELECT TO_CHAR(JV_TYPE)||'-'||JV_NAME,TO_CHAR(JV_TYPE) 
                     FROM JV_TYPES 
                     WHERE 1=
                        OR EXISTS (SELECT JV_TYPE 
                                  FROM JV_TYPES_DETAIL
                                  WHERE JV_TYPE = JV_TYPES.JV_TYPE
                                  AND   Nvl(VIEW_FLAG,0) = 1 ) ORDER BY JV_TYPE
SELECT TO_CHAR(INCOM_TYPE)||'-'||INCOM_NAME,TO_CHAR(INCOM_TYPE) 
                     FROM INCOM_TYPES 
                     WHERE 1=
                        OR EXISTS (SELECT INCOM_TYPE 
                                  FROM PRIV_INCOME_TYPE
                                  WHERE INCOM_TYPE = INCOM_TYPES.INCOM_TYPE
                                  AND   ADD_FLAG = 1 ) ORDER BY INCOM_TYPE
SELECT TO_CHAR(OUT_TYPE)||'-'||OUT_NAME,TO_CHAR(OUT_TYPE) 
                     FROM OUT_TYPES 
                     WHERE 1=
                        OR EXISTS (SELECT OUT_TYPE 
                                     FROM PRIV_OUT_TYPE
                                    WHERE OUT_TYPE = OUT_TYPES.OUT_TYPE
                                      ORDER BY OUT_TYPE

                SELECT 1
                  FROM privilege_cc
                 WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no
Order By Cc_Code
SELECT  c_group_code ,
    FROM customer_group
   WHERE ((:parameter.user_no = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM priv_acc
                 WHERE a_code = customer_group.c_a_code
ORDER BY customer_group.c_group_code
Select Customer.C_Code,
  From Customer
 Where ((:Parameter.User_No = 1)
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
--Order By Lpad(C_Code,15,'0')
 Order By C_Code

 from regions ,cities
 where 
 order by r_code

    FROM SALES_MAN
   WHERE REPRS_CODE LIKE DECODE (:IAS_SALES_PLAN_MST.TEMP_DATA,
ORDER BY REPRS_CODE
SELECT   BRN_NO,
    FROM S_BRN
   WHERE BRN_NO LIKE DECODE (:IAS_SALES_PLAN_MST.TEMP_DATA,
ORDER BY BRN_NO

    FROM WAREHOUSE_DETAILS
   WHERE W_CODE LIKE
                SELECT 1
                  FROM PRIVILEGE_WH
                 WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY W_CODE
Select   D.Itm_Unt, 
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M, Ias_Itm_Dtl D
   Where M.I_Code = D.I_Code
Order By Lvl_Unit
Select M.I_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,Nvl(M.I_Name,M.I_E_Name),Nvl(M.I_E_Name,M.I_Name)) I_Name,
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M,Ias_Itm_Dtl D 
   Where M.I_Code=D.I_Code
            Select 1
              From Privilege_Gc
             Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
ORDER BY M.I_Code 
select group_details.g_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,nvl(g_a_name,g_e_name),nvl(g_e_name,g_a_name))  g_name from group_details,privilege_gc
where group_details.g_code=privilege_gc.g_code And
 order by group_details.g_code
SELECT  DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG_no,1,C_CLASS_NAME, C_CLASS_E_NAME) C_NAME,to_char(C_CLASS) c_class FROM CUSTOMER_CLASS ORDER BY C_CLASS

    FROM customer_group
   WHERE ((:parameter.user_no = 1)
                      SELECT 1
                        FROM priv_acc
                       WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no
ORDER BY c_group

    FROM ITEM_TYPES
ORDER BY TYPE_OF_ITEM

    From Cntry
Order By Cntry_No

         (SELECT FLG_DESC
            FROM S_FLAGS
           WHERE FLG_VALUE = PLAN_TYPE
         (SELECT FLG_DESC
            FROM S_FLAGS
           WHERE FLG_VALUE = PLAN_DSTR_TYPE
         (SELECT FLG_DESC
            FROM S_FLAGS
           WHERE FLG_VALUE = PLAN_PRD_TYPE
    FROM IAS_SALES_PLAN_MST
ORDER BY PLAN_NO

    From ias_provinces
Order By Prov_No

    From IAS_ALTERNATIVE_GROUP
Order By Group_No

    FROM customer_class_Typ
ORDER BY c_class_Typ

    FROM IAS_SUB_GRP_DTL
   WHERE (   :PARAMETER.USER_NO = 1

   From  Ias_mainsub_grp_dtl

   From  Ias_Assistant_Group
     Order  by Assistant_No

    FROM IAS_MAINSUB_GRP_DTL
   WHERE 
          OR EXISTS (SELECT G_CODE
                       FROM PRIVILEGE_GC
                      WHERE NVL (ADD_FLAG, 0) = 1
ORDER BY MNG_CODE

Select M.I_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,Nvl(M.I_Name,M.I_E_Name),Nvl(M.I_E_Name,M.I_Name)) I_Name,         
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M
   Where Get_Items_Activity( M.Activity_No                      ,
     And (:Parameter.User_No=1 Or Exists (Select 1 From Privilege_Gc
                 Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
ORDER BY LPAD (m.i_code, 30, '0')

FROM          GROUP_DETAILS,
WHERE         GROUP_DETAILS.G_CODE = PRIVILEGE_GC.G_CODE
ORDER BY      GROUP_DETAILS.G_CODE

    FROM ias_mainsub_grp_dtl
   WHERE ias_mainsub_grp_dtl.mng_code LIKE
ORDER BY ias_mainsub_grp_dtl.mng_code
Select  C.Bnf_No,
 From Ias_Bnfcrs B,Ias_Insrnce_Card C
 Where B.Bnf_No=C.Bnf_No
Order By b.BNF_NO,c.PRSON_NO

 from IAS_INSRNCE_CMP
order by INS_CMP_No
Select Emp_No,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,Nvl(Emp_l_Nm,Emp_F_Nm),Nvl(Emp_F_Nm,Emp_L_Nm)) Emp_Name
        From s_Emp
        Order By Emp_No
Select u_id,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,U_a_Name,nvl(U_e_Name,U_a_Name)) U_name From User_r Order by U_id
             (select i_code from Ias_Itm_Mst where g_code = '

 And Per.i_code in (select i_code from Ias_Itm_Mst where Mng_code = '
 And Per.i_code in (select i_code from Ias_Itm_Mst where Mng_code between '
Select Customer.C_Code,
  From Customer
 Where ((:Parameter.User_No = 1)
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Lpad(C_Code,15,'0')
Select Brn_No,
 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
 Order By Cmp_No , Brn_No

select DLR_NO
from (
select distinct d.DLR_NO
 from MTX_V_DEALERS      d
where :mtx_out_trx.AGENT_TYPE  = 2 
select distinct d.DLR_NO
 from MTX_V_USER_AGENTS        d
where :mtx_out_trx.AGENT_TYPE = 3 
group by DLR_NO
order by DLR_NO
SELECT   R_CODE,
    FROM REGIONS,
   WHERE REGIONS.CITY_NO = CITIES.CITY_NO
ORDER BY R_CODE
SELECT   CITY_NO,
    FROM CITIES
   WHERE CNTRY_NO = NVL (:mtx_out_trx.cntry_no, CNTRY_NO)
ORDER BY CNTRY_NO,city_no
Select cntry_no,cntry_a_name,cntry_e_name from CNTRY order by cntry_no     
Select PROV_NO,PROV_A_NAME,PROV_E_NAME
from IAS_PROVINCES
where cntry_no=Nvl(:Mtx_out_trx.cntry_no  ,cntry_no)
order by cntry_no,PROV_NO  
select REP_NAME       
from mtx_cust_reps r
where cust_ser = :MTX_OUT_TRX.cust_ser
order by REP_NAME

order by BaNK_NO

order by BNK_No
SELECT ALL CURR_SHRT, 
FROM GEN_v_CURR 
order by CURR_NO
select AGT_NO
from MTX_AGENTS
where agt_STATUS = 1
 order by agt_NO
select AGT_NO
from MTX_AGENT_BRNS
where brn_STATUS = 1
 order by agt_brn_NO
select  
from (
select  decode(:parameter.lang_no,1,d.DLR_ADES,d.DLR_EDES)  DLR_NAME
 from MTX_V_USER_AGENTS_BRNS  d
where  d.DLR_CAT  = 2
select  decode(:parameter.lang_no,1,d.DLR_brn_ADES,d.DLR_brn_EDES)  DLR_NAME
 from MTX_V_USER_AGENTS_BRNS    d
where d.DLR_CAT    = 3

order by DLR_NO,DLR_BRN_NO
SELECT distinct d.dlr_no
FROM MTX_V_USER_AGENTS  d
where DLR_STATUS = 1

  FROM MRP_ITEMS_VIEW
WHERE MRP_ITM_CLSS IN (5,2,4)  
ORDER BY I_CODE ,ITM_UNT

  FROM MRP_ITEMS_VIEW
 WHERE DECODE(:PARAMTRS.CTGRY,NULL,1,MRP_ITM_CLSS)=DECODE(:PARAMTRS.CTGRY,NULL,1,:PARAMTRS.CTGRY)
ORDER BY MRP_ITM_CLSS,I_CODE,ITM_UNT

 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

 ORDER BY

    From Account, Account_Grouping
   Where Account.A_Grouping = Account_Grouping.Group_No(+)
     And Exists(Select Account_Type

                 Where Nvl(Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1 And Account_Type = Account.A_S_M)

    From Account, Account_Grouping
   Where Account.A_Grouping = Account_Grouping.Group_No(+)

    FROM V_DETAILS

FROM     customer,
WHERE    customer.c_class = customer_class.c_class(+)
                         SELECT 1
                         FROM   S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                         WHERE  u_id = :parameter.user_no

  From customer  
Where Nvl(Conn_Rem_Sys,0)=Decode(:Parameter.Form_No,5104,1,Nvl(Conn_Rem_Sys,0))
Order By Lpad(c_code,15,'0')

    FROM REGIONS,
   WHERE REGIONS.CITY_NO = CITIES.CITY_NO
ORDER BY R_CODE
SELECT   COL_NO,
    FROM COLLERCTOR
   WHERE (   (:PARAMETER.USER_NO = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM IAS_PRIV_COLLECTORS
                 WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY COL_NO
SELECT   CODE_NO,
    FROM ARS_CODE_DTL
    WHERE CODE_TYP=3
    ORDER BY CODE_NO
SELECT   CITY_NO,
    FROM CITIES
   WHERE CNTRY_NO = NVL (:CUSTOMER.CNTRY_NO, CNTRY_NO)
ORDER BY CNTRY_NO
SELECT   C_CLASS,
    FROM CUSTOMER_CLASS
ORDER BY C_CLASS
SELECT   C_CLASS_TYP,
    FROM CUSTOMER_CLASS_TYP
ORDER BY C_CLASS_TYP
Select cntry_no,cntry_a_name,cntry_e_name from CNTRY order by cntry_no     
SELECT DISTINCT IAS_ROUTE_DTL.ROUTE_NO ROUTE_NO,
           FROM IAS_ROUTE_MST,
          WHERE IAS_ROUTE_MST.ROUTE_NO = IAS_ROUTE_DTL.ROUTE_NO
       ORDER BY IAS_ROUTE_DTL.ROUTE_NO,
SELECT DISTINCT IAS_ROUTE_MST.ROUTE_NO ROUTE_NO,
           FROM IAS_ROUTE_MST
       ORDER BY IAS_ROUTE_MST.ROUTE_NO
Select PROV_NO,PROV_A_NAME,PROV_E_NAME
from IAS_PROVINCES
where cntry_no=Nvl(:Customer.cntry_no  ,cntry_no)
order by cntry_no,PROV_NO  
SELECT   BRN_NO,
    FROM S_BRN
   WHERE (   (:PARAMETER.USER_NO = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                 WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY BRN_NO

    FROM SALES_MAN  
   WHERE NVL (INACTIVE, 0) = 0
                 SELECT 1
                   FROM IAS_PRIV_SMAN
                  WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY LPAD (REPRS_CODE, 15, '0')

    FROM Customer_degree  
ORDER BY C_degree

 from IAS_INSRNCE_CMP  
order by INS_CMP_No
SELECT   SUB_NO,
FROM     IAS_GNR_CODE_DTL
WHERE    MAIN_CODE = :PARAMETER.MAIN_CODE AND NVL (INACTV, 0) = 0 
ORDER BY SUB_NO

 SELECT  DECODE(
   FROM  MTX_V_USERS_BRNS S      
  where S.S_USERID  = '
               ORDER BY B.BRN_NO

============== /home/ameen/YS_ERP/YS_ERP/forms/ARSR003.fmx ==============
Select Brn_No,
 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
 Order By Cmp_No , Brn_No
Select u_id,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,U_a_Name,nvl(U_e_Name,U_a_Name)) U_name From User_r Order by U_id
SELECT   city_no,
    FROM cities, cntry
   WHERE cities.cntry_no = cntry.cntry_no(+)
ORDER BY cities.cntry_no, city_no
select Sales_Man.reprs_code rep_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,reprs_a_name,nvl(reprs_e_name,reprs_a_name)) Rep_Name,Sales_Man.r_code,
From Sales_Man,Regions where 
order by Lpad(Sales_Man.reprs_code,15,'0')
select Regions.r_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,r_a_name,nvl(r_e_name,r_a_name)) r_name,
From Regions,cities where
order by Regions.r_code
From Salesman
From City

SELECT A.LEV_NO,A.I_PRICE,A.ITM_UNT,A.P_SIZE,B.A_CY,A.I_PRICE*GET_RATE(:A_CY,b.a_cy,:aC_rate),DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG_NO,1,B.LEV_A_NAME,B.LEV_E_NAME) FROM IAS_ITEM_PRICE A, IAS_PRICING_LEVELS B WHERE
 A.LEV_NO=B.LEV_NO AND  A.LEV_NO in(SELECT  LEV_NO_CSH FROM CUSTOMER_CURR WHERE C_CODE=:C_CODE ) AND I_CODE=:I_CODE 
SELECT A.LEV_NO,A.I_PRICE,A.ITM_UNT,A.P_SIZE,B.A_CY,A.I_PRICE*GET_RATE(:A_CY_COST,b.a_cy,:a_cy_cost_rate),DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG_NO,1,B.LEV_A_NAME,B.LEV_E_NAME) FROM IAS_ITEM_PRICE A, IAS_PRICING_LEVELS B WHERE
 A.LEV_NO=B.LEV_NO AND  A.LEV_NO in(SELECT  LEV_NO_CSH FROM CUSTOMER_CURR WHERE C_CODE=:C_CODE_COST ) AND I_CODE=:I_CODE 
Select M.I_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,Nvl(M.I_Name,M.I_E_Name),Nvl(M.I_E_Name,M.I_Name)) I_Name,
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M,Ias_Itm_Dtl D 
   Where M.I_Code=D.I_Code
SELECT MP. EMP_NO,decode(:parameter.lang_no,1, mp.EMP_L_NM, mp.EMP_F_NM)nm
FROM S_EMP mp
WHERE mp.MNT_PSRC=1  
 (SELECT   COUNT(*)  FROM  MNT_EMP_WORK_TIM_TEM WHERE  ENG_CODE=MP.EMP_NO
SELECT NULL "FLD1", NULL "FLD2", NULL "FLD3", NULL "FLD4", NULL "FLD5", NULL "FLD6", NULL "FLD7", NULL "FLD8", NULL "FLD9", NULL "FLD10", NULL "FLD11" , NULL "FLD12", NULL "FLD13" , NULL "FLD14" , NULL "FLD15",
       NULL "FLD16", NULL "FLD17", NULL "FLD18", NULL "FLD19", NULL "FLD20" FROM DUAL
Select i_code, Sum(In_Out*P_QTY)
         From Item_Movement
where w_code=:parameter.mnt_wcode
group by i_code
select i_code,MNT_GET_I_NAME(I_CODE,:PARAMETER.LANG_NO),
itm_unt,p_size ,mnt_Get_Icode_Avlqty(I_CODE,p_size ,:PARAMETER.MNT_WCODE)  FROM ias_itm_dtl WHERE  DECODE (:I_CODE_REF,NULL,'0',I_CODE)=NVL(:I_CODE_REF,'0')
select i_code,MNT_GET_I_NAME(I_CODE,:PARAMETER.LANG_NO),
itm_unt,p_size ,mnt_Get_Icode_Avlqty(I_CODE,p_size ,:PARAMETER.MNT_WCODE)AA  FROM ias_itm_dtl WHERE  DECODE (:I_CODE_REF,NULL,'0',I_CODE)=NVL(:I_CODE_REF,'0')

SELECT INACTIVE   FROM IAS_SYS.S_ERP_SYSTEM  WHERE SYS_NO = 110"SELECT MRP_HRS_FLG   FROM MRP_SGS_GENERAL_PARAMETARS  WHERE BRN_NO = :b1"
SELECT COUNT(WORK_ORDER)   FROM MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDR_MSTR  WHERE CMP_NO = :b1  AND BRN_NO = :b2  AND IND_STATUS = 1  AND ROUT_CODE = :b3  AND ITEM_CODE = :b4  AND UNIT_CODE = :b5  AND ((TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(:b6,''DD/MM/YYYY'') || '' ''  || TO_CHAR(:b7,''HH24:MI:SS'') ,''DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FORCAST_F,''DD/MM/YYYY'') || '' ''  || TO_CHAR(FORCAST_TF,''HH24:MI:SS'') ,''DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FORCAST_T,''DD/MM/YYYY'') || '' ''  || TO_CHAR(FORCAST_TT,''HH24:MI:SS'') ,''DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') ))"
SELECT COUNT(*)   FROM MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDR_MSTR  WHERE CMP_NO = :b1  AND BRN_NO = :b2  AND WORK_ORDER = :b3"
SELECT ROUND(NVL(MAT_CST,0) * :b1 ,:b2)   FROM MRP_PCM_CALC_STD_BOM_ROW  WHERE CMP_NO = :b3  AND BRN_NO = :b4  AND SHF_CODE = :b5  AND BOM_CODE = :b6  AND ITEM_CODE = :b7  AND UNIT_CODE = :b8  AND ROW_ITEM_CODE = :b9  AND ROW_UNIT_CODE = :b10  AND CSTD_SQ =  (SELECT MAX(CSTD_SQ)   FROM MRP_PCM_CALC_STD_MST  WHERE CMP_NO = :b3  AND BRN_NO = :b4  AND SHF_CODE = :b5  AND NVL(CSTD_STS,0) = 1  AND APP_USR IS NOT NULL  )"

)  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,:b6,:b7,:b8,:b9,:b10,:b11,:b12,:b13,:b14,:b15,:b16,:b17,:b18,:b19,:b20,:b21  )"SELECT BOM_QTY   FROM MRP_BOM_BOM_MSTR  WHERE BRN_NO = :b1  AND BOM_CODE = :b2"INSERT INTO MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDER_ROW ( CMP_NO,BRN_NO,WORK_ORDER,ITEM_CODE,UNIT_CODE,BOM_QTY,STD_QTY,ACT_QTY,STD_MAT_CST,ACT_MAT_CST,W_CODE,WOP_ROW_WT_UNT,WOP_ROW_WT_ARGMNT_NO,WOP_ROW_WT_QTY )  SELECT :b1,:b2,:b3,ITEM_ROW,UNIT_CODE_ROW,ROUND(((:b4 / :b5 ) * QTY_F ),:b6),ROUND(((:b4 / :b5 ) * QTY_F ),:b6),0,MRP_GNR_PKG.GET_GRAND_WTAVG(ITEM_ROW,UNIT_CODE_ROW,W_CODE) * (:b4 * (QTY_F)  / (:b5) ) ,0,W_CODE,BOM_ROW_WT_UNT,BOM_ROW_WT_ARGMNT_NO,NVL(MRP_GNR_PKG.CALC_ITM_QTY_WT(ITEM_ROW,UNIT_CODE_ROW,BOM_ROW_WT_UNT, NULL ,ROUND(((:b4 / :b5 ) * QTY_F ),:b6),BOM_ROW_WT_ARGMNT_NO),0)   FROM ,0,PROD_CST_PER,PROD_STD_CST,PROD_ACT_CST,W_CODE,BOM_PROD_WT_UNT,NVL(IAS_WEIGHT_SYS_PKG.GET_ARGMNT_NO(ITEM_CODE,BOM_PROD_WT_UNT,UNIT_CODE),0),NVL(MRP_GNR_PKG.CALC_ITM_QTY_WT(ITEM_CODE,UNIT_CODE,BOM_PROD_WT_UNT,        NULL "FLD16", NULL "FLD17", NULL "FLD18", NULL "FLD19", NULL "FLD20" FROM DUAL
SELECT WOP_CTGRY_NO , DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG_NO,1,WOP_CTGRY_ADES,NVL(WOP_CTGRY_EDES,WOP_CTGRY_ADES))CTGRY_NAME
FROM MRP_SGS_WOP_CTGRY
WHERE NVL(P_CNTU,0) = 0 
ORDER BY WOP_CTGRY_NO
SELECT BOM_CODE,
  FROM MRP_BOM_BOM_MSTR  
 WHERE BRN_NO    =  :MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDR_MSTR.BRN_NO
ORDER BY BOM_CODE
SELECT W_CODE ,
  FROM WAREHOUSE_DETAILS
 WHERE EXISTS (  SELECT 1 
                   FROM PRIVILEGE_WH
                  WHERE PRIVILEGE_WH.W_CODE = WAREHOUSE_DETAILS.W_CODE
                  ORDER BY W_CODE
SELECT BOM_CODE ,WORK_ORDER,RELASE_DATE,WOP_REQ_QTY,WO_DETAILS
FROM MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDR_MSTR
WHERE CMP_NO = :PARAMETER.CMP_NO
ORDER BY WORK_ORDER
SELECT BOM_CODE, SUBSTR(DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG_NO ,1, BOM_NAME_A , NVL(BOM_NAME_F ,BOM_NAME_A)), 1, 300) BOM_NAME,
  FROM MRP_BOM_BOM_MSTR  
 WHERE BRN_NO    = :MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDER_ROW.BRN_NO
ORDER BY BOM_CODE
SELECT BOM_CODE, SUBSTR(DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG_NO ,1, BOM_NAME_A , NVL(BOM_NAME_F ,BOM_NAME_A)), 1, 300) BOM_NAME,
  FROM MRP_BOM_BOM_MSTR  
 WHERE BRN_NO    = :MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDR_MSTR.BRN_NO
ORDER BY BOM_CODE
SELECT I_CODE,
  FROM MRP_ITEMS_VIEW 
 WHERE MRP_ITM_CLSS IN (1,2,4) 
   AND I_CODE||ITM_UNT IN (SELECT ITEM_CODE||UNIT_CODE
                             FROM MRP_SGS_ROUTE_MST)
   AND I_CODE||ITM_UNT IN (SELECT ITEM_CODE||UNIT_CODE
                             FROM MRP_BOM_BOM_MSTR)
ORDER BY MRP_ITM_CLSS,I_CODE, ITM_UNT
SELECT ORDER_SER,
  FROM SALES_ORDER
 WHERE BRN_NO = :MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDR_MSTR.BRN_NO
SELECT I_CODE,
  FROM MRP_ITEMS_VIEW
 WHERE MRP_ITM_CLSS IN (5,2,4,8) 
   AND  I_CODE||ITM_UNT NOT IN ( SELECT ITEM_CODE||UNIT_CODE 
                                   FROM MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDER_ROW
                                  WHERE CMP_NO    = :MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDR_MSTR.CMP_NO
 ORDER BY MRP_ITM_CLSS,I_CODE,ITM_UNT
SELECT W_CODE ,
  FROM WAREHOUSE_DETAILS
  WHERE EXISTS (  SELECT 1 
                   FROM PRIVILEGE_WH
                  WHERE PRIVILEGE_WH.W_CODE = WAREHOUSE_DETAILS.W_CODE
                  ORDER BY W_CODE
SELECT BOM_CODE,
  FROM MRP_BOM_BOM_MSTR  
 WHERE BRN_NO    = :MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDR_MSTR.BRN_NO
ORDER BY BOM_CODE
SELECT ROUT_CODE , DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG_NO ,1, ROUT_ADES , NVL(ROUT_EDES ,ROUT_ADES)) ROUTE_NAME,
FROM MRP_SGS_ROUTE_MST 
WHERE CMP_NO    =  :PARAMETER.CMP_NO
SELECT ROUT_CODE , SUBSTR(DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG_NO ,1, ROUT_ADES , NVL(ROUT_EDES ,ROUT_ADES)), 1, 300) ROUTE_NAME,
FROM MRP_SGS_ROUTE_MST 
WHERE CMP_NO    =  :MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDR_MSTR.CMP_NO
SELECT A_CODE, DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG_NO,1,A_NAME, NVL(A_NAME_ENG,A_NAME)) A_NAME
FROM ACCOUNT M
WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 
                FROM ACCOUNT_TYPES D
               WHERE D.ACCOUNT_TYPE = M.A_S_M
ORDER BY A_CODE
SELECT ROUT_CODE , DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG_NO ,1, ROUT_ADES , NVL(ROUT_EDES ,ROUT_ADES)) ROUTE_NAME,
FROM MRP_SGS_ROUTE_MST 
WHERE CMP_NO    =  :PARAMETER.CMP_NO
SELECT   SUBSTR(YS_GEN_PKG.Get_Flg_Nm('MRP_PERIOD_PARTITION', M.PERIOD_TYPE, :PARAMETER.LANG_NO), 1, 120) PERIOD_TYPE,
    FROM MRP_MPS_PLN_DTLS D, MRP_MPS_PLN_MSTR M
   WHERE M.CMP_NO      = :PARAMETER.CMP_NO
ORDER BY D.F_DATE, D.PLAN_NO
SELECT  I_CODE_ALTNTV, 
FROM  IAS_ITM_ALTRNTV
WHERE I_CODE     = :MRP_MPS_WORK_ORDER_ROW.ITEM_CODE 
ORDER BY ORDR_NO
SELECT I_CODE,  
  FROM MRP_ITEMS_VIEW 
 WHERE MRP_ITM_CLSS IN (1,2)   
 ORDER BY I_CODE , ITM_UNT
SELECT LANG_DIR,LANG_EXT   FROM LANG_DEF  WHERE LANG_NO = :b1"
Select Cust.
WHERE I_CODE = '
SELECT NVL(USE_BATCH_NO,0),NVL(USE_BATCH_NO_AUTO_SQ_FLG,0),BATCH_NO_MTHD_NO_SQ   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE I_CODE = :b1"SELECT PROD_CST_PER   FROM MRP_BOM_BOM_MSTR  WHERE BRN_NO = :b1  AND BOM_CODE = :b2"

SELECT   DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.EXPIRE_DATE, 'DDMMYYYY'),
FROM     ITEM_MOVEMENT i,order_detail od
WHERE    i.I_CODE = :IAS_CHK_DOC_INOUT_QTY_dtl.I_CODE
GROUP BY i.EXPIRE_DATE,
ORDER BY i.EXPIRE_DATE
Select   Sales_Order.So_Type, 
    From Sales_Order, Ias_Drivers
   Where Sales_Order.Procesed = 0
                               CASE when not Exists (SELECT 1 FROM  IAS_CHK_DOC_INOUT_QTY_MST Where Doc_Ser_Ref=Sales_Order.Order_Ser
       (Select 1 From IAS_CHK_DOC_INOUT_QTY_MST Where Doc_Ser_Ref=Sales_Order.Order_Ser And Doc_Type_Ref=:IAS_CHK_DOC_INOUT_QTY_MST.Doc_Type_Ref ANd RowNum<=1)
                Select 1
                  From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                 Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Sales_Order.So_Type, Sales_Order.Order_No
Select   Sales_Order.So_Type, 
    From Sales_Order, Ias_Drivers
   Where Sales_Order.Procesed = 1
     And Exists (Select 1 From IAS_CHK_DOC_INOUT_QTY_MST Where Doc_Ser_Ref=Sales_Order.Order_Ser And Doc_Type_Ref=53 ANd RowNum<=1)
                Select 1
                  From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                 Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Sales_Order.So_Type, Sales_Order.Order_No
SELECT   DECODE(i.BATCH_NO,
FROM     ITEM_MOVEMENT i,order_detail od
WHERE    i.I_CODE = :IAS_CHK_DOC_INOUT_QTY_dtl.I_CODE
GROUP BY i.BATCH_NO
select doc_no,
 DOC_SER from (
Select Nvl(M.Out_No,M.Doc_No) Doc_No,
                               When M.Doc_Type_Ref=2 And Exists (Select 1 From Gr_Note Where Doc_Ser=M.Doc_Ser And Pi_Type=2 And Nvl(Pur_Type,0)=2 And Rownum<=1 )Then 44                                       
From   (Select   Doc_Type,
        From     Ias_Item_Serialno
        Group By Doc_Type,
                 where 1=1
                                                    SELECT 1
                                                    FROM   s_brn_usr_priv
                                                    WHERE  u_id = :parameter.user_no
                    ORDER BY doc_date DESC,                                           
Select D.I_Code, 
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M,Order_Detail D
   Where M.I_Code=D.I_Code
     And (:Parameter.User_No=1 Or Exists (Select 1 From Privilege_Gc
                                           where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode (:Parameter.P_Ord_Lov, 1, M.I_Code, (M.I_Code||M.I_Name))
Select   D.Itm_Unt,
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M,Ias_Itm_Dtl D ,order_detail od
   Where M.I_Code=D.I_Code
Order By Lvl_Unit
Select  Measure,  Measure_Code From  Measurement
Order By Measure
Select Brn_No,
 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
 Order By Cmp_No , Brn_No
SELECT   NVL(INCOM_NAME, INCOM_E_NAME) INCOM_TYPE, M.GR_NO, M.GR_DATE, M.A_DESC,
    FROM GR_NOTE M, INCOM_TYPES
   WHERE PI_TYPE = 5
     AND Exists (SELECT 1 FROM  GR_DETAIL DT,IAS_ITM_MST IT 
                       Where DT.G_SER=M.G_SER
                       AND DT.I_QTY>NVL((SELECT COUNT(SERIALNO) FROM IAS_ITEM_SERIALNO
                                         WHERE DOC_SER=M.G_SER
                SELECT 1
                  FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                 WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY INCOM_TYPE, GR_NO, GR_DATE  
SELECT   NVL(Out_NAME, OUT_E_NAME) OUT_TYPE, M.OUT_NO, M.OUT_DATE, M.A_DESC,w_code,
    FROM Ias_Outgoing_Mst M, OUT_TYPES
   WHERE M.OUT_TYPE = OUT_TYPES.OUT_TYPE
 AND Exists (SELECT 1 FROM  Ias_Outgoing_DTL DT,IAS_ITM_MST IT 
                       Where DT.OUT_SER=M.OUT_SER
                       AND DT.I_QTY>NVL((SELECT COUNT(SERIALNO) FROM IAS_ITEM_SERIALNO
                                         WHERE DOC_SER=M.OUT_SER
                SELECT 1
                  FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                 WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY  OUT_NO DESC, OUT_DATE DESC
SELECT   M.TR_TYPE, M.TR_NO, M.TR_DATE,
    FROM  IAS_WHTRNS_MST M, CUSTOMER
   WHERE M.TR_INOUT_TYPE = 2 
AND Exists (SELECT 1 FROM  IAS_WHTRNS_DTL DT,IAS_ITM_MST IT 
                       Where DT.TR_SER=M.TR_SER
                       AND DT.I_QTY>NVL((SELECT COUNT(SERIALNO) FROM IAS_ITEM_SERIALNO
                                         WHERE DOC_SER=M.TR_SER
                SELECT 1
                  FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                 WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY M.TR_NO DESC, M.TR_DATE DESC

    FROM IAS_RT_BILL_MST M, S_FLAGS, IAS_RT_SALES_TYPES
   WHERE M.RT_BILL_DOC_TYPE = S_FLAGS.FLG_VALUE
     AND Exists (SELECT 1 FROM  IAS_RT_BILL_DTL DT,IAS_ITM_MST IT 
                       Where DT.RT_BILL_SER=M.RT_BILL_SER
                       AND DT.I_QTY>NVL((SELECT COUNT(SERIALNO) FROM IAS_ITEM_SERIALNO
                                         WHERE DOC_SER=M.RT_BILL_SER
                ELSE (SELECT 1
                        FROM IAS_SHW_DOC_PRIV
                       WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
                 SELECT 1
                   FROM PRIVILEGE_WH
                  WHERE PRIVILEGE_WH.W_CODE = M.W_CODE
                SELECT 1
                  FROM S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                 WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY W_CODE, RT_BILL_DATE desc, RT_BILL_NO desc

From ias_out_request_mst

 FROM  MRP_SGS_SHOPS_FLOOR_CODING

 FROM  MRP_SGS_PERIOD_COSTONG

FROM  MRP_PCM_COST_CENTER
WHERE P_CNTU = 0
AND CC_CODE IN ( SELECT DISTINCT CC_CODE FROM MRP_PCM_VARIABLES_VALUES )
ORDER BY CC_CODE

FROM  MRP_SGS_PERIOD_COSTONG  P
WHERE  SYSDATE > P.DATE_F
ORDER BY P.DATE_F
SELECT C.dv_code,
FROM MRP_PCM_DISTRIBUTION_VARIABLES C
      ( select distinct basedon,ind_Assign  
        from MRP_PCM_DISTRIBUTION_VARIABLES 
        where dv_code = nvl(:PARAMETERS.DV_CODE1,dv_code) ) 
ORDER BY C.dv_code

from MRP_CRP_ITEMS_DETAILS
WHERE CMP_NO = :PARAMETER.CMP_NO AND 
      ITEM_CODE IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ITEM_CODE FROM MRP_PCM_VARIABLES_VALUES )

from Rem_Real_Mst

select a_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,A_Name,Nvl(A_Name_Eng,A_Name)) A_name,
 from account,account_grouping
and Exists  ( Select Account_Type  From Account_Types  Where Nvl (Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1
and Exists (select 1 from priv_acc where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and a_code=account.a_code and view_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
order by a_code
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) Or Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and view_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)) 
order by cc_code

 from Ias_Projects,IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP 
where Ias_Projects.group_no=IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP.group_no(+)
  and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) Or Exists (select 1 from IAS_PRIV_PROJECTS
               where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and Pj_No=Ias_Projects.Pj_No and nvl(view_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1))) 
order by Pj_No

    FROM ias_Actvty, ias_Actvty_group
   WHERE ias_Actvty.group_no = ias_Actvty_group.group_no(+)
            SELECT 1

             WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no

 From S_Brn

                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

    FROM cost_centers
   WHERE c_s_m = (SELECT cc_type
                    FROM cost_center_types
                   WHERE affected_by_trans = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM privilege_cc
                 WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no
Order By Lpad(Cc_Code,30,'0')

    FROM CUSTOMER_GROUP
   WHERE (   (:PARAMETER.USER_NO = 1)

                  FROM PRIV_ACC

FROM          CUSTOMER_RQ

Select   A_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,
    From Account, Account_Grouping
   Where Account.A_Grouping = Account_Grouping.Group_No(+)
     And Exists(Select Account_Type
                  From Account_Types
                 Where Nvl(Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1 And Account_Type = Account.A_S_M)

              From Priv_Acc
             Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode(:Parameter.P_Ord_Lov,

    From Account, Account_Grouping
   Where Account.A_Grouping = Account_Grouping.Group_No(+)
     And Exists(Select Account_Type
                  From Account_Types
                 Where Nvl(Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1 And Account_Type = Account.A_S_M)
            Select 1
              From Priv_Acc

    From Account
   Where

CREATE TABLE FAS_ASSETS_MST_BR AS SELECT * FROM FAS_ASSETS_MST
CREATE TABLE FAS_AS_MOVMNT_BR AS SELECT * FROM FAS_AS_MOVMNT
CREATE TABLE FAS_DEPR_MST_BR AS SELECT * FROM FAS_DEPR_MST
CREATE TABLE FAS_DEPR_DTL_BR AS SELECT * FROM FAS_DEPR_DTL
CREATE TABLE FAS_RE_EVL (RE_EVL_NO     NUMBER, RE_EVL_DATE DATE, BRN_NO        NUMBER(6), AS_CODE VARCHAR2(30), 
UPDATE S_LOV_SLCT SET LOV_SQL=REPLACE(LOV_SQL,''AS_E_NAME'',''NVL(AS_A_NAME,AS_E_NAME)'') WHERE LOV_NM = ''LOV_FAS_AS_CODE''  AND INSTR(LOV_SQL,''NVL(AS_A_NAME,AS_E_NAME)'') = 0"

           from IAS_ACCOUNT_ANLSYS

,1,Group_name,nvl(Group_e_name,Group_name)),to_char(Group_no) From Account_Grouping order by Group_no

,1,Report_name,nvl(Report_e_name,Report_name)),to_char(Report_type) From Account_Report_type order by  Report_type

,1,class_a_name,nvl(class_e_name,class_a_name)),to_char(class_no) From Ias_Account_Class Order by  class_no

From cash_at_bank,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl,priv_cash

  From v_details,Vendor_Group
 Where 
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Vendor
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Lpad(V_code,15,'0')
Select customer.c_code   c_v_code,
  From customer,Customer_Group
 Where 
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Lpad(C_code,15,'0')
select cash_in_hand.cash_no,ias_cash_in_hand_dtl.a_cy,ias_cash_in_hand_dtl.a_code,
From cash_in_hand,ias_cash_in_hand_dtl,priv_cash 
Where cash_in_hand.cash_no=ias_cash_in_hand_dtl.cash_no 
order by cash_in_hand.cash_no
SELECT M.J_DOC_NO,
FROM Master_Journal_V M,jv_types C
where M.jv_type=C.jv_type
and NOT Exists (select 1 from IAS_RQ_VCHR_DTL where DOC_SER_REF=M.J_SER AND ROWNUM<=1)
and NOT Exists (select 1 from VOUCHER_DETAIL where DOC_SER_REF=M.J_SER AND ROWNUM<=1)
           (Select 1 
              From Ias_Shw_Doc_Priv 
             Where U_Id =:Parameter.User_No
and Exists (select 1 from jv_types_detail where u_id=:Parameter.user_no 
        Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
ORDER BY M.J_DOC_NO,M.j_date DESC
SELECT 
 DESC_NO, DESC_A_DOC, DESC_E_DOC FROM IAS_DESC_DOC Order by DESC_NO
select a_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,A_Name,Nvl(A_Name_Eng,A_Name)) A_name,
 from account,account_grouping
and Exists  ( Select Account_Type  From Account_Types  Where Nvl (Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1
and Exists (select 1 from priv_acc where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and a_code=account.a_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
order by a_code
select a_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,A_Name,Nvl(A_Name_Eng,A_Name)) A_name,
 from account,account_grouping
and Exists  ( Select Account_Type  From Account_Types  Where Nvl (Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1
and Exists (select 1 from priv_acc where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and a_code=account.a_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
order by decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,a_name,a_name_eng)
Select Cur_No,A_Cy,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,Cur_Name,Cur_E_Name ) Cur_Name ,Cur_Rate From Ex_Rate,Account_Curr 
Where Ex_Rate.Cur_Code=Account_Curr.A_Cy 
  and Exists (select 1 from Priv_acc
               where u_id=:Parameter.User_no
Order By L_F,Cur_No
SELECT BANK_NO,
FROM GLS_BNK_CHQ_DTL
Where BANK_NO=:IAS_RQ_VCHR_MST.Cash_No
SELECT cur_no,customer_curr.A_CY,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cur_name,cur_e_name ) cur_name ,cur_rate FROM EX_RATE,Customer_curr 
WHERE EX_RATE.CUR_CODE=Customer_Curr.A_CY 
  And Exists (select 1 from IAS_PRIV_CUSTOMER
               where u_id=:Parameter.User_no
order by L_F,cur_no
Select EMP_NO,
  From S_EMP M
 Where  ((:Parameter.User_No = 1)
                   Select 1
                     From S_EMP_PRV
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From S_EMP_PRV
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By EMP_NO
SELECT cur_no,vendor_curr.A_CY,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cur_name,cur_e_name ) cur_name ,cur_rate FROM EX_RATE,vendor_curr 
WHERE EX_RATE.CUR_CODE=vendor_Curr.A_CY 
  And Exists (select 1 from IAS_PRIV_Vendor
               where u_id=:Parameter.User_no
order by L_F,cur_no
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and (:Parameter.User_No=1 OR Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1 ) )) 
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,
SELECT   cash_in_hand.cash_no, 
    FROM cash_in_hand
   WHERE      cash_in_hand.A_CODE =:IAS_RQ_VCHR_DTL.a_code
     And Exists(Select 1 
              From Sales_Man 
             Where Nvl(Cash_No,0)=cash_in_hand.Cash_No
ORDER BY cash_in_hand.cash_no
Select Customer.C_Code,
  From Customer,Customer_Class,Customer_Group
 Where 
 And Exists(Select 1 
              From Ias_Cst_Sman 
             Where C_Code=Customer.C_Code
               And Rep_Code in (select reprs_code from sales_man where cash_no=:IAS_RQ_VCHR_MST.cash_no)
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By C_Code
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and (:Parameter.User_No=1 OR Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1  ))) 
And cc_code In (select CC_Code from ias_account_cc where a_code=:IAS_RQ_VCHR_DTL.A_code)
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,
Select Pj_No,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,pj_a_name,nvl(pj_e_name,pj_a_name)) pj_name ,
 from Ias_Projects,IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP 
where Ias_Projects.group_no=IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP.group_no(+)
  And ((:Parameter.User_No=1) OR Exists (select 1 from IAS_PRIV_PROJECTS
               where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and Pj_No=Ias_Projects.Pj_No and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 ) )) 
order by Pj_No
SELECT wo_no,Nvl(Wo_a_Name,Wo_E_name) Wo_type_name,wo_date,c_name,doc_desc,wo_ser 
FROM  Ias_Work_Order_Mst,ias_work_order_types
where  Ias_Work_Order_Mst.wo_type_no=ias_work_order_types.wo_type_no
ORDER BY Ias_Work_Order_Mst.wo_type_no,wo_no
Select Pj_No,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,Pj_a_name,nvl(Pj_e_name,Pj_a_name)) Pj_name ,
from Ias_Projects,Ias_Projects_Group
where Ias_Projects.group_no=Ias_Projects_Group .group_no(+)
  and (:Parameter.User_No=1 OR Exists (select 1 from Ias_Priv_Projects
               where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and Pj_No=Ias_Projects.Pj_No and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 ) )) 
  and Pj_No In (select Pj_No from ias_account_pj where a_code=:IAS_RQ_VCHR_dtl.A_code)
  order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,Pj_No,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,Pj_a_name,Pj_e_name))

    FROM ias_Actvty, ias_Actvty_group

            SELECT 1
              FROM ias_priv_Actvty
             WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no

from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 OR (:Parameter.User_No=1) )) 
And cc_code In (select CC_Code from ias_account_cc where a_code=:Ias_Rq_Vchr_MST.Dummy_A_Code)
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,

    FROM credit_card_types,Ias_cr_card_types
   WHERE credit_card_types.Cr_Card_Type=Ias_cr_card_types.Cr_Card_Type
   ORDER BY cr_card_no

                   Where U_Id   = :parameter.User_no 
   ORDER BY cr_card_no

SELECT  c_group_code ,
    FROM customer_group
   WHERE ((:parameter.user_no = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM priv_acc
                 WHERE a_code = customer_group.c_a_code
ORDER BY customer_group.c_group_code
SELECT   Cc_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,Nvl(Cc_A_Name,Cc_E_Name),
    FROM cost_centers
   WHERE c_s_m = (SELECT cc_type
                    FROM cost_center_types
                   WHERE affected_by_trans = 1)
                SELECT 1
                  FROM privilege_cc
                 WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no
Order By Lpad(Cc_Code,30,'0')
select Regions.r_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,nvl(r_a_name,r_e_name),nvl(r_e_name,r_a_name)) r_name,
From Regions,cities where
order by Regions.r_code
select reprs_code,decode(:parameter.Lang_No,1,nvl(reprs_a_name,reprs_e_name), nvl(reprs_e_name,reprs_a_name)) rep_name from sales_man order by reprs_code
Select Customer.C_Code,
  From Customer
 Where ((:Parameter.User_No = 1)
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Lpad(C_Code,15,'0')
Select  Col_No,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,col_Name,col_E_Name) Col_Name,collerctor.R_Code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,2,r_A_Name,r_E_Name) R_Name From Collerctor,regions
Where Collerctor.R_Code=Regions.R_Code(+)
Order By Col_No
Select u_id,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,U_a_Name,nvl(U_e_Name,U_a_Name)) U_name From User_r Order by U_id
Delete From Ias_Dr_Det_Tmp
Delete From Ias_Dr_Det_Paid_Tmp
SELECT B.C_CODE,B.A_CY,B.BILL_NO,B.DOC_DATE,B.DOC_TYPE,B.BILL_DOC_TYPE,B.BILL_SER,B.I_NO,DECODE(NVL(:b1,1),1,I_DATE,NVL(DOC_DATE,I_DATE)) I_DATE,B.I_AMT,(NVL(B.I_AMT,0) * NVL(B.AC_RATE,1) ) I_AMT_LOC,B.AC_RATE,B.BRN_NO,B.BRN_YEAR,B.CMP_NO,B.BRN_USR,B.CC_CODE,B.PJ_NO,B.ACTV_NO   FROM CUSTOMER A,INSTALLMENT B  WHERE A.C_CODE = B.C_CODE  AND B.C_CODE BETWEEN NVL(:b2,B.C_CODE) AND NVL(:b3,B.C_CODE)  AND NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b4,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b5,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0))  AND NVL(A.C_CLASS,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b6,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0)) AND NVL(:b7,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0))  AND NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b8,NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0)) AND NVL(:b9,NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0))  AND NVL(A.COL_NO,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b10,NVL(A.COL_NO,0)) AND NVL(:b11,NVL(A.COL_NO,0))  AND B.A_CY = DECODE(NVL(:b12,0),1,B.A_CY,:b13)  AND B.I_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(:b14,''DD/MM/YYYY'') AND TO_DATE(:b15,''DD/MM/YYYY'')  AND B.DOC_TYPE IN ( NVL(:b16,0),NVL(:b17,9),NVL(:b18,1),NVL(:b19,3),NVL(:b20,4),NVL(:b21,2),NVL(:b22,25)  ) AND B.DR_NO IS NULL  AND (:b23 IS NULL  OR (:b24 = 0  AND NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b23,NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b26,NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'')) ) OR (:b24 = 1  AND (B.DOC_TYPE = 0  OR B.C_CODE IN (SELECT C_CODE   FROM IAS_POST_DTL  WHERE NVL(REP_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b23,NVL(REP_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b26,NVL(REP_CODE,''0'')) )))) AND NVL(A.R_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b30,NVL(A.R_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b31,NVL(A.R_CODE,0))  AND NVL(B.BRN_NO,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b32,NVL(B.BRN_NO,0)) AND NVL(:b33,NVL(B.BRN_NO,0))  AND NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b34,NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b35,NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0''))  AND ((:b36 = 1 ) OR (((:b37 = 1 ) AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM PRIV_ACC  WHERE U_ID = :b36  AND A_CODE = A.C_A_CODE  AND A_CY = B.A_CY  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) OR ((:b37 = 2 ) AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_PRIV_CUSTOMER  WHERE U_ID = :b36  AND C_CODE = A.C_CODE  AND A_CY = B.A_CY  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) )))ORDER BY A.C_CODE,DECODE(NVL(:b1,1),1,I_DATE,NVL(DOC_DATE,I_DATE)),DOC_TYPE,BILL_NO"SELECT B.AC_CODE_DTL C_CODE,B.DOC_DATE,B.DOC_SER,B.DOC_TYPE,B.DOC_NO,B.A_CY,B.CR_AMT CR_AMT,DECODE(NVL(B.CR_AMT_F,0),0,1,(NVL(B.CR_AMT,0) / NVL(B.CR_AMT_F,0) )) AC_RATE   FROM CUSTOMER A,IAS_POST_DTL B  WHERE A.C_CODE = B.AC_CODE_DTL  AND A.C_A_CODE = B.A_CODE  AND B.AC_DTL_TYP = 3  AND B.AC_CODE_DTL IS NOT NULL   AND NVL(CR_AMT,0) > 0  AND B.AC_CODE_DTL BETWEEN NVL(:b1,B.C_CODE) AND NVL(:b2,B.C_CODE)  AND NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b3,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b4,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0))  AND NVL(A.C_CLASS,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b5,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0)) AND NVL(:b6,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0))  AND NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b7,NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0)) AND NVL(:b8,NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0))  AND NVL(A.COL_NO,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b9,NVL(A.COL_NO,0)) AND NVL(:b10,NVL(A.COL_NO,0))  AND B.A_CY = DECODE(NVL(:b11,0),1,B.A_CY,:b12)  AND B.DOC_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(:b13,''DD/MM/YYYY'') AND TO_DATE(:b14,''DD/MM/YYYY'')  AND B.DOC_TYPE IN ( NVL(:b15,0),NVL(:b16,8),NVL(:b17,1),NVL(:b18,2),NVL(:b19,5),NVL(:b20,15)  ) AND (DOC_TYPE != 0  OR NOT EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM INSTALLMENT  WHERE C_CODE = B.AC_CODE_DTL  AND DOC_DATE < :b21  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  ) AND (:b22 IS NULL  OR (:b23 = 0  AND NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b22,NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b25,NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'')) ) OR (:b23 = 1  AND NVL(B.REP_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b22,NVL(B.REP_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b25,NVL(B.REP_CODE,''0'')) )) AND NVL(A.R_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b29,NVL(A.R_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b30,NVL(A.R_CODE,0))  AND NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b31,NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b32,NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0''))  AND NVL(B.BRN_NO,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b33,NVL(B.BRN_NO,0)) AND NVL(:b34,NVL(B.BRN_NO,0))  AND ((:b35 = 1 ) OR (((:b36 = 1 ) AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM PRIV_ACC  WHERE U_ID = :b35  AND A_CODE = A.C_A_CODE  AND A_CY = B.A_CY  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) OR ((:b36 = 2 ) AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_PRIV_CUSTOMER  WHERE U_ID = :b35  AND C_CODE = A.C_CODE  AND A_CY = B.A_CY  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) )))ORDER BY B.C_CODE,B.DOC_DATE,B.DOC_SER"INSERT INTO IAS_DR_DET_TMP ( C_CODE,A_CY,DOC_NO,DOC_TYPE,DOC_JV_TYPE,DOC_SER,I_NO,DOC_DATE,I_AMT,I_AMT_LOC,BILL_RATE,PAID_AMT,PAID_AMT_LOC,PAID_DATE,PAID,BILL_DATE,TRMNL_NAME,BRN_NO,BRN_YEAR,CMP_NO,BRN_USR,CC_CODE,PJ_NO,ACTV_NO )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,:b6,:b7,:b8,:b9,:b10,NVL(:b11,1), NULL , NULL , NULL ,0,:b12,:b13,:b14,:b15,:b16,:b17,:b18,:b19,:b20  )"SELECT DOC_SER,DOC_NO,I_NO,DOC_DATE,I_AMT_LOC,PAID_AMT_LOC,PAID_DATE,PAID,C_CODE   FROM IAS_DR_DET_TMP  WHERE NVL(PAID,0) = 0  AND C_CODE = :b1 ORDER BY C_CODE,DOC_DATE,DOC_SER"UPDATE IAS_DR_DET_TMP SET PAID_AMT_LOC=I_AMT_LOC,PAID_AMT=ROUND((I_AMT_LOC / :b1 ),:b2),PAID=1,PAID_DATE=:b3,PAID_DOC_TYPE=:b4,PAID_DOC_NO=:b5,PAID_DOC_SER=:b6 WHERE DOC_SER = :b7  AND C_CODE = :b8  AND I_NO = :b9"UPDATE IAS_DR_DET_TMP SET PAID_AMT_LOC=I_AMT_LOC,PAID_AMT=ROUND((I_AMT_LOC / :b1 ),:b2),PAID=1,PAID_DATE=:b3,PAID_DOC_TYPE=:b4,PAID_DOC_NO=:b5,PAID_DOC_SER=:b6 WHERE DOC_SER = :b7  AND C_CODE = :b8  AND I_NO = :b9"UPDATE IAS_DR_DET_TMP SET PAID_AMT_LOC=:b1,PAID_AMT=ROUND((:b1 / :b3 ),:b4),PAID_DATE=:b5,PAID_DOC_TYPE=:b6,PAID_DOC_NO=:b7,PAID_DOC_SER=:b8 WHERE DOC_SER = :b9  AND C_CODE = :b10  AND I_NO = :b11"

 From IAS
             Select 
 From 
.Ias_Post_Dtl Where Doc_Type<>0 And Doc_Date>=Ias_Gen_Pkg.Get_Frst_Day
SELECT COLUMN_NAME   FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS  WHERE TABLE_NAME = ''IAS_POST_DTL''  AND COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ( ''DOC_NO_REF'',''DOC_JV_TYPE_REF'',''DOC_TYPE_REF'',''DOC_SER_REF''  )ORDER BY COLUMN_NAME"
Select 
 From IAS
             Select 
 From 
.INSTALLMENT Where Doc_Type<>0 And Doc_Date>=Ias_Gen_Pkg.Get_Frst_Day
SELECT COLUMN_NAME   FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS  WHERE TABLE_NAME = ''INSTALLMENT'' ORDER BY COLUMN_NAME"

 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

SELECT B.C_CODE,B.A_CY,B.BILL_NO,B.DOC_DATE,B.DOC_TYPE,B.BILL_DOC_TYPE,B.BILL_SER,B.I_NO,DECODE(NVL(:b1,1),1,I_DATE,NVL(DOC_DATE,I_DATE)) I_DATE,B.I_AMT,(NVL(B.I_AMT,0) * NVL(B.AC_RATE,1) ) I_AMT_LOC,B.AC_RATE,B.BRN_NO,B.BRN_YEAR,B.CMP_NO,B.BRN_USR,B.CC_CODE,B.PJ_NO,B.ACTV_NO   FROM CUSTOMER A,INSTALLMENT B  WHERE A.C_CODE = B.C_CODE  AND B.C_CODE BETWEEN NVL(:b2,B.C_CODE) AND NVL(:b3,B.C_CODE)  AND NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b4,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b5,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0))  AND NVL(A.C_CLASS,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b6,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0)) AND NVL(:b7,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0))  AND NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b8,NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0)) AND NVL(:b9,NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0))  AND NVL(A.COL_NO,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b10,NVL(A.COL_NO,0)) AND NVL(:b11,NVL(A.COL_NO,0))  AND B.A_CY = DECODE(NVL(:b12,0),1,B.A_CY,:b13)  AND B.I_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(:b14,''DD/MM/YYYY'') AND TO_CHAR(:b15,''DD/MM/YYYY'')  AND B.DOC_TYPE IN ( NVL(:b16,0),NVL(:b17,9),NVL(:b18,1),NVL(:b19,3),NVL(:b20,4),NVL(:b21,2),NVL(:b22,25)  ) AND B.DR_NO IS NULL  AND (:b23 IS NULL  OR (:b24 = 0  AND NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b23,NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b26,NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'')) ) OR (:b24 = 1  AND (B.DOC_TYPE = 0  OR B.C_CODE IN (SELECT C_CODE   FROM IAS_POST_DTL  WHERE NVL(REP_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b23,NVL(REP_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b26,NVL(REP_CODE,''0'')) )))) AND NVL(A.R_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b30,NVL(A.R_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b31,NVL(A.R_CODE,0))  AND NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b32,NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b33,NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0''))  AND NVL(B.BRN_NO,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b34,NVL(B.BRN_NO,0)) AND NVL(:b35,NVL(B.BRN_NO,0))  AND ((:b36 = 1 ) OR (((:b37 = 1 ) AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM PRIV_ACC  WHERE U_ID = :b36  AND A_CODE = A.C_A_CODE  AND A_CY = B.A_CY  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) OR ((:b37 = 2 ) AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_PRIV_CUSTOMER  WHERE U_ID = :b36  AND C_CODE = A.C_CODE  AND A_CY = B.A_CY  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) )))ORDER BY A.C_CODE,DECODE(NVL(:b1,1),1,I_DATE,NVL(DOC_DATE,I_DATE)),DOC_TYPE,BILL_NO"SELECT B.C_CODE,B.DOC_DATE,B.DOC_SER,B.DOC_TYPE,B.DOC_NO,B.A_CY,DECODE(B.A_CY,:b1,B.CR_AMT,B.CR_AMT_F) CR_AMT,DECODE(NVL(B.CR_AMT_F,0),0,1,(NVL(B.CR_AMT,0) / NVL(B.CR_AMT_F,0) )) AC_RATE   FROM CUSTOMER A,IAS_POST_DTL B  WHERE A.C_CODE = B.AC_CODE_DTL  AND A.C_A_CODE = B.A_CODE  AND B.AC_DTL_TYP = 3  AND B.AC_CODE_DTL IS NOT NULL   AND NVL(CR_AMT,0) > 0  AND B.AC_CODE_DTL BETWEEN NVL(:b2,B.C_CODE) AND NVL(:b3,B.C_CODE)  AND NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b4,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b5,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0))  AND NVL(A.C_CLASS,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b6,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0)) AND NVL(:b7,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0))  AND NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b8,NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0)) AND NVL(:b9,NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0))  AND NVL(A.COL_NO,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b10,NVL(A.COL_NO,0)) AND NVL(:b11,NVL(A.COL_NO,0))  AND B.A_CY = DECODE(NVL(:b12,0),1,B.A_CY,:b13)  AND B.DOC_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(:b14,''DD/MM/YYYY'') AND TO_CHAR(:b15,''DD/MM/YYYY'')  AND B.DOC_TYPE IN ( NVL(:b16,0),NVL(:b17,8),NVL(:b18,1),NVL(:b19,2),NVL(:b20,5),NVL(:b21,15)  ) AND (DOC_TYPE != 0  OR NOT EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM INSTALLMENT  WHERE C_CODE = B.AC_CODE_DTL  AND DOC_DATE < :b22  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  ) AND (:b23 IS NULL  OR (:b24 = 0  AND NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b23,NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b26,NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'')) ) OR (:b24 = 1  AND NVL(B.REP_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b23,NVL(B.REP_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b26,NVL(B.REP_CODE,''0'')) )) AND NVL(A.R_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b30,NVL(A.R_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b31,NVL(A.R_CODE,0))  AND NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b32,NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b33,NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0''))  AND NVL(B.BRN_NO,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b34,NVL(B.BRN_NO,0)) AND NVL(:b35,NVL(B.BRN_NO,0))  AND ((:b36 = 1 ) OR (((:b37 = 1 ) AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM PRIV_ACC  WHERE U_ID = :b36  AND A_CODE = A.C_A_CODE  AND A_CY = B.A_CY  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) OR ((:b37 = 2 ) AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_PRIV_CUSTOMER  WHERE U_ID = :b36  AND C_CODE = A.C_CODE  AND A_CY = B.A_CY  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) )))ORDER BY B.C_CODE,B.DOC_DATE,B.DOC_SER"INSERT INTO IAS_DR_DET_TMP ( C_CODE,A_CY,DOC_NO,DOC_TYPE,DOC_JV_TYPE,DOC_SER,I_NO,DOC_DATE,I_AMT,I_AMT_LOC,BILL_RATE,PAID_AMT,PAID_AMT_LOC,PAID_DATE,PAID,BILL_DATE,TRMNL_NAME,BRN_NO,BRN_YEAR,CMP_NO,BRN_USR,CC_CODE,PJ_NO,ACTV_NO )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,:b6,:b7,:b8,:b9,:b10,NVL(:b11,1), NULL , NULL , NULL ,0,:b12,:b13,:b14,:b15,:b16,:b17,:b18,:b19,:b20  )"SELECT DOC_SER,DOC_NO,I_NO,DOC_DATE,I_AMT,I_AMT_LOC,PAID_AMT,PAID_AMT_LOC,PAID_DATE,PAID,C_CODE   FROM IAS_DR_DET_TMP  WHERE NVL(PAID,0) = 0  AND C_CODE = :b1 ORDER BY C_CODE,DOC_DATE,DOC_SER"UPDATE IAS_DR_DET_TMP SET 
PAID_AMT_LOC=ROUND((I_AMT * :b1 ),:b2),PAID_AMT=I_AMT,PAID=1,PAID_DATE=:b3,PAID_DOC_TYPE=:b4,PAID_DOC_NO=:b5,PAID_DOC_SER=:b6 WHERE DOC_SER = :b7  AND C_CODE = :b8  AND I_NO = :b9"INSERT INTO IAS_DR_DET_PAID_TMP ( I_NO,I_DOC_SER,I_DOC_NO,I_DOC_DATE,DOC_TYPE,DOC_NO,DOC_SER,A_CY,AMT,DOC_DATE )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,:b6,:b7,:b8,DECODE(:b9,:b10,ROUND((:b11 * :b12 ),:b13),ROUND((:b11 / :b12 ),:b13)),:b17  )"UPDATE IAS_DR_DET_TMP SET PAID_AMT_LOC=ROUND((I_AMT * :b1 ),:b2),PAID_AMT=I_AMT,PAID=1,PAID_DATE=:b3,PAID_DOC_TYPE=:b4,PAID_DOC_NO=:b5,PAID_DOC_SER=:b6 WHERE DOC_SER = :b7  AND C_CODE = :b8  AND I_NO = :b9"INSERT INTO IAS_DR_DET_PAID_TMP ( I_NO,I_DOC_SER,I_DOC_NO,I_DOC_DATE,DOC_TYPE,DOC_NO,DOC_SER,A_CY,AMT,DOC_DATE )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,:b6,:b7,:b8,DECODE(:b9,:b10,:b11,ROUND((:b11 * :b13 ),:b14)),:b15  )"UPDATE IAS_DR_DET_TMP SET PAID_AMT_LOC=ROUND((:b1 * :b2 ),:b3),PAID_AMT=:b1,PAID_DATE=:b5,BILL_RATE=:b2,PAID_DOC_TYPE=:b7,PAID_DOC_NO=:b8,PAID_DOC_SER=:b9 WHERE DOC_SER = :b10  AND C_CODE = :b11  AND I_NO = :b12"INSERT INTO IAS_DR_DET_PAID_TMP ( I_NO,I_DOC_SER,I_DOC_NO,I_DOC_DATE,DOC_TYPE,DOC_NO,DOC_SER,A_CY,AMT,DOC_DATE )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,:b5,:b6,:b7,:b8,DECODE(:b9,:b10,:b11,ROUND((:b11 * :b13 ),:b14)),:b15  )"
From Cust
From rep_code
Delete From Ias_Dr_Det_Tmp
SELECT B.C_CODE,B.A_CY,B.BILL_NO,B.DOC_DATE,B.DOC_TYPE,B.BILL_DOC_TYPE,B.BILL_SER,B.I_NO,DECODE(NVL(:b1,1),1,I_DATE,NVL(DOC_DATE,I_DATE)) I_DATE,B.I_AMT,(NVL(B.I_AMT,0) * NVL(B.AC_RATE,1) ) I_AMT_LOC,B.AC_RATE,B.BRN_NO,B.BRN_YEAR,B.CMP_NO,B.BRN_USR,B.CC_CODE,B.PJ_NO,B.ACTV_NO   FROM CUSTOMER A,IAS_V_INSTLMNT_YR B  WHERE A.C_CODE = B.C_CODE  AND B.C_CODE BETWEEN NVL(:b2,B.C_CODE) AND NVL(:b3,B.C_CODE)  AND NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b4,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b5,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0))  AND NVL(A.C_CLASS,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b6,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0)) AND NVL(:b7,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0))  AND NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b8,NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0)) AND NVL(:b9,NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0))  AND NVL(A.COL_NO,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b10,NVL(A.COL_NO,0)) AND NVL(:b11,NVL(A.COL_NO,0))  AND B.A_CY = DECODE(NVL(:b12,0),1,B.A_CY,:b13)  AND B.I_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(:b14,''DD/MM/YYYY'') AND TO_CHAR(:b15,''DD/MM/YYYY'')  AND B.DOC_TYPE IN ( NVL(:b16,0),NVL(:b17,9),NVL(:b18,1),NVL(:b19,3),NVL(:b20,4),NVL(:b21,2),NVL(:b22,25)  ) AND B.DR_NO IS NULL  AND ((:b23 = 0  AND NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b24,NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b25,NVL(A.REP_CODE,''0'')) ) OR (:b23 = 1  AND (B.DOC_TYPE = 0  OR B.C_CODE IN (SELECT C_CODE   FROM IAS_POST_DTL  WHERE NVL(REP_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b24,NVL(REP_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b25,NVL(REP_CODE,''0'')) )))) AND NVL(A.R_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b29,NVL(A.R_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b30,NVL(A.R_CODE,0))  AND NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b31,NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b32,NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0''))  AND NVL(B.BRN_NO,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b33,NVL(B.BRN_NO,0)) AND NVL(:b34,NVL(B.BRN_NO,0))  AND ((:b35 = 1 ) OR (((:b36 = 1 ) AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM PRIV_ACC  WHERE U_ID = :b35  AND A_CODE = A.C_A_CODE  AND A_CY = B.A_CY  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) OR ((:b36 = 2 ) AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_PRIV_CUSTOMER  WHERE U_ID = :b35  AND C_CODE = A.C_CODE  AND A_CY = B.A_CY  AND NVL(ADD_FLAG,0) = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) )))ORDER BY A.C_CODE,DECODE(NVL(:b1,1),1,I_DATE,NVL(DOC_DATE,I_DATE)),DOC_TYPE,BILL_NO"SELECT B.C_CODE,B.DOC_DATE,B.DOC_SER,B.DOC_TYPE,B.DOC_NO,B.A_CY,B.CR_AMT CR_AMT,DECODE(NVL(B.CR_AMT_F,0),0,1,(NVL(B.CR_AMT,0) / NVL(B.CR_AMT_F,0) )) AC_RATE   FROM CUSTOMER A,IAS_V_POST_DTL_YR B  WHERE A.C_CODE = B.C_CODE  AND B.C_CODE IS NOT NULL   AND NVL(CR_AMT,0) > 0  AND B.C_CODE BETWEEN NVL(:b1,B.C_CODE) AND NVL(:b2,B.C_CODE)  AND NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b3,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b4,NVL(A.C_GROUP_CODE,0))  AND NVL(A.C_CLASS,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b5,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0)) AND NVL(:b6,NVL(A.C_CLASS,0))  AND NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b7,NVL(A.C_DEGREE,0)) AND NVL(:b24,NVL(B.REP_CODE,''0'')) )) AND NVL(A.R_CODE,0) BETWEEN NVL(:b28,NVL(A.R_CODE,0)) AND NVL(:b29,NVL(A.R_CODE,0))  AND NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b30,NVL(A.CC_CODE,''0'')) AND Select M.I_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_Dflt,1,Nvl(M.I_Name,M.I_E_Name),Nvl(M.I_E_Name,M.I_Name)) I_Name,
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M,Ias_Itm_Dtl D 
   Where M.I_Code=D.I_Code
     And  Exists (Select 1 From Privilege_Gc
                 Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
 Order By Decode(
SELECT SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0))   FROM (SELECT SUM((NVL(I_QTY,0) + NVL(FREE_QTY,0) ) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) ) I_QTY   FROM IAS_BILL_MST M,IAS_BILL_DTL D  WHERE M.BILL_SER = D.BILL_SER  AND D.I_CODE = :b1  AND D.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0''))  AND NVL(M.CONN_SI_WITH_OUTGONG,0) = 0  UNION ALL SELECT SUM((NVL(I_QTY,0) + NVL(FREE_QTY,0) ) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) ) * -1  I_QTY   FROM DETAIL_OUT_BILLS  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(BATCH_NO,''0''))  UNION ALL SELECT SUM((NVL(D.I_QTY,0) + NVL(D.FREE_QTY,0) ) * NVL(D.P_SIZE,1) ) * -1  I_QTY   FROM IAS_RT_BILL_MST M,IAS_RT_BILL_DTL D  WHERE M.RT_BILL_SER = D.RT_BILL_SER  AND M.P_YEAR = 3  AND D.I_CODE = :b1  AND D.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0'')) )"SELECT SUM(((NVL(I_QTY,0) - NVL(RET_QTY,0) ) + (NVL(FREE_QTY,0) - NVL(RET_FREE_QTY,0) ) ) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) )   FROM IAS_RT_BILL_MST,IAS_RT_BILL_DTL  WHERE IAS_RT_BILL_MST.RT_BILL_SER = IAS_RT_BILL_DTL.RT_BILL_SER  AND IAS_RT_BILL_MST.P_YEAR != 3  AND I_CODE = :b1  AND IAS_RT_BILL_DTL.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(BATCH_NO,''0''))  AND ((NVL(I_QTY,0) > NVL(RET_QTY,0) ) OR (NVL(FREE_QTY,0) > NVL(RET_FREE_QTY,0) ))"

SELECT LAST_INCOMING_PRICE(:b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,1) / NVL(:b3,1)    FROM IAS_ITM_WCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b6  AND W_CODE = :b4"
SELECT LAST_INCOMING_PRICE(:b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,1) / NVL(:b3,1)    FROM IAS_ITM_WCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b6  AND W_CODE = :b4"
SELECT LAST_INCOMING_PRICE(:b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,1) / NVL(:b3,1)    FROM IAS_ITM_WCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b6  AND W_CODE = :b4"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,NVL(I_NAME,I_E_NAME),NVL(I_E_NAME,I_NAME)),I_DESC,NVL(IAS_ITM_MST.INACTIVE,0),NVL(IAS_ITM_DTL.NO_SALE,0),NVL(USE_QTY_FRACTION,0),NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0),NVL(USE_ATTCH,0),NVL(USE_EXP_DATE,0),NVL(USE_BATCH_NO,0),LENGTH_ITM,WIDTH_ITM,HEIGHT_ITM,NVL(USE_WEIGHT,0),NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0),NVL(USE_ATTCH,0)   FROM IAS_ITM_MST,IAS_ITM_DTL  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = IAS_ITM_DTL.I_CODE  AND IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = :b2  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_WCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT NVL(SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ),0) / NVL(:b1,1)    FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE I_CODE = :b2  AND WHG_CODE = IAS_WCODE_PKG.GET_WHG_CODE(:b3)"DELETE FROM IAS_ITM_WCODE WHERE ( I_CODE,W_CODE  ) IN (SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE   FROM IAS_ITM_WCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND W_CODE = :b2  MINUS SELECT I_CODE,W_CODE   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND W_CODE = :b2 )"SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_WCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND W_CODE = :b2  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT NVL(I_CWTAVG,0)   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE I_CODE = :b1"UPDATE IAS_ITM_WCODE SET PRIMARY_COST=NVL(:b1,0),I_CWTAVG=NVL(:b1,0) WHERE I_CODE = :b3  AND W_CODE = :b4"SELECT LAST_INCOMING_PRICE(:b1,:b2,:b3,:b4,1) / NVL(:b3,1)    FROM IAS_ITM_WCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b6  AND W_CODE = :b4"SELECT IAS_DOC_SEQ.NEXTVAL   FROM DUAL"
SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_WCODE  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND W_CODE = :b2  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT DECODE(SIGN(:b1),1,15,-1,16)   FROM DUAL"SELECT 1   FROM GR_NOTE  WHERE G_SER = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT NVL(STK_COST,0)   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE DOC_TYPE = 16  AND DOC_SER = :b1  AND I_CODE = :b2  AND W_CODE = :b3  AND DOC_SEQUENCE = :b4  AND ROWNUM <= 1"UPDATE STK_ADJUSTMENT_DET SET WTAVG=(SELECT NVL(STK_COST,0)   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE DOC_TYPE = 16  AND DOC_SER = :b1  AND I_CODE = :b2  AND W_CODE = :b3  AND DOC_SEQUENCE = :b4  AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) WHERE DOC_SER = :b1  AND I_CODE = :b2  AND W_CODE = :b3  AND DOC_SEQUENCE = :b4"SELECT W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ) IQTY,SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ) PQTY   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND DOC_SER != :b2  GROUP BY W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO  HAVING SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ) > 0"SELECT 1   FROM GR_NOTE  WHERE G_SER = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ) IQTY,SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ) PQTY   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND W_CODE = :b2  AND DOC_SER != :b3  GROUP BY W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO  HAVING SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ) > 0"SELECT 1   FROM GR_NOTE  WHERE G_SER = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ) IQTY,SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ) PQTY   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND WHG_CODE = IAS_WCODE_PKG.GET_WHG_CODE(:b2)  AND DOC_SER != :b3  GROUP BY W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO  HAVING SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ) > 0"SELECT 1   FROM GR_NOTE  WHERE G_SER = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT INV_DATE)   FROM MASTER_INV  WHERE INV_SER BETWEEN :b1 AND :b2"
Drop Table Ias_pos_minus_qty_Tmp
Delete From Ias_pos_minus_qty_Tmp
SELECT I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,SUM(NVL(I_LENGTH,0)) I_LENGTH,SUM(NVL(I_WIDTH,0)) I_WIDTH,SUM(NVL(I_HEIGHT,0)) I_HEIGHT,SUM(NVL(I_NUMBER,0)) I_NUMBER,NVL(SUM(AVL_QTY),0) AVL_QTY,NVL(SUM(P_QTY),0) QTY,NVL(SUM(P_QTY) - GET_ICODE_AVLQTY(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,1,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,DETAIL_INV.EXPIRE_DATE,DETAIL_INV.BATCH_NO, NULL ) ,0) P_QTY   FROM DETAIL_INV  WHERE DETAIL_INV.INV_SER BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b3)  AND DETAIL_INV.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b5, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b5) AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b7)  AND DETAIL_INV.I_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b9, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b9) AND DECODE(:b11, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b11)  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = DETAIL_INV.I_CODE  AND IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b13, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b13) AND DECODE(:b15, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b15)  AND NVL(SERVICE_ITM,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM MASTER_INV  WHERE DETAIL_INV.INV_SER = M
ASTER_INV.INV_SER  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_TYPE = MASTER_INV.INV_TYPE  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_NO = MASTER_INV.INV_NO  AND MASTER_INV.INV_SER BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_SER,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_SER,:b3)  AND NVL(ANNUAL,0) = 1  AND NVL(PROCESSED,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM = 1 )  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO  HAVING NVL(SUM(P_QTY) - GET_ICODE_AVLQTY(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,1,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,DETAIL_INV.EXPIRE_DATE,DETAIL_INV.BATCH_NO, NULL ) ,0) != 0"SELECT 1   FROM MASTER_INV,DETAIL_INV  WHERE MASTER_INV.INV_NO = DETAIL_INV.INV_NO  AND MASTER_INV.INV_TYPE = DETAIL_INV.INV_TYPE  AND MASTER_INV.INV_SER = DETAIL_INV.INV_SER  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_SER NOT  BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b3)  AND MASTER_INV.INV_DATE BETWEEN DECODE(:b5, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE,TO_CHAR(:b5,''DD/MM/YYYY'')) AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE,TO_CHAR(:b7,''DD/MM/YYYY''))  AND DETAIL_INV.I_CODE = :b9  AND DETAIL_INV.W_CODE = :b10  AND DETAIL_INV.EXPIRE_DATE = :b11  AND DETAIL_INV.BATCH_NO = :b12  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE ITEM_MOVEMENT.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.W_CODE,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.W_CODE,:b3)  AND ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b5, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE,:b5) AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE,:b7)  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM DETAIL_INV  WHERE INV_SER IN (SELECT INV_SER   FROM MASTER_INV  WHERE NVL(ANNUAL,0) = 1 ))  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE  AND IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b9, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b9) AND DECODE(:b11, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b11)  AND NVL(SERVICE_ITM,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO  HAVING NVL(SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ),0) > 0  MINUS SELECT I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO   FROM DETAIL_INV  WHERE DETAIL_INV.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b3)  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_SER BETWEEN DECODE(:b17, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b17) AND DECODE(:b19, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b19)  AND DETAIL_INV.I_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b5, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b5) AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b7)  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = DETAIL_INV.I_CODE  AND IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b9, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b9) AND DECODE(:b11, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b11)  AND NVL(SERVICE_ITM,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM MASTER_INV  WHERE DETAIL_INV.INV_SER = MASTER_INV.INV_SER  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_TYPE = MASTER_INV.INV_TYPE  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_NO = MASTER_INV.INV_NO  AND MASTER_INV.INV_SER BETWEEN DECODE(:b17, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_SER,:b17) AND DECODE(:b19, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_SER,:b19)  AND NVL(ANNUAL,0) = 1  AND NVL(PROCESSED,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM = 1 )  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO"SELECT NVL(USE_WEIGHT,0)   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE I_CODE = :b1"SELECT I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,SUM(NVL(I_LENGTH,0)) I_LENGTH,SUM(NVL(I_WIDTH,0)) I_WIDTH,SUM(NVL(I_HEIGHT,0)) I_HEIGHT,SUM(NVL(I_NUMBER,0)) I_NUMBER,NVL(SUM(AVL_QTY),0) AVL_QTY,NVL(SUM(P_QTY),0) QTY,NVL(SUM(P_QTY) - GET_ICODE_AVLQTY(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,1,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,DETAIL_INV.EXPIRE_DATE,DETAIL_INV.BATCH_NO,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE) ,0) P_QTY   FROM DETAIL_INV,MASTER_INV  WHERE DETAIL_INV.INV_SER = MASTER_INV.INV_SER  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_TYPE = MASTER_INV.INV_TYPE  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_NO = MASTER_INV.INV_NO  AND NVL(MASTER_INV.ANNUAL,0) = 0  AND NVL(PROCESSED,0) = 0  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_SER BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b3)  AND MASTER_INV.INV_DATE BETWEEN DECODE(:b5, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE,TO_CHAR(:b5,''DD/MM/YYYY'')) AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE,TO_CHAR(:b7,''DD/MM/YYYY''))  AND DETAIL_INV.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b9, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b9) AND DECODE(:b11, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b11)  AND DETAIL_INV.I_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b13, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b13) AND DECODE(:b15, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b15)  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = DETAIL_INV.I_CODE  AND IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b17, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b17) AND DECODE(:b19, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b19)  AND NVL(SERVICE_ITM,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE  HAVING NVL(SUM(P_QTY) - GET_ICODE_AVLQTY(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,1,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,DETAIL_INV.EXPIRE_DATE,DETAIL_INV.BATCH_NO,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE) ,0) != 0"SELECT 1   FROM MASTER_INV,DETAIL_INV  WHERE MASTER_INV.INV_NO = DETAIL_INV.INV_NO  AND MASTER_INV.INV_TYPE = DETAIL_INV.INV_TYPE  AND MASTER_INV.INV_SER = DETAIL_INV.INV_SER  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_SER NOT  BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b3)  AND MASTER_INV.INV_DATE BETWEEN DECODE(:b5, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE,TO_CHAR(:b5,''DD/MM/YYYY'')) AND DECODE(:b7, NULL I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,SUM(NVL(I_LENGTH,0)) I_LENGTH,SUM(NVL(I_WIDTH,0)) I_WIDTH,SUM(NVL(I_HEIGHT,0)) I_HEIGHT,SUM(NVL(I_NUMBER,0)) I_NUMBER,NVL(SUM(AVL_QTY),0) AVL_QTY,NVL(SUM(P_QTY),0) P_QTY   FROM DETAIL_INV  WHERE DETAIL_INV.INV_SER BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b3)  AND DETAIL_INV.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b5, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b5) AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b7)  AND DETAIL_INV.I_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b9, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b9) AND DECODE(:b11, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b11)  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = DETAIL_INV.I_CODE  AND IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b13, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b13) AND DECODE(:b15, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b15)  AND NVL(SERVICE_ITM,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO  HAVING NVL(SUM(P_QTY),0) != 0"SELECT I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,SUM(NVL(I_LENGTH,0)) I_LENGTH,SUM(NVL(I_WIDTH,0)) I_WIDTH,SUM(NVL(I_HEIGHT,0)) I_HEIGHT,SUM(NVL(I_NUMBER,0)) I_NUMBER,NVL(SUM(AVL_QTY),0) AVL_QTY,NVL(SUM(P_QTY),0) QTY,NVL(SUM(P_QTY) - GET_ICODE_AVLQTY(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,1,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,DETAIL_INV.EXPIRE_DATE,DETAIL_INV.BATCH_NO,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE) ,0) P_QTY   FROM DETAIL_INV,MASTER_INV  WHERE DETAIL_INV.INV_SER = MASTER_INV.INV_SER  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_TYPE = MASTER_INV.INV_TYPE  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_NO = MASTER_INV.INV_NO  AND NVL(MASTER_INV.ANNUAL,0) = 0  AND NVL(PROCESSED,0) = 0  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_SER BETWEEN DECODE(:b7, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE,TO_CHAR(:b7,''DD/MM/YYYY''))  AND DETAIL_INV.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b9, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b9) AND DECODE(:b11, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b11)  AND DETAIL_INV.I_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b13, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b13) AND DECODE(:b15, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b15)  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = DETAIL_INV.I_CODE  AND IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b17, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b17) AND DECODE(:b19, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b19)  AND NVL(SERVICE_ITM,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE  HAVING NVL(SUM(P_QTY) - DETAIL_INV.INV_NO  AND MASTER_INV.INV_TYPE = DETAIL_INV.INV_TYPE  AND MASTER_INV.INV_SER = DETAIL_INV.INV_SER  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_SER NOT  BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b3)  AND MASTER_INV.INV_DATE BETWEEN DECODE(:b5, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE,TO_CHAR(:b5,''DD/MM/YYYY'')) AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,MASTER_INV.INV_DATE,TO_CHAR(:b7,''DD/MM/YYYY''))  AND DETAIL_INV.I_CODE = :b9  AND DETAIL_INV.W_CODE = :b10  AND DETAIL_INV.EXPIRE_DATE = :b11  AND DETAIL_INV.BATCH_NO = :b12  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE ITEM_MOVEMENT.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.W_CODE,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.W_CODE,:b3)  AND ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b5, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE,:b5) AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE,:b7)  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM DETAIL_INV  WHERE INV_SER BETWEEN :b9 AND :b10 )  AND I_DATE <=  (SELECT MAX(INV_DATE)   FROM MASTER_INV  WHERE INV_SER BETWEEN :b9 AND :b10 )  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE  AND IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b13, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b13) AND DECODE(:b15, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b15)  AND NVL(SERVICE_ITM,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO  HAVING NVL(SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ),0) > 0  MINUS SELECT I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO   FROM DETAIL_INV  WHERE DETAIL_INV.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b3)  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_SER BETWEEN DECODE(:b9, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b9) AND DECODE(:b10, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b10)  AND DECODE(:b3,1,NVL(W_CODE,0),:b5)"SELECT NVL(SUM(I_QTY),0)   FROM IAS_PR_BILL_DTL  WHERE BILL_SER = :b1  AND I_CODE = :b2  AND DECODE(:b3,1,NVL(W_CODE,0),W_CODE) = DECODE(:b3,1,NVL(W_CODE,0),:b5)"SELECT AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  GROUP BY IAS_ITM_WCODE.I_CODE,DECODE(:b1,1,IAS_ITM_WCODE.W_CODE, NULL ) ORDER BY IAS_ITM_WCODE.I_CODE,DECODE(:b1,1,IAS_ITM_WCODE.W_CODE, NULL )"SELECT GR_DETAIL.I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(GR_DETAIL.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,GR_DETAIL.W_CODE,GR_DETAIL.EXPIRE_DATE,GR_DETAIL.BATCH_NO,GR_DETAIL.DOC_SEQUENCE,ROUND(GR_DETAIL.STK_COST,2) STK_COST,(NVL(SUM(GR_DETAIL.P_QTY),0) + NVL(SUM(GR_DETAIL.FREE_QTY * GR_DETAIL.P_SIZE ),0) ) INC_QTY,NVL(IN_QUERY.OUT_QTY,0) OUT_QTY,((NVL(SUM(GR_DETAIL.P_QTY),0) + NVL(SUM(GR_DETAIL.FREE_QTY * GR_DETAIL.P_SIZE ),0) ) - (NVL(IN_QUERY.OUT_QTY,0)) ) BAL_QTY   FROM GR_DETAIL,(SELECT (NVL(SUM(SALE_COST.P_QTY),0)) OUT_QTY,DOC_SEQUENCE_GR   FROM SALE_COST  GROUP BY DOC_SEQUENCE_GR ) IN_QUERY  WHERE IN_QUERY.DOC_SEQUENCE_GR (+)   = GR_DETAIL.DOC_SEQUENCE  AND GR_DETAIL.G_SER = :b1  AND GR_DETAIL.PI_TYPE = DECODE(:b2,11,5,12,2)  AND GR_DETAIL.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b3, NULL ,GR_DETAIL.W_CODE,:b3) AND DECODE(:b5, NULL ,GR_DETAIL.W_CODE,:b5)  AND EXISTS NVL(SERVICE_ITM,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  GROUP BY GR_DETAIL.I_CODE,GR_DETAIL.W_CODE,GR_DETAIL.EXPIRE_DATE,GR_DETAIL.BATCH_NO,GR_DETAIL.DOC_SEQUENCE,IN_QUERY.OUT_QTY,ROUND(GR_DETAIL.STK_COST,2)  HAVING (NVL(SUM(GR_DETAIL.P_QTY),0) + NVL(SUM(FREE_QTY * GR_DETAIL.P_SIZE ),0) ) - (NVL(IN_QUERY.OUT_QTY,0))  > 0"SELECT BILL_SER   FROM IAS_PI_BILL_MST  WHERE BILL_NO = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.W_CODE,IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.EXPIRE_DATE,IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.BATCH_NO,IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.DOC_SEQUENCE,ROUND((NVL(IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.STK_COST,0) / IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.P_SIZE ),2) STK_COST,NVL(IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.P_QTY,0) + (NVL(IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.FREE_QTY,0) * IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.P_SIZE )  INC_QTY   FROM IAS_PI_BILL_DTL  WHERE IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.BILL_SER = :b1  AND IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b2, NULL ,IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.W_CODE,:b2) AND DECODE(:b4, NULL ,IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.W_CODE,:b4)  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = IAS_PI_BILL_DTL.I_CODE  AND IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b6, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b6) AND DECODE(:b8, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b8)  AND NVL(SERVICE_ITM,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )"SELECT I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO   FROM ITEM_MOVEMENT  WHERE ITEM_MOVEMENT.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.W_CODE,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.W_CODE,:b3)  AND ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b5, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE,:b5) AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE,:b7)  AND I_DATE <=  (SELECT MAX(INV_DATE)   FROM MASTER_INV  WHERE INV_SER BETWEEN :b9 AND :b10 )  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = ITEM_MOVEMENT.I_CODE  AND IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b11, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b11) AND DECODE(:b13, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b13)  AND NVL(SERVICE_ITM,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0
  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )  GROUP BY I_CODE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO  HAVING NVL(SUM(IN_OUT * (NVL(P_QTY,0) + NVL(PF_QTY,0) ) ),0) > 0  MINUS SELECT I_CODE,IAS_ITM_PKG.GET_ICODE_MIN_UNIT(DETAIL_INV.I_CODE) ITM_UNT,1 P_SIZE,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO   FROM DETAIL_INV  WHERE DETAIL_INV.W_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b1, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b1) AND DECODE(:b3, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.W_CODE,:b3)  AND DETAIL_INV.INV_SER BETWEEN DECODE(:b9, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b9) AND DECODE(:b10, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.INV_SER,:b10)  AND DETAIL_INV.I_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b5, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b5) AND DECODE(:b7, NULL ,DETAIL_INV.I_CODE,:b7)  AND EXISTS  (SELECT 1   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE IAS_ITM_MST.I_CODE = DETAIL_INV.I_CODE  AND IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE BETWEEN DECODE(:b11, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b11) AND DECODE(:b13, NULL ,IAS_ITM_MST.G_CODE,:b13)  AND NVL(SERVICE_ITM,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_ATTCH,0) = 0  AND NVL(USE_SERIALNO,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1 )"SELECT MAX(INV_DATE)   FROM MASTER_INV  WHERE INV_SER BETWEEN :b1 AND :b2"
Select Excel.exe File

Order By

SELECT SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0))   FROM (SELECT SUM((NVL(I_QTY,0) + NVL(FREE_QTY,0) ) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) ) I_QTY   FROM IAS_BILL_MST M,IAS_BILL_DTL D  WHERE M.BILL_SER = D.BILL_SER  AND D.I_CODE = :b1  AND D.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0''))  AND NVL(M.CONN_SI_WITH_OUTGONG,0) = 0  UNION ALL SELECT SUM((NVL(I_QTY,0) + NVL(FREE_QTY,0) ) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) ) * -1  I_QTY   FROM DETAIL_OUT_BILLS  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(BATCH_NO,''0''))  UNION ALL SELECT SUM((NVL(D.I_QTY,0) + NVL(D.FREE_QTY,0) ) * NVL(D.P_SIZE,1) ) * -1  I_QTY   FROM IAS_RT_BILL_MST M,IAS_RT_BILL_DTL D  WHERE M.RT_BILL_SER = D.RT_BILL_SER  AND M.P_YEAR = 3  AND D.I_CODE = :b1  AND D.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(D.EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(D.BATCH_NO,''0'')) )"SELECT SUM(((NVL(I_QTY,0) - NVL(RET_QTY,0) ) + (NVL(FREE_QTY,0) - NVL(RET_FREE_QTY,0) ) ) * NVL(P_SIZE,1) )   FROM IAS_RT_BILL_MST,IAS_RT_BILL_DTL  WHERE IAS_RT_BILL_MST.RT_BILL_SER = IAS_RT_BILL_DTL.RT_BILL_SER  AND IAS_RT_BILL_MST.P_YEAR != 3  AND I_CODE = :b1  AND IAS_RT_BILL_DTL.W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b3,NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900''))  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b4,NVL(BATCH_NO,''0''))  AND ((NVL(I_QTY,0) > NVL(RET_QTY,0) ) OR (NVL(FREE_QTY,0) > NVL(RET_FREE_QTY,0) ))"SELECT SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0))   FROM IAS_OUTGOING_DTL  WHERE OUT_SER = :b1  AND I_CODE = :b2  AND W_CODE = :b3  AND NVL(EXPIRE_DATE,''01/01/1900'') = NVL(:b4,''01/01/1900'')  AND NVL(BATCH_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b5,''0'')  AND RCRD_NO = :b6"

Select M.I_Code, Decode(:Parameter.Lang_Dflt,1,Nvl(M.I_Name,M.I_E_Name),Nvl(M.I_E_Name,M.I_Name)) I_Name,
       Round((Select Decode(A.A_cy, :Ias_Outgoing_Mst.A_Cy,B.I_price,
From Ias_pricing_levels A,Ias_item_price B,Ex_rate C
Where A.Lev_no   = B.Lev_no
    From Ias_Itm_Mst M,Ias_Itm_Dtl D 
   Where M.I_Code=D.I_Code
            Select 1
              From Privilege_Gc
             Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                Select 1
                  From Ias_Itm_Wcode
                 Where I_Code = M.I_Code
 Order By Decode(

 From S_Brn

        Or Exists (Select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                
   Order by gr_no 
Select  Measure,  Measure_Code From  Measurement
Order By Measure

  From v_details
 Where ((:Parameter.User_No = 1)
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

                     From Ias_Priv_Vendor

                 From Ias_Attach_Dtl
                 Where Ias_Attach_Dtl.Attch_No=:Paramtrs_Attach.Temp_Data                    
      Order By Ias_Attach_Dtl.Attch_Desc_No

from ias_itm_attach_movement
where flex_no Like decode(:ias_itm_attach_mov_dummy.flex_no,null,flex_no,:ias_itm_attach_mov_dummy.flex_no)
group by Flex_No,
Order By attch_desc_no1,
