from Ias_Itm_Attach
where flex_no Like decode(:ias_itm_attach_mov_dummy.flex_no,null,flex_no,:ias_itm_attach_mov_dummy.flex_no)
Order By attch_desc_no1,

  From Customer,Customer_Class,Customer_Group
 Where 
Order By C_Code

  From  Mrp_Sfc_Materials_Request_Mstr

Select Pj_No,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_dflt,1,pj_a_name,nvl(pj_e_name,pj_a_name)) pj_name , 
 from Ias_Projects,IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP 
where Ias_Projects.group_no=IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP.group_no(+)
  and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) OR Exists (select 1 from IAS_PRIV_PROJECTS
               where u_id=:Parameter.User_No and Pj_No=Ias_Projects.Pj_No and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 )) 
 Order By Pj_No

 from Ias_Projects,IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP 
where Ias_Projects.group_no=IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP.group_no(+)
  and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) OR Exists (select 1 from IAS_PRIV_PROJECTS

              Where Pj_No = Ias_Projects.Pj_No

From cash_in_hand,ias_cash_in_hand_dtl,priv_cash

order by cash_in_hand.cash_no

From cash_at_bank,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl,priv_cash

    FROM Lc_Master, Lc_Detail,S_FLAGS

  From S_EMP

         (Select Nvl(C_A_Name,C_E_Name) From Customer Where c_code= Sales_Order.C_Code) C_Name,
    FROM Sales_Order ,IAS_SORDER_TYPES 
     Where Sales_Order.So_Type = IAS_SORDER_TYPES.So_Type 
And Order_Ser Not In ( Select Doc_Ser_Ref From Ias_Outgoing_Dtl Where Doc_Type_Ref = 53)
          OR EXISTS (SELECT S_TYPE
                       FROM IAS_PRIV_AR
                      WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO
ORDER BY Order_Date, Order_No, Bill_Doc_Type

                       FROM IAS_PRIV_AR
                      WHERE U_ID = :PARAMETER.USER_NO

from Ias_Projects,Ias_Projects_Group
where Ias_Projects.group_no=Ias_Projects_Group .group_no(+)

               where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and Pj_No=Ias_Projects.Pj_No and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 )))

G_DTL.DOC_NO_REF = :b1  AND IAS_OUTGOING_DTL.DOC_SER_REF = :b2  AND I_CODE = :b3  AND NVL(DOC_SEQUENCE_REF,0) = NVL(:b4,0)"SELECT SUM(NVL(I_QTY,0))   FROM IAS_WHTRNS_DTL  WHERE NVL(USE_EXP_DATE,0),NVL(USE_BATCH_NO,0)   FROM IAS_ITM_MST  WHERE I_CODE = :b1"SELECT EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,TRUNC(SUM(NVL(CP_QTY,0) / NVL(:b1,1) )) CP_QTY   FROM GR_DETAIL  WHERE I_CODE = :b2  AND W_CODE = :b3  AND NVL(CP_QTY,0) > 0  GROUP BY EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO ORDER BY EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO"SELECT MIN(EXPIRE_DATE)   FROM GR_DETAIL  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND W_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(CP_QTY,0) > 0  AND EXPIRE_DATE != ''01/01/1900''"SELECT MIN(BATCH_NO)   FROM GR_DETAIL  WHERE I_CODE = :b1  AND W_CODE = :b2  AND EXPIRE_DATE = :b3  AND BATCH_NO != ''0''  AND NVL(CP_QTY,0) > 0"SELECT I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,I_QTY,P_QTY,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,I_LENGTH,I_WIDTH,I_HEIGHT,I_NUMBER   FROM GR_DETAIL  WHERE GR_NO = :b1  AND PI_TYPE = 5  AND G_SER = :b2"SELECT I_CODE,ITM_UNT,P_SIZE,NVL(I_QTY,0) + NVL(FREE_QTY,0)  I_QTY,NVL(P_QTY,0) + (NVL(FREE_QTY,0) * P_SIZE )  P_QTY,W_CODE,EXPIRE_DATE,BATCH_NO,BARCODE,I_LENGTH,I_WIDTH,I_HEIGHT,I_NUMBER   FROM IAS_PI_BILL_DTL  WHERE BILL_NO = :b1  AND BILL_SER = :b2"SELECT MAX(G_SER)   FROM GR_NOTE  WHERE GR_NO = :b1  AND NVL(GR_NOTE.HUNG,0) = 0  AND NVL(A_CODE,''0'') = DECODE(:b2, NULL ,NVL(A_CODE,''0''),:b2)  AND NVL(GR_NOTE.A_CY,''0'') = DECODE(:b4, NULL ,NVL(GR_NOTE.A_CY,''0''),:b4)  AND NVL(C_CODE,''0'') = DECODE(:b6, NULL ,NVL(C_CODE,''0''),:b6)  AND NVL(V_CODE,''0'') = SELECT USER_TAB_COLUMNS.COLUMN_NAME,IAS_DBS_SYS_PKG.GET_COMMENT(:b1,''HRS_LOAN_MST'',USER_TAB_COLUMNS.COLUMN_NAME,USER) COMMENTS   FROM ALL_COL_COMMENTS,USER_TAB_COLUMNS  WHERE ALL_COL_COMMENTS.TABLE_NAME = USER_TAB_COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME  AND ALL_COL_COMMENTS.COLUMN_NAME = USER_TAB_COLUMNS.COLUMN_NAME  AND ALL_COL_COMMENTS.OWNER = USER  AND USER_TAB_COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME = ''HRS_LOAN_MST''  AND USER_TAB_COLUMNS.COLUMN_NAME IN ( ''APRV_EMP_NO'',''EMP_NO_GRNTR1'',''EMP_NO_GRNTR2'',''EMP_NO_GRNTR3''  )ORDER BY COLUMN_ID"
Select Excel(.Xls) File
SELECT 1   FROM S_EMP_CODE_DTL  WHERE CODE_TYP = :b1  AND CODE_NO = :b2  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
Select Excel.exe File 
SELECT NVL(IAS_DBS_SYS_PKG.GET_COMMENT(:b1,''S_EMP'',:b2,USER),:b2)   FROM ALL_COL_COMMENTS  WHERE OWNER = USER  AND TABLE_NAME = ''S_EMP''  AND COLUMN_NAME = :b2"
SELECT NVL(IAS_DBS_SYS_PKG.GET_COMMENT(:b1,''S_EMP'',:b2,USER),:b2)   FROM ALL_COL_COMMENTS  WHERE OWNER = USER  AND TABLE_NAME = ''S_EMP''  AND COLUMN_NAME = :b2"

Select to_char(Dev_Typ_no)||' -'||Decode(
       nvl(Dev_typ_l_nm,Dev_typ_f_nm),nvl(Dev_typ_f_nm,Dev_typ_l_nm)),to_char(Dev_Typ_no)  from mnt_dev_types order by dev_Typ_no
Select Customer.C_Code,
  From Customer
 Where ((:Parameter.User_No = 1)
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Lpad(C_Code,15,'0')
SELECT   cc_code, Nvl(cc_A_Name, cc_e_name) CC_name
    FROM cost_centers
   WHERE c_s_m = (SELECT cc_type
                    FROM cost_center_types
                   WHERE affected_by_trans = 1)
                SELECT cc_code
                  FROM privilege_cc
                 WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no
Order By Lpad(Cc_Code,30,'0')
Select EMP_NO ENG_CODE,
  From S_EMP
Order By EMP_NO
Select   I_Code,
    From Ias_Itm_Mst, Privilege_Gc
   Where Ias_Itm_Mst.G_Code = Privilege_Gc.G_Code
     And Exists (Select 1
                   From Ias_Receipt_Doc
                  Where I_Code = Ias_Itm_Mst.I_Code And Rownum <= 1)
Order By Lpad (I_Code, 30, '0')
SELECT   i_code,
    FROM Ias_Receipt_Doc
   WHERE I_Name Like Decode(:paramtrs.temp_data,Null,'%','%'||:paramtrs.temp_data||'%')   
ORDER BY Lpad(i_Name,60,'0')
SELECT   Serialno
    FROM Ias_Receipt_Doc
   WHERE Serialno Like Decode(:paramtrs.temp_data,Null,'%','%'||:paramtrs.temp_data||'%')   
ORDER BY Lpad(Serialno,20,'0')
SELECT   C_Address
    FROM Ias_Receipt_Doc
   WHERE C_Address Like Decode(:paramtrs.temp_data,Null,'%','%'||:paramtrs.temp_data||'%')   
ORDER BY Lpad(Serialno,20,'0')

SELECT E.EMP_NO,DECODE(:b1,1,E.EMP_L_NM,E.EMP_F_NM) EMP_NM,A.ARTCL_NO,DECODE(:b1,1,A.ARTCL_L_NM,A.ARTCL_F_NM) ARTCL_NM,A.ARTCL_VAL_TYP,A.AC_CODE,A.ARTCL_VAL,A.CUR_CODE   FROM S_EMP E,HRS_ARTCL A  WHERE E.BRN_NO = :b3  AND NVL(E.EMP_NO,0) >= NVL(:b4,NVL(E.EMP_NO,0))  AND NVL(E.EMP_NO,0) <= NVL(:b5,NVL(E.EMP_NO,0))  AND NVL(E.HRCHY_NO,0) >= NVL(:b6,NVL(E.HRCHY_NO,0))  AND NVL(E.HRCHY_NO,0) <= NVL(:b7,NVL(E.HRCHY_NO,0))  AND E.EMP_ST = 1  AND NVL(E.INACTIVE,0) = 0  AND A.ARTCL_FRQNCY = 2  AND (ARTCL_CLASS IS NULL  OR ARTCL_CLASS IN ( 4,5,6,9  ) OR (ARTCL_CLASS = 14  AND ARTCL_FRQNCY IN ( 1,2  ))) AND A.ARTCL_PAY_OUT_SLRY = 0  AND NVL(A.INACTIVE,0) = 0  AND NVL(A.ARTCL_NO,0) >= NVL(:b8,NVL(A.ARTCL_NO,0))  AND NVL(A.ARTCL_NO,0) <= NVL(:b9,NVL(A.ARTCL_NO,0))  AND (A.ARTCL_RSRVD_NO IS NULL  OR ARTCL_RSRVD_NO IN ( 14,17  ))ORDER BY DECODE(:b10,1,ARTCL_NO,EMP_NO),DECODE(:b10,1,EMP_NO,ARTCL_NO)"

Select Lang_no||' - '||Lang_Name,to_char(Lang_no) From IAS_Sys.lang_def  where nvl(flg_st,1)= 1 Order by lang_no
SELECT ACCOUNT_TYPE   FROM ACCOUNT_TYPES  WHERE AFFECTED_BY_TRANS = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
 Or Exists ( select 1 from priv_acc 
                          where u_id = 
SELECT 1   FROM ACCOUNT  WHERE A_CODE = :b1  AND A_S_M IN (SELECT ACCOUNT_TYPE   FROM ACCOUNT_TYPES  WHERE AFFECTED_BY_TRANS = 1 ) AND ROWNUM <= 1"
select a_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,A_Name,Nvl(A_Name_Eng,A_Name)) A_name
 from account WHERE NVL(AC_DTL_TYP,0) = 0
order by a_code
select D.a_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,M.A_Name,Nvl(M.A_Name_Eng,M.A_Name)) A_name
 from account M, IAS_ACCNT_MSG D
WHERE M.A_CODE =  D.A_CODE
order by D.a_code
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,A_NAME,NVL(A_NAME_ENG,A_NAME)),A_S_M   FROM ACCOUNT  WHERE A_CODE = :b2  AND NVL(AC_DTL_TYP,0) = 0  AND ROWNUM <= 1"

SELECT NULL "FLD1", NULL "FLD2", NULL "FLD3", NULL "FLD4", NULL "FLD5", NULL "FLD6", NULL "FLD7", NULL "FLD8", NULL "FLD9", NULL "FLD10", NULL "FLD11" , NULL "FLD12", NULL "FLD13" , NULL "FLD14" , NULL "FLD15",
       NULL "FLD16", NULL "FLD17", NULL "FLD18", NULL "FLD19", NULL "FLD20" FROM DUAL
Select Brn_No,
 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

SELECT DOC_SER,DOC_NO,BDGT_PRD_TYPE,A_CY,REF_NO,DOC_NOTE,DOC_DESC   FROM IAS_BDGT_BLNC_MST  WHERE DOC_NO = :b1  AND DOC_SER = :b2"SELECT DOC_SER,DOC_NO,BDGT_PRD_TYPE,PRD_NO,A_CY,AC_RATE,A_CODE,AC_CODE_DTL,AC_DTL_TYP,CC_CODE,PJ_NO,ACTV_NO,DOC_DESC,F_DATE,T_DATE,AMT_L,AMT_F,AMT_L_ADD,AMT_F_ADD,AMT_L_DISC,AMT_F_DISC,AMT_L_ADD_MOV,AMT_F_ADD_MOV,AMT_L_DISC_MOV,AMT_F_DISC_MOV   FROM IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL  WHERE DOC_NO = :b1  AND DOC_SER = :b2  AND NVL(A_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b3,NVL(A_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b4,NVL(A_CODE,''0''))  AND NVL(AC_CODE_DTL,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b5,NVL(AC_CODE_DTL,''0'')) AND NVL(:b6,NVL(AC_CODE_DTL,''0''))  AND NVL(AC_DTL_TYP,0) = NVL(:b7,NVL(AC_DTL_TYP,0))  AND NVL(CC_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b8,NVL(CC_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b9,NVL(CC_CODE,''0''))  AND NVL(PJ_NO,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b10,NVL(PJ_NO,''0'')) AND NVL(:b11,NVL(PJ_NO,''0''))  AND NVL(ACTV_NO,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b12,NVL(ACTV_NO,''0'')) AND NVL(:b13,NVL(ACTV_NO,''0''))"SELECT COUNT(A_CODE)   FROM IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL  WHERE DOC_NO = :b1  AND DOC_SER = :b2  AND NVL(A_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b3,NVL(A_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b4,NVL(A_CODE,''0''))  AND NVL(AC_CODE_DTL,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b5,NVL(AC_CODE_DTL,''0'')) AND NVL(:b6,NVL(AC_CODE_DTL,''0''))  AND NVL(AC_DTL_TYP,0) = NVL(:b7,NVL(AC_DTL_TYP,0))  AND NVL(CC_CODE,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b8,NVL(CC_CODE,''0'')) AND NVL(:b9,NVL(CC_CODE,''0''))  AND NVL(PJ_NO,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b10,NVL(PJ_NO,''0'')) AND NVL(:b11,NVL(PJ_NO,''0''))  AND NVL(ACTV_NO,''0'') BETWEEN NVL(:b12,NVL(ACTV_NO,''0'')) AND NVL(:b13,NVL(ACTV_NO,''0''))"
UPDATE IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL SET AMT_L_ADD=NVL(AMT_L_ADD,0) + :b1 ,AMT_L_DISC=NVL(AMT_L_DISC,0) + :b2 ,AMT_F_ADD=NVL(AMT_F_ADD,0) + :b3 ,AMT_F_DISC=NVL(AMT_F_DISC,0) + :b4  WHERE DOC_SER = :b5  AND A_CODE = :b6  AND PRD_NO = :b7  AND BDGT_PRD_TYPE = :b8  AND NVL(A_CY,''0'') = NVL(:b9,''0'')  AND NVL(CC_CODE,''0'') = NVL(:b10,''0'')  AND NVL(PJ_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b11,''0'')  AND NVL(ACTV_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b12,''0'')"UPDATE IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL SET AMT_L_ADD=NVL(AMT_L_ADD,0) + :b1  - (:b2) ,AMT_L_DISC=NVL(AMT_L_DISC,0) + :b3  - (:b4) ,AMT_F_ADD=NVL(AMT_F_ADD,0) + :b5  - (:b6) ,AMT_F_DISC=NVL(AMT_F_DISC,0) + :b7  - (:b8)  WHERE DOC_SER = :b9  AND A_CODE = :b10  AND PRD_NO = :b11  AND BDGT_PRD_TYPE = :b12  AND NVL(A_CY,''0'') = NVL(:b13,''0'')  AND NVL(CC_CODE,''0'') = NVL(:b14,''0'')  AND NVL(PJ_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b15,''0'')  AND NVL(ACTV_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b16,''0'')"UPDATE IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL SET AMT_L_ADD=NVL(AMT_L_ADD,0) - :b1 ,AMT_L_DISC=NVL(AMT_L_DISC,0) - :b2 ,AMT_F_ADD=NVL(AMT_F_ADD,0) - :b3 ,AMT_F_DISC=NVL(AMT_F_DISC,0) - :b4  WHERE DOC_SER = :b5  AND A_CODE = :b6  AND PRD_NO = :b7  AND BDGT_PRD_TYPE = :b8  AND NVL(A_CY,''0'') = NVL(:b9,''0'')  AND NVL(CC_CODE,''0'') = NVL(:b10,''0'')  AND NVL(PJ_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b11,''0'')  AND NVL(ACTV_NO,''0'') = NVL(:b12,''0'')"

       NULL "FLD16", NULL "FLD17", NULL "FLD18", NULL "FLD19", NULL "FLD20" FROM DUAL
select a_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,A_Name,Nvl(A_Name_Eng,A_Name)) A_name,
 from account,account_grouping
and Exists  ( Select Account_Type  From Account_Types  Where Nvl (Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1
and Exists (select 1 from priv_acc where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and a_code=account.a_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
and Exists (select 1 from IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL where  a_code=account.a_code  AND DOC_SER=:GLS_EDIT_BDGT_BLNC_MST.DOC_SER_REF and RowNum<=1)
order by a_code
select a_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,A_Name,Nvl(A_Name_Eng,A_Name)) A_name,
 from account,account_grouping
and Exists  ( Select Account_Type  From Account_Types  Where Nvl (Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1
and Exists (select 1 from priv_acc where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and a_code=account.a_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
order by a_code

FROM ACCOUNT_CURR,EX_RATE 
WHERE ACCOUNT_CURR.A_CY=EX_RATE.CUR_CODE 
ORDER BY A_CY

 from account,account_grouping
and Exists  ( Select Account_Type  From Account_Types  Where Nvl (Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1
and Exists (select 1 from priv_acc where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and a_code=account.a_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
and Exists (select 1 from IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL where  a_code=account.a_code  AND DOC_SER=:GLS_EDIT_BDGT_BLNC_MST.DOC_SER_REF and RowNum<=1)
order by decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,a_name,a_name_eng)
select a_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,A_Name,Nvl(A_Name_Eng,A_Name)) A_name,
 from account,account_grouping
and Exists  ( Select Account_Type  From Account_Types  Where Nvl (Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1
and Exists (select 1 from priv_acc where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and a_code=account.a_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
order by decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,a_name,a_name_eng)
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and Exists (select 1 from IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL where  CC_code=cost_centers.CC_code  AND DOC_SER=:GLS_EDIT_BDGT_BLNC_MST.DOC_SER_REF and RowNum<=1)
and (:Parameter.User_No=1 OR Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 ) )) 
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and (:Parameter.User_No=1 OR Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 ) )) 
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,
select cc_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_a_name,cc_e_name)) cc_name
from cost_centers 
where cc_code in (select cc_code from PRIVILEGE_CC
  where u_id =:parameter.User_No and nvl(add_flag,0)=1)
and Exists (select 1 from IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL where  CC_CODE=cost_centers.CC_CODE  AND DOC_SER=:GLS_EDIT_BDGT_BLNC_MST.DOC_SER_REF and RowNum<=1)  
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1)
And cc_code In(select cc_code from ias_account_cc where a_code=:GLS_EDIT_BDGT_BLNC_DTL.A_code)
order by cc_code

    FROM ias_Actvty, ias_Actvty_group
   WHERE ias_Actvty.group_no = ias_Actvty_group.group_no(+)

from Ias_Projects,Ias_Projects_Group
where Ias_Projects.group_no=Ias_Projects_Group .group_no(+)

 From GLS_EDIT_BDGT_BLNC_MST

 from account,account_grouping

from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1 OR (:Parameter.User_No=1) )) 
and Exists (select 1 from IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL where  CC_code=cost_centers.CC_code  AND DOC_SER=:GLS_EDIT_BDGT_BLNC_MST.DOC_SER_REF and RowNum<=1)
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,
Select Pj_No,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,pj_a_name,nvl(pj_e_name,pj_a_name)) pj_name ,
 from Ias_Projects,IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP 
where Ias_Projects.group_no=IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP.group_no(+)
and Exists (select 1 from IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL where  PJ_NO=Ias_Projects.PJ_NO  AND DOC_SER=:GLS_EDIT_BDGT_BLNC_MST.DOC_SER_REF and RowNum<=1)  
  and Exists (select 1 from IAS_PRIV_PROJECTS
               where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and Pj_No=Ias_Projects.Pj_No and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 OR (:Parameter.User_No=1) )) 
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,Pj_No,
SELECT   Actv_no,
    FROM ias_Actvty, ias_Actvty_group
   WHERE ias_Actvty.group_no = ias_Actvty_group.group_no(+)
and Exists (select 1 from IAS_BDGT_BLNC_DTL where  ACTV_NO=ias_Actvty.ACTV_NO  AND DOC_SER=:GLS_EDIT_BDGT_BLNC_MST.DOC_SER_REF and RowNum<=1)    
     And (:Parameter.Conn_Pj_Actv=0 Or Actv_No In (Select Actv_No From Ias_Pj_Actv Where Pj_No=:Ias_Bdgt_Blnc_Dtl.Pj_No))
            SELECT 1
              FROM ias_priv_Actvty
             WHERE u_id = :parameter.user_no
ORDER BY Actv_no
SELECT EXCEL_PATH   FROM USER_R  WHERE U_ID = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"

PROCEDURE Create_Mv_Yr IS
  Cursor C_Field Is Select Column_Name From User_Tab_Columns
      Where Table_Name='IAS_POST_DTL'
      Order By Column_Name;
   V_Sql := 'Select '||Field||' From IAS'||(To_Number(:Parameter.Brn_Year)-1)||:Parameter.Brn_Usr||'.Ias_Post_Dtl
             Select '||Field||' From Ias_Post_Dtl Where Doc_Type<>0';
Exception WHen Others Then Null;

             Select " From Ias_Post_Dtl Where Doc_Type<>0"FORMS_DDL"CREATE Or Replace View IAS_V_PST_DTL_Yr AS "OTHERS""

SELECT NULL "FLD1", NULL "FLD2", NULL "FLD3", NULL "FLD4", NULL "FLD5", NULL "FLD6", NULL "FLD7", NULL "FLD8", NULL "FLD9", NULL "FLD10", NULL "FLD11" , NULL "FLD12", NULL "FLD13" , NULL "FLD14" , NULL "FLD15",
       NULL "FLD16", NULL "FLD17", NULL "FLD18", NULL "FLD19", NULL "FLD20" FROM DUAL
Select Brn_No,
 From S_Brn
where ((:Parameter.User_No=1) 
       Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                  Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No

SELECT NULL "FLD1", NULL "FLD2", NULL "FLD3", NULL "FLD4", NULL "FLD5", NULL "FLD6", NULL "FLD7", NULL "FLD8", NULL "FLD9", NULL "FLD10", NULL "FLD11" , NULL "FLD12", NULL "FLD13" , NULL "FLD14" , NULL "FLD15",
       NULL "FLD16", NULL "FLD17", NULL "FLD18", NULL "FLD19", NULL "FLD20" FROM DUAL
select IAS_BANK_ADJUST_MST.DOC_NO ,IAS_BANK_ADJUST_MST.BANK_NO ,decode(1,:Parameter.lang_no,bank_name,nvl(bank_e_name,bank_name)) bank_name ,IAS_BANK_ADJUST_MST.Brn_No
From IAS_BANK_ADJUST_MST,cash_at_bank
Where cash_at_bank.bank_no=IAS_BANK_ADJUST_MST.bank_no
           (Select 1 
              From Ias_Shw_Doc_Priv 
             Where U_Id =:Parameter.User_No
        Or Exists (select 1 From S_Brn_Usr_Priv
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No                            
Order by IAS_BANK_ADJUST_MST.Doc_No,IAS_BANK_ADJUST_MST.Bank_No DESC
select cash_at_bank.bank_no,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.a_cy,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.a_code,
From cash_at_bank,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl,priv_cash 
Where cash_at_bank.bank_no=ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.bank_no
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,cc_e_name,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) Or Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1  )) )
And cc_code In (select CC_Code from ias_account_cc where a_code=:voucher_detail.A_code)
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,
select cc_code,Decode(:Parameter.Lang_no,1,cc_a_name,nvl(cc_e_name,cc_a_name)) cc_name ,cc_e_name,
from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and ((:Parameter.User_No=1) Or Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1 ))) 
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,
select a_code,decode(:Parameter.Lang_No,1,A_Name,Nvl(A_Name_Eng,A_Name)) A_name,
 from account,account_grouping
and Exists  ( Select Account_Type  From Account_Types  Where Nvl (Affected_By_Trans, 0) = 1
and Exists (select 1 from priv_acc where u_id=:Parameter.user_no and a_code=account.a_code and add_flag=1 and RowNum<=1)
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,a_code,
Select customer.c_code,
  From customer,Customer_Group
 Where 
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_customer
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode(:Parameter.P_Ord_Lov,1,c_code,Decode(:Parameter.lang_no,1,c_a_name,c_e_name))
Select v_details.v_code,
  From v_details,Vendor_Group
 Where 
                   Select 1
                     From Priv_Acc
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
                   Select 1
                     From Ias_Priv_Vendor
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By Decode(:Parameter.P_Ord_Lov,1,v_code,Decode(:Parameter.lang_no,1,v_a_name,v_e_name))
Select EMP_NO,
  From S_EMP
 Where  ((:Parameter.User_No = 1)
                   Select 1
                     From S_BRN_USR_PRIV
                    Where U_Id = :Parameter.User_No
Order By EMP_NO
select cash_in_hand.cash_no,ias_cash_in_hand_dtl.a_cy,ias_cash_in_hand_dtl.a_code,
From cash_in_hand,ias_cash_in_hand_dtl,priv_cash 
Where cash_in_hand.cash_no=ias_cash_in_hand_dtl.cash_no 
order by cash_in_hand.cash_no
select cash_at_bank.bank_no,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.a_cy,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.a_code,
From cash_at_bank,ias_cash_at_bank_dtl,priv_cash 
Where cash_at_bank.bank_no=ias_cash_at_bank_dtl.bank_no
order by cash_at_bank.bank_no

       From Ias_Cash_At_Bank_Dtl AC,Ex_Rate Ex 
      Where Ex.cur_code = Ac.A_CY

from cost_centers,cc_grouping 
where cost_centers.c_grouping=cc_grouping.group_no(+)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1) 
and (:Parameter.User_No=1 OR Exists (select 1 from privilege_cc 
where (u_id=:Parameter.User_No and cc_code=cost_centers.cc_code and nvl(add_flag,1)=1 and RowNum<=1 ) )) 
order by Decode(:Parameter.P_ord_Lov,1,cc_code,

from cost_centers 
where cc_code in (select cc_code from PRIVILEGE_CC
  where u_id =:parameter.User_No and nvl(add_flag,0)=1)
and c_s_m=(select cc_type from cost_center_types where affected_by_trans=1)
And cc_code In(select cc_code from ias_account_cc where a_code=:S_JRNL_FILE_DTL.A_code)
order by cc_code

 from Ias_Projects,IAS_PROJECTS_GROUP

        (:Paramtrs_Close.Cls_Ac_Typ=3 And A_Code In (Select V_A_Code From V_Details)))

A_CODE   FROM CASH_IN_HAND  UNION ALL SELECT A_CODE   FROM CASH_AT_BANK  UNION ALL SELECT C_A_CODE   FROM CUSTOMER  UNION ALL SELECT V_A_CODE   FROM V_DETAILS  UNION ALL SELECT LC_AC   FROM LC_MASTER A_CODE,A_CY  HAVING SUM(AMT) = 0 ) GROUP BY A_CODE,A_CY,CC_CODE,PJ_NO,ACTV_NO  HAVING ABS(SUM(AMT)) > 0 ORDER BY LPAD(A_CODE,30,''0'')"SELECT C_CODE,A_CY,CC_CODE,PJ_NO,ACTV_NO,SUM(AMT) AMT   FROM IAS_POST_DTL  WHERE C_CODE IS NOT NULL   AND A_CODE BETWEEN NVL(:b1,A_CODE) AND NVL(:b2,A_CODE)  AND C_CODE BETWEEN NVL(:b3,C_CODE) AND NVL(:b4,C_CODE)  AND A_CY = DECODE(:b5,''0'',A_CY,:b5)  AND A_CODE IN (SELECT C_A_CODE   FROM CUSTOMER ) AND A_CODE IN (SELECT A_CODE   FROM ACCOUNT A,ACCOUNT_REPORT_TYPE B  WHERE A.A_REPORT = B.REPORT_TYPE  AND B.REPORT_BS = 1 ) AND ( C_CODE,A_CY  ) IN (SELECT C_CODE,A_CY   FROM IAS_POST_DTL  GROUP BY C_CODE,A_CY  HAVING SUM(AMT) = 0 ) GROUP BY C_CODE,A_CY,CC_CODE,PJ_NO,ACTV_NO  HAVING ABS(SUM(AMT)) > 0 ORDER BY LPAD(C_CODE,30,''0'')"SELECT V_CODE,A_CY,CC_CODE,PJ_NO,ACTV_NO,SUM(AMT) AMT   FROM IAS_POST_DTL  WHERE V_CODE IS NOT NULL   AND A_CODE BETWEEN NVL(:b1,A_CODE) AND NVL(:b2,A_CODE)  AND V_CODE BETWEEN NVL(:b3,V_CODE) AND NVL(:b4,V_CODE)  AND A_CY = DECODE(:b5,''0'',A_CY,:b5)  AND A_CODE NOT IN (SELECT V_A_CODE   FROM V_DETAILS ) AND A_CODE IN (SELECT A_CODE   FROM ACCOUNT A,ACCOUNT_REPORT_TYPE B  WHERE A.A_REPORT =  (IAS_ACCOUNTING_YR) = TableSpace Not Created Must Open Dba And Create TableSpace
PACKAGE
PROCEDURE

Function post_cust_drw_dpst(a_yr      number

    from s_trmnls
   where TRMNL_NAME= userenv('terminal');
Exception
  select r.PYMT_STATUS
    from MTX_RECEIPT_PYMT r
   where r.PYMT_YR   = a_yr
     for update of r.PYMT_STATUS
Exception
     begin
  select CHK_PUR_BRN
          from mtx_stp_accts
         where brn_no = a_brn;
     exception
     end;
  begin

  from gen_curr
 where curr_no = v_curr;
  exception
   begin
select decode(c_lang,1,curr_ades,curr_edes) curr_desc
  from gen_curr
 where curr_no = v_othr_curr;
  exception
 begin

  from mtx_banks
 where bnk_no = v_bnk_no;

 -- select the cust_acct_name
 begin

   from mtx_customers
  where ACCT_NO = v_cust_acct;
 Exception
 begin

  from mtx_banks
 where bnk_no = v_bnk_no;
 Exception
 begin

  from mtx_banks
 where bnk_no = v_bnk_no;
 Exception
  -- draw or deposit from another branch (not cust branch)
  if v_cr_brn <> v_db_brn  -- the customer draw or deposite from another branch
  -- update posting flag
    Begin
  update MTX_RECEIPT_PYMT
   where PYMT_YR = a_yr
Exception
  -- update treaser balance only

   from  MTX_ACCTS_TRNSFR  c
  where  c.BRN_NO    = a_brn
  for  update of c.TRNS_STATUS;
exception

         from mtx_stp_accts  s
        where brn_no =  a_brn

   from gen_curr
   where curr_no= v_to_curr;
exception
select  CURR_ADES
   from gen_curr
   where curr_no= v_frm_curr;
exception
  -- update transaction table
 update MTX_ACCTS_TRNSFR c
  where c.BRN_NO      = a_brn
exception

 GEN_V_CURR order by CURR_SHRT

SELECT RSTRCT_USR   FROM MTX_V_USERS  WHERE S_USERID = :b1"
SELECT NVL(TRN_HSAL_EXCH,0),NVL(TRN_HSAL_EXCH,0),NVL(TRN_LSAL_EXCH,0)   FROM MTX_V_USER_EXCH  WHERE S_USERID = :b1  AND CURR_NO = :b2"
SELECT NVL(CURR_DEC,0),NVL(EXCH_CURR_DEC,0)   FROM GEN_V_CURR  WHERE CURR_NO = NVL(:b1,:b2)"
SELECT NVL(EXCH_CURR_DEC,0)   FROM GEN_V_CURR  WHERE CURR_NO = NVL(:b1,:b2)"
SELECT EXCH_MTHD   FROM GEN_V_CURR  WHERE CURR_NO = :b1"

FROM GEN_v_CURR

============== /home/ameen/YS_ERP/YS_ERP/forms/OldFiles/mtxinw004.fmx ==============
SELECT S_USERID,S_USERID  FROM S_MAINSEC 
SELECT  BRN_ADES,TO_CHAR(BRN_NO)  FROM 
SELECT  DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,CURR_ADES,CURR_EDES) CURR_ADES,TO_CHAR(CURR_NO)  FROM 
 SELECT  decode(:parameter.lang,1,TRNS_RSN_ADES,TRNS_RSN_eDES) TRNS_RSN_ADES,TO_CHAR(TRNS_RSN_NO)
 FROM 
 SELECT S_USERID,S_USERID FROM S_MAINSEC 
 SELECT  DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,IDTYP_ADES,IDTYP_EDES) IDTYP_ADES ,TO_CHAR(IDTYP_NO)  FROM 
select  decode(:parameter.lang,1,idtyp_ades,idtyp_edes) idtyp_ades 
 ,to_char(idtyp_no) idtyp_no from gen_idtyps order by idtyp_no
select decode(:parameter.lang,1,gen_cntry.cntry_antion, gen_cntry.cntry_ention)
 ,to_char(gen_cntry.cntry_no) cntry_no from gen_cntry  order by cntry_no 
SELECT SHOW_CUST_TRX   FROM MTX_CTRL  WHERE ROWNUM <= 1"
SELECT NVL(A.CURR_EXCH,0)   FROM MTX_IN_MST_AMTS A  WHERE A.CURR_NO = :b1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"

SELECT S_FG_ENT || S_FG_UPD  || S_FG_DEL  || S_FG_QRY  || S_FG_PRN    FROM S_USERROLE  WHERE S_USERID = :b1  AND S_PRGCD = :b2"
SELECT RSTRCT_USR   FROM MTX_V_USERS  WHERE S_USERID = :b1"
SELECT NVL(TRN_CURR_EXCH,0),NVL(TRN_LPUR_EXCH,0),NVL(TRN_HPUR_EXCH,0)   FROM MTX_V_USER_EXCH  WHERE S_USERID = :b1  AND CURR_NO = :b2"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,C.CUST_ANAME,C.CUST_ENAME) CUST_ANAME,DECODE(:b1,1,C.CUST_AADD,C.CUST_EADD) CUST_AADD,CUST_ID,CUSTID_TYPE,CUST_BANK,CUST_BANK_BRN,CUST_BANK_ADD,CUST_BNK_ACCT   FROM MTX_V_CUSTOMERS C  WHERE C.CUST_SER = :b3"

SELECT NVL(EXCH_CURR_DEC,0)   FROM GEN_V_CURR  WHERE CURR_NO = NVL(:b1,:b2)"

SELECT CUST_BANK,CUST_BANK_BRN,CUST_BANK_ADD,CUST_BNK_ACCT   FROM MTX_V_CUSTOMERS C  WHERE C.CUST_SER = :b1"
SELECT I.TRX_CURR_NO,:b1 - I.TRX_AMT ,:b2 - I.TRX_LAMT ,I.FEE_CURR_NO,I.FEE_EXCH_RATE,:b3 - I.FEE_AMT ,:b4 - I.FEE_LAMT    FROM MTX_IN_TRX I  WHERE I.BRN_NO = :b5  AND I.IN_YEAR = :b6  AND I.IN_SER = :b7  AND I.TRX_SER = :b8  AND I.TRX_STATUS IN ( 2  )"SELECT TRX_CURR_NO,TRX_AMT * -1 ,TRX_AMT * -1 ,TRX_EXCH_RATE,FEE_CURR_NO,FEE_EXCH_RATE,FEE_AMT * -1 ,FEE_LAMT * -1    FROM MTX_IN_TRX I  WHERE I.BRN_NO = :b1  AND I.IN_YEAR = :b2  AND I.IN_SER = :b3  AND I.TRX_SER = :b4  AND I.TRX_STATUS IN ( 2  )"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,D.DLR_ADES,D.DLR_EDES) DLR_DESC,DECODE(:b1,1,B.DLR_ADES,B.DLR_EDES) DLR_BRN_DESC,DECODE(:b1,1,O.BNF_ANAME,O.BNF_ENAME) BNF_NAME,O.TRX_AMT,O.TRX_CURR_NO,O.TRX_STATUS,O.OS_FLAG,O.SNDR_NAME,C.REQ_DATE,C.AMND_TYPE,C.IN_YEAR,C.IN_SER,C.TRX_SER,C.AMND_SRC_FLAG,C.FILE_REF_NO,C.AMEND_DESC,C.AMND_NOTES,C.AMND_TYPE,O.TRX_CURR_NO,B.CNTRY_NO   FROM MTX_V_IN_TRX O,MTX_V_DEALERS D,MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN B,MTX_IN_AMND_RQST C,MTX_IN_BNFS E  WHERE O.BRN_NO = :b4  AND O.TRX_STATUS IN ( 1,2  ) AND O.AGENT_TYPE = D.DLR_CAT  AND O.AGENT_NO = D.DLR_NO  AND D.DLR_CAT = B.DLR_CAT  AND D.DLR_NO = B.DLR_NO  AND O.AGNET_BRN_NO = B.DLR_BRN_NO  AND O.IN_YEAR = C.IN_YEAR  AND O.IN_SER = C.IN_SER  AND O.TRX_SER = C.TRX_SER  AND O.BRN_NO = C.BRN_NO  AND C.REQ_SER = :b5"
INSERT INTO MTX_IN_BNF_CONDS_VER ( BRN_NO,IN_YEAR,IN_SER,TRX_SER,AMND_SER,BODY_LNGTH,SKIN_COLOR,PRSN_WHGT,EYES_COLOR,HAIR_COLOR,HAIR_LENGTH,OTHR_ASPCTS,PRSN_CLOTHS,OTHR_CONDS )  SELECT BRN_NO,IN_YEAR,IN_SER,TRX_SER,:b1,BODY_LNGTH,SKIN_COLOR,PRSN_WHGT,EYES_COLOR,HAIR_COLOR,HAIR_LENGTH,OTHR_ASPCTS,PRSN_CLOTHS,OTHR_CONDS   FROM MTX_IN_BNF_CONDS  WHERE BRN_NO = :b2  AND IN_YEAR = :b3  AND TRX_SER = :b4"

SELECT  decode(:parameter.lang,1,BRN_ADES,BRN_EDES) 
 ,TO_CHAR(BRN_NO)  FROM 
 SELECT  CURR_SHRT curr_ades,TO_CHAR(CURR_NO)  FROM GEN_CURR where curr_active=1 order by curr_order
 SELECT  decode(:parameter.lang,1,curr_ades,curr_edes) 
   FROM 
 SELECT  decode(:parameter.lang,1,u.UDN_ADES,u.UDN_EDES) 
   FROM 
  where  u.UDN_TYPE  = 3 
 SELECT  decode(:parameter.lang,1,TRNS_RSN_ADES,TRNS_RSN_eDES) TRNS_RSN_ADES,TO_CHAR(TRNS_RSN_NO)
 FROM 
 SELECT S_USERID,S_USERID FROM S_MAINSEC 
 SELECT  DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,IDTYP_ADES,IDTYP_EDES) IDTYP_ADES ,TO_CHAR(IDTYP_NO)  FROM 
select  decode(:parameter.lang,1,idtyp_ades,idtyp_edes) idtyp_ades 
 ,to_char(idtyp_no) idtyp_no from gen_idtyps order by idtyp_no
select decode(:parameter.lang,1,gen_cntry.cntry_antion, gen_cntry.cntry_ention)
 ,to_char(gen_cntry.cntry_no) cntry_no from gen_cntry  order by cntry_no

    from mtx_agents_pass_sides s  
   where s.agent_no   = :mtx_in_trx.pass_to_side

sELECT '1' acct_no , '1' acct_name , '1' acct_brn_no 
 FROM DUAL where 1 = 2 
select DLR_NO
from (
Select d.DLR_NO
 From  MTX_V_DEALERS d
where  :agent_type = 2
select distinct d.DLR_NO
 from MTX_V_USER_AGENTS     d
where :agent_type = 3
order by    DLR_NO
SELECT  b.DLR_BRN_NO
FROM MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN b 
where b.DLR_NO     = :mtx_in_mst.agent_no
order by  b.DLR_BRN_NO
FROM GEN_CURR 
order by CURR_NO
select DLR_NO
from (
select distinct d.DLR_NO
 from MTX_V_DEALERS      d
where :mtx_in_trx.pass_to_type  = 2 
select distinct d.DLR_NO
 from MTX_V_DEALERS        d
where :mtx_in_trx.pass_to_type = 3 
order by DLR_NO
select DLR_NAME
from (
select decode(:parameter.lang,1,d.DLR_ADES,d.DLR_EDES)  DLR_NAME
 from MTX_V_DEALERS_brn      d
where :mtx_in_trx.pass_to_type  = 2 
select decode(:parameter.lang,1,d.DLR_ADES,d.DLR_EDES)  DLR_NAME
 from MTX_V_DEALERS_brn     d
where :mtx_in_trx.pass_to_type  = 3
order by DLR_BRN_NO 
select DLR_NAME
from (
select decode(:parameter.lang,1,d.DLR_ADES,d.DLR_EDES)  DLR_NAME
 from MTX_V_DEALERS_brn      d
where :mtx_in_trx.pass_to_type  = 2 
select decode(:parameter.lang,1,d.DLR_ADES,d.DLR_EDES)  DLR_NAME
 from MTX_V_DEALERS_brn     d
where :mtx_in_trx.pass_to_type  = 3
order by DLR_NAME 
Select decode(:parameter.lang,1,b.BNK_ADES,b.BNK_EDES) BNK_ADES 
  FROM mtx_v_this_brn_banks b
 where b.CNTRY_NO   = c.CNTRY_NO(+) 
order by c.cntry_no 
SELECT  decode(:parameter.lang,1,u.UDN_ADES,u.UDN_EDES) udn_desc
  FROM 
 where  u.UDN_TYPE  = 3
order by decode(:parameter.lang,1,u.UDN_ADES,u.UDN_EDES)

where BNK_NO=:MTX_IN_TRX.CUST_BANK_NO
Select decode(:parameter.lang,
from mtx_agents_pass_sides s
where s.agent_no   = :mtx_in_trx.pass_to_type 
order by pass_side_ordr nulls last

,TO_CHAR(BRN_NO)  FROM

  FROM MTX_ACCTS a
 WHERE a.BRN_NO =:parameter.branch

  FROM MTX_V_TACCTS a
 WHERE a.BRN_NO =:MTX_STP_ACCTS.BRN_NO
   and not exists (select 1 
                     from mtx_trsrs t 
                    where t.brn_no  = a.brn_no
   and not exists (select 1 
                     from mtx_bank_brn b 
                    where b.ACCT_BRN_NO = a.brn_no
   and not exists (select 1 
                     from mtx_agent_brns  b 
                    where b.ACCT_BRN_NO = a.brn_no

Procedure "del_prg_frm_user_roles"

  SELECT  DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,'
       FROM DUAL
    ORDER BY curr_NO
SELECT  TRNS_RSN_ADES,TO_CHAR(TRNS_RSN_NO)  FROM 
SELECT  decode(:parameter.lang,1,REF_ADES,REF_EDES),TO_CHAR(REF_NO) 
 FROM 
 MTX_REF_MST where ref_type=1
SELECT CMP_ADES,CMP_EDES   FROM S_COMPNY  WHERE CMP_NO = 1"SELECT BRN_EDES   FROM S_BRN  WHERE BRN_NO = :b1"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN.DLR_ADES,MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN.DLR_EDES)   FROM MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN  WHERE MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN.DLR_NO = :b2  AND DLR_BRN_NO = :b3  AND MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN.DLR_CAT = DECODE(:b4,2,2,3,3,4,4)  AND DLR_STATUS = 1"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_ADES,MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_EDES)   FROM MTX_V_DEALERS  WHERE MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_NO = :b2  AND MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_CAT = DECODE(:b3,2,2,3,3,4,4)  AND DLR_STATUS = 1"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,CUST_ANAME,CUST_ENAME) CUST_ANAME   FROM MTX_CUSTOMERS  WHERE CUST_SER = :b2"
SELECT ALL CURR_SHRT, 
FROM GEN_v_CURR 
select decode(:parameter.lang,1,DLR_ADES,DLR_EDES) DLR_ADES,to_char(DLR_BRN_NO) DLR_BRN_NO ,CNTRY_NO
from MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN
 where 
SELECT ALL MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_NO, decode(:parameter.lang,1,MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_ADES,
FROM MTX_V_DEALERS 
SELECT ALL GEN_CNTRY.CNTRY_NO, 
FROM GEN_CNTRY 
SELECT ALL GEN_CITIES.CNTRY_NO, GEN_CITIES.CITY_NO, DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,GEN_CITIES.CITY_ADES,CITY_EDES) CITY_ADES
FROM GEN_CITIES 
WHERE 
SELECT ALL MTX_CUST_OUT_BNFS.BNF_NO, MTX_CUST_OUT_BNFS.BNF_ANAME, MTX_CUST_OUT_BNFS.BNF_GNDR, 
FROM MTX_CUST_OUT_BNFS 
WHERE 
SELECT GEN_CNTRY.CNTRY_ADES   FROM GEN_CNTRY  WHERE GEN_CNTRY.CNTRY_NO = :b1"
SELECT CITY_ADES   FROM GEN_CITIES  WHERE CNTRY_NO = :b1  AND CITY_NO = :b2"

SELECT  decode(:parameter.lang,1,BRN_ADES,BRN_eDES) BRN_ADES 
,TO_CHAR(BRN_NO)  FROM 
SELECT S_USERID,S_USERID  FROM S_MAINSEC 
select  decode(:parameter.lang,1,idtyp_ades,idtyp_edes) idtyp_ades 
 ,to_char(idtyp_no) idtyp_no from gen_idtyps order by idtyp_no
SELECT COUNT(*)   FROM MTX_CNCLD_CHKS  WHERE BNK_NO = :b1  AND :b2 BETWEEN FRM_CHK_NO AND TO_CHK_NO  AND CANCEL_STATUS = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
SELECT S_FG_ENT || S_FG_UPD  || S_FG_DEL  || S_FG_QRY  || S_FG_PRN    FROM S_USERROLE  WHERE S_USERID = :b1  AND S_PRGCD = UPPER(:b2)"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,A.ACCT_ADES,NVL(A.ACCT_EDES,A.ACCT_ADES)),:b2   FROM MTX_ACCTS A  WHERE ACCT_NO = :b3  AND BRN_NO = :b4"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,C.CUST_ANAME,C.CUST_ENAME) CUST_ANAME   FROM MTX_CUSTOMERS C  WHERE CUST_SER = :b2"
SELECT S_FG_ENT || S_FG_UPD  || S_FG_DEL  || S_FG_QRY  || S_FG_PRN    FROM S_USERROLE  WHERE S_USERID = :b1  AND S_PRGCD = :b2"
select decode(:parameter.lang,1,BRN_ADES,BRN_eDES) BRN_ADES ,to_char(BNK_BRN_NO) BNK_BRN_NO from 
where BNK_NO=:BNK_NO
SELECT decode(:parameter.lang,1,BNK_ADES,BNK_EDES) BNK_ADES ,TO_CHAR(BNK_NO)  BNK_NO  
FROM mtx_banks
where bnk_status = 1 
select t.BRN_NO
  from MTX_ACCTS  t
 where t.BRN_NO  = :MTX_ACCTS_TRNSFR.BRN_NO
           (select 1
              from mtx_trsrs  r
             where r.BRN_NO = t.BRN_NO
  order by t.ACCT_NO 
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,BNK_ADES,BNK_EDES)   FROM MTX_BANKS  WHERE BNK_NO = :b2"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,B.BRN_ADES,B.BRN_EDES)   FROM MTX_BANK_BRN B  WHERE B.BNK_NO = :b2  AND B.BNK_BRN_NO = :b3"SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,ACCT_ADES,ACCT_EDES)   FROM MTX_V_TACCTS A  WHERE A.BRN_NO = :b2  AND A.ACCT_NO = :b3"SELECT B.ACCT_NO,DECODE(:b1,1,ACCT_ADES,ACCT_EDES)   FROM MTX_BANK_BRN B,MTX_V_TACCTS A  WHERE B.BNK_NO = :b2  AND B.BNK_BRN_NO = :b3  AND B.ACCT_BRN_NO = A.BRN_NO  AND B.ACCT_NO = A.ACCT_NO"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,BRN_ADES,BRN_EDES)   FROM MTX_BANK_BRN  WHERE BNK_NO = :b2  AND BNK_BRN_NO = :b3"

SELECT C_PROFF, NULL  BRN_NO,C_CLASS CUST_TYP_NO,DECODE(:b1,1,C.C_A_NAME,C.C_E_NAME) CUST_ANAME,DECODE(:b1,1,C.C_ADDRESS,C.C_ADDRESS) CUST_AADD,C_ID,C_ID_TYPE,C_ID_EXP_DATE,C_PHONE   FROM CUSTOMER C  WHERE C_CODE = :b3"SELECT C_PROFF,C_CLASS CUST_TYP_NO   FROM CUSTOMER C  WHERE C_CODE = :b1"

SELECT CMP_LNAME,CMP_FNAME   FROM S_CMPNY  WHERE CMP_NO = 1"SELECT CMP_FNAME   FROM S_BRN  WHERE BRN_NO = :b1"
SELECT RSTRCT_USR   FROM MTX_V_USERS  WHERE S_USERID = :b1"
select null bnk_no
from mtx_othr_banks b
where b.OTHR_BANK_CNTRY = c.cntry_no(+)
order by c.cntry_no 
select null bnk_brn_no,
from mtx_othr_banks_brns d
where d.OTHR_BNK_SER = m.OTHR_BNK_SER 
order by d.BNK_BRN_NM 
SELECT NVL(CSH_LPUR_EXCH,0),NVL(CSH_HPUR_EXCH,0)   FROM MTX_V_USER_EXCH  WHERE S_USERID = :b1  AND CURR_NO = :b2"
SELECT XCH_USE_DOCS   FROM MTX_CTRL  WHERE ROWNUM <= 1"
SELECT NVL(EXCH_CURR_DEC,0)   FROM GEN_V_CURR  WHERE CURR_NO = NVL(:b1,:b2)"
SELECT EXCH_MTHD   FROM GEN_V_CURR  WHERE CURR_NO = :b1"
SELECT REP_CODE   FROM CUSTOMER  WHERE C_CODE = :b1"
SELECT CMP_LNAME,CMP_FNAME   FROM S_CMPNY  WHERE CMP_NO = 1"SELECT CMP_FNAME   FROM S_BRN  WHERE BRN_NO = :b1"
SELECT REP_CODE   FROM CUSTOMER  WHERE C_CODE = :b1"SELECT LTTR_EXP_DATE   FROM MTX_CUST_REPS R  WHERE CUST_SER = :b1  AND REP_NAME = :b2"
SELECT 1   FROM DUAL  WHERE TRUNC(:b1) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE)"
SELECT T.CONN_BRN_NO,T.A_CODE   FROM CASH_IN_HAND T  WHERE T.CASH_NO = :b1"
SELECT C.CUST_SER,C.CUST_ID_NO,C.CUST_ID_TYPE,C.CUST_ID_ISS_PLC,C.CUST_ID_EXP_DT,C.CUST_ADD,C.CUST_PHONE   FROM MTX_BNK_CHK_OPT C  WHERE ROWNUM <= 1"

  From  Cash_At_Bank B ,
 Where  B.Bank_No     = :Bnk_No

SELECT S_USERID,TO_CHAR(S_USERID)  FROM S_MAINSEC 
SELECT  DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,IDTYP_ADES,IDTYP_EDES) IDTYP_ADES  
 ,TO_CHAR(IDTYP_NO) IDTYP_NO FROM GEN_IDTYPS order by IDTYP_NO
select  decode(:parameter.lang,1,idtyp_ades,idtyp_edes) idtyp_ades 
 ,to_char(idtyp_no) idtyp_no from gen_idtyps order by idtyp_no
SELECT SHOW_CUST_TRX,DISP_CALENDAR   FROM MTX_CTRL  WHERE ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT CHK_PUR_BRN,CHK_PUR_ACT   FROM MTX_STP_ACCTS S  WHERE S.BRN_NO = :b1  AND CHK_PUR_BRN IS NOT NULL   AND CHK_PUR_ACT IS NOT NULL   AND ROWNUM <= 1"
Select decode(:parameter.lang,1,b.BNK_ADES,b.BNK_EDES) BNK_ADES 
  FROM mtx_v_this_brn_banks b
 where b.CNTRY_NO   = c.CNTRY_NO(+) 
order by c.cntry_no 
SELECT CURR_SHRT, 
FROM GEN_CURR 
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,P.CASH_NAME,P.CASH_E_NAME)   FROM CASH_IN_HAND P  WHERE P.CASH_NO = :b2"

SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,BNK_ADES,BNK_EDES)   FROM MTX_V_THIS_BRN_BANKS  WHERE BNK_NO = :b2"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,S.BRN_LNAME,S.BRN_FNAME)   FROM CASH_AT_BANK B,MTX_V_TACCTS A,S_BRN S  WHERE B.BANK_NO = :b2  AND B.CONN_BRN_NO = S.BRN_NO  AND B.CONN_BRN_NO = A.BRN_NO  AND B.A_CODE = A.ACCT_NO"

SELECT  CURR_SHRT,TO_CHAR(CURR_NO)  FROM 
SELECT S_USERID,S_USERID  FROM S_MAINSEC 
SELECT JV_NAME ,TO_CHAR(JV_TYPE)  
 FROM 
JV_TYPES  where PAY_REC = 2  order by PAY_REC,JV_TYPE 
SELECT PYMT_STATUS   FROM MTX_RECEIPT_PYMT  WHERE BRN_NO = :b1  AND PYMT_YR = :b2  AND PYMT_SER = :b3  AND ROWNUM <= 1"SELECT CMP_ADES,CMP_EDES   FROM S_COMPNY  WHERE CMP_NO = 1"SELECT BRN_EDES   FROM S_BRN  WHERE BRN_NO = :b1"
SELECT RSTRCT_USR   FROM MTX_V_USERS  WHERE S_USERID = :b1"

SELECT COUNT(*)   FROM MTX_CNCLD_CHKS  WHERE BNK_NO = :b1  AND :b2 BETWEEN FRM_CHK_NO AND TO_CHK_NO  AND CANCEL_STATUS = 1  AND ROWNUM <= 1"

SELECT  BRN_ADES,TO_CHAR(BRN_NO)  FROM 
SELECT   decode(:parameter.lang,1,MEDIA_ADES,MEDIA_ADES) MEDIA_ADES,TO_CHAR(MEDIA_NO)  FROM 
SELECT  CURR_SHRT,TO_CHAR(CURR_NO)  FROM 
SELECT S_USERID,TO_CHAR(S_USERID)  FROM S_MAINSEC 
SELECT  IDTYP_ADES,TO_CHAR(IDTYP_NO)  FROM 
SELECT OS_FLAG,DECODE(:b1,1,D.DLR_ADES,D.DLR_EDES) DLR_DESC,DECODE(:b1,1,B.DLR_ADES,B.DLR_EDES) DLR_BRN_DESC,DECODE(:b1,1,C.CUST_ANAME,C.CUST_ENAME) SNDR_NAME,DECODE(:b1,1,B.BNF_ANAME,B.BNF_ANAME) BNF_NAME,B.CNTRY_NO CNTRY_NO,TRX_STATUS   FROM MTX_V_OUT_TRX O,MTX_V_DEALERS D,MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN B,MTX_V_CUSTOMERS C,MTX_CUST_OUT_BNFS B  WHERE O.BRN_NO = :b5  AND O.TRX_YR = :b6  AND O.AGENT_TYPE = D.DLR_CAT  AND O.AGENT_NO = D.DLR_NO  AND D.DLR_CAT = B.DLR_CAT  AND D.DLR_NO = B.DLR_NO  AND O.AGENT_BRN = B.DLR_BRN_NO  AND O.CUST_SER = C.CUST_SER (+)    AND O.BENEF_NO = B.BNF_NO (+)    AND O.CUST_SER = B.CUST_SER (+)    AND O.TRX_TYPE IN ( 1,4  ) AND O.TRX_SER = :b7"
INSERT INTO MTX_OUT_VER ( BRN_NO,TRX_YEAR,TRX_SER,AMND_SER,OUT_REM_NO,CUST_SER,CURR_NO,TRX_DATE,TRX_AMT,TRX_LAMT,TRX_EXCH_RATE,DEST_TYPE,AGENT_TYPE,AGENT_NO,AGENT_BRN_NO,FEE_CURR_NO,FEE_AMT,FEE_EXCH_RATE,FEE_LAMT,COUNTER_NOTE,NOTE_TO_AGENT,TO_BNF_NOTE,TRNS_RSN_NO,AMEND_FLAG,TRX_STATUS,OS_FLAG,REF_NO,FAST_FLAG,LAST_AMND_SER,SND_TO_CASH_DT,SND_TO_CSH_USER,SEND_DATE,SND_USERID,OUTSTD_DATE,OUTSTD_USER,ENTRY_DATE,ENTRY_USER,APPRV_DATE,APPRV_USER )  SELECT BRN_NO,TRX_YEAR,TRX_SER,YSEC_PACK.GET_SER,OUT_REM_NO,CUST_SER,CURR_NO,TRX_DATE,TRX_AMT,TRX_LAMT,TRX_EXCH_RATE,DEST_TYPE,AGENT_TYPE,AGENT_NO,AGENT_BRN_NO,FEE_CURR_NO,FEE_AMT,FEE_EXCH_RATE,FEE_LAMT,COUNTER_NOTE,NOTE_TO_AGENT,TO_BNF_NOTE,TRNS_RSN_NO,AMEND_FLAG,TRX_STATUS,OS_FLAG,REF_NO,FAST_FLAG,LAST_AMND_SER,SND_TO_CASH_DT,SND_TO_CSH_USER,SEND_DATE,SND_USERID,OUTSTD_DATE,OUTSTD_USER,ENTRY_DATE,ENTRY_USER,APPRV_DATE,APPRV_USER   FROM MTX_OUT_TRX  WHERE BRN_NO = :b1  AND TRX_YEAR = :b2  AND TRX_SER = :b3"
INSERT INTO MTX_OUT_BNF_VER ( BRN_NO,TRX_YEAR,TRX_SER,CUST_SER,BENEF_NO,AMND_SER,BNF_ADD,BENEF_PHONE,BNF_ID,BNF_IDTYP_NO,CALL_BENEF_FLAG,EXPIRY_DATE,ACT_IF_EXPIRED )  SELECT BRN_NO,TRX_YEAR,TRX_SER,CUST_SER,BENEF_NO,YSEC_PACK.GET_SER,BNF_ADD,BENEF_PHONE,BNF_ID,BNF_IDTYP_NO,CALL_BENEF_FLAG,EXPIRY_DATE,ACT_IF_EXPIRED   FROM MTX_OUT_BNF  WHERE BRN_NO = :b1  AND TRX_YEAR = :b2  AND TRX_SER = :b3"
INSERT INTO MTX_OUT_MORE_VER ( BRN_NO,TRX_YEAR,TRX_SER,AMND_SER,RCVD_CURR_NO,RCVD_AMT,RCVD_EXCH_RATE,RCVD_LAMT,PASS_TO_SIDE,PASS_TO_BRN,PASS_TO_ADD,PASS_TO_NOTE,ADD_FEE_AMT,ADD_FEE_LAMT,ADD_FEES_NOTES )  SELECT BRN_NO,TRX_YEAR,TRX_SER,YSEC_PACK.GET_SER,RCVD_CURR_NO,RCVD_AMT,RCVD_EXCH_RATE,RCVD_LAMT,PASS_TO_SIDE,PASS_TO_BRN,PASS_TO_ADD,PASS_TO_NOTE,ADD_FEE_AMT,ADD_FEE_LAMT,ADD_FEES_NOTES   FROM MTX_OUT_MORE  WHERE BRN_NO = :b1  AND TRX_YEAR = :b2  AND TRX_SER = :b3"
SELECT TRX_CURR_NO,-1 * TRX_AMT ,TRX_EXCH,-1 * TRX_LAMT ,FEE_CURR,FEE_CURR_EXCH,-1 * FEE_AMT ,-1 * FEE_LAMT    FROM MTX_V_OUT_TRX O  WHERE O.BRN_NO = :b1  AND O.TRX_YR = :b2  AND O.TRX_STATUS IN ( 3,4,6,8  ) AND O.TRX_TYPE IN ( 1,4  ) AND O.TRX_SER = :b3"SELECT TRX_CURR_NO,0,TRX_EXCH,0,FEE_CURR,FEE_CURR_EXCH,0,0   FROM MTX_V_OUT_TRX O  WHERE O.BRN_NO = :b1  AND O.TRX_YR = :b2  AND O.TRX_STATUS IN ( 3,4,6,8  ) AND O.TRX_TYPE IN ( 1,4  ) AND O.TRX_SER = :b3"
SELECT BNF_ANAME,IDTYP_NO,BNF_ID,BNF_AADD   FROM MTX.MTX_CUST_OUT_BNFS  WHERE MTX_CUST_OUT_BNFS.BNF_NO = :b1  AND CUST_SER = :b2  AND BRN_NO = :b3"

SELECT TRX_CURR_NO,TRX_AMT,TRX_LAMT,TRX_EXCH,FEE_CURR,FEE_AMT,FEE_CURR_EXCH,FEE_LAMT,AGENT_TYPE,AGENT_NO,AGENT_BRN,DEST_TYPE,REF_NO,FAST_FLAG,CNTRY_NO   FROM MTX_V_OUT_TRX O  WHERE O.BRN_NO = :b1  AND O.TRX_YR = :b2  AND O.TRX_STATUS IN ( 3,4,6,8  ) AND O.TRX_TYPE IN ( 1,4  ) AND O.TRX_SER = :b3"

============== /home/ameen/YS_ERP/YS_ERP/forms/OldFiles/SECFM04.fmx ==============
 SELECT S.S_USERID, S.S_USERID      
   FROM S_MAINSEC S                 
  where s.BRN_NO = :DATABLK.brn_no 
 SELECT  DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,B.BRN_ADES,B.BRN_EDES) 
   FROM  MTX_V_USERS_BRNS S   
  where S.S_USERID = '
 Select sys_nm , sys_no    
   from (
 Select ' ---- ALL ---- ' Sys_nm
   from dual 
 Select distinct decode(:parameter.lang,1,s.S_SYS_ADESC,s.S_SYS_EDESC) 
   FROM s_system    s         
  WHERE s.S_SYSCD  > 1         
      )  order by to_number(sys_no) asc 
select S_PRG_ADESC
    from s_program 
   where S_ACTIVE=1 
ORDER BY S_PRGCD 
SELECT S_USERID,USER_ANM FROM S_MAINSEC
 SELECT S.S_USERID, S.S_USERID      
   FROM S_MAINSEC S                 
  where s.BRN_NO = :DATABLK.brn_no 
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,NVL(S.USER_ANM,S.USER_ENM),NVL(S.USER_ENM,S.USER_ANM)),NVL(S.S_ADMIN_FLAG,2)   FROM S_MAINSEC S  WHERE S.S_USERID = :b2  AND S.BRN_NO = :b3  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
 Select Subsys_nm , Subsys_no 
   from (
 Select ' ---- ALL ---- ' Subsys_nm
   from dual 
 SELECT distinct  decode(:parameter.lang,1,s.S_SUBSYS_ADESC,s.S_SUBSYS_EDESC)             
   FROM S_SUBSYS   s
 WHERE  s.S_SYSCD    = decode(:datablk.SYSTEM_LIST,0,s.S_SYSCD,:datablk.SYSTEM_LIST)
      )  order by to_number(subsys_no) asc 
s_syscd = decode(:1,0,s_syscd,:2) and s_subsyscd = decode(:3,0,s_subsyscd,:4) and s_userid = :5 and ( :6 = 1 or exists (select 1 from s_userrole r where r.s_prgcd = s_prgcd and r.s_userid = :7 and r.grnt_opt = 1 ) )
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,P.S_PRG_ADESC,P.S_PRG_EDESC)   FROM S_PROGRAM P  WHERE P.S_PRGCD = :b2"

============== /home/ameen/YS_ERP/YS_ERP/forms/OldFiles/MTXRPO022.fmx ==============
select  decode(:parameter.lang,1,idtyp_ades,idtyp_edes) idtyp_ades 
 ,to_char(idtyp_no) idtyp_no from gen_idtyps order by idtyp_no
SELECT  CURR_SHRT,TO_CHAR(CURR_NO)  FROM 
 SELECT  DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,B.BRN_ADES,B.BRN_EDES) 
   FROM  MTX_V_USERS_BRNS S   
  where S.S_USERID = '
SELECT ALL CURR_SHRT, 
FROM GEN_v_CURR 
select decode(:parameter.lang,1,DLR_ADES,DLR_EDES) DLR_ADES,to_char(DLR_BRN_NO) DLR_BRN_NO ,CNTRY_NO
from MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN
 where 
SELECT S_FG_ENT || S_FG_UPD  || S_FG_DEL  || S_FG_QRY  || S_FG_PRN    FROM S_USERROLE  WHERE S_USERID = :b1  AND S_PRGCD = :b2"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,C.CUST_ANAME,C.CUST_ENAME) CUST_ANAME   FROM MTX_CUSTOMERS C,MTX_ACCTS T  WHERE CUST_SER = :b2  AND C.ACCT_NO = T.ACCT_NO (+)    AND C.ACCT_BRN_NO = T.BRN_NO (+)"

SELECT C.BNF_NAME   FROM MTX_CUST_OUT_BNFS C  WHERE BNF_NO = :b1"

FROM MTX_OUT_BNF

SELECT ACCT_NO,CURR_SHRT   FROM MTX_JV_DTLS D,GEN_CURR C,MTX_JVS J  WHERE D.CURR_NO = C.CURR_NO  AND J.BRN_NO = D.BRN_NO  AND J.FIN_YR = D.FIN_YR  AND J.JV_SER = D.JV_SER  AND J.JV_TYP_NO = DECODE(NVL(:b1,-1),-1,JV_TYP_NO,:b1)  AND TRUNC(J.JV_DATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(:b3) AND TRUNC(:b4)  AND JV_STATUS != 3  MINUS SELECT TO_NUMBER(A_CODE),A_CY   FROM ACCOUNT_CURR"SELECT ACCT_NO   FROM MTX_JV_DTLS D,MTX_JVS J,ACCOUNT  WHERE D.ACCT_NO = TO_NUMBER(ACCOUNT.A_CODE)  AND ACCOUNT.AC_CLOSE = 2  AND J.BRN_NO = D.BRN_NO  AND J.FIN_YR = D.FIN_YR  AND J.JV_SER = D.JV_SER  AND J.JV_TYP_NO = DECODE(NVL(:b1,-1),-1,JV_TYP_NO,:b1)  AND TRUNC(J.JV_DATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(:b3) AND TRUNC(:b4)  AND JV_STATUS != 3"SELECT JV_SER   FROM (SELECT D.JV_SER,SUM(DTL_CR) - SUM(DTL_DB)  AMT,SUM(DTL_LCR) - SUM(DTL_LDB)  LOCA_AMT   FROM MTX_JV_DTLS D,MTX_JVS J  WHERE J.BRN_NO = D.BRN_NO  AND J.FIN_YR = D.FIN_YR  AND J.JV_SER = D.JV_SER  AND J.JV_TYP_NO = DECODE(NVL(:b1,-1),-1,JV_TYP_NO,:b1)  AND TRUNC(J.JV_DATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(:b3) AND TRUNC(:b4)  AND JV_STATUS != 3  GROUP BY D.JV_SER )  WHERE LOCA_AMT != 0"SELECT *   FROM MTX_JVS  WHERE TRUNC(JV_DATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(NVL(:b1,JV_DATE)) AND TRUNC(NVL(:b2,JV_DATE))  AND JV_TYP_NO = DECODE(NVL(:b3,-1),-1,JV_TYP_NO,:b3)  AND JV_STATUS != 3"SELECT BRN_NO,FIN_YR,JV_SER,DTL_SER,ACCT_BRN_NO,ACCT_NO,MTX_JV_DTLS.CURR_NO,DTL_NOTE,DTL_CR,DTL_DB,EXCH_RATE,DTL_LCR,DTL_LDB,CURR_SHRT   FROM MTX_JV_DTLS,GEN_CURR  WHERE MTX_JV_DTLS.BRN_NO = :b1  AND MTX_JV_DTLS.FIN_YR = :b2  AND MTX_JV_DTLS.JV_SER = :b3  AND MTX_JV_DTLS.CURR_NO = GEN_CURR.CURR_NO"SELECT ''*-   '' || J.JV_SER  || ''-''  || J.FIN_YR  || ''     ''  || :b1  || ''  ''  || :b2  || CHR(10)  || ''                 ''  || DECODE(:b3,1,NVL(A.ACCT_ADES,A.ACCT_EDES),NVL(A.ACCT_EDES,A.ACCT_ADES))  || ''   -   ''  || DECODE(:b3,1,JV_TYP_ADES,JV_TYP_EDES)  || '' ''  || CHR(10)  INVALID_ACCT_LINE   FROM MTX_JV_DTLS D,MTX_JVS J,MTX_ACCTS A,GEN_CURR C,MTX_JV_TYPS T  WHERE J.BRN_NO = D.BRN_NO  AND J.FIN_YR = D.FIN_YR  AND J.JV_SER = D.JV_SER  AND D.CURR_NO = C.CURR_NO  AND D.ACCT_NO = :b1  AND C.CURR_SHRT = :b2  AND T.JV_TYP_NO = J.JV_TYP_NO  AND A.ACCT_NO = D.ACCT_NO  AND A.BRN_NO = D.BRN_NO  AND J.JV_TYP_NO = DECODE(NVL(:b7,-1),-1,J.JV_TYP_NO,:b7)  AND JV_STATUS != 3"SELECT CUR_CODE   FROM EX_RATE  WHERE L_F = 1"INSERT INTO MASTER_JOURNAL ( JV_TYPE,DOC_NO,DOC_TYPE,J_DATE,J_POSTED,J_CLOSE,MNTH,JV_SERIAL )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,1,TRUNC(:b3),:b4,0,:b5,''000000000000'' || TO_CHAR(:b3,''yyyy'')  || LPAD(:b5,2,''0'')  || LPAD(:b2,10,''0'')  || LPAD(:b1,2,''0'')   )"SELECT NVL(CURR_BAL,0)   FROM ACCOUNT_CURR  WHERE A_CODE = :b1  AND A_CY = :b2"INSERT INTO DETAIL_JOURNAL ( JV_TYPE,DOC_NO,DOC_TYPE,A_CODE,DR_AMT,CR_AMT,DR_AMT_F,CR_AMT_F,AMT,AMT_F,MN_SB,J_DESC,MNTH,YEAR,A_CY,CB_BEFORE,CB_AFTER,J_DATE,J_CLOSE,JV_SERIAL )  VALUES ( :b1,:b2,1,:b3,:b4,:b5,:b6,:b7,:b8,:b9,2,:b10,:b11,:b12,:b13,:b14,:b14 + :b8 ,TRUNC(:b17),0,''000000000000'' || TO_CHAR(:b17,''yyyy'')  || LPAD(:b11,2,''0'')  || LPAD(:b20,10,''0'')  || LPAD(:b1,2,''0'')   )"UPDATE MTX_JVS J SET JV_STATUS=3 WHERE J.JV_TYP_NO = DECODE(NVL(:b1,-1),-1,JV_TYP_NO,:b1)  AND TRUNC(J.JV_DATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(:b3) AND TRUNC(:b4)  AND JV_STATUS != 3"

SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_ADES,DLR_EDES) DLR_ADES   FROM MTX_V_DEALERS  WHERE MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_NO = :b2  AND MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_CAT = :b3"

SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,MTX_V_CUSTOMERS.CUST_ANAME,MTX_V_CUSTOMERS.CUST_ENAME) CUST_ANAME,DECODE(:b1,1,MTX_V_CUSTOMERS.CUST_AADD,MTX_V_CUSTOMERS.CUST_EADD) CUST_AADD,MTX_V_CUSTOMERS.SPNSRID_TYPE,MTX_V_CUSTOMERS.SPNSR_ID   FROM MTX_V_CUSTOMERS  WHERE MTX_V_CUSTOMERS.CUST_SER = :b3"
SELECT MTX_IN_BNFS.BNF_NAME,MTX_IN_BNFS.BNF_ADD   FROM MTX_IN_BNFS  WHERE BNF_NO = :b1"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,MTX_V_CUSTOMERS.CUST_ANAME,MTX_V_CUSTOMERS.CUST_ENAME) CUST_ANAME   FROM MTX_V_CUSTOMERS  WHERE MTX_V_CUSTOMERS.CUST_SER = :b2"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_ADES,DLR_EDES) DLR_ADES   FROM MTX_V_DEALERS  WHERE MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_NO = :b2  AND MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_CAT = :b3"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,DLR_ADES,DLR_EDES) DLR_ADES   FROM MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN  WHERE DLR_NO = :b2  AND DLR_BRN_NO = :b3  AND DLR_CAT = :b4"

============== /home/ameen/YS_ERP/YS_ERP/forms/OldFiles/SECFM09.fmx ==============
 SELECT  DECODE(:PARAMETER.LANG,1,B.BRN_ADES,B.BRN_EDES) 
   FROM  MTX_V_USERS_BRNS S   
  where S.S_USERID = '
SELECT 1   FROM S_MAINSEC S  WHERE S.S_ADMIN_FLAG = 1  AND S.BRN_NO = :b1  AND S.S_USERID != :b2  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
Procedure "add_user_roles" 
INSERT INTO S_USERROLE ( S_SYSCD,S_SUBSYSCD,S_PRGCD,S_USERID,S_FG_ENT,S_FG_QRY,S_FG_DEL,S_FG_UPD,S_FG_PRN,S_ACTIVE,GRNT_OPT )  SELECT P.S_SYSCD,P.S_SUBSYSCD,P.S_PRGCD,:b1,0,0,0,0,0,0,DECODE(:b2,1,1,2)   FROM S_PROGRAM P  WHERE P.S_ACTIVE = 1"
Procedure "delete_user_roles" 
DELETE FROM S_USERROLE R WHERE R.S_USERID = :b1"
Procedure "update_user_roles" 
UPDATE S_USERROLE R SET R.GRNT_OPT=DECODE(:b1,1,1,2) WHERE R.S_USERID = :b2"
exists (select 1 FROM MTX_V_USERS_BRNS S where S.S_USERID = :1 and s.BRN_PRV = 1 and s.brn_no = s_mainsec.brn_no )
SELECT SYSDATE + (50 * 365 )    FROM S_MAINSEC S  WHERE ROWNUM <= 1"

CREATE OR REPLACE Package OutChkSerPk is
Procedure Chk_Cheque_Serial(a_iss_brn  number
CREATE OR REPLACE Package Body OutChkSerPk is
Function Get_Next_OutChk_Serial(a_iss_brn  number
  begin
      select s.brn_chr_code
        from mtx_stp_accts s
       where s.brn_no = a_iss_brn
    Exception
    End;
        Begin
              select d.ACCT_NO
                from mtx_v_dealers d
               where d.dlr_cat = a_agt_type
        exception
        End;
            Begin
                  select d.ACCT_NO
                    from mtx_v_dealers_brn d
                   where d.dlr_cat    = a_agt_type
            exception
            End;
    Begin
      select nvl(s.last_ser,0) + 1
        from MTX_OUTCHK_SERIALS s
       where s.AGENT_TYPE = a_agt_type
        Begin
            update MTX_OUTCHK_SERIALS s
             where s.AGENT_TYPE = a_agt_type
        exception
        end;
    exception
                Begin
                    insert into MTX_OUTCHK_SERIALS
                Exception
                End;
    end;
Procedure Chk_Cheque_Serial(a_iss_brn  number
    begin
              select ochk_auto_ser
                from mtx_banks
               where bnk_no = a_agt_no
    exception
    end;
 package finished successfully.....
 package

procedure get_out_chk_data ( a_cv in out   cv

SELECT COUNT(1)   FROM ALL_OBJECTS  WHERE OWNER = ''MTXYMN''  AND STATUS = ''INVALID''  AND OBJECT_TYPE = ''VIEW''"
&Packages
 &Update System
PROCEDURE
FUNCTIONS
 FROM S_SYSTEM,
 WHERE S_SYSTEM.S_SYSCD <= 1
 GROUP BY
select c.CNTRY_NO, c.CNTRY_ADES, c.CNTRY_EDES, c.CNTRY_SHRT, c.CNTRY_CNTNT,
 from GEN_CNTRY c
select c.CURR_NO, c.CURR_ADES, c.CURR_EDES, c.CURR_SHRT, c.CURR_DEC, c.EXCH_CURR_DEC,
from GEN_CURR c
select   a.brn_no     brn_no
from mtx_trsr_trx a
where  b.brn_no = a.brn_no
 select   a.brn_no
from mtx_trsr_trx a
where  b.brn_no = a.brn_no
select   xh.brn_no
from MTX_EXCH xh
 where  xd.brn_no = xh.brn_no
select   xh.brn_no
from MTX_EXCH xh
 where  xd.brn_no = xh.brn_no
select  p.brn_no
from mtx_trx_pymt p
where PYMT_MTHD = 1
select  p.brn_no
from mtx_trx_pymt p
where PYMT_MTHD = 1
select ch.brn_no
from  mtx_tchk_purch ch
where cd.brn_no  = ch.brn_no
group by ch.brn_no
select mh.brn_no
from MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX mh
where md.brn_no =  mh.brn_no
group by mh.brn_no
select  dr.brn_no
from MTX_RECEIPT_PYMT DR
where dr.PYMT_MTHD = 1
select  dr.brn_no
from MTX_RECEIPT_PYMT DR
where dr.PYMT_MTHD = 1
select a.BRN_NO, a.ACCT_NO, a.ACCT_TYP, a.ACCT_EDES, a.ACCT_ADES, c.CURR_NO,
from MTX_ACCTS a, MTX_ACCT_CURR c, gen_v_curr v
where a.BRN_NO = c.BRN_NO
select a.BRN_NO, a.ACCT_NO, a.ACCT_TYP, a.ACCT_EDES, a.ACCT_ADES, c.CURR_NO,
from MTX_ACCTS a, MTX_ACCT_CURR c, gen_v_curr v
where a.BRN_NO = c.BRN_NO
select to_char(sysdate,'MONDY') ||substr(userenv('TERMINAL'),1,2) usr
 from dual
(SELECT a.agt_no dlr_no, a.agt_ades dlr_ades, a.agt_edes dlr_edes,
      FROM mtx_agents a)
   (SELECT c.cmp_no, c.cmp_ades, c.cmp_edes, c.cmp_asht, c.cmp_esht,
      FROM s_compny c)
   (SELECT b.bnk_no, b.bnk_ades, b.bnk_edes, b.bnk_ashrt, b.bnk_eshrt,
      FROM mtx_v_this_brn_banks b)
(SELECT d.AGT_NO dlr_NO
FROM MTX_AGENT_BRNS d)
 UNION ALL (SELECT c.CMP_NO
FROM s_brn d
WHERE d.BRN_NO = s.brn_no(+) )
 UNION ALL  (SELECT d.BNK_NO, d.BNK_BRN_NO, d.BRN_ADES, d.BRN_EDES,
FROM MTX_BANK_BRN d )
SELECT   a.brn_no     brn_no
FROM MTX_TRSR_TRX a
WHERE  TRSR_TRX_STATUS = 2
SELECT   a.brn_no     brn_no
FROM MTX_TRSR_TRX a
WHERE  TRSR_TRX_STATUS = 2
SELECT   xh.brn_no  brn_no
FROM MTX_EXCH xh
 WHERE  ex_status = 2
SELECT   xh.brn_no
FROM MTX_EXCH xh
 WHERE  ex_status = 2
SELECT  p.brn_no
FROM MTX_TRX_PYMT p
WHERE PYMT_STATUS = 2
SELECT  p.brn_no
FROM MTX_TRX_PYMT p
WHERE PYMT_STATUS = 2
SELECT  p.brn_no
FROM MTX_TRX_PYMT p
WHERE PYMT_STATUS = 2
SELECT ch.brn_no
FROM  MTX_TCHK_PURCH     ch
WHERE PUR_STATUS = 3
SELECT mh.brn_no
FROM MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX mh
WHERE MTT_STATUS = 3        -- POSTED
GROUP BY  mh.brn_no
SELECT ch.brn_no
FROM  MTX_CHK_PURCH ch
WHERE PUR_STATUS = 2
SELECT o.brn_no
FROM MTX_OUT_TRX o
WHERE o.trx_status        = 7
SELECT o.brn_no
FROM MTX_OUT_TRX o
WHERE o.trx_status        = 7
select bnk_no
from mtx_banks
where bnk_status=1
select othr_bnk_ser
from MTX_OTHR_BANKS
select bnk_no
from mtx_bank_brn
where brn_status=1
select othr_bnk_ser
from MTX_OTHR_BANKS_BRNS
select c.CNTRY_NO, c.CNTRY_ADES, c.CNTRY_EDES, c.CNTRY_SHRT, c.CNTRY_CNTNT,
from GEN_CNTRY c
SELECT c.cust_ser, c.cust_no, c.brn_no, c.cust_aname, c.cust_ename,
     FROM mtx_customers c
select d.REC_SER, d.CUST_SER, d.DOC_GRP_NO, d.DOC_SER, d.DOC_NO, d.DOC_ISS_DT,
from MTX_CUST_RQRD_DOC d
select d.REC_SER, d.CUST_SER, d.DOC_GRP_NO, d.DOC_SER, d.DOC_NO, d.DOC_ADESC,
from MTX_CUST_RQRD_DOC d, MTX_DOC_TMP t
where t.REC_SER = d.REC_SER
(SELECT a.agt_no dlr_no, a.agt_ades dlr_ades, a.agt_edes dlr_edes,
     FROM MTX_AGENTS a)
   (SELECT c.cmp_no, c.cmp_ades, c.cmp_edes, c.cmp_asht, c.cmp_esht,
      FROM s_compny c)
   (SELECT b.bnk_no, b.bnk_ades, b.bnk_edes, b.bnk_ashrt, b.bnk_eshrt,
      FROM mtx_v_this_brn_banks b
     WHERE b.bnk_agnt_flag = 1)
(SELECT d.AGT_NO dlr_NO
FROM MTX_AGENT_BRNS d)
 UNION (SELECT c.CMP_NO, d.BRN_NO, d.BRN_ADES, d.BRN_EDES,
FROM s_brn d
WHERE d.BRN_NO = s.brn_no(+) )
UNION (SELECT d.BNK_NO, d.BNK_BRN_NO, d.BRN_ADES, d.BRN_EDES,
FROM MTX_BANK_BRN d,
WHERE m.BNK_NO = d.BNK_NO
from S_MAINSEC u
where u.S_USERID not in ( select p.user_id from mtx_trx_priv p
                                                   where p.user_id=u.s_userid
and t.TRX_TYPE not in ( select p.TRX_TYPE  from MTX_TRX_PRIV  p
                                                   where p.TRX_TYPE=t.TRX_TYPE
SELECT o.brn_no
 FROM MTX_OUT_CHK    o
   WHERE o.agent_no     = d.bnk_no
SELECT o.brn_no, o.trx_year, o.trx_ser, o.out_rem_no, o.trx_status, 1 trx_type,
 FROM MTX_OUT_TRX       o
   WHERE o.TRX_STATUS  in (1,2)
(select p.BRN_NO brn_no
from MTX_CHK_PURCH p
where j.JV_SER(+) = p.JV_SER
Select x.BRN_NO
From MTX_EXCH x
WHERE x.BRN_NO = d.BRN_NO
SELECT i.brn_no, i.in_year, i.in_ser, i.trx_ser, i.in_rem_no, i.in_sec_no,
FROM MTX_IN_TRX i, MTX_IN_MST m,  mtx_v_dealers_brn a, mtx_v_users u,
WHERE i.brn_no = m.brn_no
select m.BRN_no, m.mtt_yr, m.mtt_ser,
from MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX_dtl m
where amt_flag <> 2
group by m.BRN_no, m.mtt_yr, m.mtt_ser,acct_no,ACCT_nm
SELECT o.trx_ser, o.brn_no, o.trx_year, o.out_rem_no
     FROM MTX_OUT_TRX o,
    WHERE o.brn_no = a.brn_no
(SELECT r.brn_no brn_no, r.trx_year trx_yr, r.trx_ser trx_ser,
      FROM MTX_OUT_TRX r,
     WHERE r.agent_no = d.dlr_no
(select 3 --  gent cat
from s_compny   s
(select 1 -- comp brns
from s_compny s
select BRN_NO, ACCT_NO, ACCT_TYP, ACCT_EDES, ACCT_ADES
from MTX_ACCTS
where ACCT_TYP = 1
 from  mtx_banks 
 where r.brn_no = u.brn_no
select      a.brn_no    trx_brn,
 from  MTX_TRUST_DEPOSIT  a
 where      a.BNK_NO     =  k.BNK_NO(+)
select      p.BRN_NO     trx_brn,
 from  MTX_trx_pymt  p
 where p.pymt_mthd= 4
select      a.brn_no  ,
 from  MTX_TRUST_DRAW  a
 where      a.BNK_NO     =  k.BNK_NO(+)
select      m.brn_no ,
 from  MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX           m
 where   m.brn_no = d.brn_no
     and   d.mtt_mthd  = 4                                    -- from trust balance
     and not exists (select 1
       from mtx_out_amnd a
                      where a.brn_no     = m.MTT_TRX_BRN
select  S.BRN_NO , S.CSH_OUT_BRN, S.CSH_OUT_ACT, S.CSH_OUT_FEE_BRN, S.CSH_OUT_FEE_ACT,
from MTX_STP_ACCTS S
select d.REC_SER, d.CUST_SER, d.DOC_GRP_NO, d.DOC_SER, d.DOC_NO, d.DOC_DLVRY_DT,
from MTX_CUST_RQRD_DOC d, MTX_DOC_TMP t
where t.REC_SER = d.REC_SER
from S_MAINSEC s, GEN_CURR c, MTX_CURR_EXCH x
where c.CURR_NO = x.CURR_NO
and x.ENTRY_DATE = (SELECT MAX(x2.ENTRY_DATE) FROM MTX_CURR_EXCH X2 WHERE X2.CURR_NO = C.CURR_NO)
select 
  from S_MAINSEC    s 
   SELECT s.brn_no brn_no, s.user_anm, s.user_enm, s.s_userid s_userid,
     FROM s_mainsec s, mtx_user_prvs p
    WHERE s.s_userid = p.s_userid(+)
  FROM s_mainsec_brn  b
      ,(select  b.*
          from mtx_v_users s
 WHERE U.brn_no   = b.brn_no(+)
SELECT p.s_userid, d.dlr_cat, d.dlr_no
     FROM mtx_v_users       p
    WHERE d.dlr_cat        = b.dlr_cat(+)
SELECT u.s_userid, a.dlr_cat, a.dlr_no

CREATE OR REPLACE procedure chk_rcv_brn_fee( a_agnt_type      number
          begin
          select  fee_type
           from  MTX_AGNT_RCV_FEE
          where agnt_type  = a_agnt_type
          exception
--      end;
                      begin
                      select  fee_type
                       from  MTX_AGNT_RCV_FEE
                      where agnt_type  = a_agnt_type
                          exception
                      end;
          end;
create  OR REPLACE Procedure create_in_and_out_jobs is
CREATE OR REPLACE procedure MTXYMN.get_dflt_rcv_fee( a_agnt_type         number
  begin
          select  fee_type
           from  MTX_AGNT_RCV_FEE
          where agnt_type  = a_agnt_type
          exception
          end;
 elsif v_fee_type = 3  -- fee is PERCENTAGE from comp fee
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE othr_curr_exch (a_frm_cur     number
                          begin
                         Select min(x.TRN_HSAL_EXCH)+(NVL (x.rem_limit_above, 0) / 100 * x.trn_hsal_exch)
                       from  MTX_V_USER_EXCH x
                      where  x.S_USERID = prmpkg.get_userid
               exception
               end;
            begin
                         Select min(x.TRN_HSAL_EXCH)+(NVL (x.rem_limit_above, 0) / 100 * x.trn_hsal_exch)
                      from  MTX_V_USER_EXCH x
                     where  x.S_USERID = prmpkg.get_userid
               exception
                        end;
            /*begin
                        select nvl(exch_mthd ,'*')
                          from mtx_curr_vs_curr_mthd
                         where curr_no    = a_frm_cur
          exception
             end;*/
create  OR REPLACE PROCEDURE show_msg IS
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE set_agt_brn IS
  open v_rc for ' select b.AGT_NO
                                        ,row_number() over(partition by agt_no order by agt_no, agt_brn_no ) new_no
                             from mtx_agent_brns b
                             order by agt_no, agt_brn_no ';
          update mtx_agent_brns b
           where b.agt_no         = v_agt_brn_rec.agt_no
          update mtx_agents_brns_curr b
           where b.agt_no         = v_agt_brn_rec.agt_no
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE P_get_cust_fee_descount (  a_lvl_no              number
  select  LVL_MIN_PRSNT
    from  MTX_FEE_DISC_PRSNT_LVL l
   where  l.lvl_no = a_lvl_no;
exception
CREATE OR REPLACE Procedure post_bnk2(a_trx_brn  number
     Begin
         select o.TO_BNK_NO
          from  MTX_OUT_BTRX o
         where  o.BRN_NO     = a_trx_brn
           for  update ;
     exception
     end;
  Begin
   select jv_type
     from MTX_B2B_TYPES t
    where t.B2B_TYPE = v_b2b_type;
  exception
   End;
     begin
       select b_cost_center into v_cost_center from MTX_STP_ACCTS 
       where brn_no=a_trx_brn;
     exception
     end;
    -- update bank to bank remittance record
   Begin
          update MTX_OUT_BTRX o
           where o.BRN_NO     = a_trx_brn
   Exception
   End;
CREATE OR REPLACE procedure MTXYMN.p_get_trx_fee_in(a_mtx_trx number 
  begin
                 select f.fee_curr_no
                        from mtx_v_user_fees f
                     where f.trx_typ = 3 
                        elsif v_fee_type = 3  -- fee is PERCENTAGE from comp fee
Exception

   where mtt_ser= a_mtt_ser;
   where mtt_ser= a_mtt_ser;
CREATE OR REPLACE Procedure create_in_and_out_jobs is
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE MTXYMN.CNCL_WEB_BRN_REM_PRC(A_REM_TYPE          IN NUMBER
     begin
       begin
        select brn_no    
        from mtx_in_trx
       where trx_ser_ref     = a_trx_ser_ref
         exception when no_data_found then
          end;  
    BEGIN
      select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') INTO CANDATE from dual;
    END;      
                              Begin
                                 select 1
                                   from mtx_in_trx
                                     where brn_no = v_brn_no
                              for update of  brn_no
                              exception
                              end;
                        BEGIN
                                SELECT acct_brn_no
                                 FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                WHERE agt_no = v_frm_agent_no
                            exception
                        END;   
                    ----***********  if frm_agnt_type = 2 then  acct_no else select   acct from agent   (medial account)
                                    Begin
                                        select  acct_brn_no
                                         from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                        where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                                    exception
                                    End;
                                BEGIN
                                        SELECT acct_brn_no
                                         FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                        WHERE agt_no = v_pass_to_side
                                    exception
                                END;   
                                BEGIN
                                        SELECT acct_brn_no
                                         FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                        WHERE agt_no = v_frm_agent_no
                                    exception
                                END;   
                          --update remittance record status
                            Begin
                                  update MTX_IN_TRX 
                                     where brn_no = v_brn_no
                            Exception
                                 End;
                            Begin
                            ---------update mysql data
                            update web_in_out_trx  --@mysql2oracle 
                                     where outrem_secure_no = a_rem_secur_no
                            Exception
                                 End; 
                          --update remittance SENDER AND BNF NAME
                            Begin
                                  update MTX_IN_TRX i
                                     where i.brn_no = v_brn_no
                            Exception
                                 End;
                            Begin
                            ---------update mysql data
                            update web_in_out_trx   --@mysql2oracle 
                                     where outrem_secure_no = a_rem_secur_no
                            Exception
                                 End;                                  
   Exception
  end; 
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE MTXYMN.GET_OUTREM_NO_TO_WEB(A_REM_TYPE       IN NUMBER
  begin
            Select nvl(MAX(s.LAST_SER),0)  + 1
              from MTX_OUT_SERIALS s 
             where s.AGENT_TYPE = V_PAY_AGENT_TYPE
   exception when OTHERS then
  end;
           BEGIN
                SELECT FRM_AGENT_NO,PAY_AGENT_BRN_NO INTO V_AGENT_SN,V_PAY_BRN_NO FROM WEB_IN_OUT_TRX --@MYSQL2ORACLE 
                WHERE OUTREM_SECURE_NO=A_REM_SECUR_NO AND TRX_SER_REF = A_TRX_SER_REF;     
              INSERT INTO MTX_OUT_SERIALS
                            INSERT INTO MTX_OUT_SERIALS
           EXCEPTION
           END;                                      
     BEGIN
       UPDATE MTX_OUT_TRX
        WHERE 1||BRN_NO||TRX_YEAR||TRX_SER = A_TRX_SER_REF
       EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN       
     END;
     ELSIF A_REM_TYPE IN(1,3) THEN --FROM WEB    AND   IN REM
     BEGIN
       UPDATE MTX_IN_TRX
        WHERE TRX_SER_REF     = A_TRX_SER_REF
       EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN
     END;     
     BEGIN
       UPDATE WEB_IN_OUT_TRX  --@MYSQL2ORACLE
        WHERE TRX_SER_REF = A_TRX_SER_REF
       EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN
     END;  
  -------------UPDATE OUT REM NO IN WEB       
  begin
      UPDATE MTX_OUT_SERIALS SET LAST_SER = V_OUT_REM_NO
     where AGENT_TYPE = V_PAY_AGENT_TYPE
   exception when others then
  end;  
EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE MTXYMN.get_fee_brn(a_brn         in   number
       begin
         select TRX_BRN into v_trx_brn from MTX_TRX_PYMT where PYMT_YR            = a_yr
        Begin
            select     IN_REM_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = v_trx_brn;
        exception
        End;
        begin       
             select  
                   From  MTX_TRX_PYMT    i
                   where i.PYMT_STATUS         = 2
   EXCEPTION
CREATE OR REPLACE procedure MTXYMN.get_dflt_rcv_web_fee( a_agnt_type         number
  begin
          select  fee_type
           from  WEB_TRX_PAY_FEES
          where AGENT_TYPE  = a_agnt_type
          exception
          end;
  begin
          select  fee_type
           from  WEB_TRX_PAY_FEES
            where  decode(nvl(AGENT_TYPE,0),0,a_agnt_type,AGENT_TYPE) = a_agnt_type 
          exception
          end;
END;get_dflt_rcv_web_fee
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE COMPILE_OBJECTS IS
  for rec in ( SELECT  OBJECT_NAME
                FROM ALL_OBJECTS
                WHERE OWNER='MTXYMN'
                ORDER BY OBJECT_TYPE DESC  )
  BEGIN
  END;
  -- PROCEDURES
  for rec in ( SELECT  OBJECT_NAME
                FROM ALL_OBJECTS
                WHERE OWNER='MTXYMN'
               AND OBJECT_TYPE ='PROCEDURE'
                ORDER BY OBJECT_TYPE DESC  )
  BEGIN
       EXECUTE IMMEDIATE ' ALTER PROCEDURE '||REC.OBJECT_NAME||' COMPILE';
  END;
  -- FUNCTIONS
  for rec in ( SELECT  OBJECT_NAME
                FROM ALL_OBJECTS
                WHERE OWNER='MTXYMN'
               AND OBJECT_TYPE ='FUNCTION'
                ORDER BY OBJECT_TYPE DESC  )
  BEGIN
       EXECUTE IMMEDIATE ' ALTER FUNCTION '||REC.OBJECT_NAME||' COMPILE';
  END;
-- PACKAGES
  for rec in ( SELECT  OBJECT_NAME
                FROM ALL_OBJECTS
                WHERE OWNER='MTXYMN'
               AND OBJECT_TYPE ='PACKAGE BODY'
                ORDER BY OBJECT_TYPE DESC  )
  BEGIN
       EXECUTE IMMEDIATE ' ALTER PACKAGE '||REC.OBJECT_NAME||' COMPILE';
  END;
  EXCEPTION
ALTER  PROCEDURE CHK_RCV_BRN_FEE COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE CREATE_IN_AND_OUT_JOBS COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE GET_DFLT_RCV_FEE COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE OTHR_CURR_EXCH COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE P_GET_TRX_FEE_CHKO COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE P_GET_TRX_FEE_CHKP COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE P_GET_TRX_FEE_IN COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE P_GET_TRX_FEE_OUT COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE SHOW_MSG COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE SET_AGT_BRN COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE P_GET_CUST_FEE_DESCOUNT COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE POST_BNK2 COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE DELPYMT COMPILE
ALTER  PROCEDURE COMPILE_OBJECTS COMPILE

CREATE OR  REPLACE FUNCTION f_check_chk_status ( a_chk_no  number
 begin
select CHK_USE_FLAG
    from MTX_USD_CUST_CHKS c
   where a_chk_no between c.CHK_NO and nvl(c.TO_CHK_NO,a_chk_no)
exception
   begin
select CHK_USE_FLAG
    from MTX_USD_CUST_CHKS c
   where a_chk_no between c.CHK_NO and nvl(c.TO_CHK_NO,a_chk_no)
  exception

CREATE OR  REPLACE function f_get_rem_doc(  a_trx_type  
 open doc_rec for ' Select s.DOC_GRP_NO
    From MTX_RQRD_DOC_STP s
 Where  s.MTX_TRX = 1
     Begin
     select sum(nvl(o.TRX_LAMT,0))
       from MTX_V_OUT_TRX o
      where o.CUST_SER =  a_cust;
      Exception
      End;
     Begin
     select sum(nvl(o.TRX_LAMT,0))
       ( select i.TRX_LAMT , rownum rec_ser
       from MTX_V_OUT_TRX i
      where i.CUST_SER = a_cust
      order by i.trx_date desc) o
      where o.rec_ser <= v_trx_cnt;
      Exception
      End;
     Begin
     select sum(nvl(o.TRX_LAMT,0))
       from MTX_V_OUT_TRX o
      where o.CUST_SER = a_cust
      Exception
      End;
CREATE OR  REPLACE function f_get_xch_doc(  a_trx_type  number
 open doc_rec for ' Select s.DOC_GRP_NO
    From MTX_RQRD_DOC_STP s
 Where  s.MTX_TRX = 2
     Begin
     select sum(nvl(x.TRX_LAMT,0))
       from MTX_V_EXCH_TRX x
      where x.CUST_SER =  a_cust;
      Exception
      End;
     Begin
     select sum(nvl(x.TRX_LAMT,0))
       ( select i.TRX_LAMT , rownum rec_ser
       from MTX_V_EXCH_TRX i
      where i.CUST_SER = a_cust
      order by i.trx_date desc) x
      where x.rec_ser <= v_trx_cnt;
      Exception
      End;
     Begin
     select sum(nvl(x.TRX_LAMT,0))
       from MTX_V_EXCH_TRX x
      where x.CUST_SER = a_cust
      Exception
      End;

CREATE OR  REPLACE Function get_new_seq(s_TAB    VarChar2,
   Begin
    Begin
     Select nvl(S_SEQ_VAL,0)   + nvl( S_INCRBY_VAL,0)
  From  S_SEQ_VALUES
  Where UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
     Update  S_SEQ_VALUES
  Where  UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
 Exception
INSERT INTO
    Begin
     Select  S_SEQ_VAL   + S_INCRBY_VAL
   From  S_SEQ_VALUES
  Where  UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
     Update S_SEQ_VALUES
  Where UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
   Exception
INSERT INTO
   End;
    Begin
     Select  S_SEQ_VAL   + S_INCRBY_VAL
   From  S_SEQ_VALUES
  Where  UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
     Update S_SEQ_VALUES
  Where UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
     Exception
INSERT INTO
     End;
    Begin
     Select  S_SEQ_VAL   +  S_INCRBY_VAL
   From  S_SEQ_VALUES
  Where  UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
     Update  S_SEQ_VALUES
  Where  UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
     Exception
INSERT INTO
   End;
    Begin
         Select S_SEQ_VAL   + S_INCRBY_VAL
      From  S_SEQ_VALUES
     Where  UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
     Update  S_SEQ_VALUES
Where  UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
     Exception
  INSERT INTO
   End;
    Begin
         Select  S_SEQ_VAL   + S_INCRBY_VAL
       From  S_SEQ_VALUES
       Where UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
     Update  S_SEQ_VALUES
Where  UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
     Exception
INSERT INTO
   End;
       Begin
           Select  S_SEQ_VAL   + S_INCRBY_VAL
         From  S_SEQ_VALUES
        Where  UPPER(S_TAB_NAME) =   UPPER(S_TAB)
Update S_SEQ_VALUES
 Where UPPER(S_TAB_NAME)  =   UPPER(S_TAB)
     Exception
INSERT INTO
   End;

  begin
 select nvl(s.POST_TO_ONYX_BRN,s.brn_no)
   from mtx_stp_accts s
where s.brn_no = a_snd_brn_no
 exception
 begin
select nvl(s.POST_TO_ONYX_BRN,s.brn_no)
   from mtx_stp_accts s
   where s.brn_no = a_rcv_brn_no
 exception

 CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION  chk_agent_wep_conn (a_agent_no in mtx_agents.agt_no%type) RETURN NUMBER IS

                from mtx_agents

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION MTXYMN.chk_rem_web_status (a_brn in number,
     BEGIN
        select trx_status
        from web_in_out_trx  --@mysql2oracle
        where trx_ser_ref = 1||a_brn||a_yr||a_trx;
        exception WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION MTXYMN.chk_rem_in_web_status (a_brn in number,
     BEGIN
        select trx_status
        from web_in_out_trx  --@mysql2oracle
        where trx_ser_ref = 2||a_brn||a_yr||a_trx||a_in_ser;
        exception WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION chk_web_status (p_sec_no in number) RETURN NUMBER IS
     BEGIN
        select trx_status
        from web_in_out_trx  --@mysql2oracle
        where OUTREM_SECURE_NO = p_sec_no;
        exception WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION MTXYMN.get_rcv_voc_no(agent_num in number) RETURN number IS
      begin
           begin                   
               SELECT MAX (RCV_VOC_NO) into v_agent_num FROM web_in_out_trx  WHERE to_date(PAY_DATETIME,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') AND PAY_AGENT_NO=agent_num;          
                              exception
   end;
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION MTXYMN.chk_rem_status (a_brn in number,
     BEGIN
        select PYMT_STATUS
        from MTX_TRX_PYMT
        where BRN_NO = a_brn AND PYMT_YR=a_yr AND PYMT_SER=a_trx;
        exception WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION MTXYMN.chk_agent_wep_conn (a_agent_no in mtx_agents.agt_no%type) RETURN NUMBER IS
             BEGIN
                select weB_conn
                from mtx_agents
                where agt_no = a_agent_no;
            exception WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN

procedure post_exch_trx(a_brn  number
    Begin
            select    x.EX_TYPE
                 from mtx_exch          x
                where x.BRN_NO      = a_brn
                  for update of  x.EX_STATUS
    Exception
    end;
    Begin
         select s.CHK_PUR_BRN
           from mtx_stp_accts s
          where s.brn_no = a_brn
    Exception
    End;
    for rec in (select     d.CURR_NO
                                     from mtx_exch_dtl d
                                    where d.BRN_NO   = a_brn
                                      for update )
                                                      Begin
                                                            select ACCT_BRN_NO
                                                             from  MTX_BANK_BRN  b
                                                            where  b.BNK_NO    = v_bnk_no
                                                        exception
                                                        End;
                                                    Begin
                                                        select ACCT_BRN_NO
                                                         from  MTX_BANKS b
                                                        where b.BNK_NO    = v_bnk_no;
                                                    exception
                                                    End;
                                          Begin
                                                select ACCT_BRN_NO
                                                 from  MTX_BANK_BRN  b
                                                where  b.BNK_NO    = v_bnk_no
                                            exception
                                            End;
                                        Begin
                                            select ACCT_BRN_NO
                                             from  MTX_BANKS b
                                            where b.BNK_NO    = v_bnk_no;
                                        exception
                                        End;
                                                 begin
                                                             select   CUST_ANAME
                                                               from   mtx_customers
                                                              where   ACCT_NO = v_cust_acct;
                                                        Exception
                                                 end;
                        begin
                             select ACCT_BRN_NO
                              from mtx_stp_accts
                             where brn_no = v_cust_acct_brn;
                             exception
                          end;
     -- update mtx_exch table
              Begin
                  update mtx_exch x
                    where x.BRN_NO      = a_brn
              Exception
              end;
Procedure post_chkp_trx( a_yr      number
        Begin
              select r.PUR_STATUS
                from MTX_CHK_PURCH  r
               where r.PUR_YR    = a_yr
                 for update of  r.PUR_STATUS
        Exception
        End;
         begin
               select decode(v_vchrd_on_bank_flag,1,v_bnk_acct_brn,CHK_PUR_BRN)
             from mtx_stp_accts
                    where brn_no = a_brn;
         exception
         end;
      -- update posting flag
        Begin
              update MTX_CHK_PURCH c
               where c.PUR_YR   = a_yr
            Exception
            End;
procedure post_trv_chk_trx(a_trx_ser  number
    Begin
      select LAST_LANG
        from s_trmnls
       where TRMNL_NAME=userenv('terminal');
    Exception
    End;
  Begin
      select r.PUR_STATUS
      from MTX_TCHK_PURCH r
       where PUR_YR      = a_trx_yr
           for update    ;
    Exception
    End;
  begin
          select acct_no
            from mtx_v_user_trsrs x
           where s_userid   = a_userid
  exception
    begin
       select b.tchk_pur_act
         From mtx_stp_accts b
          where brn_no = a_trx_brn;
  Exception
  end;
      for rec in (select d.TRVL_NO
                              from MTX_TCHK_PUR_dtl  d
                             where d.BRN_NO  = a_trx_brn
      -- update payment status
        Begin
               update MTX_TCHK_PURCH r
               where  BRN_NO      = a_trx_brn
            Exception
            End;

    from  mtx_exch       m
    where m.brn_no       = d.brn_no

   from mtx_pymt_user_nvgtion_opt 
   where s_userid= a_s_userid
        update  mtx_pymt_user_nvgtion_opt 
           where s_userid       =a_s_userid;          
       insert into mtx_pymt_user_nvgtion_opt 
    exception
     raise_application_error(-20025,'error when fetch data from Default table MTX_PYMT_USER_NVGTION_OPT '||sqlerrm);                    
end;

         from mtx_user_prvs p
        where p.s_userid = v_userid
     exception

Function get_lang return number is
Function get_app_no return number is
Function get_sys_no return number is
Function get_func_no return number is
Function get_prgcd return varchar2 is
Function get_logon_brn_nm return varchar2 is
Function get_main_brn return number is
     select b.brn_no
       from s_brn b
      where b.main_brn_flag = 1
exception
Function get_main_brn_nm return varchar2 is
     select decode(v_lang,1,b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
       from s_brn b
      where b.main_brn_flag = 1
exception
 package finished successfully.....
