CREATE OR REPLACE Package trust_pk is
 function trx_exist_for_trust(a_cust_ser number
 function get_trust_curr_net_bal(a_curr_bal      number
 procedure afect_trust_bal(a_brn     number
 Procedure post_trust_dpst(a_brn       number
 Procedure post_trust_draw(a_brn     number
 Procedure fetch_trust_bal(a_rc       in out t_rc
 function get_cust_trust_bal(a_cust_ser  number
 function get_cust_trust_open_bal(a_brn     number
 procedure aprv_trust_open_bal(a_brn    number
 procedure crt_bd_trgr_on_trust_bal_tbl;
CREATE OR REPLACE Package body trust_pk is
function trx_exist_for_trust(a_cust_ser number
  begin
          select 1
                from MTX_CUST_TRUST_BAL b
             where b.cust_ser = a_cust_ser
  exception
  end;
function get_trust_curr_net_bal(a_curr_bal                     number
procedure afect_trust_bal(a_brn                 number
        raise_application_error(-20001,' Unacceptable value for argument (a_afct_flag) of procedure (afect_trust_bal) ');
                            begin
                            select nvl(ovrd_trust_bal,0)
                              from mtx_stp_accts
                             where brn_no = a_brn
                            exception when others then
                            end;
        -- update customer currency trust balance
             Begin
                          update MTX_CUST_TRUST_BAL b
                          where b.brn_no         = a_brn
             exception
                             Begin
                                  insert into MTX_CUST_TRUST_BAL
                             exception
                             End;
Procedure post_trust_dpst(a_brn       number
    Begin
     select  c.trsr_ser
           from  MTX_TRUST_DEPOSIT  c
          where  c.BRN_NO    = a_brn
              for  update of c.TRUST_STATUS;
    exception
    End;
         Begin
         from mtx_stp_accts  s
        where brn_no =  a_brn
         Exception
         End;
                    Begin
                        select b.ACCT_BRN_NO
                          from MTX_BANKS     k
                         where b.BNK_NO    = v_bnk_no
                     exception
                     End;
      -- update transaction table
         Begin
              update MTX_TRUST_DEPOSIT c
              where c.BRN_NO      = a_brn
         exception
Procedure post_trust_draw(a_brn     number
    Begin
      select LAST_LANG
        from s_trmnls
       where TRMNL_NAME= userenv('terminal');
    Exception
    End;
    Begin
             select  d.trsr_ser
           from  MTX_TRUST_DRAW d
          where  d.BRN_NO     = a_brn
              for  update of d.DRW_STATUS;
    exception
    End;
         Begin
              select --s.CURR_DIFF_ACCT_BRN
         from mtx_stp_accts  s
        where brn_no =  a_brn
         Exception
         End;
      -- update transaction table
         Begin
              update MTX_TRUST_DRAW d
              where d.BRN_NO     = a_brn
         exception
Procedure fetch_trust_bal(a_rc       in out t_rc
                      ' select b.CUST_SER                                                                                    TBAL_CUST_SER
                                from MTX_CUST_TRUST_BAL b
                             where b.cust_ser = :a_cust_ser '
function get_cust_trust_bal(a_cust_ser  number
      begin
            select get_trust_curr_net_bal(nvl(b.CURR_TRUST_BAL,0)
                    from MTX_CUST_TRUST_BAL b
                 where b.cust_ser = a_cust_ser
      exception
      end;
function get_cust_trust_open_bal(a_brn                 number
      begin
              select nvl(sum(get_trust_curr_net_bal(0
                    from MTX_CUST_TRUST_BAL b
                 where b.brn_no   = c_brn_no
      exception
        end;
              begin
                      select nvl(sum(nvl(t.TRX_AMT,0)),0)
                            from mtx_v_trust_trx t
                         where t.trx_brn                = c_brn_no
              exception
              end;
procedure aprv_trust_open_bal(a_brn          number
  -- update only allowed balances
  ' update MTX_CUST_TRUST_BAL b
     where b.brn_no                         = :c_brn_no
procedure crt_bd_trgr_on_trust_bal_tbl is
end;';

CREATE OR REPLACE Package PrtionPk is
    procedure move_out_hist_trx;
    procedure move_in_hist_trx;
    procedure move_ochk_hist_trx;
    procedure move_chkp_hist_trx;
    procedure move_tchk_hist_trx;
    procedure move_xch_hist_trx;
    Function  get_out_status_prt_lst(a_prt_ser   number
    Function  get_in_status_prt_lst(a_prt_ser   number
    Function  get_ochk_status_prt_lst(a_prt_ser   number
    Function  get_chkp_status_prt_lst(a_prt_ser   number
    Function  get_tchk_status_prt_lst(a_prt_ser   number
    Function  get_xch_status_prt_lst( a_prt_ser   number
CREATE OR REPLACE Package body prtionpk is
procedure move_out_hist_trx is
     for rec in (select p.PRT_SER                     prt_ser
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type
                             order by p.PRT_SER asc
            update mtx_out_trx o
             where o.trx_status in ( 6 * v_prt_tbl(i).prt_factor
procedure move_in_hist_trx is
     for rec in (select p.PRT_SER                     prt_ser
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type
                             order by p.PRT_SER asc
            update mtx_in_trx t
             where t.trx_status in ( 3 * v_prt_tbl(i).prt_factor
procedure move_ochk_hist_trx is
     for rec in (select p.PRT_SER                     prt_ser
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type
                             order by p.PRT_SER asc
            update mtx_out_trx t
             where t.trx_status in (3 * v_prt_tbl(i).prt_factor)
procedure move_chkp_hist_trx is
     for rec in (select p.PRT_SER                     prt_ser
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type
                             order by p.PRT_SER asc
            update mtx_out_trx t
             where t.trx_status in (2 * v_prt_tbl(i).prt_factor)
procedure move_tchk_hist_trx is
     for rec in (select p.PRT_SER                     prt_ser
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type
                             order by p.PRT_SER asc
            update mtx_out_trx t
             where t.trx_status in (3 * v_prt_tbl(i).prt_factor)
procedure move_xch_hist_trx is
     for rec in (select p.PRT_SER                     prt_ser
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type
                             order by p.PRT_SER asc
            update mtx_out_trx t
             where t.trx_status in (2 * v_prt_tbl(i).prt_factor)
Function  get_out_status_prt_lst(a_prt_ser   number
    select v_lst_str || a_status_a || ',' ||
    from dual;
    for rec in  (select p.PRT_FACTOR                     prt_factor
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type
Function  get_in_status_prt_lst(a_prt_ser   number
    select v_lst_str || a_status_a || ',' ||
    from dual;
    for rec in  (select p.PRT_FACTOR                     prt_factor
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type
Function  get_ochk_status_prt_lst(a_prt_ser   number
    select v_lst_str || a_status_a || ',' ||
    from dual;
    for rec in  (select p.PRT_FACTOR                     prt_factor
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type                      -- inward remittances
Function  get_chkp_status_prt_lst(a_prt_ser   number
    select v_lst_str || a_status_a || ',' ||
    from dual;
    for rec in  (select p.PRT_FACTOR                     prt_factor
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type                      -- inward remittances
Function  get_tchk_status_prt_lst(a_prt_ser   number
    select v_lst_str || a_status_a || ',' ||
    from dual;
    for rec in  (select p.PRT_FACTOR                     prt_factor
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type                      -- inward remittances
Function  get_xch_status_prt_lst( a_prt_ser   number
    select v_lst_str || a_status_a || ',' ||
    from dual;
    for rec in  (select p.PRT_FACTOR                     prt_factor
                              from MTX_TRX_PRTITION_LVLS p
                             where MTX_TRX_FLAG = c_trx_type                      -- inward remittances

CREATE OR REPLACE Package OutSerPk is
Function Get_Next_OutList_Serial(a_agt_type number
Function Get_Next_OutRem_Serial(a_agt_type number
Function Get_OutRem_Frmtd_Ser(a_ser_stp_no 
CREATE OR REPLACE Package Body OutSerPk is
      ' where s.AGENT_TYPE = :v_agt_type ' || chr(10) ||
      ' where s.AGENT_TYPE = :v_agt_type ' || chr(10) ||
Function Get_OutList_Frmtd_Ser(a_ser_stp_no number
     Begin
           select nvl(s.BRN_CHR_CODE,'')
             from mtx_stp_accts s
            where s.brn_no = a_snd_brn;
     Exception
     End;
              '     Select f.STR_BFR_FLD
                       from MTX_OUT_SER_FRMT f
                      where f.OUT_SER_STP_NO = :a_ser_stp_no
                      order by f.FLD_ORDR '
Function Get_OutRem_Frmtd_Ser(a_ser_stp_no     number
     Begin
           select nvl(s.BRN_CHR_CODE,'')
             from mtx_stp_accts s
            where s.brn_no = a_iss_brn;
     Exception
     End;
                '     Select f.STR_BFR_FLD
                       from MTX_OUT_SER_FRMT f
                      where f.OUT_SER_STP_NO = :a_ser_stp_no
                      order by FLD_ORDR '
Function Get_Next_OutList_Serial_______OLD__(a_agt_type number
      ' Select nvl(s.LAST_SER,0) + 1 ' || chr(10) ||
      '   from MTX_OUT_SERIALS s '       || chr(10);
      ' where s.AGENT_TYPE = :v_agt_type ' || chr(10) ||
  Begin
            select nvl(s.USE_DFLT,2)
              From MTX_OUT_SER_STP s
             where AGENT_TYPE = a_agt_type
  Exception
  End;
  -- create the where condition
  -- change the where conditoin to default
          ' for update '
        ' Insert into MTX_OUT_SERIALS
        ' update MTX_OUT_SERIALS s ' || chr(10)    ||
Function Get_Next_OutList_Serial(a_agt_type number
      ' Select nvl(s.LAST_SER,0) + 1 ' || chr(10) ||
      '   from MTX_OUT_SERIALS s '       || chr(10);
      ' where s.AGENT_TYPE = :v_agt_type ' || chr(10) ||
  Begin
                    select nvl(s.USE_SND_BRN,1)
                      From MTX_OUT_SER_STP s
                     where d.AGT_NO                = a_agt_no
                    select nvl(s.USE_SND_BRN,1)
                      From MTX_OUT_SER_STP s
                     where d.brn_NO                = a_agt_brn
  Exception
                    begin
                    select nvl(s.USE_SND_BRN,1)
                      From MTX_OUT_SER_STP s
                     where s.STP_TYPE   = 1 -- setting for outward list
                    exception
                    end;
  End;
  -- create the where condition
          ' for update '
        ' Insert into MTX_OUT_SERIALS
        ' update MTX_OUT_SERIALS s ' || chr(10)    ||
Function Get_Next_OutRem_Serial____OLD__(a_agt_type number
      ' Select nvl(s.LAST_SER,0) + 1 ' || chr(10) ||
      '   from MTX_OUT_SERIALS s '  || chr(10);
      ' where s.AGENT_TYPE = :v_agt_type ' || chr(10) ||
  Begin
            select nvl(s.USE_DFLT,2)
              From MTX_OUT_SER_STP s
             where AGENT_TYPE = a_agt_type
  Exception
  End;
  -- create the where condition
  -- change the where conditoin to default
          ' for update '
        ' Insert into MTX_OUT_SERIALS
        ' update MTX_OUT_SERIALS s ' || chr(10)    ||
Function Get_Next_OutRem_Serial(a_agt_type number
      ' Select nvl(s.LAST_SER,0) + 1 ' || chr(10) ||
      '   from MTX_OUT_SERIALS s '  || chr(10);
      ' where s.AGENT_TYPE = :v_agt_type ' || chr(10) ||
  Begin
                    select nvl(s.USE_SND_BRN,1)
                      From MTX_OUT_SER_STP s
                     where d.AGT_NO                = a_agt_no
                    select nvl(s.USE_SND_BRN,1)
                      From MTX_OUT_SER_STP s
                     where d.brn_NO                = a_agt_brn
  Exception
                    begin
                    select nvl(s.USE_SND_BRN,1)
                      From MTX_OUT_SER_STP s
                     where s.STP_TYPE   = 2 -- setting for outward remittance
                    exception
                    end;
  End;
  -- create the where condition
          ' for update '
        ' Insert into MTX_OUT_SERIALS
        ' update MTX_OUT_SERIALS s ' || chr(10)    ||

CREATE OR REPLACE Package outrempk is
  Procedure post_out_rcpt(a_brn      number
  Procedure post_out_chk_rcpt(a_brn      number
  Procedure post_snd_out_csh_rem(a_snd_brn number
  Procedure post_bnk2bnk_trx_snd(a_trx_brn  number
  Procedure calc_rcpt_agent_outrem_fee(a_dlr_type     number
CREATE OR REPLACE Package Body outrempk is
Procedure post_out_chk_rcpt(a_brn      number
    Begin
       select r.PAY_CURR_NO
        from  MTX_TRX_PYMT  r
       where  r.PYMT_YR   = a_yr
             for update of  r.PYMT_STATUS
        exception
        End;
        Begin
              select o.TRX_STATUS
                from mtx_out_chk   o
               where o.BRN_NO   = v_out_brn
        exception
        End;
        Begin
              select ACCT_BRN_NO
                from mtx_v_all_dealers d
               where d.dlr_cat = v_agt_type
        exception
        End;
        Begin
              select A_cost_center
                from mtx_agents d
               where d.agt_no = v_agt_no;
        exception
        End;
            Begin
                  select ACCT_BRN_NO
                    from mtx_v_all_dealers_brn d
                   where d.dlr_cat = v_agt_type
            exception
            End;
        Begin
            select decode(c.out_chk_dest,1,s.CHK_OUT_BRN,v_agt_acct_brn)
             from  mtx_stp_accts s
            where s.brn_no = a_brn
        Exception
        End;
      if v_pymt_mthd = 1 then -- cash  recpt from treaser
      -- update check outward status
        Begin
              update MTX_OUT_CHK o
               where o.BRN_NO  = v_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
      -- update payment status
        Begin
              update MTX_TRX_PYMT r
               where PYMT_YR  = a_yr
            Exception
            End;
Procedure calc_rcpt_agent_outrem_fee(a_dlr_type              number
    /*Begin
         select d.RCV_FEE_USE
            from     MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN d -- this updated by khalid
         where    d.dlr_cat    = a_dlr_type
    Exception
    End;
            Begin
                 select c.CURR_DEC
                    from     gen_curr c
                 where    c.curr_no = a_fee_curr
            Exception
            End;
exception
Procedure post_rcpt_agent_outrem_fee(a_snd_brn                          number
     begin
        select C.CURR_DEC
          from gen_curr c
         where c.CURR_NO = c_local_curr;
      Exception
      end;
      Begin
                  update mtx_out_snd s
                     where s.BRN_NO         = a_snd_brn
            exception
            end;
      Begin
                  update mtx_out_snd s
                     where s.BRN_NO         = a_snd_brn
            exception
            end;
           for rec in (select s.AGENT_TYPE
                                      from mtx_out_snd s
                                     where s.BRN_NO                 = a_snd_brn
                        begin
                              update mtx_out_snd s
                                 where s.BRN_NO           = a_snd_brn
                        exception
                        end;
        Begin
            select CSH_OUT_FEE_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_snd_brn
        exception
        End;
        Begin
            select A_cost_center
             from  mtx_agents
            where  agt_no = a_agent_no
        exception
        End;
   for remrec in (select s.RCV_FEE_CURR              curr_no
                                     from mtx_out_snd s
                                    where s.BRN_NO                 = a_snd_brn
                                    group by s.RCV_FEE_CURR
Procedure post_snd_out_csh_rem(a_snd_brn number
   Function should_crt_jv return boolean is
        Begin
                 /*select 1
                 From MTX_OUT_SND       s
                where s.BRN_NO      = a_snd_brn
        exception
        End;
        begin
                select  CSH_OUT_BRN
                  from  mtx_stp_accts
               where brn_no = a_snd_brn;
        exception
        end;
        Begin
            select CSH_OUT_FEE_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_snd_brn
        exception
        End;
        begin
        select DEAL_CURR_EXCH
            from MTX_OUT_SND_MST
         where SND_BRN_NO= a_snd_brn
        exception
            end;
        Begin
            select A_cost_center
             from  mtx_agents
            where  agt_no = v_agent_no
        exception
        End;
   for agnt in (select distinct
                              From  MTX_OUT_SND       s
                             where  s.BRN_NO     = a_snd_brn
               Begin
                      select agnt.agnt_nm || 
                        from MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN d
                     where d.DLR_CAT   = agnt.agent_type
               exception
               end;
                    Begin
                               select distinct s.CURR_NO
                       from  MTX_OUT_SND  s
                                    where  s.BRN_NO      = a_snd_brn
                    exception
                    end;
                    -- previouse select must return rows
                          for rec in (select  S.TRX_BRN        trx_brn
                                                      From  MTX_OUT_SND  s
                                                     where  s.BRN_NO      = a_snd_brn
                                        Begin
                             select decode(agnt.brn_deal_flag,1,b.ACCT_NO            ,agnt.agnt_acct)           agnt_acct
                                                from mtx_v_dealers_brn b
                                             where b.dlr_cat   = agnt.agent_type
                                        exception
                                        end;
                             BEGIN
                                              SELECT o.trx_status
                                                FROM MTX_OUT_TRX o
                                               WHERE o.brn_no     = rec.trx_brn
                                            EXCEPTION
                                            END;
                             BEGIN
                                          select i.trx_status
                                            from MTX_IN_TRX i
                                           WHERE i.brn_no     = rec.trx_brn
                                        EXCEPTION
                                        END;
                        -- update out remittance record
                                    begin
                       update mtx_out_trx o
                                           where o.trx_status = rec.out_trx_status
                                        exception
                                        end;
                                        begin
                                          update mtx_in_trx i
                                           where i.trx_status = rec.out_trx_status
                                        exception
                                        end;
                              -- update remittance sending record
                                    begin
                                      update MTX_OUT_SND s
                                       where s.brn_no         = a_snd_brn
                                    exception
                                    end;
                         Begin
                                     select nvl(EXCH_MTHD,
                                       from gen_curr
                                      where curr_no =  vt_outrem_curr(snt_rem_cur);
                                     exception
                               end;
                                    begin
                                             select min(to_number(s.orem_no))
                                                      From  MTX_OUT_SND  s
                                                     where  s.BRN_NO      = a_snd_brn
                            exception
                                 Begin
                                     select nvl(EXCH_MTHD,
                                       from gen_curr
                                      where curr_no =  vt_outrem_curr(snt_rem_cur);
                                     exception
                                     end;
         for remrec in (select s.RCV_FEE_CURR              curr_no
                                     from mtx_out_snd s
                                    where s.BRN_NO                 = a_snd_brn
                                    group by s.RCV_FEE_CURR
                    /*    Begin
                            select acct_brn_no
                             from  mtx_stp_accts
                            where  brn_no = remrec.trx_brn
                        exception
                        End;
         for feerec in (select s.RCV_FEE_CURR              curr_no
                                     from mtx_out_snd s
                                    where s.BRN_NO                 = a_snd_brn
                                    group by s.RCV_FEE_CURR
                        Begin
                            select acct_brn_no
                             from  mtx_stp_accts
                            where  brn_no = feerec.trx_brn
                        exception
                        End;
      -- update sending transaction
        begin
          update MTX_OUT_SND_MST
           where snd_status = 1
        exception
        end;
Procedure post_bnk2bnk_trx_snd(a_trx_brn  number
 Begin
     select o.TO_BNK_NO
      from  MTX_OUT_BTRX o
     where  o.BRN_NO     = a_trx_brn
       for  update ;
 exception
        begin
                select  b_cost_center
                  from  mtx_stp_accts
               where brn_no =a_trx_brn ; -- a_snd_brn;
        exception
        end;
  Begin
   select jv_type
     from MTX_B2B_TYPES t
    where t.B2B_TYPE = v_b2b_type;
  exception
   End;
    -- update bank to bank remittance record
   Begin
          update MTX_OUT_BTRX o
           where o.BRN_NO     = a_trx_brn
   Exception
   End;
 package finished successfully.....
 package

CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE out_fetch_util is
    procedure get_updatable_out_trx(
    procedure get_to_be_aprvd_out_trx(
    procedure get_to_be_postd_out_trx( a_cv   in out      t_out_cv
    procedure get_all_out_trx(
    procedure get_hist_out_trx(a_cv                       in out  t_out_cv
        Procedure fetch_outrem_to_snd_cnts(a_outrem2snd  in out   t_out_cv
        Procedure fetch_out_rem_to_snd(a_outrem2sndtbl in out nocopy t_v_outtable
        procedure get_rcvabl_out_trx(  a_cv               in out  t_out_cv
        procedure get_notpaid_out_amnd(a_cv               in out  t_out_cv
        procedure fetch_not_posted_out_amnd(a_cv               in out  t_out_cv
procedure get_all_out_chk( a_cv   in out  t_out_cv
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY MTXYMN.fetch_util is
procedure get_cust_trx(a_cv       in out t_cv
 Select q.TRX_LAMT
 Select t.TRX_LAMT
    from  mtx_out_trx   t
 where  nvl(a_ocsh,1)= 1
  Select c.chk_LAMT
    from   mtx_out_chk   c
 where  nvl(a_ochk,1) = 1
   select  i.trx_lamt
     from  mtx_in_trx    i
    where nvl(a_inw,1)  = 1
   select  x.ex_lamt
     from  mtx_exch      m
    where nvl(a_exch,1) = 1
   select  c.pur_lamt
     from  mtx_chk_purch c
    where nvl(a_bnkchk,1) = 1
   select  t.tot_lamt
     from  mtx_tchk_pur_dtl  t
    where nvl(a_trvchk,1) = 1
 order  by q.trx_date desc;

procedure get_hist_in_trx(a_cv        in out  t_cv
  select  10                                                                             hst_trx_type
    from  mtx_in_trx  i
    where i.trx_status  = a_in_status
    select 11
    from  mtx_trx_pymt  b
    where b.trx_brn       = a_trx_brn
    select a.IN_AMND_TYPE
    from  mtx_in_amnd  a
    where a.brn_no      = a_trx_brn
    select 12
    from  mtx_out_snd     s
    where s.brn_no      = a_trx_brn

CREATE OR REPLACE Package OnAccPk is
Procedure post_acct_trsfr(a_brn      number
Function post_cust_drw_dpst(a_yr      number
CREATE OR REPLACE Package Body OnAccPk is
Function post_cust_drw_dpst(a_yr      number
    Begin
      select LAST_LANG
        from s_trmnls
       where TRMNL_NAME= userenv('terminal');
    Exception
    End;
        Begin
              select r.PYMT_STATUS
                from MTX_RECEIPT_PYMT r
               where r.PYMT_YR   = a_yr
                 for update of r.PYMT_STATUS
        Exception
        End;
     begin
           select CHK_PUR_BRN
          from mtx_stp_accts
         where brn_no = a_brn;
     exception
     end;
  begin
      select decode(c_lang,1,curr_ades,curr_edes) curr_desc
        from gen_curr
       where curr_no = v_curr;
  exception
   begin
      select decode(c_lang,1,curr_ades,curr_edes) curr_desc
        from gen_curr
       where curr_no = v_othr_curr;
  exception
                 begin
           select decode(v_lang,1,BNK_ADES,nvl(BNK_EDES,BNK_ADES))
                              from mtx_banks
                             where bnk_no = v_bnk_no;
                 Exception
                 end;
             -- select the cust_acct_name
             begin
             select CUST_ANAME
               from mtx_customers
              where ACCT_NO = v_cust_acct
             Exception
                 end;
                 begin
                            select decode(v_lang,1,BNK_ADES,nvl(BNK_EDES,BNK_ADES))
                              from mtx_banks
                             where bnk_no = v_bnk_no;
                 Exception
                 end;
                 begin
                            select decode(v_lang,1,BNK_ADES,nvl(BNK_EDES,BNK_ADES))
                              from mtx_banks
                             where bnk_no = v_bnk_no;
                 Exception
                 end;
  -- draw or deposit from another branch (not cust branch)
  if v_cr_brn <> v_db_brn  -- the customer draw or deposite from another branch
  -- update posting flag
    Begin
          update MTX_RECEIPT_PYMT
           where PYMT_YR = a_yr
        Exception
        End;
  -- update treaser balance only
Procedure post_acct_trsfr(a_brn      number
    Begin
     select  c.FRM_ACCT_Curr
           from  MTX_ACCTS_TRNSFR  c
          where  c.BRN_NO    = a_brn
              for  update of c.TRNS_STATUS;
    exception
    End;
         Begin
              select s.CURR_DIFF_ACCT_BRN
         from mtx_stp_accts  s
        where brn_no =  a_brn
         Exception
         End;
    select  CURR_ADES
       from gen_curr
       where curr_no= v_to_curr;
exception
    select  CURR_ADES
       from gen_curr
       where curr_no= v_frm_curr;
exception
  -- draw or deposit from another branch (not cust branch)
  if v_frm_brn <> v_to_brn  -- the customer draw or deposite from another branch
      -- update transaction table
         Begin
              update MTX_ACCTS_TRNSFR c
              where c.BRN_NO      = a_brn
         exception
 package finished successfully.....

Procedure send_out_rcpt_to_rviw(a_mtt_brn     number
procedure set_outrem_secure_no(a_out_brn  
procedure adjust_curr_exch_nd_lamts(a_mtt_brn
CREATE OR REPLACE Package Body Multi_Rcpt_Pymt_Pk is
procedure set_outrem_secure_no(a_out_brn              number
  Begin
          update MTX_OUT_TRX o
           where o.trx_status       = a_out_status
    Exception
    End;
procedure adjust_curr_exch_nd_lamts(a_mtt_brn        number
    for mttrec in (select d.MTT_DTL_SER                                                        DTL_SER
                                     from  MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX_dtl d
                                    where  d.BRN_NO   = a_mtt_brn
                                        order  by  decode(d.AMT_FLAG
                        v_remn_fee_lamt := v_remn_fee_lamt + v_remn_trx_lamt;    -- ded. it from fee_rmn_lamt
        -- update record
    begin
                update MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX_DTL d
                 where d.BRN_NO               = a_mtt_brn
        exception
        end;
        -- update record
        begin
                update MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX_DTL d
                 where d.BRN_NO               = a_mtt_brn
        exception
        end;
        -- update record
        begin
                update MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX_DTL d
                 where d.BRN_NO               = a_mtt_brn
        exception
        end;
Function  post_multi_out_rcpt(a_mtt_brn              number
    Begin
       select m.BRN_NO
        from  MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX     m
       where m.BRN_NO   = a_mtt_brn
        exception
        End;
  -- get receipt currency to use in case the remittance from cust acct or 3thd party
  begin
      select mtt_curr
        from MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX_DTL
       where brn_no = v_brn_no
  exception
        Begin
              select o.TRX_STATUS
                from mtx_out_trx o
               where o.trx_status in (1,2,3)
        exception
        End;
        Begin
            select s.CSH_OUT_BRN
           from  mtx_stp_accts s
            where  s.brn_no = a_mtt_brn
        exception
        End;
            Begin
                  select d.ACCT_NO
                    from mtx_v_dealers d
                   where d.dlr_cat = v_agent_type
            exception
            End;
                    Begin
                          select d.ACCT_NO
                            from mtx_v_dealers_brn d
                           where d.dlr_cat         = v_agent_type
                    exception
                    End;
    for rec in (select sum(nvl(d.MTT_AMT,0))                     mtt_amt
                            from  MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX_dtl d
                           where  d.BRN_NO   = a_mtt_brn
                             group by MTT_MTHD
                                              Begin
                                                    select ACCT_BRN_NO
                                                     from  MTX_BANK_BRN  b
                                                    where  b.BNK_NO    = rec.bnk_no
                                                exception
                                                End;
                                            Begin
                                                select ACCT_BRN_NO
                                                 from  MTX_BANKS b
                                                where b.BNK_NO    = rec.bnk_no;
                                            exception
                                            End;
                if rec.rcpt_mthd = 4 -- from customer trust
                 Begin
                       select  s.DB_CONNECT
                         from mtx_stp_accts s
                        where s.brn_no = v_agent_brn
                 Exception
                 End;
                        begin
                                select  acct_brn_no
                                  from  mtx_stp_accts
                               where brn_no = c_main_brn
                        exception
                        end;
      -- update outward status
      Begin
              update MTX_OUT_TRX o
               where o.trx_status in (1,2,3)
        Exception
        End;
      -- update payment status
      Begin
              update MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX m
               where m.BRN_NO       = a_mtt_brn
        Exception
        End;
                     Begin
                        select b.ACCT_NO
                          from mtx_out_bnf b
                               where b.BRN_NO   = v_out_brn
                     Exception
                     end;
Procedure send_out_rcpt_to_rviw(a_mtt_brn     number
    Begin
          update MTX_OUT_TRX o
           where o.trx_status in (1,2)
        Exception
        End;
  -- update payment status
    Begin
          update MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX m
           where m.BRN_NO       = a_mtt_brn
        Exception
        End;
 package finished successfully.....

                       end;

                      where p.s_userid = v_to_user;

                       Exception
                       end;

                          ( select v_to_user    --    S_USERID
                                        from mtx_user_prvs pf
                                     where pf.s_userid = a_frm_usr
                       begin

                              and exists (select 1
                                                          from mtx_user_prvs pf
                                                       where pf.s_userid = a_frm_usr
                           Exception
                           end;

                              ( select v_to_user    --    S_USERID

function  f_get_lcntry(a_brn number) return number is
    Begin
         Select CNTRY_NO
           from s_brn
          where brn_no = a_brn;
    Exception
           select c.CNTRY_NO
             from s_compny c
            where rownum <= 1;
    end;
function  f_get_str(a_sys  varchar2
    Begin
      select LAST_LANG
        from s_trmnls
       where TRMNL_NAME=userenv('terminal');
    Exception
    End;
    Begin
        select  decode(v_lang,
          from s_msgs
         where MSG_CODE = v_sys
    Exception
    End;
procedure p_rebld_fee_func(a_mtx_trx number) is
  begin
        select trx_amt
          from mtx_fees_fld f
         where mtx_trx = a_mtx_trx;
  exception
'            create or replace procedure p_get_trx_fee_out(a_mtx_trx number'||v_nl||
            'begin
                        select f.fee_curr_no
                        from     mtx_v_user_fees f
                     where  f.trx_typ = 1 '||v_nl||where_cond ||' ;'||v_nl||
      'Exception
     --  End;
            'create or replace procedure p_get_trx_fee_chko(a_mtx_trx number ' ||v_nl||
            'Begin
        select f.fee_curr_no
                          from mtx_v_user_fees f
                         where f.trx_typ = 2 '||v_nl||where_cond ||' ;'||v_nl||
      'Exception
   --    End;
            'create or replace procedure p_get_trx_fee_in(a_mtx_trx number ' ||v_nl||
            'begin

                        from mtx_v_user_fees f
                     where f.trx_typ = 3 '||v_nl||where_cond ||' ;'||v_nl||
      'Exception
    --   End;
   -- this is new procedure for read inrem from file
            'create or replace procedure p_get_trx_fee_in_file(a_mtx_trx number ' ||v_nl||
            'begin
                 select f.fee_curr_no
                        from mtx_v_user_fees f
                     where f.trx_typ = 3 '||v_nl||where_cond ||' ;'||v_nl||
      'Exception
    --   End;
            'create or replace procedure p_get_trx_fee_chkp(a_mtx_trx number  '  ||v_nl||
            'Begin
                    select f.fee_curr_no
                    from mtx_v_user_fees f
                 where f.trx_typ = 4 '||v_nl||where_cond ||' ;'||v_nl||
      'Exception
       End;';

  select exch_dflt_lmt
        from mtx_ctrl;

Function f_get_agnt_brn_acct(a_brn       number
     select agnts_accts_lvl
    from mtx_stp_accts
   where brn_no = a_brn ;
                begin
                        select acct_brn_no
                          from mtx_agents
                         where agt_no = a_agnt_no;
                exception
                begin
                        select acct_brn_no
                          from mtx_agent_brns
                         where agt_no      = a_agnt_no
                exception
Exception
Function f_get_bnk_brn_acct(a_brn number
       select bnks_accts_lvl
         from mtx_stp_accts
        where brn_no = a_brn         ;
                    begin
                            select ACCT_BRN_NO
                              from mtx_banks
                             where bnk_no = a_bnk_no    ;
                    exception
                    begin
                            select acct_brn_no
                              from mtx_bank_brn
                             where bnk_no      = a_bnk_no
                    exception
Exception

        from mtx_stp_accts
       where brn_no = a_brn ;
            begin
                    select acct_brn_no    ,acct_no
                    from mtx_customers
            exception
exception

function f_get_dbref_text(a_ref_no number
        v_fld_select  varchar2(4000) :='';
   for rec in (select FLD_SER
                 from MTX_REF_DTL
                Where REF_NO = A_REF_NO order by REF_DTL_ORDER) loop
              Begin
                      SELECT FLD_SELECT
                        FROM mtx_ref_flds
                       WHERE FLD_SER = rec.FLD_SER;
              Exception
              End;
              Begin
                      v_fld_select := v_fld_select || ' where ' || nvl(v_whr,' 1=1 ');
                      v_fld_select := v_fld_select || '  and '  || nvl(v_whr,' 1=1 ');
                       execute immediate v_fld_select into  v_fld_txt  ;
              Exception
                   raise_application_error(-20001,'Can''t perform sql select: '||v_fld_select ||' : '||sqlerrm);
              End;
Function f_get_dbref_sending_text(a_ref_no      number
        v_fld_select varchar2(4000) :='';
   for rec in (select FLD_SER
                 from MTX_REF_DTL
                Where REF_NO = A_REF_NO order by REF_DTL_ORDER) loop
              Begin
                      select FLD_SELECT
                        from mtx_ref_flds
                       where FLD_SER = rec.FLD_SER;
              Exception
              End;
              Begin
                      v_fld_select := v_fld_select || ' where ' || nvl(v_whr,' 1=1 ');
                      v_fld_select := v_fld_select || '  and '  || nvl(v_whr,' 1=1 ');
                       execute immediate v_fld_select into  v_fld_txt  ;
              Exception
                   --raise_application_error(-20001,'Can''t perform sql select: '||v_fld_select );--||' : '||sqlerrm);
              End;
   exception
function f_get_jv_note_ref(a_jv_type   number

        from MTX_JV_TYPS
     where JV_TYP_NO = a_jv_type;
Exception

            from s_program p
         where p.S_active = 1           -- activated screens
           and not exists ( select 1
                                                 from s_userrole r
                                                where r.s_syscd    = p.s_syscd

FUNCTION  UPGRADE_ACC(ACC IN VARCHAR2
          BEGIN
             Begin
                 SELECT a_parent
                   FROM ACCOUNT
                   WHERE a_code = par;
              Exception
               End;
           begin
            SELECT nvl(sum(nvl(curr_bal,0)),0)
              FROM account_curr
             WHERE a_code = par;
           Exception
               End;
            begin
            INSERT INTO detail_journal
              Exception
               End;
         END;

       select  * from amd5.mtx_jvs_t where jv_ser between a_greater_than and a_less_than ;
       select  BRN_NO, FIN_YR, JV_SER, DTL_SER, ACCT_BRN_NO, ACCT_NO, d.CURR_NO,
          From amd5.mtx_jv_dtls_t d
            Where d.Brn_No = BRNNO
   Begin
       Select Cur_Code
         From Ex_Rate
          Where L_F=1;
   Exception
   End;
    --(1) Insert Into Master_Journal
     Begin
        Insert Into Master_Journal(JV_TYPE, DOC_NO, DOC_TYPE, J_DATE, J_POSTED,
      Exception
                begin
           SELECT NVL(curr_bal,0)
             FROM account_curr

         Exception
             insert into account_curr

         Exception

     where s.brn_no = a_brn

  begin
            select s.ACCT_NO
            from mtx_stp_accts s
             where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
  Exception
  end;
  -- update remittance record
            begin
              update mtx_out_trx o
               where o.trx_status = 4                         -- approved
            exception
            end;
            begin
              update mtx_in_trx i
               where i.trx_status = 2                            -- not paid
            exception
            end;

   where ' || v_status_whr || '

   where ' || v_status_whr || '

    from  mtx_out_trx' || v_dblink || '  o
   where ' || v_status_whr || '
  select b.*
    from mtx_out_bnf' || v_dblink || '  b
   where b.brn_no  = :a_out_brn

             Exception
             End;
                        begin

             from mtx_v_dealers_brn d

                from mtx_in_mst_amts a

Function in_test_no_exst(a_agt_no     number
  cursor v_ic is select upper(m.in_test_no)
                                   from mtx_in_mst m
                                  where m.agent_type  = a_agt_cat
Procedure adjust_in_rems
     for amtrec in (select a.CURR_NO
                                     from    mtx_in_mst_amts a
                                    where a.BRN_NO  = a_brn
          update mtx_in_trx i
           where i.trx_status = 1                -- just new!
procedure adjust_mst_amts_tbl(a_brn         number
                 update mtx_in_mst_amts  a
                      where    a.brn_no  = a_brn
procedure adjust_mst_amts_entrd(a_brn     number
      for rec  in ( select sum(nvl(i.trx_amt,0))  curr_amt_sum
                     from  mtx_in_trx i
                    where i.trx_status = 1
                    group by i.trx_curr_no
         update mtx_in_mst_amts  a
              where    a.brn_no  = a_brn
procedure adjust_data(a_brn_no               number
       update mtx_in_trx i
            where i.trx_status      = 1                                -- just new!
Function get_max_auto_aprv_amt return number is
    select c.IN_APR_DFLT_LMT
      from mtx_ctrl c
     where rownum <= 1;
Exception
Function is_lst_amts_consistent(a_brn  number
  for rec in (select sum(nvl(a.CURR_AMT,0))   curr_amt
                            from MTX_IN_MST_AMTS a
                           where a.BRN_NO  = a_brn
                             group by a.curr_no )
        Begin
                select sum(nvl(i.TRX_AMT,0))
                from MTX_IN_TRX i
               where i.trx_status  = 1             -- still new
        exception
        end;
    select count(0)
    from MTX_IN_TRX i
   where i.trx_status  = 1             -- still new
Procedure close_list_against_edit(a_brn    number
    -- update the whole inward list status
    Begin
          update MTX_IN_MST i
             where i.in_list_status = 1
        Exception
        End;
        begin
          select max(i.in_rem_no)
            from mtx_in_trx i
             where i.trx_status   = 1
                 group by   i.frm_agent_type
        Exception
        End;
    -- update the agent last
Procedure open_list_against_edit(a_brn    number
    -- update the whole inward list status
    Begin
          update MTX_IN_MST i
             where i.in_list_status = 1
        Exception
        End;
procedure set_last_inrem_nums(a_agnt_type       number
    -- update the agent last
        Begin
                      update mtx_stp_accts s
                         where s.BRN_NO          = a_agnt_brn
                   update mtx_agents a
                         where a.agt_no          = a_agnt_no
            Exception
            End;
Function set_in_list_completed(a_brn           number
    begin
        select m.in_list_status
          From mtx_in_mst m
         where m.BRN_NO             = a_brn
             for update of  m.BRN_NO
    exception
    end;
        Begin
            select IN_REM_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_brn;
        exception
        End;
    begin
        select nvl(IN_APR_DFLT_LMT,0)
         from mtx_ctrl
         where rownum <=1;
    exception
    end;
        Begin
              select d.ACCT_NO
                from mtx_v_dealers d
               where d.dlr_cat = a_agnt_type
        Exception
        End;
        Begin
              select d.a_cost_center
                from mtx_agents d
               where d.agt_no  = a_agnt_no;
        Exception
        End;
            Begin
                  select d.ACCT_NO
                    from mtx_v_dealers_brn d
                   where d.dlr_cat         = a_agnt_type
            exception
            End;
  for rec in (select i.BRN_NO
                            From  mtx_in_trx i
                         where i.trx_status         = 1
                             for  update of  i.TRX_STATUS
                       -- for fee ded from amount
                       elsif rec.in_fee_ded_flag = 1 -- deduct from amount
                                  begin
                                            select decode(rec.fast_flag,1,IN_QUICK_ACCT_BRN,IN_REM_BRN)
                                             from  mtx_stp_accts
                                            where  brn_no = rec.pass_to_brn
                                        exception
                                    end;
            if rec.in_fee_ded_flag = 1 and  -- fees deducted from inward amount // .
               elsif rec.in_fee_ded_flag = 1 and  -- fees deducted from inward amount.
                        Begin
                              update MTX_IN_TRX i
                                 where i.trx_status = 1
                            Exception
                            End;
                   begin
                           update MTX_IN_TRX i
                            where i.trx_status = 1
                            Exception
                            End;
-- create fee vouchers for th fee which ded from amount
                begin
                      select s.acct_brn_no
                   from mtx_stp_accts s
                  where s.brn_no = c_main_brn
                exception
                end;
      for rec in (select count(0)                              tot_inrem_cnt
                                From  mtx_in_trx     i
                             where i.trx_status         = 1
                 group by i.TRX_CURR_NO
      for rcvrec in (select count(0)                              tot_rcv_fee_cnt
                                From  mtx_in_trx     i
                             where i.trx_status         = 1
                 group by i.RCV_FEE_CURR_NO
  -- update all inwards transfers status:
         Begin
          update MTX_IN_TRX i
             where i.trx_status     = 1
        Exception
        End;
    -- update the whole inward list status
        Begin
              update MTX_IN_MST i
                 where i.in_list_status = 1
            Exception
            End;
    -- update the agent last
Procedure post_in_pymt(a_brn          number
    Begin
       select r.PAY_CURR_NO
        from  MTX_TRX_PYMT  r
       where  r.PYMT_YR   = a_yr
             for update of  r.PYMT_STATUS
        exception
        End;
        Begin
            select acct_brn_no
             from  mtx_stp_accts s
            where s.brn_no = a_brn
        exception
        End;
  if v_fee_ded_flag     = 1 and -- deducted from in. rem. amount
             begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_cust_acct_brn
                        exception
                        End;
             begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_cust_acct_brn
                        exception
                End;
                   begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_orgnl_rcvr_brn
                        exception
                        End;
                          Begin
                                select  decode(v_lang,1,BNK_ADES,BNK_EDES) BNK_ADES
                                 from  MTX_BANKS     r                                      
                                where  r.BNK_NO    = v_bnk_no;                          
                            exception
                            End;
             begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_bnk_acct_brn
                        exception
                        End;
             begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_bnk_acct_brn
                        exception
                        End;
                   begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_orgnl_rcvr_brn
                        exception
                        End;
                          Begin
                                select ACCT_BRN_NO
                                 from  MTX_BANK_BRN  b
                                where  b.BNK_NO    = v_bnk_no
                            exception
                            End;
                        Begin
                            select ACCT_BRN_NO
                             from  MTX_BANKS b
                            where b.BNK_NO    = v_bnk_no;
                        exception
                    End;
                          Begin
                                select ACCT_BRN_NO
                                 from  MTX_BANK_BRN  b
                                where  b.BNK_NO    = v_cust_bnk_no
                            exception
                            End;
                        Begin
                            select ACCT_BRN_NO
                             from  MTX_BANKS b
                            where b.BNK_NO    = v_cust_bnk_no;
                        exception
                        End;
      elsif v_pymt_mthd  = 1 or -- cash payment from treaser
     /* if v_fee_ded_flag = 1      -- deducted from in. rem. amoun
    -- begin to add the new benefit to inremittance customers
     begin
            select nvl(CUST_PYMT_SER,1)
              from mtx_ctrl;
     exception
     end;
      -- update inward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.trx_status = 4            -- not paid
                Exception
                End;
            Begin
                          update MTX_IN_TRX' || v_rcv_brn_dblink || ' i
                           where i.trx_status = 2                                    -- ready for payment
                Exception
                End;
      -- update payment status
        Begin
              update MTX_TRX_PYMT r
               where  PYMT_YR  = a_yr
            Exception
            End;
procedure get_inlist_rem_nums(a_in_brn                             number
     open v_rc for ' select  i.in_rem_no    in_rem_no
                                          from mtx_in_trx i
                                         where i.trx_status = 1          -- new
                                          group by i.in_rem_no '
Exception
function get_trsr_pymt_ser (  a_pymt_yr   number
   begin
             select nvl(TRSR_PYMT_SER,0)+1
               from mtx_trsrs
              where brn_no       = a_pymt_brn
           exception
   end;
  update mtx_trsrs set TRSR_PYMT_SER = nvl(v_trsr_pymt_ser,1)
                where brn_no       = a_pymt_brn
--  exception
function get_cust_pymt_ser return number is
   begin
      select nvl(CUST_PYMT_SER,0)+1
        from mtx_ctrl
       where rownum<=1;
   exception
           execute immediate 'alter table mtx_ctrl add (CUST_PYMT_SER number(1))';
   end;
     update mtx_ctrl set CUST_PYMT_SER= nvl(v_cust_pymt_ser,0);
    end;

CREATE OR REPLACE Package in_amnd_pk is
        Procedure lock_amnd_records(a_in_brn    number
         Function post_in_rem_amnd(a_in_brn                 number
        Procedure delete_not_postd_amnd(a_brn           number
        procedure upd_web(a_amnd_type   number
CREATE OR REPLACE Package Body in_amnd_pk is
    Procedure lock_amnd_records(a_in_brn     number
  Begin
     select 1
       from mtx_in_trx i
      where i.trx_status = a_in_status
          for update of  i.brn_no
  exception
  end;
  Begin
     select 1
       from MTX_IN_BNF_CONDS i
     where i.BRN_NO    =  a_in_brn
  exception
  end;
procedure try_crt_intrbrn_rvrs_vchr(a_old_rcv_brn number
 Begin
       select s.DB_CONNECT
         from mtx_stp_accts s
        where s.brn_no = a_old_rcv_brn
 Exception
        begin
              select s.acct_brn_no
           from mtx_stp_accts s
          where s.brn_no = c_main_brn
        exception
        end;
procedure try_crt_intrbrn_rsnd_vchr(a_new_rcv_brn number
 Begin
       select s.DB_CONNECT
         from mtx_stp_accts s
        where s.brn_no = a_new_rcv_brn
 Exception
        begin
              select s.acct_brn_no
           from mtx_stp_accts s
          where s.brn_no = c_main_brn
        exception
        end;
Function post_in_rem_amnd(a_in_brn                 number
        Begin
            select IN_REM_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_in_brn ;
        exception
        End;
      begin
                 select d.ACCT_NO
                  from  mtx_v_dealers_brn d
                  where  d.DLR_NO    = a_agnt_no
      exception
        End;
               begin
                    select d.a_cost_center
                    from  mtx_agents  d
                    where  d.agt_NO    = a_agnt_no;
                 exception
                 End;
                Begin
                  from  mtx_stp_accts
                  where  brn_no = a_in_brn;
                   exception
                  End;
    for rec in ( select     a.pass_to_type
                From mtx_in_amnd a
                where    a.brn_no     = a_in_brn
                for update )  -- new or aproved
           begin
                select  s.acct_brn_no
              from   mtx_stp_accts s
             where   s.brn_no = v_inrem_rec.pass_to_brn
            exception
           end;
                       begin
   select  s.acct_brn_no
                          from   mtx_stp_accts s
                         where   s.brn_no = rec.new_pass_to_brn
                        exception
                        end;
             -- begin create jv creteria for inrem acct
                         if v_inrem_rec.rem_fee_ded_flag = 1                     -- fee was deducted from in . rem amt
                             v_inrem_rec.rem_fee_ded_flag = 1   -- fees deducted from in. rem amt.
                                  v_inrem_rec.rem_fee_ded_flag = 2 -- deducted from agent
                               -- from cash payment to on account
                                 if v_inrem_rec.rem_fee_ded_flag = 1 -- fees deducted from in. rem. amount
                                Begin
                                     select d.ACCT_NO
                                      from  mtx_v_dealers_brn d
                                      where  d.DLR_CAT   = rec.pass_to_type
                                exception
                                End;
                                 -- if fee ded from amt reduce the rem amount
                                         rec.FEE_DED_FLAG = 1      -- recieve fee return (ded from agent acct)
                                    Begin
                                          update MTX_IN_TRX  i
                                             where i.brn_no    = a_in_brn
                                    Exception
                                         End;
                          --update remittance record status
                            Begin
                                  update MTX_IN_TRX  i
                                     where i.trx_status = a_in_trx_status
                            Exception
                                 End;
                          --update remittance record status
                            Begin
                                  update MTX_IN_TRX i
                                     where i.trx_status = a_in_trx_status
                            Exception
                                 End;
                                --update amendment requisetion
                                    Begin
                                      update MTX_IN_amnd_rqst i
                                          where    i.req_ser  = nvl(a_req_ser,i.req_ser)
                                    End;
                          --update remittance record status
                            Begin
                                  update MTX_IN_TRX i
                                     where i.trx_status = a_in_trx_status
                            Exception
                                 End;
                          --update send status to cancelled
                            Begin
                                  update MTX_OUT_SND S
                                     where S.trx_brn   = a_in_brn
                            Exception
                                 End;
                             -- in case the amend fee ded from amt
                                    begin
                                        update mtx_in_trx i set i.AMND_FEE_AMT  = rec.amnd_fee
                                        where i.brn_no  = a_in_brn
                                    exception
                                    end;
                            begin
                            exception
                        end;
                             -- update inrem.
                           Begin
                                  update MTX_IN_TRX  i
                                     where i.trx_status= 2
                            Exception
                                 End;
      --update amendment
        Begin
              update mtx_in_amnd  m
                  where    m.brn_no     = a_in_brn
            Exception
             End;
        --update amendment requisetion
            Begin
              update MTX_IN_amnd_rqst i
                  where    i.req_ser  = a_req_ser
            End;
     Begin
          select  INREM_SECURE_NO into v_out_sec from mtx_in_trx i
                                              where  i.brn_no   = a_in_brn
      exception when  others Then
     End;
Procedure delete_not_postd_amnd(a_brn           number
    begin
       where a.brn_no = a_brn
    exception
    end;
 procedure upd_web(a_amnd_type number
   begin
          begin
             select TO_CHAR     (SYSDATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') INTO CANDATE from dual;
          Begin
                   begin
                             select PASS_TO_SIDE,PASS_TO_TYPE ,
                                       from mtx_in_amnd m where m.AMND_SER=a_AMND_SER
                                                 begin
                                                                      begin
                                                                       update web_in_out_trx@mysql2oracle o
                                                                         where o.OUTREM_SECURE_NO  =a_out_sec
                                                                          Exception
                                                                   End;
                                                                       begin
                                                                        Exception
                                                                     End;
                                                                       begin
                                                                       update web_in_out_trx@mysql2oracle o
                                                                         where o.OUTREM_SECURE_NO  =a_out_sec
                                                                          Exception
                                                                   End;
                                                                     begin
                                                                         delete  from web_in_out_trx@mysql2oracle where OUTREM_SECURE_NO=a_out_sec ;
                                                                         update MTX_in_TRX i
                                                                         where i.INREM_SECURE_NO  =a_out_sec
                                                                       Exception
                                                                         raise_application_error(-20001,'Error While delete outward remittance record from web : '||chr(10)|| sqlerrm);
                                                                     End;
                                                     end;
                                                      update web_in_OUT_TRX@mysql2oracle w
                                                      where w.trx_status = 4            -- not CANCEL
                                                    begin
                                                       select bnf_name into v_ben_new from mtx_in_trx where INREM_SECURE_NO=a_out_sec;
                                                       update web_in_OUT_TRX@mysql2oracle w
                                                        where w.trx_status = 4            -- not CANCEL
                                                     end;
                                  Exception
                                   End;
 package finished successfully.....
 package
 package.....
CREATE OR REPLACE package gldpk as
         Function  eval_str(a_str varchar2) return number;
        function     get_curr_name(a_curr_no number) return varchar2;
        function     get_curr_shrt(a_curr_no number) return varchar2;
        function     f_get_lcurr return  number ;
        function     f_get_user_findate(a_userid varchar2) return  date;
    Function  get_jv_type_shift_value return number;
        Procedure p_crt_jv_hdr( a_brn      number
        Procedure p_crt_jv_dtl(brn         number
        Function post_trsr_trx(a_yr      integer
        Function post_rcpt_pymt(a_yr      integer
        Procedure chk_acct(v_brn_no  number
        Procedure chk_acct ( v_brn_no      number,
        Function acct_exist(v_brn_no  number
        Function get_curr_vs_curr_mthd(a_curr_no    number
    Function get_lcurr_decimal(a_curr_no integer default f_get_lcurr ) return integer;
    Function get_curr_decimal(a_curr_no integer ) return integer;
    Function get_curr_exch_decimal(a_curr_no integer ) return integer;
    Function get_max_xch_diff_pcnt return number;
        Procedure set_cust_chk_to_usd(a_cust_ser number
    Function get_purch_trx_exch_rate(a_curr number
    Function get_sale_trx_exch_rate(a_curr number
        Function get_amt_n_othr_curr(a_frm_amt   number
     Function get_purch_xch_exch_rate(a_curr number
     Function get_sale_xch_exch_rate(a_curr number
        Function exch_rate_is_allwd(a_frm_curr  number
        Procedure get_exch_rate_limits(a_frm_curr  number
Procedure get_CSH_exch_rate_limits(a_frm_curr  number
Procedure get_to_lcurr_exch_limits(a_frm_curr  number
Procedure get_to_lcurr_csh_exch_limits(a_frm_curr  number
   Function get_bnk_acct (a_brn_no number
  function get_seq_conc_val(a_seq_conc varchar2) return number;
  procedure get_trx_xch_stp ( a_trx_type varchar2
 procedure get_brn_acct ( a_brn_no  in out number
  function get_news_exch_rate (a_curr_no number) return number ;
CREATE OR REPLACE package body gldpk  as
Function eval_str(a_str varchar2) return number is
      execute immediate ' select ' || a_str || ' from dual '
Exception
Function get_jv_type_shift_value return number is
Procedure chk_acct(v_brn_no  number
    select 1
      from MTX_ACCT_CURR
     where BRN_NO  = v_brn_no
exception
Function acct_exist(v_brn_no  number
        select 1
          from mtx_acct_curr c
         where c.brn_no  = v_brn_no
    exception
Procedure chk_acct ( v_brn_no      number,
   SELECT 1
     FROM mtx_v_acct_curr
    WHERE brn_no = v_brn_no
EXCEPTION
         BEGIN
            SELECT 1
              FROM mtx_v_acct_curr
             WHERE brn_no = v_brn_no
         exception
         END;
Function f_get_lcurr return  number is
     select c.CURR_NO
       from gen_cntry c,
      where c.CNTRY_NO = p.CNTRY_NO
Exception
Function     f_get_user_findate(a_userid varchar2)  return  date  is
        Begin
        select findate
          from mtx_v_user_date
         where s_userid = a_userid ;
        Exception
        End;-- end get  user financial date functioin
        Begin
            select 1
              from s_vacc v
             where trunc(v.CLNDR_DATE) = trunc(v_findate);
        exception
        end;
        begin
                select v_findate + (min(trunc(v1.CLNDR_DATE) + 1) - trunc(v_findate) )
                  from s_vacc v1
                 where not exists (select 1
                                     from s_vacc v2
                                    where trunc(v1.CLNDR_DATE) + 1 = trunc(v2.CLNDR_DATE)
    exception
    end;
Procedure p_crt_jv_hdr( a_brn      number
    begin
          insert into mtx_jvs
                    Exception
                    end;
Procedure p_crt_jv_dtl(brn         number
        begin
                begin
                 select 1
                   from mtx_jvs d
                  where d.brn_no    = brn
                exception
                    end;
                  insert into
Function post_trsr_trx(a_yr      integer
        Begin
              select r.TRSR_TRX_STATUS
                from MTX_TRSR_TRX r
               where r.TRX_YR   = a_yr
        Exception
        End;
    Begin
          select TRSR_TRX_STATUS
            from MTX_TRSR_TRX
           where TRX_YR = a_yr
        Exception
        End;
        Begin
              select t.ACCT_NO
                from MTX_TRSR_TRX r
               where r.TRX_YR  = a_yr
        Exception
        End;
     begin
           select B_COST_CENTER
          from mtx_stp_accts
         where brn_no = a_brn;
     exception
     end;
     begin
           select B_COST_CENTER
          from mtx_stp_accts
         where brn_no = a_brn;
     exception
     end;
    for trxrec in ( select d.curr_no          v_curr
                                        from MTX_TRSR_TRX_DTL d
                                       where d.TRX_YR   = a_yr
      -- update posting flag
        Begin
              update MTX_TRSR_TRX
               where TRX_YR = a_yr
            Exception
            End;
Function post_rcpt_pymt(a_yr      integer
        Begin
              select r.PYMT_STATUS
                from MTX_RECEIPT_PYMT r
               where r.PYMT_YR   = a_yr
                 for update of r.PYMT_STATUS
        Exception
        End;
     begin
           select CHK_PUR_BRN
          from mtx_stp_accts
         where brn_no = a_brn;
     exception
     end;
  -- update posting flag
    Begin
          update MTX_RECEIPT_PYMT
           where PYMT_YR = a_yr
        Exception
        End;
  -- update treaser balance only
Procedure set_cust_chk_to_usd(a_cust_ser number
    Begin
         select c.BRN_NO
                 from MTX_CUST_CHKS c
              where c.cust_ser = a_cust_ser
    Exception
        End;
    Begin
            insert into MTX_USD_CUST_CHKS c
    Exception
    End;
Function get_lcurr_decimal(a_curr_no integer default f_get_lcurr ) return integer is
    select nvl(c.CURR_DEC,0)
      from gen_curr c
     where c.curr_no  = a_curr_no
exception
Function get_curr_decimal(a_curr_no integer) return integer is
    select nvl(c.CURR_DEC,2)
      from gen_curr c
     where c.curr_no  = a_curr_no
exception
function     get_curr_name(a_curr_no number) return varchar2 is
    select decode(prmpkg.get_lang,
      from gen_curr c
     where c.curr_no  = a_curr_no
exception
function     get_curr_shrt(a_curr_no number) return varchar2 is
    select c.curr_shrt
      from gen_curr c
     where c.curr_no  = a_curr_no
exception
Function get_max_xch_diff_pcnt return number is
    select nvl(c.MAX_PRFT_EXCH_PCNT,0)
      from mtx_ctrl c
     where rownum <= 1;
exception
Function get_curr_exch_decimal(a_curr_no integer ) return integer is
    select nvl(c.EXCH_CURR_DEC,8)
      from gen_curr c
     where c.curr_no  = a_curr_no
exception
Function get_curr_vs_curr_mthd(a_curr_no    number
    select nvl(m.EXCH_MTHD,'*')
      from MTX_CURR_VS_CURR_MTHD m
     where m.curr_no    = a_curr_no
exception
            Begin
                select decode(nvl(m.EXCH_MTHD,'*')
                  from MTX_CURR_VS_CURR_MTHD m
                 where m.curr_no    = a_vs_curr_no
            exception
                        Begin
                            select nvl(c.EXCH_MTHD,'*')
                              from gen_curr c
                             where c.curr_no = a_curr_no
                        exception
                        end;
            end;
Function get_purch_trx_exch_rate(a_curr       number
  v_EXP_division_by_zero exception;
   procedure chk_lo_hi_flag_vals is
   begin
        raise_application_error(-20001,' Wrong value for argument a_lo_hi_flag in calling "gldpk.get_purch_trx_exch_rate" function ');
   end;
  begin
      select decode(upper(a_lo_hi_flag),'LO',nvl(x.TRN_LPUR_EXCH,0)
        from mtx_v_user_exch x
       where x.curr_no  = a_curr
    Exception
    end;
Function get_sale_trx_exch_rate(a_curr number
  v_EXP_division_by_zero exception;
   procedure chk_lo_hi_flag_vals is
   begin
        raise_application_error(-20001,' Wrong value for argument a_lo_hi_flag in calling "gldpk.get_sale_trx_exch_rate" function ');
   end;
  begin
          select decode(upper(a_lo_hi_flag),'HI',nvl(x.TRN_HSAL_EXCH,0)
            from mtx_v_user_exch x
           where x.curr_no  = a_curr
    Exception
    end;
Function get_amt_n_othr_curr(a_frm_amt   number
Function get_purch_xch_exch_rate(a_curr       number
  v_EXP_division_by_zero exception;
   procedure chk_lo_hi_flag_vals is
   begin
        raise_application_error(-20001,' Wrong value for argument a_lo_hi_flag in calling "gldpk.get_purch_xch_exch_rate" function ');
   end;
  begin
          select decode(upper(a_lo_hi_flag),'LO',nvl(x.CSH_LPUR_EXCH,0)
            from mtx_v_user_exch x
           where x.curr_no  = a_curr
    Exception
    end;
Function get_sale_xch_exch_rate(a_curr number
  v_EXP_division_by_zero exception;
   procedure chk_lo_hi_flag_vals is
   begin
        raise_application_error(-20001,' Wrong value for argument a_lo_hi_flag in calling "gldpk.get_sale_xch_exch_rate" function ');
   end;
  begin
      select decode(upper(a_lo_hi_flag),'HI',nvl(x.CSH_HSAL_EXCH,0)
        from mtx_v_user_exch x
       where x.curr_no  = a_curr
    Exception
    end;
Procedure get_to_lcurr_exch_limits(a_frm_curr  number
                            Select  round(nvl(x.TRN_LPUR_EXCH,0),v_exch_dec)
                             from  MTX_V_USER_EXCH x
                             where x.S_USERID = prmpkg.get_userid
      begin
        exception
        end;
                        /*    Select  round(nvl(x.TRN_HSAL_EXCH,0),v_exch_dec)
                             from  MTX_V_USER_EXCH x
                             where x.S_USERID = prmpkg.get_userid
                raise_application_error(-20001,' Invalid value for argument "A_OPR" in calling (gldpk.get_to_lcurr_exch_limits) procedure. ' ||
                            Select  round(nvl(x.TRN_HPUR_EXCH,0),v_exch_dec)
                             from  MTX_V_USER_EXCH x
                             where x.S_USERID = prmpkg.get_userid
                            Select  round(nvl(x.TRN_LSAL_EXCH,0),v_exch_dec)
                             from  MTX_V_USER_EXCH x
                             where x.S_USERID = prmpkg.get_userid
                raise_application_error(-20001,' Invalid value for argument "A_OPR" in calling (gldpk.get_to_lcurr_exch_limits) procedure. ' ||
Exception
Procedure get_to_lcurr_CSH_exch_limits(a_frm_curr  number
                            Select  round(nvl(x.CSH_LPUR_EXCH,0),v_exch_dec)
                             from  MTX_V_USER_EXCH x
                             where x.S_USERID = prmpkg.get_userid
                            Select  round(nvl(x.CSH_HSAL_EXCH,0),v_exch_dec)
                             from  MTX_V_USER_EXCH x
                             where x.S_USERID = prmpkg.get_userid
                raise_application_error(-20001,' Invalid value for argument "A_OPR" in calling (gldpk.get_to_lcurr_exch_limits) procedure. ' ||
                            Select  round(nvl(x.CSH_HPUR_EXCH,0),v_exch_dec)
                             from  MTX_V_USER_EXCH x
                             where x.S_USERID = prmpkg.get_userid
                            Select  round(nvl(x.CSH_LSAL_EXCH,0),v_exch_dec)
                             from  MTX_V_USER_EXCH x
                             where x.S_USERID = prmpkg.get_userid
                raise_application_error(-20001,' Invalid value for argument "A_OPR" in calling (gldpk.get_to_lcurr_exch_limits) procedure. ' ||
Exception
Procedure get_exch_rate_limits(a_frm_curr  number
Procedure get_CSH_exch_rate_limits(a_frm_curr  number
Function exch_rate_is_allwd(a_frm_curr  number
                raise_application_error(-20001,' Invalid value for argument "A_OPR" in calling (gldpk.exch_rate_is_allwd) function. ' ||
                raise_application_error(-20001,' Invalid value for argument "A_OPR" in calling (gldpk.exch_rate_is_allwd) function. ' ||
Function get_bnk_acct (   a_brn_no number
    select acct_no
    from   mtx_bank_brn
    where  bnk_no     = a_bnk_no
exception
      raise_application_error(-20001,' Invalid Account code for the select bank'||chr(13)||'brn_no='||a_brn_no||' bnk_no='||a_bnk_no||sqlerrm);
      raise_application_error(-20001,' Invalid Account code for the select bank'||chr(13)||sqlerrm);
function get_seq_conc_val(a_seq_conc varchar2) return number is
    execute immediate 'select '|| a_seq_conc ||' from dual'
                      -- this procedure used to get the curr exch for exch trx type which depend on
procedure get_trx_xch_stp ( a_trx_type varchar2
 begin
    begin
      select  xch_type_price||'_L'||xch_type||'_exch'||'-(nvl('||decode(XCH_TYPE_PRICE,'CSH','csh_limit_below, 0) / 100 *'
        from mtx_trx_xch_stp
       where trx_type = a_trx_type
    exception
            raise_application_error(-20005,'plz be sure from currency exchange setup form ');
            raise_application_error(-20005,'plz be sure from currency exchange setup form ');
    end;
    begin
                                       select  '||v_lxch ||'
                                              from  mtx_v_user_exch
                                             where S_USERID =:c_user_id
       exception
    end;
    end;
-- this procedure use to get the branch account branch and branch account code
procedure get_brn_acct ( a_brn_no  in out number
   begin
                select  acct_brn_no
                  from mtx_stp_accts
                 where brn_no = a_brn_no
        exception
 function get_news_exch_rate (a_curr_no number) return number is
 begin
 select news_exch_per_brn
 from   mtx_ctrl
 where rownum<=1;
 exception when no_data_found then
 begin
 select news_exch_rate
   from mtx_curr_exch
   where curr_no = a_curr_no
 exception when no_data_found then
   --raise_application_error(-20001,'error when get news_exch_rate from mtx_curr_exch table');
 begin
 select CURR_NEWS_EXRATE
   from MTX_NEWS_EXCH_DTL N
   where n.curr_no = a_curr_no
 exception when no_data_found then
   --raise_application_error(-20001,'error when get news_exch_rate from mtx_curr_exch table');
 package finished successfully.....
