CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE fetch_util is
    procedure get_cust_trx(a_cv       in out t_cv
 procedure get_old_in_trx(a_cv             in out t_in_cv
procedure get_all_brns_in_trx(a_cv                in out    t_in_cv
    procedure get_updatable_in_trx(a_cv   in out  t_in_cv
    procedure get_all_in_trx(a_cv   in out  t_in_cv
        procedure get_unposted_in_lists( a_cv   in out  t_in_cv
        procedure get_unapproved_in_trx( a_cv   in out  t_in_cv
        procedure get_hist_in_trx(a_cv        in out  t_cv
procedure fetch_not_posted_IN_amnd(a_cv               in out  t_cv
procedure get_pymnt_vchr(a_cv in out t_cv
    procedure get_all_acct_trns( a_cv   in out  t_trns_cv
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY MTXYMN.fetch_util is
procedure get_cust_trx(a_cv       in out t_cv
 Select q.TRX_LAMT
 Select t.TRX_LAMT
    from  mtx_out_trx   t
 where  nvl(a_ocsh,1)= 1
  Select c.chk_LAMT
    from   mtx_out_chk   c
 where  nvl(a_ochk,1) = 1
   select  i.trx_lamt
     from  mtx_in_trx    i
    where nvl(a_inw,1)  = 1
   select  x.ex_lamt
     from  mtx_exch      m
    where nvl(a_exch,1) = 1
   select  c.pur_lamt
     from  mtx_chk_purch c
    where nvl(a_bnkchk,1) = 1
   select  t.tot_lamt
     from  mtx_tchk_pur_dtl  t
    where nvl(a_trvchk,1) = 1
 order  by q.trx_date desc;
procedure get_all_brns_in_trx(a_cv                in out    t_in_cv
  this procedure is to retrieve all in. rem.
  user logon branch (from both inw. and outw.tables)
             v_Out_Whr:= v_Out_Whr || ' and 1 = 2 ';  -- exclude sent from branches
              v_Out_Whr:= v_Out_Whr || ' and 1 = 2 ';  -- exclude sent from branches
  -- order by columns
  v_OrdrBy := ' order by ' || v_OrdrBy  || ' ' || nvl(a_OrdrDir,'') || ' ' ;
                  select  inlst_trx_lamt
            from (
                   select  i.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
                    from  mtx_in_trx' || v_dblink  || '  i
                            where i.trx_status   = 2                                                         -- ready for payment remittances (approved)
                            select  o.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
                                ,2                                                                                     inlst_agent_type                        -- of course: from branches
                                 from  mtx_out_trx' || v_dblink  || '      o
                                     where ' || v_out_status_whr || '
                                       select  inlst_trx_lamt
                                   from (
                                         select  i.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
                                                   from  mtx_in_trx            i
                                                           where i.trx_status   in (3,4)                                                     -- paid or cancelled
                                             select  o.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
                                                                           ,2                                                                                     inlst_agent_type                        -- of course: from branches
                                                               from  mtx_out_trx           o
                                                                         where ' || v_out_status_whr || '
                       select  inlst_trx_lamt
                   from (
                        select  i.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
                    from  mtx_in_trx' || v_dblink  || '  i
                            where i.trx_status   = 2                                                         -- ready for payment remittances (approved)
                            select  o.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
                                ,2                                                                                     inlst_agent_type                        -- of course: from branches
                                 from  mtx_out_trx' || v_dblink  || '      o
                                     where ' || v_out_status_whr || '
                                       select  inlst_trx_lamt
                                   from (
                                         select  i.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
                                                   from  mtx_in_trx            i
                                                           where i.trx_status   in (3,4)                                                     -- paid or cancelled
                                             select  o.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
                                                                           ,2                                                                                     inlst_agent_type                        -- of course: from branches
                                                               from  mtx_out_trx           o
                                                                         where ' || v_out_status_whr || '
    exception
procedure get_old_in_trx(a_cv             in out t_in_cv
  begin
       select MAX_IN_REM_AGE
         from MTX_CTRL;
    Exception
             v_Out_Whr:= v_Out_Whr || ' and 1 = 2 ';  -- exclude sent from branches
            v_Out_Whr:= v_Out_Whr || ' and 1 = 2 ';  -- exclude sent from branches
  v_OrdrBy := ' order by ' || v_OrdrBy || ' ' || nvl(a_OrdrDir,'') || ' ' ;
  select  inlst_trx_lamt
    from (
  select  i.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
    from  mtx_in_trx' || v_dblink || '  i
    where i.trx_status   in (1,2)                                  -- (new or approved) remittances
      select  o.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
          from  mtx_out_trx' || v_dblink || '            o
        where ' || v_out_status_whr || '          -- (approved) remittances, ready to be paid in any branch
procedure get_updatable_in_trx(a_cv   in out  t_in_cv
 v_OrdrBy := ' order by ' || v_OrdrBy || ' ' || nvl(a_OrdrDir,'') || ' ' ;
  select  i.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
    from  mtx_in_trx' || v_dblink || '  i
    where ' || v_status_whr || '
  select  i.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
    from  mtx_in_trx    i
    where ' || v_status_whr || '
procedure get_all_in_trx(a_cv   in out  t_in_cv
             v_Out_Whr:= v_Out_Whr || ' and 1 = 2 ';  -- exclude sent from branches
 v_OrdrBy := ' order by ' || v_OrdrBy || ' ' || nvl(a_OrdrDir,'') || ' ' ;
     select  inlst_trx_lamt
    from (
    select  i.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
    from  mtx_in_trx    i
    where ' || v_St_Whr || v_whr ||'
   select   o.trx_lamt                                                           inlst_trx_lamt
        from  mtx_out_trx'||v_dblink ||' o
      where '|| v_out_status_whr ||'
procedure get_unposted_in_lists( a_cv   in out  t_in_cv
 v_OrdrBy := ' order by ' || v_OrdrBy || ' ' || nvl(a_OrdrDir,'') || ' ' ;
  select  i.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
    from  mtx_in_trx        i
    where i.trx_status   = 1           -- in rem not posted
procedure get_unapproved_in_trx( a_cv   in out  t_in_cv
 v_OrdrBy := ' order by ' || v_OrdrBy || ' ' || nvl(a_OrdrDir,'') || ' ' ;
  select  i.trx_lamt                                                                  inlst_trx_lamt
    from  mtx_in_trx        i
    where i.trx_status   = 2 -- ready for payment
procedure get_hist_in_trx(a_cv        in out  t_cv
  select  10                                                                             hst_trx_type
    from  mtx_in_trx  i
    where i.trx_status  = a_in_status
    select 11
    from  mtx_trx_pymt  b
    where b.trx_brn       = a_trx_brn
    select a.IN_AMND_TYPE
    from  mtx_in_amnd  a
    where a.brn_no      = a_trx_brn
    select 12
    from  mtx_out_snd     s
    where s.brn_no      = a_trx_brn
procedure fetch_not_posted_IN_amnd(a_cv               in out  t_cv
    v_OrdrBy := ' order by ' || v_OrdrBy || ' ' || nvl(a_OrdrDir,'') || ' ' ;
                 select npalst_trx_brn
               from (    select o.BRN_NO                                                    npalst_trx_brn
                                 from  MTX_IN_AMND o
                                where  o.BRN_NO             = :a_issu_brn
procedure get_pymnt_vchr(a_cv in out t_cv
     -- order by creteria
             v_ordrby :=' order by '||a_ordrby||'  '|| a_ordrdir;
                select p.BRN_NO                                                         pymt_brn_no
               from   MTX_TRX_PYMT p
               where  p.brn_no   = :a_trx_brn
procedure get_all_acct_trns(     a_cv   in out  t_trns_cv
--   v_Whr:= ' where  1=1  ';
  v_OrdrBy := ' order by ' || v_OrdrBy || ' ' || nvl(a_OrdrDir,'') || ' ' ;
  select  o.trns_ser                                                                     trsr_trx_ser
    from  mtx_accts_trnsfr       o
          where 1=1'|| v_whr ||v_OrdrBy

procedure p_rebld_rem_doc_func;
procedure p_rebld_xch_doc_func;

Procedure p_del_trx_doc(a_trx_type  number

CREATE OR REPLACE Package body doc is
Procedure p_rebld_rem_doc_func  is
        ' create or replace function f_get_rem_doc('    ||
                                            'Begin '                                                                                    ||chr(10)||
                         ' Select s.DOC_GRP_NO
                             From MTX_RQRD_DOC_STP s '|| chr(10) ;
                        '                               Where  s.MTX_TRX = 1 '|| chr(10) ||'                               ';
     Select f.TRX_AMT
    From MTX_RQRD_DOC_FLD f
   where MTX_TRX = 1; -- Outward transactions
Exception
             Begin
                     select sum(nvl(o.TRX_LAMT,0))
                       from MTX_V_OUT_TRX o
                      where o.CUST_SER =  a_cust;
              Exception
              End;
             Begin
                     select sum(nvl(o.TRX_LAMT,0))
                       ( select i.TRX_LAMT , rownum rec_ser
                               from MTX_V_OUT_TRX i
                              where i.CUST_SER = a_cust
                              order by i.trx_date desc) o
                      where o.rec_ser <= v_trx_cnt;
              Exception
              End;
             Begin
                         select sum(nvl(o.TRX_LAMT,0))
                           from MTX_V_OUT_TRX o
                          where o.CUST_SER = a_cust
              Exception
              End;
End; ';
End; ';
  -- regenerating function
    Begin
    Exception
    End;
Procedure p_rebld_xch_doc_func  is
        ' create or replace function f_get_xch_doc('    ||
                                           'Begin '                                                                        ||chr(10)||
                         ' Select s.DOC_GRP_NO
                             From MTX_RQRD_DOC_STP s '|| chr(10) ;
                        '                               Where  s.MTX_TRX = 2 '|| chr(10) ||'                               ';
     Select f.TRX_AMT
    From MTX_RQRD_DOC_FLD f
   where MTX_TRX = 2; -- Exchanges transactions
Exception
             Begin
                     select sum(nvl(x.TRX_LAMT,0))
                       from MTX_V_EXCH_TRX x
                      where x.CUST_SER =  a_cust;
              Exception
              End;
             Begin
                     select sum(nvl(x.TRX_LAMT,0))
                       ( select i.TRX_LAMT , rownum rec_ser
                               from MTX_V_EXCH_TRX i
                              where i.CUST_SER = a_cust
                              order by i.trx_date desc) x
                      where x.rec_ser <= v_trx_cnt;
              Exception
              End;
             Begin
                         select sum(nvl(x.TRX_LAMT,0))
                           from MTX_V_EXCH_TRX x
                          where x.CUST_SER = a_cust
              Exception
              End;
End; ';
End; ';
  -- regenerating function
    Begin
    Exception
    End;
Procedure p_del_non_cust_doc(a_trx_type number
  Begin
       where CRT_MTX_TRX = a_trx_type
    Exception
    End;
Function f_chk_non_cust_doc(a_trx_type number
     Begin
           Select 1
             From MTX_TRX_RQRD_DOC r
            Where r.CRT_MTX_TRX     = a_trx_type
     Exception
     End;
Function f_insert_non_cust_rqrd_doc(a_doc_grp  number
     Begin
      insert into
         From  MTX_DOCS_GRP_DTL  d
         Where d.DOC_GRP_NO = a_doc_grp
    Exception
    End;
Function f_insert_rqrd_doc(a_doc_grp    number
     Begin
      insert into
         From  MTX_DOCS_GRP_DTL  d
         Where d.DOC_GRP_NO = a_doc_grp
           and not exists ( select 1
                              from MTX_CUST_RQRD_DOC r
                             where r.DOC_SER  = d.DOC_SER
    Exception
    End;
    Begin
            insert into
       (select r.REC_SER
                    From MTX_CUST_RQRD_DOC r
             where r.CUST_SER   = a_cust
                   and not exists (select 1
                                                       from mtx_doc_tmp t
                                                      where t.REC_SER = r.REC_SER
    Exception
    End;
Function f_chk_trx_doc(a_trx_type  number
     Begin
           Select 1
             From MTX_DOC_TMP       t
            Where t.CUST_SER = a_cust
     Exception
     End;
     -- Update customer required documents
     Begin
           update MTX_CUST_RQRD_DOC r
            Where r.DOC_DLVRY_STATUS not in (1,2)
              and exists ( select 1
                        from MTX_DOC_TMP t
                       where t.MTX_TRX  = a_trx_type
     Exception
     End;
Procedure p_del_trx_doc(a_trx_type  number
  Begin
       where CRT_MTX_TRX = LST_MTX_TRX
    Exception
    End;
End; -- (Package Doc

Function cust_data_is_acptd(a_cust_ser                        number
    for OptRec in ( select o.cust_fld_name
                        from mtx_cust_flds_opt o
                       where o.opt_level    = a_cust_opt_level
     begin
       select c.last_upd_dtl
         from mtx_customers c
        where c.cust_ser = a_cust_ser
     exception
     end;
Function cust_data_is_acptd_for_amt(a_trx_type                         varchar2
        begin
           select max(s.cust_opt_level)
             from mtx_trx_amt_stp s
            where s.mtx_trx           = v_trx_type
              and s.min_trx_lamt in ( select min(nvl(s2.min_trx_lamt,0))
                                        from mtx_trx_amt_stp s2
                                       where s2.mtx_trx           = v_trx_type
        exception
        end;

    insert into mtx_customers
exception

procedure collect_chk(a_chk_stlmt_tbl t_chk_stlmt_tbl) is
  Begin
        SELECT CHK_PUR_ACT
          FROM MTX_STP_ACCTS
         WHERE BRN_NO = c_brn_no;
  Exception
  End;
            Begin
                  select  BNK_BRN
                  from   mtx_chk_stlmnt
                  where  brn_no  = c_brn_no
            Exception
            End;
            -- update chk status to
              Begin
                   update  mtx_chk_stlmnt m
                    where  m.brn_no     = a_chk_stlmt_tbl(ndx).brn_no
                Exception
                End;
procedure return_chk (   a_brn_no   mtx_chk_stlmnt.brn_no%type
            Begin
           update  mtx_chk_stlmnt m
            where  m.brn_no      = a_brn_no
        Exception
        End;

CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE gnrl_pk IS
  procedure get_brn_usrs( r_cv in out t_cv
  function get_trsr_name( a_brn_no   number
  function get_usr_name (a_usr_id varchar2)  return varchar2;
  Function get_acct_name( a_acct_no number ) return varchar2;
  function get_agent_name ( a_agent_type number
  procedure check_bnk_chk_valid ( a_bnk_no        number
  function get_bank_name( a_bnk_no   number ) return varchar2;
  function get_brn_name( a_brn_no   number ) return varchar2;
  procedure set_bnk_chk_use  ( a_brn_no          mtx_bnks_chk_dtl.brn_no%type
function get_cust_name ( a_cust_ser number ) return varchar2;
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY gnrl_pk IS
    procedure get_brn_usrs( r_cv in out t_cv
      begin
              select S_USERID   user_code
                from S_MAINSEC
               where S_PAUSE = 1
      end;
      function get_trsr_name( a_brn_no   number
    begin
        select decode(c_lang,1,TRSR_ADES,TRSR_EDES) trsr_desc
          from MTX_TRSRS
         where brn_no  =a_brn_no
    exception
   function get_usr_name (a_usr_id varchar2)  return varchar2 is
   begin
       select decode(c_lang,1,USER_ANM,USER_eNM) usr_nm
         from s_mainsec
        where s_userid=a_usr_id;
   exception
   end;
   Function get_acct_name( a_acct_no number ) return varchar2 is             
SELECT decode(prmpkg.get_lang,1,ACCT_ADES,ACCT_eDES) acct_nm
 from mtx_accts
 where acct_no= a_acct_no 
exception
   -- this function to return agent name or branch name for the company 
   -- also we can use this function to get the agent's branch name
   function get_agent_name ( a_agent_type number
     begin
                     begin
                         select decode(prmpkg.get_lang,1,brn_ades,brn_edes) brn_nm
                           from s_brn
                          where brn_no= a_agent_brn
                     exception
                     end;
                 begin
                         select decode(prmpkg.get_lang,1,agt_ades,agt_edes) brn_nm
                           from mtx_agents
                          where agt_no= a_agent_no
                     exception
                     end;
               begin
                         select decode(prmpkg.get_lang,1,g.brn_ades,g.brn_edes) brn_nm
                           from MTX_AGENT_BRNS g
                          where agt_no    = a_agent_no
                     exception
                   end;
     end;
  procedure check_bnk_chk_valid ( a_bnk_no         number
 begin
  select USING_BNK_CHK_THW_SYS
    from MTX_CTRL;
                      select CHK_STATUS
                        from MTX_BNKS_CHK_DTL
                       where BNK_NO   = a_bnk_no
exception
   function get_bank_name( a_bnk_no   number ) return varchar2 is
  begin
    select decode(c_lang,1,BNK_ADES,BNK_eDES) bnk_nm
      from mtx_banks
     where bnk_no = a_bnk_no
  exception
  end;
  function get_brn_name( a_brn_no   number ) return varchar2 is
  begin
    select decode(c_lang,1,BrN_ADES,BrN_eDES) brn_nm
      from s_brn
     where brn_no = a_brn_no
  exception
  end;
   procedure set_bnk_chk_use  ( a_brn_no          mtx_bnks_chk_dtl.brn_no%type
  begin
  select USING_BNK_CHK_THW_SYS
    from MTX_CTRL;
        update MTX_BNKS_CHK_DTL set  trx_date       = a_trx_date
                             where   bnk_no  = a_bnk_no
       raise_application_error(-20005,'error during update check status '||sqlerrm);
function get_cust_name (a_cust_ser number) return varchar2 is
    select decode(c_lang,1,cust_aname,cust_ename) cust_name
      from mtx_customers
     where cust_ser=a_cust_ser
exception
 package finished successfully.....

     select nvl(s.POST_TO_ONYX_BRN,s.brn_no)
       from mtx_stp_accts s
      where s.brn_no = a_jv_brn

         select nvl(s.cust_accts_prfx,0)

   end;
Function get_acct_dflt_curr(a_jv_brn  number
                  ' select g.curr_no ' ||
                '  from ' || v_OnyxUsr || '.' ||'ACCOUNT             a ' ||
                ' where a.a_code    = :a_acct_no
                  order by  abs(sign(nvl(:a_curr_no,0) - g.curr_no )) asc        '
Exception

  c_null_slct varchar2(4000) :=' select ''1'' curr_shrt ' ||
                                                     '  from dual                       ' ||
                                                     ' where 1 = 2 ';

                 '  from ' || v_OnyxUsr  || '.' ||'ACCOUNT_CURR a ' ||
                 ' where a.a_code    = ''' || a_acct_no                     || '''' ||
                   order by  c.curr_shrt ';
Exception

Procedure Check_jv_date(a_OnyxUser varchar2
    --Result of this Function Is :
    --  4 => Invalid Function Call
       begin
           ' select p.status
               from ' || a_OnyxUser || '.' || 'detail_periods p
              where trunc(:a_jv_date) between trunc(p.from_date) and trunc(p.to_date) '
         ' select count(0)
             from ' || a_OnyxUser || '.' || 'date_lock l
            where trunc(:a_jv_date) between trunc(l.ufd) and trunc(l.utd)
        Exception
      end;
   v_Rslt := 4;  -- Invalid Function Call

    update MTX_JV_DTLS set DTL_CR=0,DTL_DB=0
    where        Brn_No    = a_jv_brn
exception when others then
    end;*/
 begin
     select count(1)  amt
       from mtx_jv_dtls d
      Where d.Brn_No    = a_jv_brn

   begin
   select CURR_SHRT
     from GEN_CURR
    where curr_no= gldpk.f_get_lcurr;

   '  Select d.acct_no
        From mtx_jv_dtls d
       Where d.Brn_No    = :a_jv_brn
      Select to_number(a_code)
        From ' || v_OnyxUser || '.' || 'account_curr ';
    ' Select d.acct_no
        From mtx_jv_dtls d
       Where d.Brn_No    = :a_jv_brn
     '    Select 1
            From (select sum(d.dtl_cr) - sum(d.dtl_db)  amt
                            From mtx_jv_dtls d
                           Where d.Brn_No    = :a_jv_brn
                   where local_amt <> 0 ';
     '    Select nvl(sum(nvl(abs(d.dtl_lcr),0)) + sum(nvl(abs(d.dtl_ldb),0)),0) lcr_plus_ldb
                    From mtx_jv_dtls d
                   Where d.Brn_No    = :a_jv_brn
     ' select  j.BRN_NO
          From MTX_JVS     j
         Where j.Brn_No = :a_jv_brn
     ' select  BRN_NO
          From MTX_JV_DTLS d
         Where d.Brn_No    = :a_jv_brn
  Begin
     ' Select Cur_Code
         From ' || v_OnyxUser || '.' || 'Ex_Rate
        Where L_F = 1 '
   Exception
   End;

Procedure get_acct_balances(a_cv   in out t_cv
        '  select g.curr_no                                                              ACCT_CURR_NO
             From ' || v_OnyxUsr ||'.account_curr c
            where c.A_CODE    =  a.acct_no
              group by g.curr_no

                      '  where  m.doc_no = '  || a_jv_ser             ||
Exception
Procedure get_cust_balances(a_cv            in out t_cv
--  a_bal_src (to determine from where balances should be fetched )
--      ACCT  :     means from account balance table
--      TRUST :     means from trust balance table
        begin
        '  select g.curr_no                                                              ACCT_CURR_NO
             From ' || v_OnyxUsr ||'.account_curr c
            where c.A_CODE    =  a.acct_no
              group by g.curr_no
        Exception
        end;
   Begin
                      ' select b.CURR_NO                                                                                     TBAL_CURR_no
                                from MTX_CUST_TRUST_BAL b
                             where b.cust_ser = :a_cust_ser '
        Exception
        end;
/*Function get_acct_balance(a_brn    number
   select  sum(decode(a.CURR_NO,gldpk.f_get_lcurr,nvl(c.OPEN_BAL,0),nvl(c.OPEN_FBAL,0)) +
     From ' || v_OnyxUsr || '.account_curr  c
    where c.A_CODE    = a.acct_no
Exception
End;*/
Function get_acct_balance(a_brn    number
   select  sum(decode(a.CURR_NO,gldpk.f_get_lcurr,nvl(c.OPEN_BAL,0),nvl(c.OPEN_FBAL,0)) +
     From ' || v_OnyxUsr || '.account_curr  c
    where c.A_CODE    = a.acct_no
      group by d.exceed_lmt  '
Exception
Procedure fetch_acct_curr(a_jv_brn   number
    Begin
          where acct_no = a_acct_no
      open v_cv for ' select c.CURR_NO
                            from gen_curr c
                           where exists (select 1
                                           from '|| v_OnyxUsr || '.' || 'account_curr a
                                          where a.A_CODE  = ''' || a_acct_no || '''
         insert into mtx_acct_curr
    exception
    end;
Procedure fetch_all_acct_curr(a_jv_brn   number
    Begin
        for acct_rec in ( select a.ACCT_NO
                                       from  mtx_accts a
                                     where  a.brn_no = a_jv_brn)
              where acct_no = acct_rec.acct_no
            ' insert into mtx_acct_curr
                (select :a_BRN_NO,
                   from gen_curr c
                  where curr_shrt in (select A_CY
                                         from '|| v_OnyxUsr || '.' ||'account_curr
                                        where A_CODE  = :a_ACCT_NO
    exception
    end;
Procedure delete_not_onyx_accounts(a_acct_tbl t_tbl_acct ) is
        where a.brn_no  = a_acct_tbl(acct_ndx).acct_brn
Procedure fetch_not_onyx_accounts(a_cv       in out t_cv
        'select c.ACCT_NO    A_CODE
       from mtx_accts c
      where c.brn_no = :a_brn_no
        and not exists  ( select 1
                                                  From ' || a_OnyxUsr ||'.' || 'account       a
                                                 where nvl(a.AC_CLOSE,0) <> 2  -- not stopeed against external access
                                                    and exists ( select 1
                                                                                       from mtx_brns_acct_grps g
                                                                                      where g.onyx_acct_grp = a.A_GROUPING
                 order by nvl(c.ACCT_ADES,c.ACCT_EDES) '
Exception
Procedure fetch_avlbl_onyx_accounts(a_cv       in out t_cv
        ' select a.A_CODE      A_CODE
                  From ' || v_OnyxUser ||'.' || 'account       a
                 where nvl(a.AC_CLOSE,0) not in (2,3)  -- not stopeed against external access and all access
                    and exists ( select 1
                                                       from mtx_brns_acct_grps g
                                                      where g.onyx_acct_grp = a.A_GROUPING
                 order by a.A_NAME '
Exception
Procedure fetch_onyx_accounts(a_cv       in out t_cv
        ' select a.A_CODE      A_CODE
                  From ' || a_OnyxUsr ||'.' || 'account       a
                 where nvl(a.AC_CLOSE,0) not in (2,3)  -- not stopeed against external access and all access
                   and not exists (select 1
                                                        from mtx_accts c
                                                       where c.acct_no = a.A_CODE
                    and exists ( select 1
                                                       from mtx_brns_acct_grps g
                                                      where g.onyx_acct_grp = a.A_GROUPING
                 order by a.A_NAME '
Exception
Function get_brn_onyx_grp_sel_stmt(a_brn_no number
    return ' SELECT TO_CHAR(GROUP_NO) GROUP_NO ' ||
         '  FROM ' || v_OnyxUsr||'.ACCOUNT_GROUPING  ' ||
         ' order by group_no ';
Function get_stp_accts_slct_stmt(a_brn_no         number) return varchar2 is
          ' select a.A_CODE   acct_no
               From ' || v_OnyxUsr || '.' || 'account             a
            where nvl(a.AC_CLOSE,0) not in (2,3)  -- not stopeed against external access and all access
              and exists ( select 1
                                         from mtx_brns_acct_grps g
                                        where g.onyx_acct_grp = a.A_GROUPING
            order by a.A_NAME ';
Function get_alwd_trx_type_whr(a_alwd_trx_type  varchar2) return varchar2 is
 this function returns a "where predicate" to be used
 in account retreiving "Select statement"
Function get_accts_slct_stmt(a_brn_no                 number
  ' select a.A_CODE   acct_no
       From ' || v_OnyxUsr || '.' || 'account             a
    where nvl(a.AC_CLOSE,0) not in (2,3)
      and exists ( select 1
                                 from mtx_brns_acct_grps g
                                where g.onyx_acct_grp = a.A_GROUPING
    order by a.A_NAME ';
Function acct_and_curr_exst(a_brn_no                   number
  ' select decode(prmpkg.get_lang,1,nvl(a.A_NAME,a.A_NAME_ENG)
       From ' || v_OnyxUsr || '.' || 'account             a
    where nvl(a.AC_CLOSE,0) not in (2,3)  -- not stopeed against external access and all access
      and exists ( select 1
                                 from mtx_brns_acct_grps g
                                where g.onyx_acct_grp = a.A_GROUPING
Exception
Function acct_exst(a_brn_no                       number
  ' select decode(prmpkg.get_lang,1,nvl(a.A_NAME,a.A_NAME_ENG)
       From ' || v_OnyxUsr || '.' || 'account             a
    where nvl(a.AC_CLOSE,0) not in (2,3)  -- not stopeed against external access and all access
      and exists ( select 1
                                 from mtx_brns_acct_grps g
                                where g.onyx_acct_grp = a.A_GROUPING
Exception
Function get_main_accts_slct_stmt(a_brn_no number) return varchar2 is
        '  select  n.a_code  a_code
        '    from ' || v_OnyxUsr || '.account n ' ||
        '          ,( select  distinct a.A_PARENT a_code
                        from   ' || v_OnyxUsr || '.account             a
                       where a.AC_CLOSE  <> 2
            where qr.a_code = n.a_code
              order by n.a_code ' ;
Procedure fetch_bs_onyx_accounts(a_cv       in out t_cv
--  this procedure is used to fetch
--   from GL
        ' select a.A_CODE
                  From ' || a_OnyxUsr || '.' || 'account             a
                 where    nvl(a.AC_CLOSE,0)  not in (2,3)  -- not stopeed against external access and all access
                   and exists ( select 1
                                                 from mtx_brns_acct_grps g
                                                where g.onyx_acct_grp = a.A_GROUPING
                   and not exists (select 1
                                                        from mtx_customers c
                                                       where c.acct_no = a.A_CODE
                 order by a.A_NAME '
Exception
Procedure insert_acct_curr(a_jv_brn   number
    Begin
            ' insert into mtx_acct_curr
                (select :a_BRN_NO,
                   from gen_curr c
                  where curr_shrt in (select A_CY
                                         from '|| v_OnyxUsr || '.' ||'account_curr
                                        where A_CODE  = :a_ACCT_NO
    exception
    end;
Procedure fetch_accounts_from_gl(a_acct_tbl t_tbl_acct
               Begin
                    select 1
                      from mtx_accts a
                     where a.brn_no  = a_brn_tbl(brn_ndx)
               Exception
                            insert into mtx_accts
                                delete from mtx_acct_curr where acct_no=a_acct_tbl(acct_ndx).acct_no;
                                 Begin
                                 exception
                                 end;
                     End;
Function get_onyx_acct_grp_name(a_brn    number
     execute immediate '  Select g.GROUP_NAME ' ||
                       '    from ' || v_OnyxUsr||'.ACCOUNT_GROUPING g ' ||
                       '   where g.GROUP_NO = :a_grp_no '
Exception
procedure fill_acct_curr_table(a_curr_tbl in out t_tbl_curr
                     ' select curr_no          ' ||
                 '  from ' || v_OnyxUsr  || '.' ||'ACCOUNT_CURR a ' ||
                 ' where a.a_code    = ''' || a_acct_no                     || '''' ||
Function validate_onyx_jv( a_brn_no    number
 begin
  execute immediate 'select doc_close ' ||
                    ' from '||v_onyx_usr||'.'||'ias_post_mst' ||
                    ' where  DOC_TYPE = '|| a_DOC_TYPE  ||'
   Exception
   end;
PROCEDURE delete_onyx_jv ( a_brn_no    number
  execute immediate 'delete from '||v_onyx_usr||'.ias_post_dtl '|| '
                           where  DOC_TYPE = '|| a_DOC_TYPE  ||'
  execute immediate 'delete from '||v_onyx_usr||'.ias_post_mst '|| '
                           where  DOC_TYPE = '|| a_DOC_TYPE  ||'
procedure rfrsh_agnt_brn_curr (   a_brn_no       number
        begin
                  where agt_no        = a_agnt_no
            exception
            end;
      -- fetch currency from agent account in onyx system
             'insert into mtx_agents_brns_curr
                (select  :a_agnt_no
                   from gen_curr c
                  where curr_shrt in (select A_CY
                                        from '||v_OnyxUsr||'.'||'account_curr
                                        where A_CODE  = :a_ACC_code
            exception
      end;
  end;
procedure move_dlt_jv_to_mtx ( a_year    number
 begin
  execute immediate 'insert into MTX_ONYX_JV_DLTD_dtl
where   doc_no ='|| a_doc_no
 exception
    end;
Function get_onyx_branch(a_brn number) return number is
    Begin
         select nvl(s.POST_TO_ONYX_BRN,s.brn_no)
           from mtx_stp_accts s
          where s.brn_no = a_brn
    Exception
    End;
CREATE OR REPLACE procedure reblt_drw_dpst_doc_typ(a_onyx_brn varchar2 ) is
            begin
                        execute immediate 'update '||a_onyx_brn||'.ias_post_dtl  set doc_type=71
                        where jv_type=1027';
                         execute immediate 'update '||a_onyx_brn||'.ias_post_dtl  set doc_type=71
                         where jv_type=1028';
          end;
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE Out_Amnd_Pk is
    function posT_amnd_change_distination (  a_out_brn         number
    Function post_out_revers(a_out_brn  number
   Function post_out_cncl_pymt(a_brn      number
   Function post_amnd_rcpt_pymnt(a_brn      number
    Procedure post_nonvalue_amnd(a_brn        number
   Function post_on_acct_out_amnd(a_out_brn        number
   Function post_out_cncl_dirct(a_out_brn   number
  procedure cancl_out_amnd_sending_to_cshr(a_out_brn   number
  Procedure delete_not_postd_amnd( a_brn     number
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY Out_Amnd_Pk is
Procedure make_hist_out_rem_rec(a_out_brn  number
    insert into mtx_out_ver v
        from MTX_OUT_TRX  o
     where BRN_NO    =  a_out_brn
    Exception
    End;
  Begin
    insert into MTX_OUT_BNF_VER v
        from MTX_OUT_BNF b
     where BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
    Exception
    End;
Procedure lock_amnd_records(a_out_brn   number
  Begin
     select amnd_type
       from mtx_out_amnd a
      where a.BRN_NO    = a_out_brn
  exception
  end;
  Begin
     select abs(o.trx_status / o.trx_status_factor)
       from mtx_out_trx o
     where o.BRN_NO    = a_out_brn
  exception
  end;
  Begin
     select 1
       from MTX_OUT_BNF b
      where b.BRN_NO    = a_out_brn
  exception
  end;
          Begin
             select 1
               from mtx_out_ver v
              where v.BRN_NO    =  a_out_brn
          exception
          end;
          Begin
             select 1
               from mtx_out_more_ver v
              where v.BRN_NO    =  a_out_brn
          exception
          end;
          Begin
             select 1
               from MTX_OUT_BNF_VER v
              where v.BRN_NO    =  a_out_brn
          exception
          end;
Procedure upd_orgn_out_rem_rec(a_out_brn    number
 --- update Outward remittance
  -- update remittance record
        update mtx_out_trx o set
        from MTX_OUT_VER  v
     where v.BRN_NO    =  a_out_brn
     where o.BRN_NO    = a_out_brn
     update MTX_OUT_BNF b set
            from MTX_OUT_BNF_VER v
         where v.BRN_NO  = a_out_brn
     where b.BRN_NO    = a_out_brn
    --Begin
      --     Begin
        --   select 
           --from MTX_OUT_BNF_VER v
         --where v.BRN_NO  = a_out_brn
            --from mtx_out_trx o
              --   where o.BRN_NO     = a_out_brn
           --exception when  others Then
           --End;
              --   update web_in_OUT_TRX@mysql2oracle w
               -- where w.trx_status = 4            -- not CANCEL
           --Exception
           --End;
function posT_amnd_change_distination (  a_out_brn                     number
 begin
        begin
                select  CSH_OUT_BRN
                  from mtx_stp_accts
                 where brn_no = a_out_brn
        exception
        Begin
              select a.new_agnt_type
                  from mtx_out_amnd      a
             where a.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
        Exception
        End;
           (select o.brn_no
              From  MTX_OUT_TRX    o
             where  abs(o.trx_status/o.TRX_STATUS_FACTOR)  = v_actual_out_status
               for update of  o.BRN_NO
                 Begin
                          select rec.agnt_nm || ' - ' || nvl(d.dlr_ades,d.dlr_edes)
                            from MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN d
                         where d.DLR_CAT   = rec.agent_type
                   exception
                   end;
                             Begin
                                      select decode(v_lang ,1,b.BRN_ADES,b.BRN_eDES) brn_desc
                                        from mtx_stp_accts d
                                       where d.BRN_NO= rec.agent_brn_no
                               exception
                               end;
                      begin
                                        select  in_rem_BRN
                                          from mtx_stp_accts
                                         where brn_no = v_new_agnt_brn
                                exception
                      begin
                                        select  in_rem_BRN
                                          from mtx_stp_accts
                                         where brn_no = v_new_agnt_brn
                                exception
                       open v_rc_remrec for select s.RCV_FEE_CURR         rcv_fee_curr
                                                                      from mtx_out_snd s
                                                                     where s.trx_brn             = a_out_brn
                                                                     order by s.ENTRY_DATE desc ;
                    -- update sending record to "Cancelled"
                                    begin
                                      update mtx_out_snd s
                                       where s.brn_no               = v_snd_brn_no
                                    exception
                                    end;
                            begin
                                 select  trx_amt
                                  from  mtx_out_trx o
                                 where  o.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
                            exception
                            begin
                            exception
                        end;
          -- update out cash remittance status to be sent for connected branch
                    begin
                      update mtx_out_trx o
                       where abs(o.trx_status/o.TRX_STATUS_FACTOR)  = v_actual_out_status
                    exception
                    end;
                         begin
                                  update mtx_out_trx o
                                   where abs(o.trx_status/o.TRX_STATUS_FACTOR)  = v_actual_out_status
                                exception
                                end;
      -- update amandment status
      if a_jv_ser is null            -- procedure called from amendment screen (no cancellation)
            Begin
                  update mtx_out_amnd a
                   where a.BRN_NO            = a_out_brn
                Exception
                End;
                if a_jv_ser is null            -- procedure called from amendment screen (no cancellation)
      --begin 
        --      select OUTREM_SECURE_NO into v_sec_no
          --     From  MTX_OUT_TRX   
            --   where 
                 -- begin   
                    -- delete  from web_in_out_trx@mysql2oracle where OUTREM_SECURE_NO=v_sec_no ;
                     --Exception
                      --  raise_application_error(-20001,'Error While delete outward remittance record from web : '||chr(10)|| sqlerrm);
                  --End;
                --  begin   
                   --Exception
                  --End;                                  
     --end;    
Function post_out_revers(a_out_brn     number
 begin
        begin
                select  CSH_OUT_BRN
                from  mtx_stp_accts
                 where  brn_no = a_out_brn;
        exception
           (select o.TRX_AMT
              From  MTX_OUT_TRX    o
             where  o.BRN_NO      = a_out_brn
               for update of o.TRX_status
                 Begin
                          select rec.agnt_nm || ' - ' || nvl(d.dlr_ades,d.dlr_edes)
                            from MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN d
                         where d.DLR_CAT   = rec.agent_type
                   exception
                   end;
        /*    begin
                select brn_no
                  from mtx_out_snd
                 where trx_year = a_out_yr
             exception
            end;
                               begin
                                    select  acct_brn_no
                                    from  mtx_stp_accts
                                     where  brn_no  = v_snd_brn
                            exception
        begin
        select nvl(fee_ded_flag,2)
          from mTX_OUT_AMND A
         where a.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
        exception
        end;
        -- update out cash remittance record
                begin
                  update mtx_out_trx o
                   where o.brn_no     = a_out_brn
                exception
                end;
        -- update out cash remittance record
                begin
                  update mtx_out_snd s
                   where s.trx_brn    = a_out_brn
                exception
                end;
      -- update amandment status
        Begin
              update mtx_out_amnd a
               where a.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
Function post_out_cncl_pymt(a_brn      number
    Begin
       select r.PAY_CURR_NO
        from  MTX_TRX_PYMT  r
       where  r.PYMT_YR   = a_yr
             for  update of  r.PYMT_STATUS
        Exception
        End;
        Begin
              select abs(o.TRX_STATUS / o.TRX_STATUS_factor)
                from mtx_out_trx o
               where o.BRN_NO   = v_out_brn
                     for update of o.brn_no
        exception
        End;
        Begin
            select CSH_OUT_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_brn;
        Exception
        End;
              begin
                   select s.acct_brn_no
                         from mtx_stp_accts s
                        where s.brn_no = v_agent_brn_no --a_brn
                Exception
                End;
            Begin
                  select d.brn_deal_flag
                    from mtx_v_dealers d
                   where d.dlr_cat = v_agent_type
            exception
            End;
                               begin
                                    select  acct_brn_no
                                    from  mtx_stp_accts
                                     where  brn_no  =  c_main_brn
                            exception
                               begin
                                    select  acct_brn_no
                                    from  m
                                     where  brn_no  = c_main_brn
                            exception
      -- update outward status
        Begin
              update MTX_OUT_TRX o
               where o.BRN_NO     = v_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
      -- update payment status
        Begin
              update MTX_TRX_PYMT r
               where r.PYMT_YR     = a_yr
            Exception
            End;
      -- update amandment status
        Begin
              update mtx_out_amnd a
               where a.BRN_NO  = v_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
      --   Begin
        --   Begin
          --  select  
          --  from mtx_out_trx o
            --     where o.brn_no     = v_out_brn
           --exception when  others Then
           --End;
              -- update web_in_OUT_TRX@mysql2oracle w
                --where w.trx_status = 4            -- not CANCEL
           --Exception
         --  End;
Function post_out_cncl_dirct(a_out_brn   number
              select abs(o.TRX_STATUS / o.TRX_STATUS_factor)
          from mtx_out_trx o
               where o.trx_status in (3,4)
                     for update  of o.BRN_NO
        exception
        End;
    begin
         select  JV_SER
           from MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX
          where mtt_trx_BRN = a_out_brn
    exception
          end;
     begin
            select CSH_OUT_FEE_ACT
              from MTX_STP_ACCTS
             where brn_no  = a_out_brn ;
            exception
            end;
         '  select d.A_CODE                            ACCT_NO
                from ' || v_onyx_user || '.ias_post_dtl d
             where d.doc_no  = :v_out_jv_ser
      -- update outward status
        Begin
              update MTX_OUT_TRX o
               where o.TRX_STATUS in (3,4)
            Exception
            End;
      -- update amandment status
        Begin
              update mtx_out_amnd a
               where a.BRN_NO                  = a_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
      for rec in (select m.brn_no               cust_brn_no
                               from  mtx_mlt_trsr_trx_dtl d
                                where  m.brn_no         = d.brn_no
     -- Begin
       --    Begin
          --  select  
            --from mtx_out_trx o
              --   where o.brn_no     = a_out_brn
           --exception when  others Then
           --End;
               --update web_in_OUT_TRX@mysql2oracle w
                --where w.trx_status = 4            -- not CANCEL
           --Exception
           --End;
Function post_amnd_rcpt_pymnt(a_brn      number
    Begin
       select r.PAY_CURR_NO
        from  MTX_TRX_PYMT  r
       where  r.BRN_NO     = a_brn
             for update of  r.PYMT_STATUS
        exception
        End;
  Begin
      select amnd_type
        from mtx_out_amnd a
       where brn_no   = v_out_brn
  exception
  end;
        Begin
            select CSH_OUT_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_brn
        exception
        End;
                   begin
                          select s.acct_no
                            from mtx_stp_accts s
                           where s.brn_no = v_agent_brn_no
                   Exception
                   End;
     -- update outward amendment status
        Begin
              update MTX_OUT_AMND a
               where a.BRN_NO         = v_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
      -- update payment status
        Begin
              update MTX_TRX_PYMT r
               where PYMT_YR  = a_yr
            Exception
            End;
       --- update inward remittance
              -- update temporary remittance record status
                Begin
                      update MTX_OUT_VER v
                         where v.brn_no      = v_out_brn
                    Exception
                     End;
                Begin
                     ' update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                       where o.BRN_NO   = :v_out_brn
                    Exception
                    End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = v_out_brn
                Exception
                End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = v_out_brn
                Exception
                End;
Procedure post_nonvalue_amnd(a_brn        number
     -- update outward amendment status
        Begin
              update MTX_OUT_AMND a
               where a.BRN_NO   = a_brn
            Exception
            End;
       --- update inward remittance
              --update temporary remittance record status
                Begin
                      update MTX_OUT_VER v
                         where v.brn_no      = a_brn
                    Exception
                     End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = a_brn
                Exception
                End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = a_brn
                Exception
                End;
Function post_on_acct_out_amnd(a_out_brn        number
    Begin
       select r.AMND_DIFF_CURR
        from  MTX_OUT_AMND  r
       where  r.brn_no   = a_out_brn
             for  update of  r.AMND_STATUS
        Exception
        End;
        Begin
            select CSH_OUT_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_out_brn
        exception
        End;
     -- update outward amendment status
        Begin
              update MTX_OUT_AMND a
               where a.BRN_NO         = a_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
       --- update inward remittance
              -- update temporary remittance record status
                Begin
                      update MTX_OUT_VER v
                         where v.brn_no      = a_out_brn
                    Exception
                     End;
                Begin
                     ' update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                       where o.BRN_NO   = :a_out_brn
                    Exception
                    End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
                Exception
                End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
                Exception
                End;
procedure cancl_out_amnd_sending_to_cshr(a_out_brn   number
    begin
      update mtx_out_amnd a
       where a.brn_no           = a_out_brn
     exception
    end;
Procedure delete_not_postd_amnd(a_brn           number
    begin
       where a.brn_no = a_brn
    exception
    end;

FROM MTX_OUT_SND_MST M,

  End;

 CREATE OR REPLACE Package MoveRemfweb is
          Procedure Fetchdata_f_web;
          PROCEDURE Fetchdata_f_web_dir(P_OUTREM_SECURE_NO in number) ;
          Procedure post_snd_rem_agnt(P_OUTREM_SECURE_NO in number);
          PROCEDURE GET_AGN_INFO(P_BRN_NO NUMBER ,P_AGENT_NO NUMBER ,P_AGNT_T NUMBER,P_REM_LAST_NO IN OUT MTX_IN_MST.REM_LAST_NO%TYPE,P_REM_LAST_DOC_NO IN OUT MTX_IN_MST.REM_LAST_DOC_NO%TYPE,
          --PROCEDURE MOV_REQS_FRM_WEB;                                                 
    End; 
CREATE OR REPLACE Package Body MTXYMN.MoveRemfweb is
           PROCEDURE Fetchdata_f_web IS
CURSOR ora_insert IS SELECT FRM_AGENT_TYPE
                       FROM web_in_out_trx  --@mysql2oracle
                      where trans_ora=0
                        order by trx_ser;
         begin
         EXCEPTION
         END;
       /* BEGIN
         SELECT 1
           FROM MTX_IN_MST M
          WHERE M.IN_YEAR = REC.TRX_YEAR
        EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN
        END;*/
    BEGIN
    INSERT into MTX_IN_MST(
         EXCEPTION
         END;
         BEGIN
         EXCEPTION
         END;
  BEGIN
      INSERT into MTX_IN_MST_AMTS(
     EXCEPTION
     END;
    BEGIN
                     INSERT into MTX_IN_TRX(
     EXCEPTION
     END;
      --UPDATE MYSQL DATA
           begin
                update web_in_out_trx  --@mysql2oracle
                 where trans_ora = 0
           EXCEPTION
           Raise_Application_Error(-20007,'Error when update  mysql2oracle Data,'||SQLERRM) ;
           End;
   --UPDATE AGENT DATA IN ORACLE  -LAST_REM_NO  AND LAST_DOC_NO
        begin
                update MTX_AGENTS
                 where AGT_NO =  rec.FRM_AGENT_NO;
           EXCEPTION
           Raise_Application_Error(-20006,'Error when update  Agents Data ,'||SQLERRM) ;
           End;
   EXCEPTION
PROCEDURE post_snd_rem_agnt(P_OUTREM_SECURE_NO in number) is
     BEGIN
       BEGIN
                    select brn_no
                    from mtx_in_trx
                    where trx_ser_ref is not null
                     order by trx_ser;
     END;
   Begin
                        BEGIN
                                SELECT acct_brn_no
                                 FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                WHERE agt_no = V_frm_agent_no
                            exception
                        END;
                    ----***********  if frm_agnt_type = 2 then  acct_no else select   acct from agent   (medial account)
                                    Begin
                                        select  acct_brn_no
                                         from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                        where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                                    exception
                                    End;
                                    Begin
                                        select  acct_brn_no
                                         from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                        where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                                    exception
                                    End;
                                    Begin
                                        select  acct_brn_no
                                         from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                        where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                                    exception
                                    End;
                                    BEGIN
                                            SELECT acct_brn_no
                                             FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                            WHERE agt_no = V_pass_to_side
                                        exception
                                    END;
                               BEGIN
                                        SELECT acct_brn_no
                                         FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                        WHERE agt_no = V_frm_agent_no
                                    exception
                                END;
                                  Begin
                                  from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                        where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                                      exception
                                  End;
                               update mtx_in_trx
                                 where brn_no = V_brn_no
         Exception
         END;
PROCEDURE GET_AGN_INFO(P_BRN_NO NUMBER
 BEGIN
   select          d.DLR_ADES
              from mtx_v_dealers d
             where d.dlr_no = P_AGENT_NO
               and exists ( select 1
                               from MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN b
                              where b.DLR_NO = d.DLR_NO
   EXCEPTION

     EXCEPTION

                 where trans_ora = 0

 CREATE OR REPLACE Package post_wep_pkg is
 Procedure post_rcv_in_agnt;
  Procedure post_pay_in_agnt;
  --post rem when send rem from agent in web
   PROCEDURE post_payment_in_web(P_OUTREM_SECURE_NO in number) ;
 CREATE OR REPLACE Package Body post_wep_pkg is
    Procedure post_rcv_in_agnt is
cursor c_pay_rem is   select   r.trx_ser,
                            from  web_in_out_trx  r
                          where   r.PAY_POST = 0
 Begin
                       --insert into aa(aa) values(rec.OUTREM_SECURE_NO);
                         and rec.rem_type = 2        then--rem_type = 2 out from oracle  , =3 in from oracle , =1 in from web
                            Begin
                                select  acct_brn_no
                                 from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                            exception
                            End;
                         and rec.rem_type = 3        then--rem_type = 2 out from oracle  , =3 in from oracle , =1 in from web
                            Begin
                                select  acct_brn_no
                                 from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                            exception
                            End;
                         and rec.rem_type = 1        then--rem_type = 2 out from oracle  , =3 in from oracle , =1 in from web
                        BEGIN
                                SELECT acct_brn_no
                                 FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                WHERE agt_no = rec.frm_agent_no
                            exception
                        END;
                    ----***********  if frm_agnt_type = 2 then  acct_no else select   acct from agent   (medial account)
                        BEGIN
                                SELECT acct_brn_no
                                 FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                WHERE agt_no = rec.pay_agent_no
                            exception
                        END;
                         update mtx_out_trx
                          where OUTREM_SECURE_NO = rec.OUTREM_SECURE_NO
                       update mtx_IN_trx
                       where INREM_SECURE_NO = rec.OUTREM_SECURE_NO
                           update web_in_out_trx
                             where trx_ser = rec.trx_ser
   Exception
Procedure post_pay_in_agnt is
cursor c_in_rem is   select brn_no
                    from mtx_in_trx
                    where trx_ser_ref is not null
                     order by trx_ser;
 Begin
                        BEGIN
                                SELECT acct_brn_no
                                 FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                WHERE agt_no = rec.frm_agent_no
                            exception
                        END;
                    ----***********  if frm_agnt_type = 2 then  acct_no else select   acct from agent   (medial account)
                                    Begin
                                        select  acct_brn_no
                                         from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                        where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                                    exception
                                    End;
                                    Begin
                                        select  acct_brn_no
                                         from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                        where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                                    exception
                                    End;
                                    Begin
                                        select  acct_brn_no
                                         from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                        where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                                    exception
                                    End;
                                    BEGIN
                                            SELECT acct_brn_no
                                             FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                            WHERE agt_no = rec.pass_to_side
                                        exception
                                    END;
                                BEGIN
                                        SELECT acct_brn_no
                                         FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                        WHERE agt_no = rec.frm_agent_no
                                    exception
                                END;
                               update mtx_in_trx
                                 where brn_no = rec.brn_no
   Exception
Procedure post_payment_in_web(P_OUTREM_SECURE_NO in number) is
 BEGIN
    BEGIN
                                  select   r.trx_ser
                            from  web_in_out_trx  r
                          where   r.PAY_POST = 0
      END;
                         and V_rem_type = 2        then--rem_type = 2 out from oracle  , =3 in from oracle , =1 in from web
                            Begin
                                select  acct_brn_no
                                 from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                            exception
                            End;
                         and V_rem_type = 3        then--rem_type = 2 out from oracle  , =3 in from oracle , =1 in from web
                            Begin
                                select  acct_brn_no
                                 from  mtx_stp_accts s
                                where s.brn_no = b.brn_no
                            exception
                            End;
                         and V_rem_type = 1        then--rem_type = 2 out from oracle  , =3 in from oracle , =1 in from web
                        BEGIN
                                SELECT acct_brn_no
                                 FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                WHERE agt_no = V_frm_agent_no
                            exception
                        END;
                    ----***********  if frm_agnt_type = 2 then  acct_no else select   acct from agent   (medial account)
                        BEGIN
                                SELECT acct_brn_no
                                 FROM MTX_AGENTS
                                WHERE agt_no = V_pay_agent_no
                            exception
                        END;
             BEGIN
                         update mtx_out_trx
                          where OUTREM_SECURE_NO = V_OUTREM_SECURE_NO
                       update mtx_IN_trx
                       where INREM_SECURE_NO = V_OUTREM_SECURE_NO
                           update web_in_out_trx
                             where trx_ser = V_trx_ser
          Exception
        END;
 package finished successfully.....
