CREATE OR REPLACE Package in_amnd_pk is
Procedure lock_amnd_records(a_in_brn    number
Function post_in_rem_amnd(a_in_brn     
Procedure delete_not_postd_amnd(a_brn
CREATE OR REPLACE Package Body in_amnd_pk is
Procedure lock_amnd_records(a_in_brn     number
  Begin
     select 1
       from mtx_in_trx i
      where i.trx_status = a_in_status
          for update of  i.brn_no
  exception
  end;
  Begin
     select 1
       from MTX_IN_BNF_CONDS i
     where i.BRN_NO    =  a_in_brn
  exception
  end;
procedure try_crt_intrbrn_rvrs_vchr(a_old_rcv_brn number
 Begin
       select s.DB_CONNECT
         from mtx_stp_accts s
        where s.brn_no = a_old_rcv_brn
 Exception
        begin
              select s.acct_brn_no
           from mtx_stp_accts s
          where s.brn_no = c_main_brn
        exception
        end;
procedure try_crt_intrbrn_rsnd_vchr(a_new_rcv_brn number
 Begin
       select s.DB_CONNECT
         from mtx_stp_accts s
        where s.brn_no = a_new_rcv_brn
 Exception
        begin
              select s.acct_brn_no
           from mtx_stp_accts s
          where s.brn_no = c_main_brn
        exception
        end;
Function post_in_rem_amnd(a_in_brn                 number
        Begin
            select IN_REM_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_in_brn ;
        exception
        End;
      begin
                 select d.ACCT_NO
                  from  mtx_v_dealers_brn d
                  where  d.DLR_NO    = a_agnt_no
      exception
        End;
               begin
                    select d.a_cost_center
                    from  mtx_agents  d
                    where  d.agt_NO    = a_agnt_no;
                 exception
                 End;
                Begin
                 select 
                  from  mtx_stp_accts
                  where  brn_no = a_in_brn;
                   exception
                  End;
    for rec in ( select     a.pass_to_type
                From mtx_in_amnd a
                where    a.brn_no     = a_in_brn
                for update )  -- new or aproved
           begin
                select  s.acct_brn_no
              from   mtx_stp_accts s
             where   s.brn_no = v_inrem_rec.pass_to_brn
            exception
           end;
                       begin
                            select  s.acct_brn_no
                          from   mtx_stp_accts s
                         where   s.brn_no = rec.new_pass_to_brn
                        exception
                        end;
             -- begin create jv creteria for inrem acct
                         if v_inrem_rec.rem_fee_ded_flag = 1                     -- fee was deducted from in . rem amt
                             v_inrem_rec.rem_fee_ded_flag = 1   -- fees deducted from in. rem amt.
                                  v_inrem_rec.rem_fee_ded_flag = 2 -- deducted from agent
                               -- from cash payment to on account
                                 if v_inrem_rec.rem_fee_ded_flag = 1 -- fees deducted from in. rem. amount
                                Begin
                                     select d.ACCT_NO
                                      from  mtx_v_dealers_brn d
                                      where  d.DLR_CAT   = rec.pass_to_type
                                exception
                                End;
                                 -- if fee ded from amt reduce the rem amount
                                         rec.FEE_DED_FLAG = 1      -- recieve fee return (ded from agent acct)
                                    Begin
                                          update MTX_IN_TRX  i
                                             where i.brn_no    = a_in_brn
                                    Exception
                                         End;
                          --update remittance record status
                            Begin
                                  update MTX_IN_TRX  i
                                     where i.trx_status = a_in_trx_status
                            Exception
                                 End;
                          --update remittance record status
                            Begin
                                  update MTX_IN_TRX i
                                     where i.trx_status = a_in_trx_status
                            Exception
                                 End;
                                --update amendment requisetion
                                    Begin
                                      update MTX_IN_amnd_rqst i
                                          where    i.req_ser  = nvl(a_req_ser,i.req_ser)
                                    End;
                          --update remittance record status
                            Begin
                                  update MTX_IN_TRX i
                                     where i.trx_status = a_in_trx_status
                            Exception
                                 End;
                          --update send status to cancelled
                            Begin
                                  update MTX_OUT_SND S
                                     where S.trx_brn   = a_in_brn
                            Exception
                                 End;
                             -- in case the amend fee ded from amt
                                    begin
                                        update mtx_in_trx i set i.AMND_FEE_AMT  = rec.amnd_fee
                                        where i.brn_no  = a_in_brn
                                    exception
                               end;
                            begin
                            exception
                        end;
                             -- update inrem.
                           Begin
                                  update MTX_IN_TRX  i
                                     where i.trx_status= 2
                            Exception
                                 End;
      --update amendment
        Begin
              update mtx_in_amnd  m
                  where    m.brn_no     = a_in_brn
            Exception
             End;
        --update amendment requisetion
            Begin
              update MTX_IN_amnd_rqst i
                  where    i.req_ser  = a_req_ser
            End;
Procedure delete_not_postd_amnd(a_brn           number
    begin
       where a.brn_no = a_brn
    exception
    end;
 package finished successfully.....
 package
 package.....
CREATE OR REPLACE Package OUT_AMND_PK is
    function posT_amnd_change_distination (  a_out_brn         number
    Function post_out_revers(a_out_brn  number
   Function post_out_cncl_pymt(a_brn      number
   Function post_amnd_rcpt_pymnt(a_brn      number
    Procedure post_nonvalue_amnd(a_brn        number
   Function post_on_acct_out_amnd(a_out_brn        number
   Function post_out_cncl_dirct(a_out_brn   number
  procedure cancl_out_amnd_sending_to_cshr(a_out_brn   number
  Procedure delete_not_postd_amnd( a_brn     number
CREATE OR REPLACE Package Body Out_Amnd_Pk is
Procedure make_hist_out_rem_rec(a_out_brn  number
    insert into mtx_out_ver v
        from MTX_OUT_TRX  o
     where BRN_NO    =  a_out_brn
    Exception
    End;
  Begin
    insert into MTX_OUT_BNF_VER v
        from MTX_OUT_BNF b
     where BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
    Exception
    End;
Procedure lock_amnd_records(a_out_brn   number
  Begin
     select amnd_type
       from mtx_out_amnd a
      where a.BRN_NO    = a_out_brn
  exception
  end;
  Begin
     select abs(o.trx_status / o.trx_status_factor)
       from mtx_out_trx o
     where o.BRN_NO    = a_out_brn
  exception
  end;
  Begin
     select 1
       from MTX_OUT_BNF b
      where b.BRN_NO    = a_out_brn
  exception
  end;
          Begin
             select 1
               from mtx_out_ver v
              where v.BRN_NO    =  a_out_brn
          exception
          end;
          Begin
             select 1
               from mtx_out_more_ver v
              where v.BRN_NO    =  a_out_brn
          exception
          end;
          Begin
             select 1
               from MTX_OUT_BNF_VER v
              where v.BRN_NO    =  a_out_brn
          exception
          end;
Procedure upd_orgn_out_rem_rec(a_out_brn    number
 --- update Outward remittance
  -- update remittance record
        update mtx_out_trx o set
        from MTX_OUT_VER  v
     where v.BRN_NO    =  a_out_brn
     where o.BRN_NO    = a_out_brn
     update MTX_OUT_BNF b set
            from MTX_OUT_BNF_VER v
         where v.BRN_NO  = a_out_brn
     where b.BRN_NO    = a_out_brn
    Begin
           Begin
           from MTX_OUT_BNF_VER v
         where v.BRN_NO  = a_out_brn
            from mtx_out_trx o
                 where o.BRN_NO     = a_out_brn
           exception when  others Then
           End;
                 update web_in_OUT_TRX@mysql2oracle w
                where w.trx_status = 4            -- not CANCEL
           Exception
           End;
function posT_amnd_change_distination (  a_out_brn                     number
 begin
        begin
                select  CSH_OUT_BRN
                  from mtx_stp_accts
                 where brn_no = a_out_brn
        exception
        Begin
              select a.new_agnt_type
                  from mtx_out_amnd      a
             where a.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
        Exception
        End;
           (select o.brn_no
              From  MTX_OUT_TRX    o
             where  abs(o.trx_status/o.TRX_STATUS_FACTOR)  = v_actual_out_status
               for update of  o.BRN_NO
                 Begin
                          select rec.agnt_nm || 
                            from MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN d
                         where d.DLR_CAT   = rec.agent_type
                   exception
                   end;
                             Begin
                                      select decode(v_lang ,1,b.BRN_ADES,b.BRN_eDES) brn_desc
                                        from mtx_stp_accts d
                                       where d.BRN_NO= rec.agent_brn_no
                               exception
                               end;
                      begin
                                        select  in_rem_BRN
                                          from mtx_stp_accts
                                         where brn_no = v_new_agnt_brn
                                exception
                      begin
                                        select  in_rem_BRN
                                          from mtx_stp_accts
                                         where brn_no = v_new_agnt_brn
                                exception
                       open v_rc_remrec for select s.RCV_FEE_CURR         rcv_fee_curr
                                                                      from mtx_out_snd s
                                                                     where s.trx_brn             = a_out_brn
                                                                     order by s.ENTRY_DATE desc ;
                    -- update sending record to "Cancelled"
                                    begin
                                      update mtx_out_snd s
                                       where s.brn_no               = v_snd_brn_no
                                    exception
                                    end;
                            begin
                                 select  trx_amt
                                  from  mtx_out_trx o
                                 where  o.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
                            exception
                            begin
                            exception
                        end;
          -- update out cash remittance status to be sent for connected branch
                    begin
                      update mtx_out_trx o
                       where abs(o.trx_status/o.TRX_STATUS_FACTOR)  = v_actual_out_status
                    exception
                    end;
                         begin
                                  update mtx_out_trx o
                                   where abs(o.trx_status/o.TRX_STATUS_FACTOR)  = v_actual_out_status
                                exception
                                end;
      -- update amandment status
      if a_jv_ser is null            -- procedure called from amendment screen (no cancellation)
            Begin
                  update mtx_out_amnd a
                   where a.BRN_NO            = a_out_brn
                Exception
                End;
                if a_jv_ser is null            -- procedure called from amendment screen (no cancellation)
      begin
       select OUTREM_SECURE_NO into v_sec_no
               From  MTX_OUT_TRX
          begin
            /*update web_in_out_trx@mysql2oracle o
                       where OUTREM_SECURE_NO  =v_sec_no ;*/
           delete  from web_in_out_trx@mysql2oracle where OUTREM_SECURE_NO=v_sec_no ;
             update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                        where o.OUTREM_SECURE_NO  =v_sec_no
           Exception
                raise_application_error(-20001,'Error While delete outward remittance record from web : '||chr(10)|| sqlerrm);
          End;
         begin
          Exception
          End;
          begin
            update web_in_out_trx@mysql2oracle o
                       where OUTREM_SECURE_NO  =v_sec_no ;
          Exception
          End;
    end;
Function post_out_revers(a_out_brn     number
 begin
        begin
                select  CSH_OUT_BRN
                from  mtx_stp_accts
                 where  brn_no = a_out_brn;
        exception
           (select o.TRX_AMT
              From  MTX_OUT_TRX    o
             where  o.BRN_NO      = a_out_brn
               for update of o.TRX_status
                 Begin
                          select rec.agnt_nm || 
                            from MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN d
                         where d.DLR_CAT   = rec.agent_type
                   exception
                   end;
        /*    begin
                select brn_no
                  from mtx_out_snd
                 where trx_year = a_out_yr
             exception
            end;
                               begin
                                    select  acct_brn_no
                                    from  mtx_stp_accts
                                     where  brn_no  = v_snd_brn
                            exception
        begin
        select nvl(fee_ded_flag,2)
          from mTX_OUT_AMND A
         where a.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
        exception
        end;
        -- update out cash remittance record
                begin
                  update mtx_out_trx o
                   where o.brn_no     = a_out_brn
                exception
                end;
        -- update out cash remittance record
                begin
                  update mtx_out_snd s
                   where s.trx_brn    = a_out_brn
                exception
                end;
      -- update amandment status
        Begin
              update mtx_out_amnd a
               where a.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
Function post_out_cncl_pymt(a_brn      number
    Begin
       select r.PAY_CURR_NO
        from  MTX_TRX_PYMT  r
       where  r.PYMT_YR   = a_yr
             for  update of  r.PYMT_STATUS
        Exception
        End;
        Begin
              select abs(o.TRX_STATUS / o.TRX_STATUS_factor)
                from mtx_out_trx o
               where o.BRN_NO   = v_out_brn
                     for update of o.brn_no
        exception
        End;
        Begin
            select CSH_OUT_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_brn;
        Exception
        End;
              begin
                   select s.acct_brn_no
                         from mtx_stp_accts s
                        where s.brn_no = v_agent_brn_no --a_brn
                Exception
                End;
            Begin
                  select d.brn_deal_flag
                    from mtx_v_dealers d
                   where d.dlr_cat = v_agent_type
            exception
            End;
                               begin
                                    select  acct_brn_no
                                    from  mtx_stp_accts
                                     where  brn_no  =  c_main_brn
                            exception
                               begin
                                    select  acct_brn_no
                                    from  mtx_stp_accts
                                     where  brn_no  = c_main_brn
                            exception
      -- update outward status
        Begin
              update MTX_OUT_TRX o
               where o.BRN_NO     = v_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
      -- update payment status
        Begin
              update MTX_TRX_PYMT r
               where r.PYMT_YR     = a_yr
            Exception
            End;
      -- update amandment status
        Begin
              update mtx_out_amnd a
               where a.BRN_NO  = v_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
         Begin
           Begin
            from mtx_out_trx o
                 where o.brn_no     = v_out_brn
           exception when  others Then
           End;
       BEGIN
          select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') INTO CANDATE from dual;
       END;
               update web_in_OUT_TRX@mysql2oracle w
                where w.trx_status = 4            -- not CANCEL
           Exception
           End;
Function post_out_cncl_dirct(a_out_brn   number
              select abs(o.TRX_STATUS / o.TRX_STATUS_factor)
          from mtx_out_trx o
               where o.trx_status in (3,4)
                     for update  of o.BRN_NO
        exception
        End;
    begin
         select  JV_SER
           from MTX_MLT_TRSR_TRX
          where mtt_trx_BRN = a_out_brn
    exception
          end;
     begin
            select CSH_OUT_FEE_ACT
              from MTX_STP_ACCTS
             where brn_no  = a_out_brn ;
            exception
            end;
         '  select d.A_CODE                            ACCT_NO
                from ' || v_onyx_user || '.ias_post_dtl d
             where nvl(install_type,0)<>9
      -- update outward status
        Begin
              update MTX_OUT_TRX o
               where o.TRX_STATUS in (3,4)
            Exception
            End;
      -- update amandment status
        Begin
              update mtx_out_amnd a
               where a.BRN_NO                  = a_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
      for rec in (select m.brn_no               cust_brn_no
                               from  mtx_mlt_trsr_trx_dtl d
                                where  m.brn_no         = d.brn_no
    Begin
           Begin
            from mtx_out_trx o
                 where o.brn_no     = a_out_brn
           exception when  others Then
           End;
       BEGIN
          select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') INTO CANDATE from dual;
       END;
               update web_in_OUT_TRX@mysql2oracle w
                where w.trx_status = 4            -- not CANCEL
           Exception
           End;
Function post_amnd_rcpt_pymnt(a_brn      number
    Begin
       select r.PAY_CURR_NO
        from  MTX_TRX_PYMT  r
       where  r.BRN_NO     = a_brn
             for update of  r.PYMT_STATUS
        exception
        End;
  Begin
      select amnd_type
        from mtx_out_amnd a
       where brn_no   = v_out_brn
  exception
  end;
        Begin
            select CSH_OUT_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_brn
        exception
        End;
                   begin
                          select s.acct_no
                            from mtx_stp_accts s
                           where s.brn_no = v_agent_brn_no
                   Exception
                   End;
     -- update outward amendment status
        Begin
              update MTX_OUT_AMND a
               where a.BRN_NO         = v_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
      -- update payment status
        Begin
              update MTX_TRX_PYMT r
               where PYMT_YR  = a_yr
            Exception
            End;
       --- update inward remittance
              -- update temporary remittance record status
                Begin
                      update MTX_OUT_VER v
                         where v.brn_no      = v_out_brn
                    Exception
                     End;
                Begin
                     ' update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                       where o.BRN_NO   = :v_out_brn
                    Exception
                    End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = v_out_brn
                Exception
                End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = v_out_brn
                Exception
                End;
Procedure post_nonvalue_amnd(a_brn        number
     -- update outward amendment status
        Begin
              update MTX_OUT_AMND a
               where a.BRN_NO   = a_brn
            Exception
            End;
       --- update inward remittance
              --update temporary remittance record status
                Begin
                      update MTX_OUT_VER v
                         where v.brn_no      = a_brn
                    Exception
                     End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = a_brn
                Exception
                End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = a_brn
                Exception
                End;
Function post_on_acct_out_amnd(a_out_brn        number
    Begin
       select r.AMND_DIFF_CURR
        from  MTX_OUT_AMND  r
       where  r.brn_no   = a_out_brn
             for  update of  r.AMND_STATUS
        Exception
        End;
        Begin
            select CSH_OUT_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_out_brn
        exception
        End;
     -- update outward amendment status
        Begin
              update MTX_OUT_AMND a
               where a.BRN_NO         = a_out_brn
            Exception
            End;
       --- update inward remittance
              -- update temporary remittance record status
                Begin
                      update MTX_OUT_VER v
                         where v.brn_no      = a_out_brn
                    Exception
                     End;
     Begin
                     ' update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                       where o.BRN_NO   = :a_out_brn
                    Exception
                    End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
                Exception
                End;
          -- update outward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.BRN_NO   = a_out_brn
                Exception
                End;
procedure cancl_out_amnd_sending_to_cshr(a_out_brn   number
    begin
      update mtx_out_amnd a
       where a.brn_no           = a_out_brn
     exception
    end;
Procedure delete_not_postd_amnd(a_brn           number
    begin
       where a.brn_no = a_brn
    exception
    end;
 package finished successfully.....

 CREATE OR REPLACE Package inrempk is
Function in_test_no_exst(a_agt_no     number
procedure adjust_data(a_brn_no       
procedure adjust_mst_amts_entrd(a_brn     number
Function get_max_auto_aprv_amt return number;

Procedure open_list_against_edit(a_brn    number
Function set_in_list_completed(a_brn           number
Procedure post_in_pymt(a_brn          number
Procedure validate_agnt_acct_bal( a_brn        number
procedure get_inlist_rem_nums(a_in_brn
procedure set_last_inrem_nums(a_agnt_type       number
function get_trsr_pymt_ser ( a_pymt_yr    number
function get_cust_pymt_ser return number;
 CREATE OR REPLACE Package Body inrempk is
Procedure validate_agnt_acct_bal( a_brn        number
  procedure chk_agnt_curr_bal(a_agnt_acct_brn  number
  begin
            Begin
            Exception
            End;
             Begin
                 select OVRD_BAL_PRIV
                   from MTX_V_USERS
                  where S_USERID = prmpkg.get_userid;
             Exception
             End;
                        begin
                                select decode(prmpkg.get_lang,
                                 from gen_curr c
                          where c.curr_no = a_agnt_curr_no
                        exception
                        end;
        end;
        Begin
             select d.ACCT_NO
             from mtx_v_dealers_brn d
            where d.DLR_NO     = a_agt_no
        Exception
        End;
    for rec in (select a.deal_curr_no                       curr_no
                from mtx_in_mst_amts a
               where a.brn_no       = a_brn
                             group by a.deal_curr_no
Function in_test_no_exst(a_agt_no     number
  cursor v_ic is select upper(m.in_test_no)
                                   from mtx_in_mst m
                                  where m.agent_type  = a_agt_cat
Procedure adjust_in_rems
     for amtrec in (select a.CURR_NO
                                     from    mtx_in_mst_amts a
                                    where a.BRN_NO  = a_brn
          update mtx_in_trx i
           where i.trx_status = 1                -- just new!
procedure adjust_mst_amts_tbl(a_brn         number
                 update mtx_in_mst_amts  a
                      where    a.brn_no  = a_brn
procedure adjust_mst_amts_entrd(a_brn     number
      for rec  in ( select sum(nvl(i.trx_amt,0))  curr_amt_sum
                     from  mtx_in_trx i
                    where i.trx_status = 1
                    group by i.trx_curr_no
         update mtx_in_mst_amts  a
              where    a.brn_no  = a_brn
procedure adjust_data(a_brn_no               number
       update mtx_in_trx i
            where i.trx_status      = 1                                -- just new!
Function get_max_auto_aprv_amt return number is
    select c.IN_APR_DFLT_LMT
      from mtx_ctrl c
     where rownum <= 1;
Exception
Function is_lst_amts_consistent(a_brn  number
  for rec in (select sum(nvl(a.CURR_AMT,0))   curr_amt
                            from MTX_IN_MST_AMTS a
                           where a.BRN_NO  = a_brn
                             group by a.curr_no )
        Begin
                select sum(nvl(i.TRX_AMT,0))
                from MTX_IN_TRX i
               where i.trx_status  = 1             -- still new
        exception
        end;
    select count(0)
    from MTX_IN_TRX i
   where i.trx_status  = 1             -- still new
Procedure close_list_against_edit(a_brn    number
    -- update the whole inward list status
    Begin
          update MTX_IN_MST i
             where i.in_list_status = 1
        Exception
        End;
        begin
          select max(i.in_rem_no)
            from mtx_in_trx i
             where i.trx_status   = 1
                 group by   i.frm_agent_type
        Exception
        End;
    -- update the agent last
Procedure open_list_against_edit(a_brn    number
    -- update the whole inward list status
    Begin
          update MTX_IN_MST i
             where i.in_list_status = 1
        Exception
        End;
procedure set_last_inrem_nums(a_agnt_type       number
    -- update the agent last
        Begin
                      update mtx_stp_accts s
                         where s.BRN_NO          = a_agnt_brn
                   update mtx_agents a
                         where a.agt_no          = a_agnt_no
            Exception
            End;
Function set_in_list_completed(a_brn           number
    begin
        select m.in_list_status
          From mtx_in_mst m
         where m.BRN_NO             = a_brn
             for update of  m.BRN_NO
    exception
    end;
        Begin
            select IN_REM_BRN
             from  mtx_stp_accts
            where  brn_no = a_brn;
        exception
        End;
    begin
        select nvl(IN_APR_DFLT_LMT,0)
         from mtx_ctrl
         where rownum <=1;
    exception
    end;
        Begin
              select d.ACCT_NO
                from mtx_v_dealers d
               where d.dlr_cat = a_agnt_type
        Exception
        End;
        Begin
              select d.a_cost_center
                from mtx_agents d
               where d.agt_no  = a_agnt_no;
        Exception
        End;
            Begin
                  select d.ACCT_NO
                    from mtx_v_dealers_brn d
                   where d.dlr_cat         = a_agnt_type
            exception
            End;
  for rec in (select i.BRN_NO
                            From  mtx_in_trx i
                         where i.trx_status         = 1
                             for  update of  i.TRX_STATUS
                       -- for fee ded from amount
                       elsif rec.in_fee_ded_flag = 1 -- deduct from amount
                                  begin
                                            select decode(rec.fast_flag,1,IN_QUICK_ACCT_BRN,IN_REM_BRN)
                                             from  mtx_stp_accts
                                            where  brn_no = rec.pass_to_brn
                                        exception
                                    end;
            if rec.in_fee_ded_flag = 1 and  -- fees deducted from inward amount // .
               elsif rec.in_fee_ded_flag = 1 and  -- fees deducted from inward amount.
                        Begin
                              update MTX_IN_TRX i
                                 where i.trx_status = 1
                            Exception
                            End;
                   begin
                           update MTX_IN_TRX i
                            where i.trx_status = 1
                            Exception
                            End;
-- create fee vouchers for th fee which ded from amount
                begin
                      select s.acct_brn_no
                   from mtx_stp_accts s
                  where s.brn_no = c_main_brn
                exception
                end;
      for rec in (select count(0)                              tot_inrem_cnt
                                From  mtx_in_trx     i
                             where i.trx_status         = 1
                 group by i.TRX_CURR_NO
      for rcvrec in (select count(0)                              tot_rcv_fee_cnt
                                From  mtx_in_trx     i
                             where i.trx_status         = 1
                 group by i.RCV_FEE_CURR_NO
  -- update all inwards transfers status:
         Begin
          update MTX_IN_TRX i
             where i.trx_status     = 1
        Exception
        End;
    -- update the whole inward list status
        Begin
              update MTX_IN_MST i
                 where i.in_list_status = 1
            Exception
            End;
    -- update the agent last
Procedure post_in_pymt(a_brn          number
    Begin
       select r.PAY_CURR_NO
        from  MTX_TRX_PYMT  r
       where  r.PYMT_YR   = a_yr
             for update of  r.PYMT_STATUS
        exception
        End;
        Begin
            select acct_brn_no
             from  mtx_stp_accts s
            where s.brn_no = a_brn
        exception
        End;
  if v_fee_ded_flag     = 1 and -- deducted from in. rem. amount
             begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_cust_acct_brn
                        exception
                        End;
             begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_cust_acct_brn
                        exception
                End;
                   begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_orgnl_rcvr_brn
                        exception
                        End;
                          Begin
                                select  decode(v_lang,1,BNK_ADES,BNK_EDES) BNK_ADES
                                 from  MTX_BANKS     r                                      
                                where  r.BNK_NO    = v_bnk_no;                          
                            exception
                            End;
             begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_bnk_acct_brn
                        exception
                        End;
             begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_bnk_acct_brn
                        exception
                        End;
                   begin
                        select decode(v_lang,1,nvl(b.brn_ades,b.brn_edes)
                          from s_brn         b
                         where b.brn_no = v_orgnl_rcvr_brn
                        exception
                        End;
                          Begin
                                select ACCT_BRN_NO
                                 from  MTX_BANK_BRN  b
                                where  b.BNK_NO    = v_bnk_no
                            exception
                            End;
                        Begin
                            select ACCT_BRN_NO
                             from  MTX_BANKS b
                            where b.BNK_NO    = v_bnk_no;
                        exception
                    End;
                          Begin
                                select ACCT_BRN_NO
                                 from  MTX_BANK_BRN  b
                                where  b.BNK_NO    = v_cust_bnk_no
                            exception
                            End;
                        Begin
                            select ACCT_BRN_NO
                             from  MTX_BANKS b
                            where b.BNK_NO    = v_cust_bnk_no;
                        exception
                        End;
      elsif v_pymt_mthd  = 1 or -- cash payment from treaser
     /* if v_fee_ded_flag = 1      -- deducted from in. rem. amoun
    -- begin to add the new benefit to inremittance customers
     begin
            select nvl(CUST_PYMT_SER,1)
              from mtx_ctrl;
     exception
     end;
      -- update inward status
            Begin
                  update MTX_OUT_TRX o
                   where o.trx_status = 4            -- not paid
                Exception
                End;
            Begin
                          update MTX_IN_TRX' || v_rcv_brn_dblink || ' i
                           where i.trx_status = 2                                    -- ready for payment
                Exception
                End;
      -- update payment status
        Begin
              update MTX_TRX_PYMT r
               where  PYMT_YR  = a_yr
            Exception
            End;
           Begin
           Begin
            select  
            from mtx_in_trx n
            where 
           exception when  others Then
           End;
                 update web_in_OUT_TRX@mysql2oracle w
                where w.trx_status = 4            -- not paid
           Exception
           End;
procedure get_inlist_rem_nums(a_in_brn                             number
     open v_rc for ' select  i.in_rem_no    in_rem_no
                                          from mtx_in_trx i
                                         where i.trx_status = 1          -- new
                                          group by i.in_rem_no '
Exception
function get_trsr_pymt_ser (  a_pymt_yr   number
   begin
             select nvl(TRSR_PYMT_SER,0)+1
               from mtx_trsrs
              where brn_no       = a_pymt_brn
           exception
   end;
  update mtx_trsrs set TRSR_PYMT_SER = nvl(v_trsr_pymt_ser,1)
                where brn_no       = a_pymt_brn
--  exception
function get_cust_pymt_ser return number is
   begin
      select nvl(CUST_PYMT_SER,0)+1
        from mtx_ctrl
   exception
           execute immediate 'alter table mtx_ctrl add (CUST_PYMT_SER number(1))';
   end;
     update mtx_ctrl set CUST_PYMT_SER= nvl(v_cust_pymt_ser,0);
    end;

SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_ADES,MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_EDES)   FROM MTX_V_DEALERS  WHERE MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_NO = :b2  AND MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_CAT = DECODE(:b3,2,2,3,3,4,4)  AND DLR_STATUS = 1"
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN.DLR_ADES,MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN.DLR_EDES)   FROM MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN  WHERE MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN.DLR_NO = :b2  AND DLR_BRN_NO = :b3  AND MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN.DLR_CAT = DECODE(:b4,2,2,3,3,4,4)  AND DLR_STATUS = 1"
SELECT NVL(B.TRSR_BAL,0),NVL(TRSR_MIN_BAL,0),NVL(TRSR_MAX_BAL,0),NVL(ALLOW_BELOW_MIN,1),NVL(ALLOW_ABOVE_MAX,1)   FROM MTX_TRSR_BAL B  WHERE B.BRN_NO = :b1  AND B.TRSR_SER = :b2  AND B.CURR_NO = :b3"
SELECT S_FG_ENT || S_FG_UPD  || S_FG_DEL  || S_FG_QRY  || S_FG_PRN    FROM S_USERROLE  WHERE S_USERID = :b1  AND S_PRGCD = UPPER(:b2)"
SELECT TRSR_SER,DECODE(:b1,1,TRSR_ADES,TRSR_EDES)   FROM MTX_V_USER_TRSRS P  WHERE S_USERID = :b2  AND ROWNUM <= 1"
SELECT I.IN_SER,I.TRX_SER,I.IN_YEAR,DECODE(:b1,1,D.DLR_ADES,D.DLR_EDES) DLR_DESC,DECODE(:b1,1,B.DLR_ADES,B.DLR_EDES) DLR_BRN_DESC,I.BNF_ANAME,I.SNDR_NAME,I.TRX_CURR_NO,I.TRX_AMT,I.TRX_EXCH_RATE,I.TRX_LAMT,I.FEE_CURR_NO,I.FEE_AMT,I.FEE_EXCH_RATE,I.FEE_LAMT,I.IN_FEE_DED_FLAG   FROM MTX_V_IN_TRX I,MTX_V_DEALERS D,MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN B  WHERE I.BRN_NO = :b3  AND I.AGENT_TYPE = D.DLR_CAT  AND I.AGENT_NO = D.DLR_NO  AND I.AGNET_BRN_NO = B.DLR_BRN_NO  AND D.DLR_CAT = B.DLR_CAT  AND D.DLR_NO = B.DLR_NO  AND I.TRX_STATUS = 2  AND I.DLVRY_TYPE IN ( 3  ) AND I.TRX_DATE = NVL(:b4,I.TRX_DATE)  AND NVL(I.CUST_SER,0) = NVL(:b5,NVL(I.CUST_SER,0))  AND I.TRX_CURR_NO = NVL(:b6,I.TRX_CURR_NO)  AND I.AGENT_TYPE = NVL(:b7,I.AGENT_TYPE)  AND I.AGENT_NO = NVL(:b8,I.AGENT_NO)  AND I.AGNET_BRN_NO = NVL(:b9,I.AGNET_BRN_NO)  AND I.TRNS_RSN_NO = NVL(:b10,I.TRNS_RSN_NO)  AND B.CNTRY_NO = NVL(:b11,B.CNTRY_NO)  AND B.CITY_NO = NVL(:b12,B.CITY_NO)  AND I.BNF_ANAME LIKE  NVL(:b13,I.BNF_ANAME)  AND I.SNDR_NAME LIKE  NVL(:b14,I.SNDR_NAME)  AND I.TRNS_RSN_NO = NVL(:b15,I.TRNS_RSN_NO)  AND I.TRX_AMT = NVL(:b16,I.TRX_AMT)"
SELECT EXCH_MTHD   FROM GEN_V_CURR  WHERE CURR_NO = :b1"SELECT EXCH_MTHD   FROM GEN_V_CURR  WHERE CURR_NO = :b1"

 from  MTX_V_USER_TRSRS 
where  BRN_NO = :parameter.BRANCH

UPDATE MTX_BNKS_CHK_DTL C SET C.CHK_STATUS=3 WHERE C.CHK_NO = :b1  AND C.BNK_NO = :b2  AND C.BRN_NO = :b3  AND C.CHK_CURR = :b4"SELECT C.BRN_NO,C.BNK_NO,C.CHK_NO,C.CHK_CURR   FROM MTX_BNKS_CHK_DTL C  WHERE C.CHK_NO = :b1  AND C.BNK_NO = :b2  AND C.BRN_NO = :b3  AND C.CHK_CURR = :b4  AND C.CHK_STATUS = 1"
SELECT decode(:parameter.lang,1,BNK_ADES,BNK_EDES) BNK_ADES 
FROM mtx_v_this_brn_banks
where bnk_status = 1 
order by decode(:parameter.lang,1,BNK_ADES,BNK_EDES)
select CHK_CNCL_TYPE  cncl_ser
 From MTX_CHK_CNCL_TYPES 
order by decode(:parameter.lang,1,CHK_CNCL_ADES,
SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,C.CHK_CNCL_ADES,C.CHK_CNCL_EDES) CHK_CNCL_ADES   FROM MTX_CHK_CNCL_TYPES C  WHERE C.CHK_CNCL_TYPE = :b2"
UPDATE MTX_BNKS_CHK_DTL D SET D.CHK_STATUS=1 WHERE D.BRN_NO = :b1  AND D.BNK_NO = :b2  AND D.CHK_NO = :b3  AND D.CHK_CURR = :b4  AND D.CHK_YR = :b5"
UPDATE MTX_BNKS_CHK_DTL D SET D.CHK_STATUS=3 WHERE D.BRN_NO = :b1  AND D.BNK_NO = :b2  AND D.CHK_NO = :b3  AND D.CHK_CURR = :b4  AND D.CHK_YR = :b5"

 FROM 
 MTX_REF_MST where ref_type=1

SELECT DECODE(:b1,1,MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_ADES,MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_EDES)   FROM MTX_V_DEALERS  WHERE MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_NO = :b2  AND MTX_V_DEALERS.DLR_CAT = DECODE(:b3,2,2,3,3,4,4)  AND DLR_STATUS = 1"

SELECT ALL CURR_SHRT, 
FROM GEN_v_CURR

from MTX_V_DEALERS_BRN
 where

FROM MTX_V_DEALERS

FROM GEN_CNTRY

FROM GEN_CITIES 
WHERE

FROM MTX_CUST_OUT_BNFS 
WHERE 
SELECT GEN_CNTRY.CNTRY_ADES   FROM GEN_CNTRY  WHERE GEN_CNTRY.CNTRY_NO = :b1"

from mtx_customers

WHERE
